E kī ana kāhore rawa ngā Rūhia i tae rawa ki roto ki te tino o te pā o te Tāke, engari i waho kau nei e noho ana
E kī ana ngā mōhio me pūputu te kai, engari kia iti ngā kai.
E kī ana ngā tohutohu me huri tākaraka, ka huriruatia e Tame - i wāna nei hoki!
E kī ana rātou kāhore he kai o te putiputi, he moumou tāima te whakatupu putiputi
E kī ana tana pēke i te pūhā ngaore.
E kī ana te Paipera e toru ngā mea nui i te ao, ko te tūmanako, te whakapono me te aroha.
E kī ana te Pākehā, ahakoa te kino o te kōrero ka kawea mai e ia, kaua e pūhia te uriuri!
E kī ana te kōrero he māmā noa te tauwehe i te hākawa i āna moni.
E kī ana te kōrero mā te tokorau e kaha ake ai te kōingo o te ngākau.
E kī ana te tākuta mā te waikawa e kekero ai te tona i tana ihu.
E kī ana tētahi i noho tonu ngā tūpuna Māori i roto i te puehu, i te paru, i roto i ngā wharepuni kāore nei e tomo atu te hau ora, otirā i ora noa ake rātou, i tupu pakari tonu
E kī ana ētahi kāore e pai te pakepaketai hei wahie, i te mea he nui rawa te tote o roto.
E kī e kī, ka haere mai te pōkokohua rā ki konei piopio ai i a tātou!
E kī kei te inu tī koutou - kei hea kē tāku?
E kī ko Taiwan te kāinga taketake o te Māori!
E kī kua haere ia ki te tāone i te taha o ana hoa, nāhana katoa ēnei pereti paruparu i te kīhini.
E kī tonu ana te kiri i ngā putaputa ririki, e puta ana i reira te kakawa i ngā rā werawera, i ngā wā e mahi kaha ai te tinana
E kī! He aha rāua i mahue ai?
E kī! Āpōpō ka tīkoro ō whatu ki Mahurangi. (E tohu ana i te hokinga o ngā whakaaro ki tētahi āhuatanga i tū ai tō ihu, i whakaparahakotia ai rānei e koe.)
E kī, e kī, ka whakakoha mai kōrua ko pūhaehae i āna mahi!
E kī, he hū rekereke teitei anō ōu!
E kīia ana e 78 ōrau te rahi o te hauota i te hau takiwā.
E kīia ana e te Pākehā he puruhi te kaitītaritari i te mate kino nei i te pūponika
E kīia ana e te Pākehā he puruhi te kaitītaritari i te mate kino nei, i te pūponika
E kīia ana he mea whakapiko he rakau tū, ka herengia te rapa o te taiaha rā ki te kāuru, ka tukua kia rere
E kīia ana he pari poupou rawa taua pari, ki te paheke te waewae o te tangata, hei matenga rawatanga tēnā
E kīia ana hoki e waru rau tonu te kairākau o te ope
E kīia ana ka tere ngā inanga ki te takiwā o Tonga rā anō, ki reira whakaputa uri ai.
E kīia ana ko Kupe te Māori tuatahi i tae mai ki Aotearoa nei.
E kīia ana ko Tāwera te whetū whakataki i te ata.
E kīia ana ko te perehitene o Amerika te tangata tino mana katoa o te ao.
E kīia ana kāore te wairua e peapeau i te huarahi ki te rēinga.
E kīia ana ngā niho o mua he niho tapahi, i te mea koirā tā rātou mahi nui, he tapatapahi kai.
E kīia ana te tangata he rauropi, nā te mea e ora ana.
E kīia ana tēnei tū o te mate kohi he 'tere' he 'kohi karapu', he tere nō te pā mai, he tere hoki nō te mate o te tangata
E kīia ana, mēnā ka whakatata atu he waewae tapu, kāore i roa ka ua te rangi
E kīia nei ki te nane mitimiti oko
E kītia ana, e waru marama matatia ana te kānga kōpiro. Ki a au nei, me patupatu rawa ki roto i te tāora kua oti hoki te muru mai, kia ngohengohe rawa, kātahi ka kōhua kia maoa. Na kua riringi he waiū ki runga, ka kōrori atu he huka ki roto, na kua reka ake i te pākū Pākehā
E kō ana rā hoki te taratahi a Tāwhaki, ka tau ki raro
E kō mā, whakawahawaha, tātou ka haere
E kōharihari ana a roto o tōku puku
E kōhonihoni noa ana te kōtiro i tana pihikete kia kore ai e tere pau.
E kōhuhū ana te wai i te puna.
E kōhura ake ana te tupu o te rīwai i raro i te whenua
E kōingo ana te tamaiti i te mea kua ngaro tana pōro.
E kōingo ana tōku ngākau ki tōku hoa ka riro
E kōingo tonu ana ki te wā kāinga i mahue atu rā i ngā tau ki muri.
E kōingoingo ana te kurī rā i te mataku.
E kōkeke ana ngā tārakerake i te matapihi o te waka ki te ūkui atu i te ua.
E kōkeke ana ngā tīma e rua, kei tētahi pito o te papa tākaro, taro ake kua rere ki tērā pito.
E kōkeko ana a Hine ki te puta ki waho ki te whakamātau i tana manu tukutuku hou.
E kōkihi ana ngā rau maroke i te pupuhi a te hau angiangi.
E kōmingo ana te tau o taku ate me he ia waipuke
E kōmingo haere ana te wai i te kōhao o te tāpu.
E kōmitimiti ana te kakara rēmana me te kakara wātakirihi.
E kōmuhumuhu ana mōku te hunga katoa e kino ana ki ahau; e whakatakoto ana i te kino mōku
E kōnehu ana te rarauhe, mokonahatia te waha o te kurī, kei tāhae
E kōngangengange ana te ihu o te arewhana mai i tētahi taha ki tētahi.
E kōningo ana te tau o taku ate, me he ia waipuke
E kōpaki ana māua i ngā koha kirihimete i tēnei hāora, kia kore ai ngā tamariki e kite.
E kōpana ana tana māhunga i te kaha matewai.
E kōpatapata mai ana ngā roimata o Ranginui.
E kōpiko ana ngā waka kōmaru i te nuku o te moana.
E kōpiupiu ana ngā tamariki noho tārere, e mārangaranga ana ngā tamariki noho tīemiemi.
E kōpura mai nei te whetū
E kōrangaranga ana te pāpā ki tana tama, he kore nō te tama e whai i ngā tohutohu, he whakaputa mōhio hoki.
E kōrangaranga ana tōku manawa
E kōrangaranga ana ōna waewae i te roa e tū ana.
E kōraparapa ana te tāngaengae o te pēpi i tōna whānautanga mai.
E kōrero ana taua tangata mea ake ka pau ngā mīti . . .  engari te parāoa me ētahi atu kai, e kore e pau wawe
E kōrero ana te koroheke me te mau tonu o tana paipa ki te pī o te waha.
E kōrerohia ana ngā take, ka whakatōngā ia, ka tatari.
E kōrerotia ana e te niupepa, tērā tētahi tupua i kitea i roto i te whenua, e pūkai tonu ana ngā wheua, kua kōhatutia, ā e kīia ana ko taua ngārara tipua nei, nō ngā mano tau o ngā whakatupuranga
E kōrerotia ana ngā pūtea pēke a te marae, kātahi ka kaipohau te koroua mō te whawhai i Karipori.
E kōrewha ana te tamaiti nā he tata rawa nōna ki te pouaka whakaata.
E kōriro ake ana te tupu o te kāpana
E kōrūrū ana te whare i te haurokuroku.
E kōtamutamu ana te waha o runga, engari anō te waha o raro.
E kōture mai ana te poroiwi i tana waewae whati.
E kōtītiti ana te tokorua rā i te tāone - ko wai ka mōhio āhea hoki mai ai.
E kōwhāwhā mai ana ngā rama whero o te waka rererangi.
E kūnāwiri ana me te kunanu anō.
E kūwai tonu ana te huarahi i te roa e ua ana.
E kūwata ana te koroheke ki te kai kererū māna.
E kūwawa ana tana mahi, engari ka oti pai tonu i a ia.
E mahara katoa ana te tangata ki te whāngai i te tinana, he ruarua ia e mahara ana ki te whāngai i ō rātou wairua
E mahara tonu ana āna mokopuna i tana noho torotika i tana kāwhena ā tae noa ki te rā tuatoru
E mahi ana a koroua i tana māra e tangi ana te reo irirangi i tana taha.
E mahi ana ia i te pokapū rangahau o te whare wānanga.
E mahi ana ia i te wāhanga ratonga rorohiko o taua whakahaere.
E mahi ana ki te āta pānui i tana pukapuka, ka kanu kē ki te wakatopa e taiāwhio ana i runga ake.
E mahi koe i tō mahi - ki konei au titiro atu ai.
E mahi nui ana te whānau kia whakawāteatia te whenua kua roa e tupuria ana e te tahuere.
E mahi rā te Māori i tāna mahi, a te hautū, a te pūkana, kia tere ai te waka, kia kaha ai hoki ngā kaihoe
E mahia ana tana niho waha e te rata niho.
E maka ana te tokorua i te pōro, e āta mātakihia atu ana e te kurī me te whakatahataha anō o tana māhunga.
E mama mai ana te wai i taua toka mātatatata.
E mamae ana ngā pokohiwi i te amonga rākau.
E mamae ana ngā uawhā i te roa e tū turipēpeke ana.
E mamae ana taku rei i te maremare.
E mamae ana tana karu katau i te kiritoi e puku mai ana i te paeraro.
E mamae ana ōku tako i taku kaha ki te parāihe i aku niho.
E mamina ana te Whare Wānanga kia mau katoa ngā waiata a te koroua i mua i tōna matenga.
E mana tonu ana te whakaaetanga tiaki i te awa, i waenga i ngā kaiwhakahaere o te whare hiko me te iwi kāinga.
E manaka noa ana te ngākau kei marangai, kei waho tonu rātou e hī ana.
E manana ana te hikumārō o te tute
E manana ana te hukumaro o te tute
E manawa kino ana au kei rutua te kuia e te ngaru.
E manawa kino ana kei tae tōmuri atu rāua ki te taunga waka rererangi.
E manawapā ana ahau ki te kōrero, kāhore hoki he mea hei hoatutanga māku ki a ia
E manawareka ana ngā mātua kua eke tā rāua kōtiro ki te tīma poitarawhiti Māori o te motu.
E mangeo ana ōna waewae i rapia e te toetoe.
E marara haere ana ngā moka pihikete i te papa.
E marara noa ana ngā riki, kāore anō i paiheretia hei pūhanga.
E maremare ana a kuia - he tohu kua werohia e te māeke.
E marere kau ana te tūpāpaku, kua puta mai te parapara i te waha, pēnei tonu te āhua me te waipiro, ko te kakara, rite tonu
E matahanahana ana te rangi i ngā rama o te tāone nui.
E matakawa ana au ki a ia i te mea he pākiwaha, he waha papā.
E matangurunguru ana te whānau i tō rātou maikiroa.
E mate ana i te wewehe, koirā ia e tāwheta nei.
E mate kanehe ana au ki a Hare. Ahakoa, kāre a Hare e aro mai ki a au
E matekiri ana kāore nei tā rāua mātāmua i toro i tana matua i te hōhipera.
E matengi ngā kete o te wānanga, ko te kete tuauri, ko te kete tuatea, ko te kete aronui.
E matenui ana te kuia kia riro māna e whakatipu tana mokopuna.
E matewai ana te kurī - me kimi he wai hei inu māna.
E matihe ana au i te nui o te puehu.
E mau ana i ngā kākahu rite motuhake ake nō rātou, nō te Hāhi Rātana anake, ko te pāpura, ko te mā me te kōura ngā kara
E mau ana tana pōtae tōrangapū, koinā ia e noho taiapa nā.
E mau ana te pānui ki te matapihi o te toa, e kī ana kua ngaro tana kurī.
E mau ana te wātaka pūtaiao mō te tau i te kūaha matua o te akomanga.
E mau anō ō koutou tūpare ki ō koutou māhunga
E mau kope tonu ana tā rāua pēpi i tērā wā.
E mau mai ana ki te kete rauemi nei te pukapuka aratohu, te kōpae rorohiko, tae atu ki te atamira me ngā whakapaipai e tū ai he whakaari karetao.
E mau tonu ana te kiko o taua tohorā ki te niho tāpiki o Kae, nā konā ia i raru ai.
E mau tonu ana te takini o te puhi ka riro māna e tomo te whare.
E mau tonu nei ngā pūrākau a tēnā iwi, a tēnā iwi hei taonga mā hekeheke iho, mā pikipiki ake.
E maumahara tonu ana au ki taku kuia, ahakoa e toru noa aku tau ka mate ia.
E mauāhara tonu ana taua tangata ki a au
E mea ana a Hine he tangata purotu a Para.
E mea ana a Hongi, he haumi tēnei ki a ia
E mea ana au ki te peita i te tuanui o tōku whare ā te wiki e tū mai nei.
E mea ana au ki te pātai i tā rātou taunaha i taua pito whenua mō rātou ake. Nō tātou kē tērā whenua.
E mea ana au ki te rihaina ki te rite tonu tana tapitapi i aku mahi.
E mea ana au kia rongo ngā tāngata Māori o Heretaunga ki te tini o te hanga kei a au e tū ana. Ngā hānehi parau, me ngā kara hōiho
E mea ana au tērā pea koe e hōhā i te pōrearea ōku ki te tuhi pukapuka atu ki a koe
E mea ana au, tērā pea koe e hōhā i te pōrearea ōku ki te tuhi pukapuka atu ki a koe
E mea ana hoki tēnei whārangi nā te Kuīni i tino whakaae, i tino whakapūmau hoki, ki ngā rangatira Māori me ngā iwi Māori, ki ngā hapū me ngā tāngata hoki, ko ō rātou oneone, ko ō rātou whenua, me ō rātou taonga ake
E mea ana ia ki te hoko koti mō tana punua kurī, kia kore ai ia e werohia e te māeke.
E mea ana koe ka uru ō kuruhope kunekune ki tēnā tarau?
E mea ana māua, ko ngā whakaakoranga o te ohinga e piri ki a rātou taea noatia te koroheketanga, te kuiatanga
E mea ana māua, kātahi nei anō te mahi hē rawa atu ko ngā tikanga o taua Pira hou a Mākarini
E mea ana ngā nūpepa, he komiti tonu te mahi a Te Whānau-a-Apanui i ngā pō katoa, arā he whakaaro ki te rāhuitanga o te moana i te matenga o ā rātou tamariki
E mea ana tana kupu, ka nui te hē o ngā Māori e matakana ana i ngā ritenga Kāwanatanga nō te mea kua kotahi te Pākehā rāua ko te Māori kua rite tonu ngā Ture o te Māori rāua ko te Pākehā
E mea mai ana te pānui i te kēti, he huarahi tūmataiti tērā, kua kore mātou e āhei atu.
E mea mā, haere mai ki te mātakitaki; he āhua kē anō tēnei nō te koroheke nei
E mea rā kua tauheke te haere a te rā ki te rua
E meinga ana kua heke te toto, kua hihinga te tangata
E menemene ana ngā tamariki ki ngā mahi hangareka a tō rātau hoa i muri i te māhita.
E mihi ana ki ngā iwi, ā, ka mutu, ka puaki i ēnei kupu, 'E te iwi horoia au, taku parunga mai rā anō i Tāmaki e paru nei anō'
E mihi atu ana tēnei ki a koutou i raro i te ngākau pōuri, mō tēnei aituā whakaharahara kua pā mai nei ki ngā iwi e rua
E mihi kau ana, e mihi kau ana, kei te mātātahi pūmanawa rau
E minaka ana taku waha ki te kai nei
E mitia ana ngā waewae e ngā ngaru, ka pōrukutia tana panekoti ki ana kūhā.
E mitimiti ana te hipi i te kahu e kōpaki ana i tana reme.
E moe ana ahau, nā, ka kamu ko taku ringa, he tākiri, he tohu kai
E moe ana ia, ka pupuhi te hau, ka tīmata ngā rākau ki te rūrū, me te takataka iho o te huarākau
E moe ana te pēpē i ngā kūhā o tōna māmā.
E moe ana te rangatira i te kopa o te whare.
E moe hurihuri ana, he pāihi nōna ki te nui o ana nama.
E moe i te tangata ringa raupā
E moe whakatorouka ana a Te Ponga ki te pēwheatanga rā e tata ai ia ki a Te Puhihuia
E mua āta haere, e muri tātākino
E muia ana ngā wāhi katoa e tēnei mea te moroiti, he pai ētahi, he kino ētahi.
E muia ana te whare e ngā momo kutukutu katoa, wetiweti ana.
E mura ana te whawhai ki Āwherika ka pāha he pakanga kē ki Haina
E muri ahiahi kia nohoia ake, te tūranga ki runga, ka wairuhi te tinana
E muri ahiahi takoto ki te moenga; whakatoro ana mai ko tō wairua tonu
E muri ana i runga i te mōhio ka taka katoa tērā pīkaunga ki runga i a ia.
E muri koe ahiahi nei kia nohoia ake tahi hoki te aroha
E muriroa ana ki ngā hoa mō te pai o tana māra kai, ka titiro noa atu ngā hoa i tō rātou mōhio ko te wahine kē te mea pukumahi o rāua.
E mā ana, e kanapa ana te mata o te hoari nei
E māharahara ana ngā tohunga pūtaiao i te iti haere o te tio i ngā kōpakatanga o te ao.
E mākū ana a konei, me tapanihi atu mā korā.
E mānatunatu ana te ngākau ki tana kōtiro hauā kua tīmata i te kura i te rā nei.
E māngi ana te ngākau, e ārewa noa iho ana te mahara
E mānānana ana te kumu o te kōtiro i te hia mimi.
E mārama ake ai koe ki ēnei karakia, me pānui ngā whakamārama a Te Pēhi.
E mārohirohi ana au i te roa o te ara
E mātaki ana i te pouaka whakaata, ka warea e te moe.
E mātaki ana ia i te wakapīhau me te mīharo ki te hīkoi o ōna waewae.
E mātaki ana mātou i te paru e pupū ake ana i te ngāwhā.
E mātakitaki ana i ngā mahi a ngā toa ki te whakaipo i ngā uwha.
E mātihetihe ana i te hae o ngā pua.
E māturu noa mai ana te kīnaki Hainamana i te pounamu.
E māturuturu mai ana te wai i ana kaka potere.
E māue ana te rimurapa i ngā wai hūkerikeri.
E māwe ana te rimurimu i ngā kukume a te tai.
E māwewe ana te punua kurī i te māeke.
E mīharotia ana te ū o taua nūpepa ki te tika, ki te pono i roto i ngā tau.
E mōhio ana a ia ki te tīkaro i te tika kia kore ai e ngaro i roto i ngā haupū o te hē
E mōhio ana ahau kei te patu mai koe i a māua ko taku hau, e kore taku hau e riro i tō karakia
E mōhio ana ahau ki te whakarongo, erangi horekau ahau e tino mōhio ana ki te kōrero Māori
E mōhio ana au kei hea ia e noho ana - arā kei te kokonga o Huia me Nīkau.
E mōhio ana au, tino uaua tēnei take i roto i ēnei rā o te korekore, engari kaua e waiho mā reira e whakapūhuki mai ō koutou whakaaro
E mōhio ana ia ki ētahi kupu tōtoru nei, mea ake, kua maringi mai te kupu!
E mōhio ana mātou tērā pea ētahi o ā mātou whakatikatika e whakahētia e te taha Pākehā
E mōhiotia ana ina haere te tītī ki te moana ka wehe atu i te atapō ka hoki mai i muri i te pōrehurehu i te pō.
E mōhiotia ana kei te raruraru koe, me pēhea tā mātou āwhina atu?
E mōhiotia ana nā te ringa rehe tēnei i whatu i te ita o ngā whenu.
E mōnehunehu ana tana moko, ka tāruatia.
E mōrearea ana ki te haere kei mau i te rore o te mate.
E mōtero kai ana te kurī, me te rere anō o te hūare i te waha.
E naki haere ana te kāhu i runga i te hau.
E nako ana au ki te haere ki te oma i ngā pō ko au anake.
E nako ana te kuia kia tae atu ia ki tērā whenua rongonui i mua i tōna matenga.
E nanaku ana te kākāpō i tētahi mārua hei pae whakaipoipo mōna.
E nangā ana te kōtiro ki te tāne kei tērā taha o te whare kanikani
E nanu ana te whakaminenga i te hē o ngā māka i hoatu e ngā kaiwhakawā.
E nehe mā, he kēhua whakahaehae nōku te Māori kore e mōhio ki tōna ake reo, mau kē ki te reo o te Pākehā
E neinei ana te pane o te pārera
E neke haere ana ana matimati i te papa tupuna i a ia e tātai mai ana.
E ngahue kau ana ngā kōura o Whitianga
E ngaingai ana a koroua, he hikihiki maitai nōna.
E ngaio ana ngā tamariki; kei te pīrangi puta rātou ki waho kori ai.
E ngaki ana a mua; e tōtō ana a muri
E ngaki ana te tangata nei kia ekengia e ia ngā teiteitanga i roto i tēnei tākaro.
E ngakoro ana te kekeno i ngā moutere o Maungahuka.
E ngana ana a Hōri ki te whakapopore i ngā hōiho matakā rā.
E ngana ana kia kore katoa ngā mea i hangaia i runga i tō rātou whenua. I runga i te kaha whakatakariri o ngā Pākehā o Whakatū, ka karangatia he hui
E ngana ana ngā tamariki ki te kati i te rere o te wei o te awa iti, engari kāore e taea.
E nganangana mai rā a tama waha papā.
E ngaoko ana taku kūreitanga.
E ngara mai ana te kurī ki te tohu mai kia kaua au e whakatata atu.
E ngau ana te puku, kua wheo i te kaha o te mamae.
E ngau ana te taraute i te waewae o muri o te hōiho o te autaia nei, koia e kiki rā te hōiho
E ngau ana tētahi ki tētahi, e meke ana, e huhuti ana i ngā māhunga
E ngaua ana ngā tuarā o te hunga mātakitaki i te whutupōro e te pōtiki a Rakamaomao.
E ngaweki ana te mano o te tangata i ōna tiriti, te kiri mā, te kiri kaunenehu, me te kiri mangu
E ngawī ana te wiri a te kāmura.
E nge. Ka kīia atu kia kauaka e pēnā, ka upoko mārō tonu koe.
E ngeo ana i tana tamaiti, nā wai i kata, kua auē te waha.
E ngingio ana ngā tamariki i ngā mahi ngahau a te hako.
E ngita mai ana te nēhi i ngā rongoā kia ora ai taku tinana.
E ngongoro ana te ihu me te tīhoihoi anō te waha.
E ngote ana te pēpi i tana kōnui.
E ngote tonu ana te tamaiti rā i tana tōnui ahakoa kua haere kē ki te kura.
E ngote ū tonu ana a Tāneroa i tō rātou wehenga mai i Hawaiki ā, e ngote ū tonu ana i te taenga mai hoki
E nguha ai koe, e ngana ai koe, e toa ai koe
E ngunguru ana te wai i ngā tāheke o te kopi.
E ngunu ana te tangata rā i muri i te puke iti, kei kitea e te poaka.
E nguru ana me te kangakanga anō i te korekore o tētahi tangata i tērā pito hei whakautu i tana waea.
E ngā hoa, mēmea e hē ana me tere te whakahē
E ngā tini mate, haere, haere, haere atu rā.
E ngā tohunga o te manaaki, i ranea ai a kai, i puta ai a wanea, i tau ai a mauri, tēnā rawa atu rā koutou
E ngāngā ana, e puhapuha ana te poho.
E noho ana au i te tautara ki Te Mangatawa, kia mārama ai te titiro ki tua.
E noho ana hoki a Rehua i tōna kāinga i runga, ko te ingoa o tōna kāinga ko Te Pūtahi-nui-o-Rehua
E noho ana rātou i te rangimārie kātahi ka ara ake tēnei inati nui.
E noho ana te papa kāinga i tētahi whenua e pānaki atu ana ki te maunga.
E noho ana tāua, e tama, i te raru, i te pani
E noho hītengitengi ana te kuia ki te ngakingaki haere i te kūmara ki tana ketu.
E noho hū ana te kuratōpuni i te uru kānuka, e tatari ana kia hipa atu te hoariri.
E noho i raro i te hōpua kei pakapaka tō pākira i te rā.
E noho kiritapu tonu ana ahau i taku pīrangi kia kite i te ao i mua o taku mārenatanga.
E noho koe i runga i te ama, kei makere atu koe!
E noho kotahi nei tōna motu, ko ia anake
E noho kōhiwi noa iho ana te tangata, kāore he mahara
E noho mai ana ngā putiputi porotea i waenga i ngā mea poroporo.
E noho mai ana te rua tekau tāngata i te tēpu tāroaroa.
E noho mai ana te tūī i te kāuru o te rākau.
E noho mamae tonu ana tōna ngākau mō te pāhoro nanakia a Hongi Hika i a Te Tōtara i te tau 1821
E noho manawarū ana te tangata rā i a ia e tatari ana i te whiu a te kaiwhakawā i a ia.
E noho rā, e kare mā - kua hoki au.
E noho rā.
E noho tahanga ana te rua.
E noho tō tou ki konā - kāti te tou tīrairaka haere!
E noho tūhea ana, pēnei i te kāinga kēhua.
E noho waituhi ana te repo i ngā toto o ngā hoariri i mate i te pakanga.
E noho whātata ana ō mātou whenua ki ō rātou.
E noho, e Whana, tāria koe e whakatārehe i te rā o te waru
E nonoi ana te iwi kāinga kia noho atu tāua ki te hākari.
E nonoke ana te tokorua, ko tētahi ki runga e puhapuha ana, ko tētahi ki raro e takawheta ana.
E nui ana tōku koa mōu i tae mai ki te whakatuhera i tō mātau whare
E nui haere ake ana te wai, kua eke kei ngā kauhua o te waka te wai
E ohere ana tō tangata, koirā i amowheke ai.
E oho ana i te awatea kei te warawara te hiakai
E oho tonu ana ngā tamariki ahakoa kua tekau karaka i te pō.
E oi ana ngā hōia mai i tētahi rua ki tētahi, kei kitea e te hoariri.
E oi noa ana te tai o Te Awahou
E okaka ana a roto, e whiwhiu ana a waho.
E oke ana au ki te kimi mahi whaiutu ina riro i a au taku tohu mātauranga.
E oke ana, e kārapu ana te mangō, mea ake ka motu te aho, ngaro tonu atu te autaia mangō rā.
E oke i tō oke. Nāu te mahi nui.
E oma ana i te onepū me te pupuri anō i tana manu pākaukau, nā wai ā, ka rewa tana manu ki te rangi.
E omaki ana te kapua o te rangi
E ono hāora ia e kato rōpere ana i ia rā, koirā i kirirua ai ana matimati.
E ono hāora ia e taraiwa ana, tae rawa ake ki te kāinga, he hūhē te kai.
E ono hāora mātou e piki ana i te maunga, e toru hāora noa iho ki te heke mai anō ki raro.
E ono kapa mō te rau putu rākau tapahi. He iti rawa atu tēnei utu
E ono marama i pau ki te tātari i ngā raraunga i kohia mō tana mahi rangahau.
E ono mita te roa o te māra, e toru mita te whānui.
E ono ngā mata o te mataono tau, he rerekē te tau i tēnā mata, i tēnā.
E ono ngā pire hei kai māna mō ana tini mate i te ata, e whā atu anō i te ahiahi.
E ono ngā pounamu, ka tangohia kia rua, e whā ka noho tonu mai.
E ono ngā purawhetū ki tahaki
E ono ngā rā e mahia ai te mahi; ko te whitu ia o ngā rā he hāpati okiokinga, he huihuinga tapu: kaua tētahi mahi e mahia: he hāpati tēnā nō Ihowā, i ō koutou nohoanga katoa
E ono ngā waewae o te wētā.
E ono ngā whenu o te tauaki mārautanga reo Māori, ko te whakarongo, te kōrero, te pānui, te tuhituhi, te mātakitaki me te whakaatu.
E ono wiki te rōpū whakaari e taiāwhio haere ana. He torutoru noa ngā tāone kāore i toroa e rātou.
E ora tonu ana te rākau i takahia, engari kua koronuke te tipu.
E ori ana ngā māhuri i te kōkōhau.
E ori ana te kōtiro i a ia e waiata ana.
E ori haere ana te kurī, e hamu haere ana i ngā parapara o te rorerore.
E oti ai he koke, ka werohia atu te tōtō o te kāretu ki te tātārau o te whārangi.
E pae ana te rākau i te huarahi.
E pae mai ana ngā wahie, ngā pōwhatu me ngā hukapēke hei mahi i te tōnihinihi.
E pae mai ana te kaku ki ngā pareparenga o te awa.
E pahu ana te kurī i te mea he paihamu kei te tuanui o te whare.
E pahū mai ana te puku o te tāne, o te wahine, o te tamariki i te kainga a te ahi
E pai ana te haere, kātahi ka tāpoko atu ngā waewae ki te paru.
E pai ana te moe i tō tuahine, engari kaua tō tuahine ake - he ngau whiore kē tērā.
E pai ana te moe i tō tungāne, engari kaua tō tungāne ake - he irawaru kē tērā.
E pai ana te tupu o taku rēmana.
E pai ana te whakautu: 'Ko wai ka hua, ko wai ka tohu!' Waiho kia haere ana, mā te wā e whakaatu ōna huanga
E pai ana tērā, otiia me tahuri mai hoki rātou ki te whakakaha i tēnei mahi nui
E pai ana, e whae, e haere ana koe i te ara takitini, i te ara takimano
E pai ana, karia ka mārama ake koe ki ngā mahi.
E pai ana, kua mārama mātou ināianei ki te take o te raruraru
E pakara ana te waha o te tangata i te reka o te kai
E pakaroa ana ngā tamariki i tō rātou hokinga mai i tātahi.
E pakepakē ana ngā papa o te whare nei i te kaha o te hau.
E paki ana i te ata, nāwai ā, ka tāmarutia te rangi e te kapua pōkerekere.
E paki rā te paki o Atutahi
E paki rā te paki o Autahi
E pakiri atu ana ngā niho o te paretao o Tūhua
E pako ana i te oneone kia māmā ai te tupu o ngā kūmara.
E panau atu ana ki te taihua ki te wai.
E papahoro mai ana te witi i tētahi haenga i te pēke.
E papaki ana ngā ngutu o ngā toroa ki te mihi tētahi i tētahi.
E papaki ana te paihau o te manu
E papī mai ana te wai i ana hakihaki, ka pania ki te rongoā, ka takaia.
E paraparau ana mō te tokomaha o ngā tāngata rongonui e noho hoa tata ana ki a ia.
E parea ana te puaheiri ki ngā taha o te huarahi kia pai anō ai te haere o ngā waka.
E pari, e te tai, hohoro koia te keketu mai
E parori ana te noho o ana pikitia, i te hē o te whakairi.
E pati kai ana tō tamaiti i te kura, i te korenga ōu e mahi kai māna.
E patō mai rā ngā wahia e mura ana i te ahi.
E pau katoa ana i taua manu te ngūngū, ā me mātua mahi nui te tangata, ka hoki mai te hāwhe iti o ana kai ki a ia
E peka nei tāua ki tahaki, a taukinikini, a taurakuraku
E pekepeke ana, e whakatakataka ana, e whakatoitoi ana ngā hako, hei katakata mā ngā tamariki.
E pikari ana te koroua i te kaha mamae o tana tuara.
E piki ana anō i tana pikitanga ki Māheahea, ka hē te manawa
E piki ana i ngā toka pāhekeheke, ka karengo.
E piki ana rā i ngā pikitanga, ka whano ka tautuku aku turi
E piki koe ki runga i te tiemi nei kia tākaro tahi ai tāua.
E piki koe ki runga i te whare ki te āta here i ngā rauwhare ki te hiamo.
E piko ana te koromatua o taku waewae mauī engari e pai ana te mea o te waewae matau.
E pipī tonu mai ana te toto i te motu i tana waewae.
E pirara ana ngā whare mō te hunga takahi whenua me ngā kaiwhakangau tia i ērā maunga.
E pohane tonu nei te ngākau ki te mātauranga
E pona ana au i tēnei pito ki tēnā.
E popore ana te ngākau kāore tētahi tangata kotahi i hoki i te whakaaro he mūhore noa tana haere ki tā tātou kura
E popō noa ana te ahi, kāore e mura
E porara ana a raro o te kete, i komama ai
E pore ana i waenganui pō, aoake, kua ngenge tonu.
E poroaki ana mai taku māmā me taku tipuna wahine ki a au. 'Haere, e tama. Kia pai te tiaki i a koe. Kauaka e wareware ki te tuhi mai'
E porotaitaka ana te ao, ko tōna rite kei te poi Māori
E pou ē, he atua e ramarama nei i runga whare
E puaki ana te kupu pai, ko te mahi ia, kōrori kē
E puare katoa ana a roto, puta noa ki raro
E pukuaroha ana mātou ki te wahine i tūkinotia rā.
E pukā ana ia i te taimaha o te mahi.
E pukā ana te ngākau ki te haere, engari e turikore ana ngā waewae.
E pupuke ana ngā ngaru i te wahapū, me te ruturutu anō i te waka e puta atu ana ki te au moana.
E pupuke mai ana ngā ngaru i te kūwaha o te awa.
E pupuri ana ia i tana tokotoko pongare.
E pura mai ana ngā pūrātoke i ngā tahataha o te kōawa.
E puta ake ana te toinui i te kōwhao i tana tōkena.
E puta ki waho rā, kia tāpapa koe te kopa o te whare
E puta mai ana te hiahia ki tēnei mea ki tērā mea, ka pōtatutatu tātou
E puta whakarere mai anō te mahi ki a mātou ānō he pōkākā
E putu ana ngā mēra i runga i te tēpu, he nama, he pānui hokohoko te nuinga!
E pā ana taua reta ki ngā ture whenua Māori me ngā hārakiraki i puta ake i ngā tini whakahoutanga i aua ture
E pā, e te hau, e pūangi ki te kiri
E pā, e te hau, wero tonu ki te kiri
E pākaha ana te mamae
E pākawe ana i tana rorohiko ki tana pakihiwi mauī, ko te kī o tana waka kei tana ringa matau.
E pāketu ana ahau i te taru
E pānui ana Te Toa i ngā kōrero whaikiko a te tangata, ahakoa ko wai
E pānui ana te kōtiro i tana pukapuka.
E pānuitia ana te tūranga o te Pou Whakahaere - Tātari Kaupapa i te nūpepa.
E pārekareka ana ngā tamariki i te popohe, me te whai kia kawea mai rātou e ngā ngaru ki uta.
E pāremoremo ana au ki te karakia nei, ā wareware ana
E pāroherohe ana ahau i te rā
E pātētē ana te koroua piriti i te taumaha o te taraka.
E pāuraura ana te ahi.
E pēnei ana ahau e hē ana te kupu kua pakaru te kotahitanga - kai te ora te kotahitanga - engari ko ngā tikanga i roto ngā mea kua pakaru
E pīkarikari haere ana te kaiwero me te moteko anō.
E pīnono haere ana, e utu moni ana kia whākina mai he kōrero ki a ia
E pīoraora ana te punua rēme i te māeke.
E pītoto wai ana te mauhere, kāore tonu e hoatu e ngā āpiha e uiui ana i a ia.
E pōhutu haere ana ngā kaipuke mamaha i runga i te moana nui
E pōkaikaha ana i ngā raruraru kua tau ki runga i tana whānau.
E pōkēkē ana tō hoa i te rironga o ana moni i te petipeti hōiho.
E pōnē ana te Pākehā i tana hōiho
E pōrangi ana kia tae atu tana pukapuka ki ngā toa i mua i te Kirihimete.
E pōraruraru ana, e whakaaro kē ana ki tana hoa e tapahia mai rā i te hōhipera.
E pōtatu ana ki te haere
E pōuri ana a ia mō ana kupu kanga ki a Te Kuīni
E pōuri ana te ngākau i te korenga ōna i uiuitia mō te tūranga rā.
E pōuri ana te ngākau i tōna ngaromanga atu.
E pōuri anō tētahi iwi mehemea ka moepuku tō rātou rangatira i tētahi wahine
E pū tonu ana ki tana teina, nāna nei ia i whakaatu ki ō rāua mātua.
E pūauau ana taua kōwhatu, ka kauia; ka kore e pūauau, e kore e kauia
E pūhaehae ana a Hine ki tana tuakana e reia nei e te tini tāne.
E pūnganangana ana te wahine kia kite i tana tama kua roa ki tāwāhi.
E pūranga ana ia i ngā kōwhatu ki te marae
E pūranga kau ana ngā paro, ngā poti tara, ngā pohewa
E pūranga kau ana ngā pārō, ngā potitara, ngā pohewa
E pūtanetane ana i te haunga o te tūpāpaku i mate i taua parekura.
E pūtohe ana ngā tamariki kia kite rātou i te arewhana.
E pūtoti ana te rākau nā te mea e noho ana ki te oko pakupaku rawa.
E pūwhero ana ngā peka o te pēpē nei i te kaha wera o roto nei.
E pūāritarita ana ki te haere, ka mahue tana pāhi moni.
E rahirahi ana te puku o te tangata i te pānga e te piwa taipo.
E raka ngā waewae ki runga te taumata
E raka te mauī, e raka te katau
E ramā ana ngā tuna o aua roto e ō mātou tūpuna
E rangona e au he wawara taitua, nā roto ana mai tō reo, e hine!
E rangona kautia ana te hā o te reo rangatira
E rangona tonutia atu ana ō rāua reo e aruaru ana i te iwi kia āta noho mārika
E rapa tonu ana rātou i tā rātou ngeru kua toru rā e ngaro ana.
E rapihia ana tōu ringa e te ngārara
E rapu kai ana te matuku māna i ngā wāhi hawai o te wairepo.
E rararu ana aku mahara, e hoa, i te kore moni hei utu i ngā nama.
E raru ana au i ngā tohutohu whakakā i te mīhini nei. Tē haruru, tē aha.
E rau rangatira mā, tēnā koutou katoa.
E raweke ana te tamaiti i te ngeru, koirā ia i hihī ai.
E rea ana te iwi, he tino rerekē nō ngā kōrero a te kaikauhau.
E reia tonutia ana a hine ranginamu e te tāne.
E reka ai te kōrero i te āhua o tērā iwi me āta waiho mārire mō tētahi pō marangai, kia kī pohapoha te whare i te tangata, ka āta whakatū ai me te kapakapa anō o te ringa
E reka ana te moe i te taha o te tipuna aroha, e whakarongo ana rānei ki ngā manu kōrero i te pō, e turamoe ana rānei i ngā mōteatea, e ohorere ana rānei i te haruru o te haka
E rekareka ana te hui i ngā tārainga kupu a te kōkō tatakī.
E renarenatia ana te whakapipi nūpepa ki te taura.
E rere ana ngā wai ki ngā wāhi tāwharu o te whenua.
E rere ana te hūpē i ngā putaaihu o te kōhungahunga nā.
E rere ana te kāhu i te manaha ki te kimi kai māna.
E rere ana te mahi a te kapowai i te mato.
E rere ana te tokokawa i te roa o te omanga.
E rere ana te tuhare i te tino hiakai.
E rere e te ao, kauneke ana te haere
E rere e te ao, tākawe i runga rā
E rere hāngai ana rānei, e rere tītaha ana rānei? Kei te rite rānei te hoe, kei te hoe rua rānei?
E rere kūpapapapa ana te kāhū ki te kimi kai māna.
E rere mai ana he pūrei ao i te pae maunga.
E rere rā te ao uru, tauhōkai ana i runga rā
E rere rā te ao uru, tauhōkai ana i te hei.
E rere taku manu rā runga tāmāuru, ka kawe i te aroha ki te hoa kua motu ki tawhiti.
E rere taku manu tīoriori ki te rangi.
E rere tonu ana te toto i te mīti kānewha nei.
E rere tītaha ana ngā kaumahaki o ngā pakitara.
E rere whakarara ana ngā taha maitai e rua o te ara rerewhenua.
E rere, e te kōtare, ki runga i te pūwharawhara, rūrū ai i ō parirau
E rerekē ana ngā whenua nei, he werawera ētahi, he makariri ētahi
E reti manu ana a Tomo i te ngahere.
E riaki mai ana ngā taewa i tana kete.
E rienga ā māua tamariki, he kōtiro tētahi, he tama tētahi.
E rika katoa ana a Tame kia kite i te tau o tana ate kua whā wiki e ngaro ana ki tāwāhi.
E rima kōwhaowhao uwhi
E rima ngā kānara ka titia atu ki te keke tiakarete, hei whakanui i tana huritau tuarima.
E rima ngā matimati o te ringa.
E rima ngā tīma i roto i tēnei wāhanga, i mate i a mātau ngā mea e whā. Kua whakaritea ka tūtaki mātau ki ngā toa o te hauāuru, ki Te Wairoa
E rima ngā tīraha raupō
E rima pea ina ngā pahi, kī tonu i te mahi a te tamariki me ngā pakeke anō hoki
E rima putu pea tana roa, nā, mangu tonu te tinana mai i te mātenga ki te waero. Ko te taha raro i āhua māwhe
E rima putu, tekau mā tahi īnihi te tāroa o Hēmi i tēnei wā
E rima rawa ōna waewae. Ko te rima o ngā waewae he mea tupu ake i runga i tōna tuarā, tāwerewere ai i tōna taha
E rima rā rātou e pōteretere ana i te au o te moana, ka kitea.
E rima taiāwhiotanga i te whiwhinga o te kura - koirā te roa o te oma a ngā tamariki.
E rima takirua ngā ōkiha kua hokona e ahau
E rima tau a Kereopa e noho ana i konei, e kauhau ana i te Pai Mārire, me te taka anō hoki o Tūhoe ki tēnei tikanga
E rima tau e whakatō taewa ana ki tēnei māra; te āhua nei kua tau mai te mātao.
E rima tau ia i te haikura, kātahi ka haere ki te whare wānanga.
E rima tekau ngā whare Māori o taua pā. Kei waho o te pekerangi ngā māra taewa, kūmara e tipu ana
E riro ana i te kaimahi te moni mō tāna mahi, ā whaowhina ana e ia ki roto ki te pūtea kōputaputa
E riro atu ana ngā whenua i te hunga touapo rā.
E rite ana ki te kararehe māori e koronae ana i te ahi
E rite ana ki te kurī e hamu ana i ngā kongakonga e ngahoro iho ana i te tēpara a ō rātou ariki
E rite ana ki te kāwei o te hue e totoro ana i roto i te otaota
E rite ana ki te wai e mapi mai ana mā roto i te puare waka
E rite ana koe ki te waiata rōreka a te reo pai, a te tangata he pai te rangi o tāna mea whakatangi
E rite ana te hoe a te hoe waka.
E rite ana tōna āhua ki te pūriri mingimingi, e kore nei e pakaru i te tangata te wāhi
E rite ana tōna āhua ki te pūriri mingimingi, e kore nei e pakaru i te tangata te wāhi; ahakoa tohe te tangata, e kore rawa e pakaru, erangi ka mau tonu te matakahi i roto
E rite anō ki te kararehe māori e koronae ana i te ahi
E roha ana ngā hakikau o te kāhu rere runga hau.
E roha ana ngā pakikau o te kōau
E romi mai ana i ngā para o ana mariao.
E rongo ana au i te ami o te hāngi.
E rongo ana te taringa i tōna toa ki te haere i roto i ngā kōkiri; ki te amo mai i ngā taotū i roto i te mura o te ahi ki te wāhi i te ora; ki te pīkau mai i ngā tāngata kua mate kē ki tētahi wāhi tika hei tāpukenga mō rātou
E rongonui ana te karitehe mō te kāhaki wahine i te ngahere.
E rotua ana e Rua te waka rā kia moe tonu
E rua aku ngeru, he parauri tētahi, he pango tētahi.
E rua ana whakamātautau i te rangi nei - nā whai anō i pōātinitini ai.
E rua ana whakamātautau i tēnei rā, koinā e tīhohe nā te āhua.
E rua haurima te hautanga o ngā māpere i riro i a Kiriata, arā, e whā o roto i te tekau.
E rua hāora māua ko taku whakapā pito e kōrero ana i te whounu.
E rua hāora ngā tamariki e ahu ana i tā rātou tangata hukarere, kātahi ka hoatu i te pōtae me te kāmeta.
E rua hāora te mīti e tahu ana, kātahi anō ka māoa.
E rua iara aku ringaringa ki te whakakopa mai i taku manawa
E rua ki te toru hāora te kai i roto i te hāngi, kātahi anō ka maoa.
E rua mano te tāne, hāunga te wahine, te tamariki
E rua mano, e rima rau te tapeke o ngā moni kua kohia mō te haere a te akomanga ki Te Waipounamu.
E rua marama i muri mai, nā te aranga ake anō o tētahi kāwanatanga kē, i hōtoa ai ngā whakaritenga
E rua marama mātau e mahi ana ki ngā wahie whakawaho o ngā rākau, te wāhi ngohengohe hoki tērā, te wāhi hou tērā kei waenganui i te kiri rākau me te tahiwi rākau
E rua meneti te roa ki ia kaikōrero i tēnei taukumekume.
E rua mita me te hāwhe te teitei o te kūaha, kotahi mita te whānui.
E rua mita pea te teitei o te kūwaha.
E rua mita te whānui o ngā pākaukau o tana manu aute.
E rua mārire ngā hē, arā kāore i pakari i te kōnakitanga, tētahi, kāore e pūkatakata ana. Kia pakari rawa, kātahi ka tika kia whakīia ngā puāwai
E rua ngā keokeonga o te maunga rā, koia i tapā ai ko Tararua.
E rua ngā kiore i mau i te tāwhiti hao.
E rua ngā kiore, he pūhina tētahi, he koka tētahi
E rua ngā kātete o te tangata, e whā ō te hōiho.
E rua ngā kūmara, he mea takai a waho ki te kohukohu
E rua ngā mea kua rongo au - he mea āta pana ia i tana mahi, i rihaina noa iho rānei. Ko tēhea te kōrero tika?
E rua ngā patapatai tonu a te whānau o Rua mōna, arā, ko wai tōna pāpara ka tahi, me te tika anō o tana kōrero i whānau ia ki Maungapōhatu ka rua
E rua ngā pereti kai kua pau i a tama pūkino, kāore anō i pau te pereti tuatahi a te nuinga.
E rua ngā puta i te ihu, e kīia nei ko ngā pongāihu.
E rua ngā pītau nui o te tauihu o te waka taua.
E rua ngā pō e noho ana i te kāinga, i te ata ka titiro atu a Pūroku, e piri ana te kōkōwai i te pāpāringa o Tupeteka, nō Parewhete. Kua mōhio a Pūroku kua taea te wahine rā e Tupeteka
E rua ngā pō, e rua ngā rā e tao ana, ka kīia tēnā he tāwhakamoe, mō te roa e tao ana
E rua ngā ringa o te nuinga o ngā karaka kia mōhiotia ai ngā mēneti me ngā hāora.
E rua ngā tamariki tāne, ko Haimona rāua ko Hēmi ō rāua ingoa. Kotahi tō rāua tuahine, ko Hera tērā.
E rua ngā tikanga o te kupu 'marama'. He amiorangi tētahi, he wehenga kotahi o ngā wehenga tekau mā rua o te maramataka tētahi.
E rua ngā tiratū i runga i ngā kaipuke hēra o mua.
E rua ngā tuāhine o Takurua, ā, tokoono atu anō hoki ērā o ōna tāina, tuākana mai i ērā o ngā wāhine a Te Mākarini
E rua ngā tāone nui i whakangaromia i mua e te rangitoto, e te pungarehu o taua maunga
E rua ngā tāpora paruparu a te tangata nei, pau katoa
E rua ngā tārawa kei muri i te ngaru e āki ana i te ngaru ki uta.
E rua ngā umu kei te pā o Ruakaupeka he tōpīpī tētehi.
E rua ngā waewae o te tangata, o te manu, e whā ō te kurī.
E rua ngā wakawaka o te māra nei ka oti
E rua ngā whakatētētanga i te rā. Kotahi i te ata, kotahi i te ahiahi
E rua ngā wāhanga matua o te kōpiro, ko te kōpiro iti me te kōpiro nui.
E rua ngā wāhanga o te taua, kotahi kauae i haere mā te uru, kotahi kauae i haere mā te rāwhiti.
E rua ngā wāhi tīni kaka, ko tētahi mō ngā tamatāne, ko tētahi mō ngā hengahenga.
E rua ngā āhua o ngā huarākau hei whakatō, ko ngā rākau e hua ana i te raumati, me te makariri
E rua noa iho ngā hipi toa hei ekeeke i ngā uwha e rua rau - nā whai anō rāua i whīrokiroki ai!
E rua noa iho ngā kaikōrero mā te tangata whenua, ko tētahi hei wāhi i ngā kōrero, ko tētahi hei whakakapi ina mutu ngā whaikōrero a te manuhiri.
E rua pēhinga i tana kiore, kua tīpakohia te kupu e hiahia ana ia ki te whakarerekē.
E rua rangi i muri mai, i tāpuketia ia ki Te Wainui
E rua rawa ngā nekehanga o tēnei whare, ā, nō ngā tau o te tekau tau mai i 1970, ka whakahoungia ngā amo, ngā maihi me te koruru
E rua rawa ngā tara kei te hiku o ētahi whai.
E rua rā e tāwhai ana i Te Moana-Tāpokopoko, ka tae atu.
E rua tapatahi īnanga, ka hoatu ēnā ki te aroaro o Kahu rātou ko ōna hoa tohunga
E rua tau e whakawhaiāipo ana, ka tae ki te mārenatanga i mua i ō māua iwi.
E rua tau ruru; e rua tau wehe; e rua tau mutu; e rua tau kai!
E rua tau tēnei i mua atu i te hokonga a te Karauna i Ngā Pākihi-whakatekateka-o-Waitaha i a Ngāi Tahu
E rua tekau mā waru aku tau i taua wā, he puhi tonu au, kāore anō kia wehe atu i te kāinga.
E rua tekau ngā tamariki kei ia tira o te rōpū.
E rua tekau tau kei waenga i te mātāmua me te kauaeraro.
E rua tekau ēnā kōnae kōrero i uru atu ki te kōpae kotahi.
E rua tāra te utu ki te tangata mō ia pēke āporo ka kohia e ia - koirā te pāpātanga utu mō tēnei mahi.
E rua tāra te utu mō te miraka kotahi.
E rua wiki ia e mauri ngaro ana i te hōhipera, nā whai anō i kōroiroi ai i te ohonga ake.
E rua ā mātou poutaka
E rua ā tāua inu, māu tētahi, māku tētahi.
E rua, tāpiri i te toru, ka rima.
E ruku haere ana ka tauwhiwhi ngā waewae ki te rimurapa.
E ruku pāua ana ngā tāngata mau hukapēke rā.
E ruru ana a Tame i tana kurī ki te taiepa, kia kore ai e oma atu.
E ruruku ana i tana waka.
E rutu ana au i a au e whakarongo ana ki te rōpū e waiata ana.
E rutu ana te rākau tāroaroa i te angiangi.
E rutu noa mai ana te toto - pēnei au ka totō kē mai.
E ruturutuhia ana te manuao e te moana oru.
E rāhiritia tonutia ana tā rātou tamaiti i aituā i te huarahi.
E rārangi ake nei ētahi kaupapa hei whakaaroaro māu.
E rārangi ana ō mātau motukā
E rārangi mai ana ngā pātuhi tohutau ki runga ake i ērā mō ngā pū.
E rārangi mai ana ngā whakatūpato kia kore ai te tangata e pāngia e te manawa hē.
E rīria mai ana, e whetē mai ana ngā karu ki ngā rangatira
E ta, me taha kau rā anō e pūpā ai te pukurua rā.
E tae ana ki te toru rau mano ngā mea haere i raro, ngā mea haere hōiho tekau mā waru mano, hāunga anō ōna hōia whakamahi i ngā pū repo, he nui anō ērā
E tae koe ki raro, e uia mai koe
E tae koe, tukua atu te kai mā te ope; ko ngā huahua hoatu kia kainga, ko ngā hinu ka waiho mai ki a au; ko koe, hei roto i te whare tauā noho mai ai
E taea ai te piki i ngā pari horehore i reira, me kimi ngā kapiti hei ara pikinga.
E taea e au te pō ka ketua
E taea rānei e koe te whakaatu mai te moe i kitea e ahau, me tōna tikanga anō ki ahau?
E taea rānei e tētahi te haere i runga i ngā waro ratarata, ā e kore ōna waewae e hunua?
E tahawhenua ana te punua mei kore rā e kitea tana whāereere.
E tahu ana te kai, kīhai i roa ka maoa te kai
E taiaritia ana ngā waka e ngā ngaru kuruki.
E taiatea ana a tama kei kore ana hungawai e pai mai ki a ia.
E takahi ana ngā tamariki i ngā kūmara
E takahui mai ana ngā pūao, taihoa pea ka ua.
E takahurihuri ana a Papatūānuku i tōna tuaka.
E takahurihuri ana ngā tamariki kia ānini rawa rātou.
E takakino ana ngā tamariki ki te puta ki waho ki te kori.
E takaoio ana ngā tuna i roto i te hīnaki.
E takaokeoke ana i te papa tākaro i te uauawhiti o te waewae.
E takaokeoke ana te hōiho i te pohopiri.
E takaokeoke ana te kurī i te paru me te kumukumu anō.
E takataka kau ana ngā māhunga, pērā i ō te hunga mātakitaki tēnehi.
E takatū ana kia tae atu ki te kāinga, ka mau i te pirihimana, he tere rawa nō tana haere.
E takatū ana ngā iwi o waho ki te taiapu i te pā matua o reira.
E takawhetawheta ana ngā tamariki kia tae pai atu ai rātou ki tērā taha me te kore e mau i ō rātou hoa.
E taki ana i ngā kōrero mai o mua
E taki kata ana ngā tamariki i a rātou e tarapī wai ana tētahi ki tētahi.
E taki tūtū ana ngā whare i te taha hiwi, ko ētahi i raro i ngā pari, i roto hoki i ngā rākau e pūrero ana mai
E takoto ana au i runga o taku moenga, me te paipa rapa e heke atu ana ki roto i tētahi pātara rahi tonu, e rere atu ana te pirau ki roto
E takoto ana i ngā moenga, ā, kua patua e te moe
E takoto ana ngā moenga o te tangata whenua i te mata kopa o te whare.
E takoto hema ana ngā ipu i te ringihanga atu o ngā wai.
E takoto kōpae ana i mua i te ahi.
E takoto mai ana ngā whārangi pōhaha o te reta mai a tana whaiāipo, e kī ana he wāhine anō tāna.
E takoto maoa rekareka mai ana i tana moenga.
E takoto nei he mamae, me he ngau atua
E takoto paparite ana te whenua - kāore he pukepuke, kāore he whāwhārua.
E taku ipo, ka mau tonu taku aroha mōu kia hake rā anō taku tuarā.
E takunui ana te rui o Kauwae
E tama mā, tauwhirotia mai te waka o te makau
E tama nā Ruru, wetewete mai rā taku kōmutu taramea
E tama ē! Ka riro hoki rā nge Atutahi-mā-Rehua; waiho ki muri nei tangi kau ko te mapu
E tama! Whakarerea ōu kaka, e tino pūwheki ana koe, kāore koe e kaha ki te oma
E tama, kua hinga au i a koe!
E tama. Te waha pakaru rā. Ka mahue te waiho mai ki ngā mea mōhio. Ana — kua pakaru ngā hamuti
E tamariki tonu ana rāua ka tāmautia.
E tamariki tonu ana te āhua o taku kuia i taku moehewa.
E tangi ana ki tana kākahu mārena i takahia ki ana rekereke, ka tīhae.
E tangi ana ki tōna whenua ka tupuria nei e te mōheuheu
E tangi ana te ruru, 'Keokeo, keokeo!'
E tangi ana, e whakautu ana i te kanohi o tō rātou whaea e takoto mai ana i tana kāwhena.
E tangi hotu ana ngā mātua i te pouaka whakaata kia whakahokia mai tā rāua tamaiti i tipuatia e wai rā.
E tangi koroingoingo ana te tamaiti i te pīrangi hoki ki tana whaea.
E tangihia tonutia ana te hinganga o te tīma o Aotearoa i te Kapu o te Ao.
E tangitangi ana te tamaiti nohinohi i te mea kua kakā tōna taringa.
E tanuku ana te korokoro i te wehi
E tapa noa rā koe i tāhau ngeri, pōuri, pōtango i te tinana, ī
E tapahia ana ngā whiore me ngā pūtawa o ngā kūao hipi.
E tapu rā te upoko o Te Ruakeripō, tē hōmai hei kōtutu wai kāeo ki Te Kawau
E tara kau ana te marama, āpōpō mate ai
E tarapiki ana ngā rākau nei
E tarawhitia ana te karihi o te ngota e ngā irahiko.
E tare ana a Potopoto i te mamae
E tata ana ki te whā tekau o ngā tau i whakarērea ai te karakia me te iriiri tamariki, ā, he tino whakatupuranga tēnei kāhore anō i iriiria
E tata ana te hauhake tētahi rīwai, tērā e pakari a Ākuhata nei
E tata ana te ope te matika atu ki te kai, ka tau te ataata o Hae ki runga i ngā kai. Tapu tonu atu ngā kai rā, ā, kua kore e pai hei kai
E tata ana te wā pōti kua kaha ake te tauwhawhai a ngā rōpū tōrangapū.
E tata atu ana ki te rua tekau tau i āu e noho ana i raro i ngā kauwae o tēnei kuia rāua ko tēnei koroheke
E tata tāpahi, e roa te whakatū
E tatari ana te ope whakaeke kia tae mai tā rātou kaikōrero.
E tatau ana ia e hia katoa ngā heihei mā, ngā heihei kōtingotingo me ngā heihei pākākā.
E tau ana te titiro a te tangata kino ki te tangata tika, ā, e whai ana kia whakamatea ia.
E tau mai ana tana titiro ki a au
E tauawhiawhi mai ana a Kōkā rāua ko tana hoa, me te tangi anō.
E tauhere ana ia i tana waka ki te rākau nui rā, nā te kaha o te ia o te awa.
E tauhōkai ana a Apu kia tae tuatahi atu ia ki ngā taonga hoko kua whakahekea te utu.
E tauihi ana ngā manu i ngā hau mahana e rewa ake ana i te paripari.
E taukaikai ana rātau, ko te whenua anō te take.
E taukiri tonu ana te iwi i te matenga o tō rātou ariki.
E taumaha ana ngā rārā o te rākau i te maha o ngā hua.
E taumarere ana ngā rau i ngā rākau, ko te ngahuru hoki.
E tauparapara pai ana rāua me tā rāua paoro.
E tauparoro ana ngā māpara kia ū ai rātou ki te manawataki o te kanikani.
E taupua ana ahau i tēnā mea māku
E taupuhipuhi ana a ia i a au nā te mea kua rangiroro au.
E taurapirapi ana ngā tamariki pēnei i te ngeru nei.
E tautapa ana te kaihautū kia kotahi ai te hoe.
E tautau mai ana ngā hua i te kāmata o te peka.
E tautau tonu ana te nākahi, nāna tonu i rui ka makere, otirā kua whara kē tōna ringa, kua uru te paihana ki ōna toto
E tautohetohe ana ngā waka rā
E tautoko ana au i ngā mātāpono taketake o Te Aho Matua.
E tautoko ana i ngā tangi me ngā poroporoaki mō ō tātau aituā maha i hinga i ngā marama ka taha
E taututetute ana ngā manu i te pae.
E tautūtakitaki ana te manuhiri i mua o te whakaeke ki runga i te marae.
E tauwhaiwhai ana rātou kei kore noa e oti ngā mahi i mua i te hāora whakatuwhera.
E tauwhaiwhai ana te manu ki tana kōhanga i runga rā.
E tauwhāinga ana te waka ki te poti
E tawhera ana ngā waha o ngā pīpī manu nā te kaha hiakai.
E tawhi mai ana te wahine rā me te mea nei e mōhio ana ki a tāua.
E tawhiro kē atu ana te kurī ki tana rangatira, tē whakarongo mai ki āku nei tohutohu.
E te Atua, whakapaingia ēnei kai hei oranga mō ō mātou tinana.
E te Timuaki, e kore au e whakaroa i te Kaunihera
E te hoa Hōnore, tēnā rā koe i roto i te aroha nui ki te iwi nui kua mene atu ki te pō
E te iwi! He haukai tēnei kei tō aroaro, kainga!
E te iwi, i tuhituhia ēnei kōrero i runga i te hēmanawa, i te raruraru, i te pōnānā, heoi ki te kitea iho te hē, te tahangoi o te kupu, kimoa iho
E te iwi, ka tū koutou i te kaihaukai
E te iwi, kia mataara kia matapopore, kei riro koutou i ngā whakawai a ngā Tauiwi
E te kōkiri, e rere i runga te rangi nei
E te manuhiri tūārangi, nau mai, haere mai.
E te mate i a au, e koromakina nei
E te moe tahakura i a Te Kōtuku rā, oho ake ki te ao tirotiro kau au, he ao mānu rawa i kitea iho ai
E te rangatahi, kia kaha. Puritia kia ū, kia mau ngā taonga a ngāi tāua
E te rimurimu rā i piri mai ki te toka, mā te tai e huaki ka pae mai ki uta rā
E te roimata rā i roto rā, ka maringi kei waho. E ai te wai kōrari, ka ngawhā i te waru
E te whare nei, titiro tāua ki te tangata nei
E te whānau, ka pēnā hoki koutou, ki te noho rōpine koutou e kore koutou e taea, ki te noho wehewehe koutou, hei mate tēnā e ngaro ai koutou
E te whānau, kia manawanui. Kaua e uru ki ngā hara o te tangata kē
E teka ana, e kū ana, e whai ana
E tene mai anō pea ki tētahi māna
E tengi noa iho ngā matimati i tana waewae mauī - e rua i poroa.
E tihotihoi ana te waha i te whakamīharo ki tāna e kite rā.
E tika ai te rere a te waka, me mōhio te kaihoe mau hiwa ki tāna mahi.
E tika ai te whakahua i te reo Māori, kia tika te whakahua i ngā reta pakupaku, arā, i te a, e, i, o, u
E tika ana anō kia hihira te tamariki ki te tauhou.
E tika ana anō kia mehameha koe i ngā mahi rorirori a tō tangata.
E tika ana anō kia ngōio koe i te kutikuti hipi - he mahi uaua hoki.
E tika ana anō kia niwha te whāereere ina whakatata atu koe ki ana kūao.
E tika ana anō kia puku poraka te tamaiti - he tohu ora.
E tika ana anō kia pūmatuahia ngā ingoa tāngata, ngā ingoa wāhi, me ērā atu momo ingoa katoa.
E tika ana anō kia tawari te tangata ka whakawhiti i taua pae maunga i te rā kotahi.
E tika ana anō kia whakaakona ngā tamariki katoa ki ngā mahi pāngarau me te tuhituhi.
E tika ana anō kia whakapaingia ngā kai.
E tika ana anō kia āta mānawatia ngā rangatira kua tae mai nei ki tā tātou hui.
E tika ana anō kua whawhai tētahi taha o Ngā Puhi ki te Pākehā, otirā he riri awatea tērā, kāhore he mahi konihi
E tika ana anō pea kia ara ake te hunga e wherea ana ki te patu i tōna kaiwhere ā tōna wā.
E tika ana anō te whakahāwea ki a ia, he tūtūā hoki ia
E tika ana hoki kia kore e tahuritia e te Kōti tētahi mea
E tika ana kia noho mai ia ki tērā tūranga - he nui hoki te mātauranga i a ia.
E tika ana kia noho tūtakarerewa, kia noho matawhiwhiu ki ngā whakatau, ki ngā āhuatanga hou ka puta
E tika ana kia pātaia tēnei pātai i tēnei wā, i te mea kua kitea ake kua raungaiti rawa ngā whenua Māori tōtika
E tika ana ngā wāhine ki te tiki harakeke hei raukai mā te manuhiri, arā hei popoti, hei kōpae
E tika ana tēnei rerenga kōrero mō te wāheke, arā, mō taku haere ki te marae āpōpō?
E tika atu ngā wāhine ki te tiki harakeke hai raukai mā te manuhiri, arā hei popoti, hei kōpae, hei rourou, hei waikawa
E tika kē ana kia whakauru katoatia atu ngā uri whai pānga ki te whenua ki roto ki te taitara
E tikumu ana kei kohetetia e te kaiako.
E tikumu ana koe i te mataku?
E timotimo ana te manu i te āporo.
E timu rā koe, e te tai nei, rere omaki ana ia ki waho rā
E tino hiahia rawa ana mātou ki ngā tamariki o ngā kura Māori katoa atu o te motu nei, kia kore rātou e taringa hoi ki ngā kupu ako, kupu whakatūpato, i roto i te reta kua tāia ki runga ake nei
E tino mamae ana i te tānga o taku pakituri.
E tino ngāngā ana te uma i te tīmohu i tana taenga atu ki te rata.
E tino oma kaha rawa ana i te huanui kōhatu, paruparu hoki, he whakaohiti i te rau tangata e noho ana, i te ara tonu o te wai
E tino tāria atu ana te ekenga mai o Tā Kīngi me ōna pūkengatanga ki runga i tēnei waka pūwhewhero
E tino whai hua ana te ōhanga o Aotearoa i ngā mahi tāpoi.
E tino whakakāhore ana au i tēnā whiu āna. Ehara kau ana nāku tērā mahi.
E tino whakararua ana te wāhi noho e whānau hua ai te inanga, nā whai anō e ngaro nei i ētahi rohe.
E tioma ana ki tana whare e kainga rā e te ahi.
E tipi ana te manu rā runga hau, me te roha anō o ngā parirau.
E tipu mai ana ngā piakaaka i te more.
E tipuria ana te kūkūwai e te raupō, e te harakeke, e te tī.
E tipuria ana te ngae e te raupō, e te harakeke.
E tiri ana a Tohe i ngā ika ki uta.
E tirohia ana e ngā ākonga ngā āhuatanga o te taipana tō me te taipana ue.
E titi koia, e te atarau, tīaho i runga rā
E titi te kōhiti, tīaho i runga rā
E titiro ana au te puia tū noa i runga o ngā hiwi, tineia kia mate
E titiro māhoi ana te tamaiti ki te wāhi i ngaro atu ai te poraka ki roto i te wai.
E titiro mākutu ana te tamaiti ki te kōiraira whero i te rae o te wahine Īnia.
E tiu rā ki te muri, ē, ngā hurihuri mānuka i raro o Tumutara
E toherere ana a Hōri i ana kurī, kei whai atu i ngā hipi.
E tohu ana ngā putanga o te rangahau ki te wāhi nui o te tuku a te pakeke i te reo Māori ki te tamaiti
E tohu ana ngā tatauranga o nā tata nei kua tokomaha ake te hunga e āhua matatau ana ki te reo Māori.
E tohu ana te kororoa ki tāna e kite rā.
E tohu ana te poutama i te pikinga a Tāwhaki ki ngā rangi ki te tiki i ngā kete o te wānanga.
E toia mai ana te kupenga ki uta tērā ngā tāngata whiuwhiu kōhatu atu hei whakahoki i ngā ika ki roto i te kupenga
E tokara ana me te rūrū i ngā māhunga i te rongotanga e haurangi ana tō rātou hoa i te aituātanga.
E tomokia ana te pā e te hōia i te taha ki mua, kua puta ngā Pākehā Mirihia ki te taha ki muri kokoti ai i ngā Hauhau e oma ana
E tono ana ia i te tūranga kaiako pūtaiao i te kura i haere ia i a ia e tamariki ana.
E topa ana te kāhu i te rangi.
E topa rā, e rere rā, e tae koe ki te puke
E topaki ana te wakatopa i te rangi me te whai o tana ramaroa i te tangata kino.
E toro haere ana ngā hihi o te ngata i a ia e rapu kai ana.
E torohū ana rātou i mua o te reo irirangi, e tiaki ana kia puta mai ngā rongo.
E torotika ana te huarahi, kātahi ka kōnaenae, ka huri pērā, ka huri pēnei, auē!
E toru ana murimanu nā te mea ko ia te tākupu o te iwi.
E toru hāora a Tame e rāwekeweke ana i te pūkaha o tana waka, kāore tonu e haruru i a ia.
E toru hāora mātou i te huarahi, kāore anō i tae atu ki te wāhi e haere nei mātou.
E toru hāora rātou e piki ake ana, kātahi ka tīmata te heke iho.
E toru hāora te roa o te pikitia.
E toru hāora tō mātou poti e tohe ana ki ngā ngaru whakamataku o te moana, ā, kore tonu te wahapū o te kāinga i whātata mai.
E toru ka whakaraua ki te toru, ka noho ko te iwa.
E toru marama ia e tapoko ana i te taumaha hārukiruki, kātahi anō ka āhua puea ake i tana mate.
E toru marama ia ki ēnei moka o te ao ka hoki ai
E toru marama ngā pirihimana e tirotiro ana i te ngaromanga o te kōtiro, he aha te aha.
E toru marama te roa o te whawhai, kāore tonu tētahi taha i toa.
E toru meneti ki te kokonga kino te whiu i tā rāua tamaiti ki te patua e ia te kurī.
E toru neke atu ngā whenu o te rauru.
E toru ngā io o te taura
E toru ngā kōwae o tēnei akoranga, e whā wiki ki ia kōwae.
E toru ngā manu e noho ana i te rākau, ka rere tētahi, na, e rie kei te toe.
E toru ngā momo paramu i tanumia, kia kore ai e maoka katoa i te wā kotahi.
E toru ngā papanga o te keke, he kirīmi anō i waenga i tēnā, i tēnā.
E toru ngā pona i te taura hei pupuri mā ngā waewae i te pikinga.
E toru ngā pō, kātahi anō ka mutu tana kari i te rua
E toru ngā reo i reira, me kī, i āhua puta mai i te mate ki te ora, ā, kua pakari haere, kua tāngutungutu haere
E toru ngā rākau he wai mate kei roto i ngā puāwai, he wharangi, he puawānanga, he waoriki
E toru ngā rākau pai mō te mahi kōrorohū, he mataī, he māpara, he kaiwhiria.
E toru ngā tānga tūru hei nohoanga mō te manuhiri.
E toru ngā tūāporo o te tāhū, ā, nō mua atu i te pakanga i whakairongia ai e Kihirini, kātahi ka whakaterea mai mā te awa o Mangaoporo ki te awa o Waiapu, tau rawa atu ki Rangitukia
E toru ngā wehikē, kua kōkeke haere a koroua.
E toru ngā wāhanga o te whakataetae; he kau tāwhai, he eke pahikara, he oma.
E toru ngā āhua o te matū - ko te totoka, ko te wē, me te haurehu.
E toru pea ngā kapa he rite tonu te takahi, me te kōkiri, o te ringa, te ngangahu me te whētero o te arero
E toru rau e toru tekau o taua rangapū i tae mai i runga i tētahi tima i tētahi rangi i kō atu
E toru rau pea ngā tāngata, he ope matararahi tonu.
E toru rawa ngā ope o tana taua.
E toru rā ahau e hōnea ana i taku mahi, i te mea e māuiui ana ahau.
E toru rā e haere ana ngā mahi a te rēhia, ā, ko tōna rua tekau mā whā nei ngā rōpū i eke ki te mura o te ahi
E toru rā te roa o te tangi, i te rā tuatoru, ka tukuna ki te kōpū o te whenua.
E toru rā te roa o tēnei hui
E toru rā te ua tātā e karawhiu ana i te motu, ā, pārāweranui ana te waipuke.
E toru tekau mā toru mātau i haere mā runga pahi
E toru wiki ia e ungaunga ana i tana tāne kia whakatika i te kēti.
E toru ā rāua tamariki, ko ngā māhanga, ā, ko te tautahi te pōtiki.
E totoko tonu ake ana i roto i te ngākau te whanowhanoā
E totō noa iho ana te pia i te kāho i te mea kua tata te pau.
E tuapa ana ngā kūao i te taiapa.
E tuawiri ana te tinana i te makariri.
E tuia ana ngā tera, me ngā mea katoa o te hōiho i tēnei whare
E tukatuka ana rātou i te mea kua wātea anō te ara.
E tuku atu anō ki te tuna hei omaki mō Maru
E tuku rā, ē, te waikohu o te Whitu
E tukua ana ki te Kāwana te tekau o ngā eka o ngā oneone katoa e hokoa ana
E tukua ana kia utu ia i tētahi whaina mō tōna hara
E tungatunga mai ana anō te ringa o taua tangata
E tungou ana te tangata rā ki a tāua
E tuohu ana ngā rākau i te hau.
E tuohu tonu ana ahau, koia ahau tē kite ai
E tupuria ana taua mānia e te huru rākau
E turipēpeke ana te haere
E turori ana anō hoki te tamaiti pōtiki a Matutaera, ā e kīia ana he nui tana mate
E turu mai ana te miraka i te piere i te pounamu nei.
E tuwhera ana ngā hāngī, e pae ana ngā rautao, ngā wahie, ngā kōwhatu
E tuwhera ana te toa mai i te iwa ki te rima.
E tuwhera ana waenga, he awa taniwha; māku e whakakopi, ka kopi mai
E tā pikitia ana te tamaiti ki ana pene whai kano.
E tā! Kua nui rā te wehikē ki a koe! Kua haurangi koe!
E tā, e tautau ana te hūpē i te more o tō ihu.
E tā, he rite te pune nei ki te hāwara te rahi, hōmai he pune ka uru ki tōku waha!
E tā, kawea atu tētahi wai mōku
E tā, kei te ango anō, kāore anō kia piri
E tā, kotahi noa iho te tūru kua haria e koe ki waho, kua whakahotuhotu tonu koe.
E tā, me patu e tāua te oi hei tānga ika mā tāua
E tāhere ana rāua i ngā hōiho, kia pai ai tā rāua whakatā.
E tāhuhunu ana ki te haere ki tāwāhi, he nui nō ngā raruraru kino i reira.
E tākare ana ahau ki te haere
E tākare ana ngā puku hiaruaki kia tere tau atu te waka ki uta.
E tāmia ana ia e te kōtonga, i te kore mahi, i te kore moni hei whāngai i ana tamariki, me ērā tūmomo raruraru katoa.
E tāmoremore ana te papa, ka taea te whakatū tēneti i reira.
E tāngarangara ana i te kore e waia ki ana rekereke teitei.
E tāoru mai ana te pirau i te whēwhē.
E tāpuia ana ōna uru hei titititanga raukura
E tāreka ana te tāriana kia tata atu ia ki ngā uwha.
E tāria ana te paki o Huitanguru - hei reira au ka whakapau i ngā rā whakatā e toe ana ki a au.
E tāria ana te ripoata a Te Puni Kōkiri mō ngā kaupapa ohaoha a te iwi Māori.
E tāria atu nei ngā whakamōhio mai me te tūmanako anō ka kaha te tautoko i tēnei hui
E tārūrū kau ana i te kaha riri.
E tātāhau tonu ana ki te raki, engari kua paki ki te tonga.
E tātāhia ana ngā whare o te takutai e te hau pūkerikeri.
E tātāu ana te ngākau ki te aha, ki te aha
E tāuhi ana te koroua i te wai ki ngā koko katoa o te whare me te karakia haere anō.
E tāwhirowhiro ana ngā rau o ngā pūrere kapohau e rārangi mai ana i te pae maunga.
E tāwiri ana i te kaha mataku.
E tāwiriwiri ana i te kaha mataku.
E tāwiriwiri ana te papa i te nui o tēnā rū.
E tāwēwē noa ana ngā ū, pēnei i ō te kau.
E tīaho ana te marama i waho, engari he nui ngā kapua kei te rangi
E tīaho nei taua rama i runga i a tātou
E tīemiemi ana te poti i te nui o ngā ngaru.
E tīkaro ana i te ngita i tana raparapa.
E tīneinei ana ngā hōiho kia tuwhera ngā keti, kia tīmata te tauomaoma.
E tīoioi ana te waka i te huarahi i te haurangi o te taraiwa.
E tīraha ana au kia kitea ngā whetū o te rangi.
E tīraha mai ana te takahore rā i te hōpa, ko ngā ringa toi kei te peita i tōna āhua.
E tīrepa ana ngā kākahu i te hau.
E tītongitongi noa ana i tana pihikete, pēnei me te kiore nei.
E tīwhana mai rā a Kahukura i runga i te rangi
E tīwheta ana ngā tuna i roto i te wai wera.
E tō ana i tōna waka i a Te Kumukumu, ka puta kei waho, kei ngā whakaihu ki Maungaroa
E tō ana te rā ka mākurakura katoa te tāepaepatanga o te rangi.
E tō, e te rā, rehurehu ki te rua
E tō, e te rā, rere whakauru ana ki te rua
E tō, e te rā, āhua te whakangaro
E tōku hoa kaingākau nui, he pungarehu pīhangaiti rawa, kua roa rawa tōu okiokinga
E tōmina ana ngā tamariki kia haere rātou ki te kaukau i te awa.
E tōroherohe ana te tārere i te hau.
E tū ana a Rāniera, e ngāngā ana nā te kaha o tana oma
E tū ana anō te rākau, ahakoa te whai a te ringa kani kia topea atu.
E tū ana he kōhua i te ahi, e pīoioi ana, me ngā kete e tare ana i runga i te whare, oraora katoa ngā kete me te kōhua, wehi ana mātou katoa
E tū ana te haka, he tohu whenua rangatira te haka
E tū ana te kaiwhakarata hōiho i waenganui, ko te hōiho e taiāwhio ana i a ia.
E tū koe ki te taha o te pari ka whiu ai i te pākaukau ki waho, ka hikina e te hau, ā, ka rere ki runga i ngā hau mahana.
E tū koe ki tēnei rāwāhi, ka karanga, ā, ka ō mai
E tū mai ana ngā toka pākeho i ngā hiwi i Hinuera.
E tū mai ana tētahi poupou whakairo ki te pokapū o te whare kōpae.
E tū paruru ana ngā tūwatawata o te taiapa kia kore ai ngā kurī e kuhu atu.
E tū pōrangi noa ana ki te rakuraku i te mangeo
E tū tawhiti mai ana ngā heketua i te wharenui i ngā rā o mua.
E tū toipoto ana ngā hōia, ka puta te whakahau a te rangatira kia ukupara rātou.
E tūkawikawi ana ngā kau kia puta atu rātou ki te pātītī hou.
E tūmanako ana ahau kia makuru ngā hua pai o ā koutou mahi
E tūngāngā ana koe he kaha nōu ki te momi hikareti.
E tūpuhipuhi tonu ana māua i tērā wā.
E tūretireti ana te waka i te wai, ka mataku ia ki te peke atu ki runga.
E tūtakitaki ana ngā kapua o te rangi, kei runga Te Mangōroa e kōpae pū ana
E ua ana a konei. Kei te pēhea mai a konā?
E ua, e te ua, ō kōpata e tāria nei e te whenua maroke.
E uakaha ana te tīma katoa kia riro i a rātou te wikitōria.
E ui ana au i te pūtake o te riri, i huatakina ai te pakanga
E uira ana te pāua me te whakairo
E uira ana te pāua me te whakairo, puhipuhi rawa ki te waero, ānana, ka turua rā
E uka ana a raro o te pou i te one
E umere ana te iwi i te taenga ake o te kōrero kua mutu te pakanga.
E unga tonu ana au i taku pōtae. I ahatia rā e au?
E uruwehi ana au kei puta te kōhuru rā i te whare herehere, ka haere mai ki te patu i taku tamāhine.
E wanawana ana ngā punua i te māeke.
E warawara ana ki te kai paipa māna.
E warea ana ngā āpiha ki te tinei i te ahi, paheno tonu atu ngā mauhere.
E warea ana te hoariri ki te kanikani a ngā wāhine, kua kounu atu ngā tāhae.
E warea kētia ana ki te whakapaipai i ō rāua matikuku
E waru mārō ō taku taura me te hau
E waru ngā tao ki a ia, ā, kīhai a Whare i rongo i te māngeongeo
E waru ngā taumata o te marautanga kura, e piki ake ana i te tau tuatahi o te kura tuatahi ki te tau whakamutunga o te kura tuarua.
E waru ngā tōtiti i te rorerore, e rua ka taka atu ki te pungarehu, e ono ka toe mai.
E waru ngā waewae o te katipō, e ono ō te wētā.
E waru ngā wekeweke o te wheke.
E waru ngā whengu o te whiri o Raukatauri.
E waru tekau ana kau e whakatētē ā-ringa ana rātau. Kāore hoki he mīhini kutētē kau i taua wā
E waru tekau rawa ngā tapawhā i tāparua kia oti mai ai te papangarua kānihinihi nei.
E wawata puku ana tētehi, me tētehi, ki a rāua ake
E wawā kau ake nei ngā kōwhatu o Waitara
E werawera katoa ana au me te pātuki o taku manawa i taku kaha mataku.
E wewero pātiki ana
E whai ake nei tā rātou waiata.
E whai ana i te hoariri me te whīoioi i ā rātou rākau.
E whai ana kia piki ake te kounga o te reo Māori e kōrerotia ana, e tuhia ana, kia reo rangatira tonu ai.
E whai atu ana te waka tuarua i te kōriporipo o te waka matua.
E whai haere ana au i tētahi kōawa ka tūpono atu ki tētahi rere.
E whai mai ana ngā tokorua rā i ngā tapuwae o tō rāua tupuna
E whai mai tā tāua tama i a koe, waiho atu i tōna kāinga, kia hea tōna wairua, hea ki roto ki Tauranga
E whaitake ana ēnā kōrero ki ahau mō taku tuhinga roa.
E whaiwhairoroa ana kia mutu te kai paipa a tana hoa kua hapū nei, he aha te aha.
E whakaae ana kia unuhia atu taku mōtini
E whakaahua mai ana te amiorangi i te mata o Matawhero.
E whakaangaanga tonu ana a ia, me haere me noho rānei.
E whakaapaapa ana a Ruahine i ngā wahia ki te taha tonu o te wharau.
E whakaaro ana kia iti te kai . . . kia angiangi ai te poho o te tangata mō te tūranga i te aroākapa o te haka
E whakaaro noa ana au he pai ake pea mēnā ka haere takitahi atu tātou, kia kore ai ia e hēmanawa.
E whakaarotia ana he tino huritau te kotahi rau tau o te tangata, o te kura, o te tāone, o te aha.
E whakaatu ana te rōpū hauora i ā rātou pānui whakatairanga, me kore e tangohia e te marea.
E whakaawe ana ahau i ngā rare nei kei pau i ngā tamariki i te rā kotahi.
E whakahaere ana te kura i tētahi taiopenga kohi moni.
E whakahakune ana te tokorua i te taha o te toa, ka pōhēhē te pirihimana e mahi kino ana rāua.
E whakahie ana te tamaiti i te kurī e ngengere mai rā, kāore tonu taua kurī e oma.
E whakahipa ana ahau i te kōrero a Tamihana Tikitere i roto i Te Toa Takitini e kī nei, ko Te Ngae te whenua tuatahi i noho ai a Te Hapimana, i tīmata ai te whakapono ki waenganui i a Te Arawa. E kī ana ahau kāore, ko Te Koutu kē te whenua tuatahi
E whakahāngai mai ana tētahi o te hoariri i tana pū, ka hopukia atu e ia te ngutu o te pū, ka whakaarahia ki runga
E whakahē ana au ki tēnei kōrero he rongoā te wai harareke mō te piwa taipo, e pānuitia nei
E whakahē ana au ki tēnei kōrero he rongoā te wai harareke mō te piwa taipō, e pānuitia nei. Kāhore i tika tēnei kōrero kia uru ki te pepa a te katoa
E whakahīhī ana te whaea i ngā mahi pai a tana tamaiti.
E whakainati ana i te nui o ana whenua, engari kāore i whāki mai he mea tāhae te nuinga e tana tupuna.
E whakakau ana te riri, kāore anō i riri
E whakakewa atu ana au ki te wahine rā.
E whakakoko ana te ngeru ki te hopu i te manu.
E whakakoromaki ana i tana pāmamae i ngā kupu tātā a tana rangatira.
E whakakumu ana tōku ngākau e kore ahau e haere mā te waka
E whakakunāwheke ana kei kore ia e puta i te whakamātautau.
E whakakāti ana i tana matua kia mutu tana patupatu i tō rātou whaea.
E whakamahia ana te pūnaha ngahuru puta noa i te ao, arā, ko te mita te waeine taketake mō te roa, ko te karamu mō te papatipu, ko te rita mō te rōrahi.
E whakamahia ana te tāoke kia kore ai te ngahere e muia e te paihamu.
E whakamanamana ana rāua i te whānautanga mai o tā rāua pēpē.
E whakamauru ana mai te tangi o te pū
E whakamihi ana ia ki ōna mātua mō tā rāua koha ki a ia.
E whakamomori ana a Hine ki tana whakaaweawe e hokihoki nei ki tana kāinga i tawhiti.
E whakamāori ana ia i ngā kōrero Pāniora a te kaikauhau ki te reo Pākehā.
E whakamāpuna kau ana te whakaaro me pēhea te maungārongo o Waikato rāua ko te Kāwana
E whakamārama ana te ākonga i ngā āhuatanga matū kua pā i roto i tāna ipuipu.
E whakamātau ana ki te hoko i tētahi whenua iti nei i te tarawāhi tonga o te awa o Waitara
E whakamātauria ana te wāhi ki te aho, te mahana, te wai me te kai e whanake ai tētahi tipu.
E whakananawe atu ana ki muri; e kore e hohoro te haere
E whakanaoa mai ana aua kākahu i tāwāhi, i ngā whenua e utua ai ngā kaimahi ki te kongakonga noa iho.
E whakanewa noa ana te puhi o tōna waka, me taunaki ki te tā kākaho kia kitea ai.
E whakangaro atu ana te remu o te ope a Rakapare ki roto o Marokopa, ka pepeke mai a Tūpāhau, kāore i roa kua piri tonu atu
E whakangoto ana ia kia kite anō i tana tōrere, koirā i kauria ai e ia te moana uriuri.
E whakangākau ana ia ki ngā kai o tōna tamarikitanga.
E whakanonenone ana te motu whānui i te whakapikinga ake o te tāke hokohoko.
E whakanui ana rātou i te whare kia whā kē ngā rūma moe.
E whakaora ana, e whakanene ana i tō kiri
E whakapae ana rāua nā Hare i tuku tētahi kōrero muna ki te nūpepa.
E whakapae ana te tākuta kei te muhanitia te tamaiti rā, nā te nui o ngā uruhua i tana tinana.
E whakapae ana ētahi tohunga pūtaiao i mate katoa ngā mokoweri i tētahi matakōkiri kaitā rawa atu i tau mai ki te whenua.
E whakapaetia ana i pūtakea mai te Mate Ārai Kore i te makimaki.
E whakapaetia ana ia i raro i te ture. Ki te whakaaetia nāna taua mahi kino, ka mauheretia ia mō tētahi wā roa.
E whakapaetia ana nā te kai whiore i roto i taua whānau i raru ai ngā tamariki.
E whakapaetia ana nā te rehu paihana i tukua ki ngā ngahere i taua pakanga, i whānau ngunu mai ai ana tamariki.
E whakapaetia ana nā tētahi tipu i pukupuku ai te kiri.
E whakapaipai ana rātou i te whare tapere mō te mārena hei te Rātapu.
E whakaparo ana te kapokapowai i te mata o te wai.
E whakapau kaha ana ngā kāmura kia tāpatua te whare i mua i te taunga mai o te āwhā.
E whakapekapeka ana a ia i ngā mahi, i tana tino kore e pīrangi kia riro ki tā tētehi atu.
E whakapeke ana te ngeru i raro i te waka.
E whakapokara ana i te reka o ngā kai.
E whakapono ana ahau ko te Atua te mana o ngā mana katoa.
E whakapono ana ia ki ngā mana kei ngā wāhi katoa, ki te mana o neherā, ki te mana o nāianei, ki te mana o te tangata me ngā mea ora katoa
E whakapono ana ngā koroheke kei roto tonu te taniwha nei i te puna, nō te mea kei te riri tonu te wai, ā, i ētahi wā he waikura tonu te āhua o te wai
E whakapono ana ētahi he hoihoi ake, he totoa ake te aki i te kōtiro.
E whakapuke ana te hiahia
E whakaputa ana te tangata kūware i ōna whakaaro hei whawhai ki te tangata whakaaro nui
E whakapāeko kau ana, he noho tou noa iho te mahi.
E whakapāho ana ngā ororua ki ngā koko katoa o te pā.
E whakapīoioi ana te waka i te hone o te moana
E whakapō ana i tana tamaiti kua kahakina e te waipuke.
E whakararua ana te kāinga me ngā kararehe e te iro pērā i te ngaro, te puruhi, me te kutu.
E whakarikiriki ana ngā tamariki i te kore o tō rātou matua i whakaae kia haere rātou ki te kaukau.
E whakarite puku ana ngā tamariki i tētahi hākari weherua pō mā rātou.
E whakaroau ana te kekeno i te toka, ka pōhēhētia kua mate.
E whakarongo ana ki te kauhau, mea ake kua kurehu me te ngongoro anō o te ihu.
E whakatakataka ana te tamaiti i roto i tōku kōpū nei
E whakataki ana rāua i te manuhiri tūārangi i te taunga rererangi.
E whakatakohe ana te taina i muri i ngā tuākana, kāore hoki i pīrangi haere ki te kura.
E whakatapeha ana ia i ngā kōrero, engari kāore ērā tāngata i te mārama kei te pērātia.
E whakatare ana ngā tamariki kia puta ki waho ki te kori.
E whakataretare ana a Te Ponga kia puta ia ki mua ngangahu ai
E whakataruna ana ia kei te mate tana puku, kia whakaaetia ai tana noho ki te kāinga.
E whakatekateka ana ngā tamariki i te papa tākaro.
E whakatekateka ana ngā tamariki i waenga pārae.
E whakatikaina ana te remu o te panekoti me te whakamau pine atu.
E whakatinaku ana ngā tamariki i te tomokanga o te kura.
E whakatio haere ana te mata o te roto.
E whakatipuria ana he paina ki tērā pito whenua.
E whakatuanui ana, me te kī anō ka haria tana nawe ki te kōti.
E whakatīeke ana ia ki te hāpai i te kōhatu
E whakatīkorokoro ana me te mea nei kua rore - he aha rā tāna i kai ai?
E whakatōkihikihi ana tētahi i tētahi, me te kata anō o ngā waha.
E whakauaua ana ia ki te whakahoki i te pātai, kei kīia ia he whakaputa mōhio.
E whakauhi manuhiri ana mātou āpōpō; nō Tahiti te tūwaewae.
E whakawai ana ia i ana waiata mō tana whakamātautau piana.
E whakawairua mai rā te waka i roto i te wai
E whakawhetai atu ana au ki a koutou, e aku hoa Pākehā, mō ā koutou kupu whakapai mōku, mō tēnei kura hoki
E whakawhirinaki ana ia ki te kaho whakarunga o te mahau.
E whakawhiti ana i te awa, ka peo i ngā kōhatu.
E whakawhēuaua ana te koroua ki te hoko, i te mea kua waia rawa ia ki tana punua whare.
E whana ana te ngākau o te kōhine ki te kupu a ōna mātua.
E whanake ana te rākau nei
E whano ai koe ki tō tini, ki tō mano, ki tō kau ariki
E whano ana rā ki te kawe ā-riri
E whata ana ngā whakatūpato mō te au tō o tērā tāwhangawhanga.
E whata mai ana i te whārangi tuatahi tonu o te niupepa ngā kōrero mō te kōhurutanga o te wahine rā.
E whata mai ana te pānui kia āta haere ngā waka, i te nui o ngā tuapuku i taua wāhanga o te rori.
E whatā ake ana e te ngako o taua ngārara nei
E whawhai kino ana tētahi ki tētahi mō ngā taonga o te tangata kua mate, kia riro i tētahi i tētahi rānei te nuinga. Kāore he mea nui atu i tēnei hei whakatupu i te mauāhara i te pakanga
E whawhe mai ana te paoa
E wherawhera ana i ngā whārangi o te moheni ki te tirotiro i ngā pikitia.
E whero tonu ana te koha i te wāhi i motu ai tana waewae i te toki.
E wheuka ana ngā pou o tēnei pito o te taiepa.
E whewhera mai ana te hāte o tama whakameremere, he mekameka koura pīataata kei tana kakī.
E whiti ana ngā aua, e rukuruku ana ngā kawau.
E whiti ana te rā, kāre he ua, kāre he hau, koia te huarere e kīia ana ko te paki o Ruhi.
E whiti, e te rā, e kai ki taku kiri
E whiti, e te rā, e maene ki te kiri
E whitu ngā kaitākaro ki te tīma poitarawhiti.
E whitu ngā rā o te wiki.
E whitu tāra me te rima tekau hēneti te utu mō te hanawiti me te kawhe.
E whiu ana te rōpū i te taha o te ahi, he kōrero kēhua te mahi.
E whiu ana te wahie, te kōwhatu, te mārohi, e tahu ana te ahi, e tunu ana i te mārohi
E whiua ana te kakau o te hoe
E whiuwhiu ana te whiore o te kurī i te harikoa.
E whiwhi ana taku matua i te takuhe a te pouaru.
E whiwhi penihana ana te nuinga o te hau kāinga, he kore mahi rā hoki.
E whā hāora mātou e hī ana i te ata nei kāre kau ā mātou ika - he haere tahakore tēnā.
E whā hāora rātou e hoehoe ana i ngā utanga mai i te kaipuke ki uta.
E whā hāora rātou e kohi ana i ā rātou wahie.
E whā hāora te waka rererangi e rere ana ka tae ki Rarotonga.
E whā kē ngā tohorā i te āwhina haere mai i a Tākitimu
E whā ngā hamupaka kua pau i a tama honekai, kāore anō i kī te tero.
E whā ngā kanoi o tēnā taura
E whā ngā momo kōwhai, ko te kōwhai kape tahi, te kōwhai kape rua, te kōwhai ngutu tahi me te kōwhai ngutu rua.
E whā ngā niho nunui rawa, e whā ngā mea tū-ā-ririki nei
E whā ngā rūma moe o tō rātou whare, he kīhini nui me ngā whareiti e rua!
E whā ngā tatau o taua whare, kotahi kei te rāwhiti, kotahi kei te pū o te tonga, kotahi kei te māuru, kotahi kei te marangai
E whā ngā waewae o te hōiho, e rua ō te manu.
E whā ngā wai o te kupenga
E whā ngā waka nei, he waka toiera, he waka pītau, he waka pakoko, he waka tētē; te toiera he waka nui
E whā rau mita te pae o te papa omaoma nei.
E whā rawa ngā pou o te whare hei tokotoko ake i te tāhuhu.
E whā rawa ngā puku o ētahi kararehe pērā i te kau me te hipi.
E whā te roa o te rākau; kāhore he koha
E whā tekau tau e mahia ana te āka, kātahi anō ka whakapuke ake ngā wai ki runga i te tihi o ngā maunga
E whā ēnā tāngata nunui e kōpana ana i te waka kua tapoko ki te wharu, he aha te aha.
E whāia ana e ia ngā akoranga o te Kura ā-Tuhi.
E whāia ana e te hoariri, ka taki i tana māhuruhuru ka tere rawa atu te oma.
E whāia ana te matatuhi aua e te kahawai.
E whākure kutu ana te māmā, e heke ana ngā roimata o te tamaiti.
E whāngai ana i tana hōiho ki te kāroti, ka komia mai te ringa.
E whāoko ana i te ngaunga a te puruhi.
E whārikihia ana a raro i ngā rākau e te rau hūnonoi.
E whātai ake ana ki te tope kura i runga i te rae o Tamatea, he pōhoi toroa anō i ngā taringa
E whātare mai rā te tāwhana i tua o te hiwi.
E whātero mai ana te pakoko i te ihu o te waka.
E whāuraura ana a Hine, ka mahi te tungāne ki te whakamauru i a ia, me te whakamā anō.
E whāwhā haere ana ngā pūhihi o te kōuraura.
E whāōtia ana te kai ānō nei kua rua marama rātou e whakatiki ana.
E whēangaanga tonu ana ngā whakaaro o ētehi.
E whēke ana ngā rākau i te kino o te hau.
E whēnanau ana te whāereere i ana kūao e whāngote ana.
E whētuki ana tana tārāuma, koirā au i mōhio ai e ora tonu ana ia.
E whētuki kau nei te whatumanawa mōhou, e te tau.
E whīoioi ana rāua i ā rāua hoari tētahi ki tētahi.
E wiriwiri ana ngā hipi tīmore i te makariri.
E wiriwiri ana ngā korokē nei i te makariri, kua tino mākū hoki rāua
E wēwē ana te kurī me te oma mō te hemo tonu atu.
E āhei ana kia whiua ia ki te moni, kia kaua e iti iho i te tekau hereni, kia kaua e neke atu i te rua pāuna
E āhua ana te wahine, koinā ia e kore nā e kutikuti i ōna makawe.
E āhua tīmokamoka ana tōna mōhio ki ngā kōrero tātai
E āhua whakamā ana - nāna te mahi nui, mōku kē ngā painga.
E āhuru ana i te whanga, engari, nō te putanga ki te moana waiwai, kātahi ka rongo i te kino.
E āia mai ana ngā hipi i te rapaki ki te hēte kuti hipi i te pūtake.
E ākina mai ana ngā toka e te ngaru, me te rere anō o te nehutai.
E ānau ana te kuia, kua hiahia hoki ki tōna rā.
E ānene ana te pēpi.
E āniwaniwa mai rā te rangi, taihoa ka ua tātā.
E ārai ana rātou i a tātou, e whakatūtū taiapa noa ana hei peke mā tātou.
E ārangi ana ngā whakaaro i te haruru o te āwhā me te mōhio e hī tonu ana te hoa.
E ārewa noa iho ana, kāore e tūturu te noho
E āritarita ana te kurī kia haria ia ki te hāereere, koirā i tīkina ai e ia tana here.
E āta haere ana ngā waka i te huarahi i tēnei pō pūkohukohu.
E āta haere ana tō mātou waka i te kino o te kohu i te huarahi.
E āta kakapa ana te haki i te hau pāhengihengi.
E āta kimihia ana e te kāwanatanga ngā whakaaro o te hapori kāpō me te hapori turi.
E āta tirohia ana e te tākuta te tara o te kōtiro kia mōhiotia ai mēnā i rahua ia.
E āta whakanoho ana ia i ngā whakaahua ki tana pukapuka kia uru ai te katoa ki roto.
E ātea ana te whare, kāhore he tangata o roto
E āwangawanga ana i te mea kāhore anō kia rite tana nama.
E āwangawanga ana te tumuaki kei kore e oti te mahi i te wā i kī taurangi ai ia ka oti.
E āwhiti ana te kuia ki tētahi hoa kōrero Māori kai parāoa noa iho nei.
E āwhiti kau ana, he kore nōna i whakapuaki i tōna aroha ki tana matua kua mate nei.
E āwhiti noa rā ki te tau i rāngia
E āwhitu ana tōku ngākau ki ngā kai kīhai i nui mai ki a au
E ōi atu ana me kore e aro mai te kuia hoi rā.
E! Kua tipoko noa atu ngā kai o te rua nei!
E! Kāre koe i rongo i aku tohutohu nē? Taringa morimori!
E! Nā te wahine iti rā koe! Ko au nā te wahine rahi
E, ko Te Kahureremoa, ko te tamāhine a Paka
E, me whai matikuku anō e taea ai te tapona nei te whakamatara.
E, te whakahī rā o te tamariki ki te whakahē, ki te tohutohu i ngā koeke
Ehara au i raro nei, nō runga rawa au nō te maunga tiketike e rere nei te pūroro
Ehara au i te Pākehā, kia whakatarawetitia rawatia au e koutou
Ehara hoki koe i te mea hara mai noa, he mea rāhiri mārire nā ngā tāngata o Heretaunga nei hei taonga mōna
Ehara i a Hinepoupou tangata, ko Hinepoupou atua
Ehara i a koe ēnā hū - nō tō tuakana kē.
Ehara i te au miro nei tōna au, engari he tika tonu
Ehara i te hanga ahau ka kanukanu taku puku ki te riri
Ehara i te hanga te maninohea o roto o tōku puku i te mahi a te tangata rā
Ehara i te hanga tāu mahi ki te pikoni i te ahi nei, ā mate noa iho.
Ehara i te hanga tōu mōariari i te hinganga o te rākau nā
Ehara i te hanga! Harawiniwini ana te kiri i te mātaotao
Ehara i te kōrero ngutu kau ēnei e kōrerotia nei, engari nō roto nō te ngākau
Ehara i te mea e kitea rangitahitia
Ehara i te mea e matatau ana ki te reo; e mōhio kau ana ki ētahi kupu kōtahitahi nei.
Ehara i te mea he aha, heoi anō he whakamōhio noa atu ko te pūtea i pau ki ngā mahi whakarākei whare
Ehara i te mea he moni anake e hapa ana, e hapa ana hoki te tangata
Ehara i te mea he mātauranga wawata, engari ko ngā tino mātauranga tonu e ingoatia ai tēnei iwi
Ehara i te mea he pakanga tōna hoaketanga ake. Kia noho ki te kāinga, he tangata hūmārie, he tangata ngāwari, he tangata ngākau māhaki
Ehara i te mea he pohe ngā tamariki, nō reira kei te pouako kē pea te mate.
Ehara i te mea ka hapū te wahine i ngā ainga katoa, ahakoa te nui o te parapara ka puta ake i te ure o te tāne.
Ehara i te mea ka onohia ana te rākau, taro ake kua pakari
Ehara i te mea ka pakanga ngā iwi rā, he riri takurua noa iho hoki tā rātou riri.
Ehara i te mea ko ia anake e rongo kino nei i te mamae i te matenga o Pāpā - ko tātou katoa tērā.
Ehara i te mea ko ia anake tō mātau kaiwhakaako. Tokotoru pea ina rātau
Ehara i te mea ko ngā whenua raupatu anake, ko ngā whenua anō hoki e kī ana te Kāwanatanga i hokoa, kāti e kī ana te Māori i riro noa atu
Ehara i te mea kua hiamoe, ērangi kua mamae aku kanohi i te whetēnga kia kite i te huarahi
Ehara i te mea me wheuri rawa te wai e toremi ai te kōhungahunga.
Ehara i te mea mutunga-kore taua mana, kāore e tukua iho ana ki ā rātou tamariki
Ehara i te mea mōna anake ngā painga o tēnei mahi - mō te iwi nui tonu.
Ehara i te mea nāku te kupu, engari heoi anō tāku he pupuri i te kupu
Ehara i te mea nō ināianei ia i whakahoa ai ki te Pākehā; kāore, engari nō te oroko nohoanga mai o te Pākehā ki tēnā kāinga
Ehara i te mea nōna katoa te hē - he mea āta patou hoki ia kia whawhai.
Ehara i te mea pātai
Ehara i te mea tika kia moe ngā wāhine takakau i roto i te rūma o ngā tāne takakau
Ehara i te mea utu ōna taonga, he mea apo
Ehara i te mea, mā mātou o Whanganui nei e whakaatu atu kia whēnei, kia whēnā
Ehara i te tahora pēnei me tō tēnei motu. Kāhore he awa, kāhore he rākau, kāhore he tarutaru o taua wāhi; hōhā noa iho te ngākau o te tira haere, titiro kau ana ki tētahi taha, ki tētahi taha, he onepū kau, me te moana nei te tika
Ehara i te tangata pūhuruhuru, he torutoru noa ngā huruhuru i te riu.
