Ehara i te taonga hau te kai e puritia nei e mātou, e Ngāti Toa
Ehara i te taru te mate
Ehara i te tino mate rawa te mate o Tāwhaki, ā, nōna ake anō te mana i ora ake ai anō ia
Ehara i te tākuta ki te whakawhānau. Nā te atua kē tēnā mahi
Ehara i te tī e wana ake
Ehara i te waka tōkau, he whakarei anō
Ehara i te whaiwhaiā i patu engari nā te nui o te wehi, he nui hoki ngā tāngata e mate ana i te wehi i te whiti
Ehara ia i te atua - he tangata noa, pēnei i a tāua nei.
Ehara ia i te momo tangata e whakawhirinaki atu ai koe.
Ehara ia i te ringa tauhou mō te kairākau
Ehara ia i te tangata matapiko - ahakoa tō hiahia, ka hoatu noa e ia.
Ehara ia i te tangata mōhū, mehemea kei a ia, ka tohaina ki te katoa.
Ehara kau i te pakanga ki te Kuīni, engari e whakamomori ana ki te pupuru i ō rātou kāinga
Ehara ko koe anake tēnā e haere nei, engari ko tō iwi kei runga i ō pakihiwi e wahaina ana e koe
Ehara ko ngā tākuta anake kia mataara. Me mataara anō te iwi ka tika
Ehara koe i te tāne, he puhi koe nāku, ē, he ipo ki te moenga, ē
Ehara kua weto taua ahi
Ehara kua wātea te tāne māna
Ehara māku tēnei reta - māu kē.
Ehara ngā hakirara katoa i te waiata taunu, ko ētahi he waiata whakahangareka.
Ehara noa iho tēnei i te whawhai ina whakaritea ki ngā whawhai o mua tata ake nei
Ehara nāu ēnā taputapu, nō reira āta tiakina.
Ehara nō Hine te hē - nō tana teina kē.
Ehara rā pea, e tama, i konei, nō rāwāhi mai anō
Ehara rāpea, e tama, i konei; nō rāwāhi mai anō, nō ngā mangainga i a Tamatekapua
Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, engari he toa takitini
Ehara tana whakapapa i te whakapapa o te ware, he kauhau ariki kē.
Ehara te mako i te ika e arongia ana
Ehara te mate kohi i te mate momo heke iho i ngā mātua, engari kia uru rawa te ngārara ki roto i te tinana o te tangata, kātahi ka pāngia
Ehara te matua pōriro; engari tōna matua tupu
Ehara te tapawhā tītaha i te tapawhā hāngai, i te mea kāore i ōrite te rahi o ngā koki e whā.
Ehara tēnei i te kāinga arotau mō te hunga e pāngia ana e te mate huangō, nā te nui o te paina.
Ehara tēnei i te ture o te hoa. Kāhore au e pai ki tēnei tū tangata
Ehara tēnei i te whakateke nāku; he tika tonu
Ehara tēnei motu he koroiti
Ehara tēnei whītiki i te whītiki pongi, ko tēnei whitiki kua paiherea nei tātou he whītiki koura tēnei whītiki - e kore tēnei whītiki e motu
Ehara tēnā i te tōrōkiri - koirā tonu te āhua o te tōtōeka.
Ehara tērā i te wahine hou a Tame - ko tana tuahine kē.
Ehara ēnei i te hunga kanukanu i kite atu rā ia i te ahiahi. Ānō nei he hunga kē, i te papai o ngā kākahu me te tau o te āhua
Ehara, e maranga mai ana te pou rā, ka taka te tangata rā
Ehara, ka eke te ope taua ki te pae o te riri, ki te wāhi okiokinga.
Ehara, ka taha te patu i tōna angaanga, ka pakaru ko te tahā, mau mai i a ia ko te ngutu anake o te tahā rā
Ehara, ka tatū te noho a ngā tokorua nei. Kua pai ō rāua wairua. Ka koa hoki au i tō rāua painga
Ehara, me te huruhuru manu ka rere i te hau
Ehara, moe ana rāua nei, ā, tupu noa ō rāua nei uri; ā, moroki noa nei, mahara tonu rātou ki ngā whanonga a tō rātou tupuna wahine, a Te Huhuti
Ehara, tahutahu ana te kai nei, te raukura o te manu ka kitea ki reira, te mā, te pango, te whero, te aha
Ei, kaua e matatāu. Me uru mai koe ki te whakaahua nei.
Ei, kaua e whakairihia te tōtō kai ki runga ake i te moenga o Tūtakangahau, kei tāikihia ngā kurī a Pōhokorua.
Ei, kei te kōrero au ki a koe!
Ei, kia tika te kai, ehara hoki i te whakataetae.
Ei, māta takahi tō waewae. Kei whakaahuatia tāua e te kāmera rā.
Eke ake ki runga ka titiro ki waho ki te moana. Ko te waka rā e whakangaro atu ana i te pae. Kātahi ka tangi i tōna tangi, hei whakahoki mai i tōna waka ki a ia
Eke huirua ana ngā kararehe i te waka o Noa.
Eke, eke, eke hohoro; eke Tangaroa, eke panuku, hui ē, tāiki, ē!
Eneene ana ngā kai o te kāinga nei, monemone ana i te poaka.
Engari a konei e kōangi ana i te hau
Engari ahakoa riro atu i tētahi tangata tō whenua, ko taua tīni, ka mau tonu te mana hei haeretanga tūruhi
Engari anō taku kurī pinepine ka mauria e au ki taku kete!
Engari anō tana kurī, he momo huruhuru tarahutihuti, nō Itāria.
Engari anō te marama, ka eke penu tonu kei runga
Engari he hunga rawakore taua hunga e whāngaitia ana, he hunga hemokai hoki, nō konā i kore ai e maumautia tētahi wāhi o tā rātou kai
Engari he iwi kaupeka te tupu o te tangata
Engari he neke nō ngā kararehe ki te taha matau o te kāraho o te kei o te waka, ka hē kē atu te tītaha o te tima
Engari i mea i a ia anō kia pōaha, ka mau ki te āhua o te pononga, ka meinga kia rite ki te tangata
Engari i ngērā wā, e mōhio ana au, i haere mātou ki reira purei netipōro ai
Engari i te mea kei te kāngia te ao e te ahi, ā kei te rērere haere ngā korakora, nā reira kia noho mataara tātou kei wera i taua ahi
Engari i whakatūria te kēti hei kohikohi moni i te katoa, kia ai he rawa hei whakapai i te rori, kia pai ai te haere a te katoa - te Pākehā me te Māori
Engari i whiwhi rawa ia ki te hōnore nui a Kuīni Riripeti Tuarua, Tā Turi, i mua o tōna matenga
Engari ia ngā wawata, ngā tūmanako o ngā rā. Ka hoki mai hei tapuhi, hei kōingo i ēnei rā. E kore e memeha noa
Engari ka maringi ana, ānō he pākete wai e maringi ana, ka ngaro katoa te whenua i te wai
Engari ka tuohu anō kia hongi te ihu ki te ihu
Engari ka wehe i te rekareka ngā tāngata e kōwhiria ana mō tērā haere ka kite rātau i Ingarangi
Engari kaua te mate e whakatupuria, nā te mea he mahinga nui te whakamahu i te mate
Engari ki te pāpunitia ngā wini o ngā whare papa, ka rite aua whare papa ki te whare puni
Engari kia maumahara tātou ko te wā o te āiō tēnei, taihoa anō te tuarangaranga, te whenewhene o Hinemoana!
Engari kia tūpato, kei pōrahurahu noa ō tātou ngākau, ka wareware ngā mea o te tapu, o te oranga tonutanga
Engari ko ngā pukapuka mātauranga nui o te ao, me ngā pukapuka o ngā haerenga whenua o te tangata tāna i rekareka ai
Engari ko te maha me te umere noa iho a te hunga kōhuru rā, kāore rawa e ngaro te warowaro i roto i ōna taringa
Engari ko te wahi e tārewa ana ko ngā roto kei waenganui i ngā whenua, ko ngā parumoana, arā, ngā whenua e pā ana ki ngā moana, e ngaromia ana e te tai pari
Engari ko ētahi o ēnei tamariki e takirua ana ō rātou iwi
Engari kua kōmuhumuhu mai te tamaiti nei ki a au. Inā tana kupu: 'E pāpā, kua tawhito rawa ngā kākahu i homai nei e aku rangatira mōku. Kua kore ahau i mahana'
Engari kua tū kē te ihu, kua komekome kē te waha i te āhua o ētahi. Aua atu, me ū tonu mātou ki tēnei mahi i whakaritea hei pīkau mā te Taura Whiri
Engari kāore e pai kia tītaha te tūnga atu o te waewae, engari kia poupou tonu
Engari me mātua mōhio te tangata ki te wherawhera papakupu me ngā momo pukapuka katoa hei āwhina i a ia i tana mahi
Engari me pā atu anō ki taua tangata ngā whiu me ngā whaina kua whakahuatia ake nei
Engari me tāpiri atu he kōrero whakamārama kia kore ai e pōrahurahu ā tātou tamariki, ā tātou mokopuna ā ngā tau e heke iho nei
Engari ngā tāngata hoe poti e wehi ana i taua kurī, mehemea ka riri ia, ka whāia tō poti, ā, ka mau, wāhia iho e ōna niho
Engari nā roto i te kotahi o te waihoe, ahakoa te tautohetohe, te amowheke, te nihoniho, te hūneinei i ōna wā, karohia ana te korokoro o Te Parata
Engari taku taha e kai koromaki ana
Engari te aka kiore, kāore he niho o tērā
Engari te kaiatua e purea e ora; tēnā ko te aroha tū tonu i roto rā
Engari te kōpito e roraha ki te tini
Engari te ngākihi e tukia, e marere i te toka
Engari, ahakoa te mīharo o Hikairo ki te whakaaro rangatira o Ngā Puhi, kāore ia mō te whakarere i tana iwi
Engari, kāhore ahau i whakapuaki i ōku whakaaro; ko te arero hangahanga te hoariri hoki o te wahine
Erangi rangona rawatia ake ko ngā papa kāinga, ko ngā whare, me ngā mahinga kai mai o ngā tūpuna tae mai ki nāianei, kua riro i te tangata kē
Erangi te kōwhatu, ka rehua, ka ngawhara
Erangi te kōwhatu, ka rehua, ka ngāwhara
Ero ana tana tinana, nā te kore kai.
Eā! Kua mate tāu mōkai
Ha! He aha i kapea ai a Tame i te tīma? Nāna ngā piro e rua i te kēmu i tērā wiki rā.
Ha! He aha i tāuhitia ai ngā toto ki ngā pou o ngā kūwaha?
Ha! Kua pau kē āna rare, kua tahuri ki te unene i ā ētahi atu.
Ha! Māu rawa te kōrero!
Haea mai rā ki te mere tuatini
Haehaea koe ki te mira o tawhiti
Haehaea mai ā tāua kehakai nā hei mātātara mā tāua.
Haere ai ia ki te tapahi i ngā karaehe i te urupā i ia marama.
Haere ai mātou ki te kōngutu o te awa ki te hao kōeaea.
Haere ai mātou ki te muriwai kaukau ai kia kore ai e ākina mai e te tai.
Haere ai mātou ki uta ki te kari noke whiti mō ā mātou matira.
Haere ai taku kuia ki te kohikohi i ngā wūru ka mau i ngā taiapa, ka miroa e ia hei whatu poraka.
Haere ai te nuinga o ngā kaiparo ki te whare hupa, kai ai.
Haere ai tērā rā ki te whare whakamārōrō tinana hei kaupare atu i te ngohungohu.
Haere ake i aua ope he tamariki kau, otirā, ehara i te tamariki nonohi nei, kāo, he tāngata kua mau i te moko, ko ngā taitamariki kaumātua o aua iwi
Haere ake rā te ihi o ngā toa, te mana o ngā toa
Haere ana a Rita, noho ana te tangata
Haere ana i te mahanatanga o te rā ki te whare o Ihipohete, i a ia e okioki ana i te poutūmārōtanga
Haere ana ia ki Tauranga ki te tiki whao hei whakairo mō tōna whare
Haere ana koe ki te tinihanga i ōu tīpuna, ana, ka kite koe i te hūhi
Haere ana te wahine rā ki tahaki tangi ai
Haere ana tēnei tangata ki te kimi i tana ariki, whanatu atu whanatu mai, haere ana ki tēnei kāinga ki tērā kāinga, roa noa tōna haerenga, na, ka tae ki tētahi pā
Haere ana tētehi i ōna waewae anō, haere ana tētehi i te waewae rākau
Haere atu ai ka kite iho i ngā wheua o te kuia rā e haipū ana me tōna kurī anō e takoto tahi ana i te taha i a ia
Haere atu ana a Kae i a Hine-te-iwaiwa rāua ko Raukatauri
Haere atu ana aua tamariki ki te titiro i te mea e ngarue rā i te repo
Haere atu ana rāua ko tana kape ki te hao kōkopu.
Haere atu ana te murare ko tana tueke me tana takapau kei te tuarā e pīkau ana.
Haere atu rā koe, te matā kai kutu, te ingoa ka raka ki tawhiti rā, ī!
Haere atu rā, e taku kupu, i runga i te kōmuri aroha ki ōku hoa Māori e noho haere ana i te tapātai, i te tuawhenua, i ngā wāhi katoa
Haere atu te wahine, haere maro kore
Haere atu! Kua hōhā au i a koe.
Haere au ka kainga e te mangumangu, noho au i te kāinga mā te noke noa taku tinana e kai
Haere houhou atu ki te whare korikori, hoki werawera mai.
Haere i ngā rūrūanga a Rangiwhenua
Haere i runga i ngā tūātea o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, haere i runga i ngā moana nui, i ngā moana roa, i ngā moana whēkere, i ngā moana pōuri, i te moana oti atu
Haere i te ata māhina
Haere kahurangi atu ana ki te uiuinga, hoki mauri tau mai ana.
Haere ki tawhiti nui, ki tawhiti roa, ki tawhiti pāmamao
Haere ki te apo i ngā āporo e takoto mai rā.
Haere ki te arataki i tō tuahine
Haere ki te horoi i ō ringaringa, kua kainamu ki te hapa.
Haere ki te puna, tīkina he wai mōku.
Haere ki te tapahi harakeke hai mātātara mā taua
Haere ki te tapahi harakeke hei raranga kete mā tāua.
Haere ki te whāriki noho ai, tamariki mā - waiho ngā nohoanga mō ngā mātua.
Haere ki tērā pāpā ōu ki te pātai mō ngā whakapapa o te whānau.
Haere ki tō kōrua tipuna, ki a Timuwhakairia, kia ākona kōrua ki te wānanga hei ngaki i tō kōrua mate
Haere kiritea atu ana ki Tahiti, hoki kākarauri mai ana.
Haere koe i runga o tai aronui, ko au e whai atu i runga o tai takoto.
Haere koe i tai aronui, haere au i tai timu
Haere koe ka wawao i ngā rorirori rā, kia noho kē tētahi, kia noho kē tētahi.
Haere koe ki mua kōrero ai, kia rongo ai te whakaminenga i a koe.
Haere koe ki te kimi i ō hū hou - ka rīria koe e Māmā ki te kore e kitea.
Haere koe ki te pōpō i tā tātou mokopuna.
Haere koe ki te āwhina i te tauhou rā, kei te whakatairangi noa iho ia.
Haere koutou ki a Tūmatauenga, i mate mai nei koutou ki te pae o te pakanga ki te Tiamana, i mea nei kia riro i a rātau te ao katoa, ka mea ai i ngā iwi hai pononga takatakahi mā rātau
Haere koutou ki te tiki whara hune hei purupuru mō ngā kōwhao
Haere koutou, e hoki ki tō tātou matua, hei oranga ngākau mōna
Haere mahana atu i te poupoutanga o te rā, hoki pūanu mai i te ahiahipō.
Haere mahana atu ki te kaukau i te puna, hoki toroeke mai.
Haere mai ki ahau, e koutou katoa e māuiui ana, e taimaha ana, ā, māku koutou e whakaokioki
Haere mai ki runga ki tōku waka ki te whai ake i te kawa o te waka nei
Haere mai ki te whakaene i ngā pārua i tanumia e ōu mātua
Haere mai ki te wāhi marumaru nei kia pongi ai te kiri.
Haere mai ki te āhuru mōwai, tē taea e ngā hau o te rangi.
Haere mai kia kite i a mātou i ngā maramara o te waka a Porourangi i maheu mai ki tēnei wāhi
Haere mai kia kite tinana mai koe i a mātau, kia kite tinana atu hoki mātau i a koe
Haere mai kōrua - e rua ngā tūru e wātea ana i taku taha.
Haere mai rā koe, ka haere tahi tāua
Haere mai, e Te Wananga, whakaarahia te ua o te kakī o ō tūpuna, o tō whenua hoki o Aotearoa
Haere mai, e taku kaihou, ka moe tāua.
Haere mai, ka haere tao ki te tāone.
Haere mai, ka haere tāua ki te hāereere, mā te kōtaotao hauwai e patu te ānini o ō tāua māhunga.
Haere mai, kia awhi tāua.
Haere mai, tāua ka haere ki te pārae
Haere mohito ana te kōtiro i waenganui pō, kia kore ai he raru e tau ki runga i a ia.
Haere mā te tukutata e tohu ana ki Ōtorohanga, ka kore e roa te haere.
Haere māha, noho māha
Haere māmā atu ki te hui, hoki rorerore mai me ngā take maha hei whaiwhai māna.
Haere nei a Te Heuheu, ā, waea noa ngā wae
Haere ngaro atu a Hine ki te kite i tana whakaaweawe i waenganui pō.
Haere ngaro atu te ope rā
Haere noa ki te riri tāwhai
Haere rawa ake; ehara, kei muri tonu i tōna tuarā e whai atu ana: nāwai, nāwai ā ka tata kei te tuarā
Haere rawa atu te kanohi ki te mano e noho ana, kōrakorako ana ki te kānapanapa mai o te peara, o te taimona, o te koura, o te hiriwa — whakarewa kau ana!
Haere rā, e Karu, i te riri hunuhunu, i te riri tukutahi
Haere rā, e Tama! Auraki atu ki tō pāpā, ki a Hori, ki konā moe ai
Haere rā, e ngā maioro tē keria ē, tete noa ki te whanga
Haere rā, ngā rātā whakaruru hau, ki te muri
Haere tika atu ki tō Hana rā, kaua e kaihora, kei tūreiti kōrua.
Haere tonu i te rohe kua whakahuatia rā ki te kuinga o te awa o Mangatāwhiri, haere tonu, ka mārō mai ki te awa o Wairoa, haere tonu i te awa o Wairoa tae noa ki te pūaha
Haere tonu mai te tai o te moana, ā, kati ki te pari, nā te tai i ārai te ara
Haere tonu, ka puta ki te rarauhe, ka kai, he kōnehu rarauhe te kai, koia te pananehu
Haere tīmangamanga ana te porohaurangi.
Haere tītaha kē, kāore e haere tika atu ana ki Te Atua
Haere whakatohetohe ana te taurekareka nei
Haere, e Pene, māu e kōrero atu anei kia hoki mai a Hori ki te kāinga.
Haere, e hoa! E kore hoki mātou e wareware ki tōu aroha me tōu atawhai whakaharahara ki a mātou
Haere, e hoa, haere ki tōu okiokitanga. Te wharemate, tēnā koutou katoa. Kia kaha, kia manawanui
Haere, e te puru o Hokianga, te whakamarumaru o ngā iwi, te herenga o ngā tikanga nunui, te marae o ngā iwi
Haere, haere, haere, i runga i te ringa kino i te ringa ohorere o Aituā
Hahau kau ana te patu a taua tangata ki a Tūwhakararo. Heoti anō ka mate i konei a Tūwhakararo
Hahau kau ana te patu, he mano ki te matenga
Hai aha māku. Ka totohe tonu au ki te haere
Hai tangata ihupuku a Pāhewa ki te mahi māra. He huawhenua . . . me te putiputi wētahi o ngā tipu nāna i whakatipu
Hai te kore, iwa rau hāora, ka haere mātau ki tō mātau whare kura
Hai te ono o ia ata, ko tētahi o mātau kua oho kē, kua tīmata te tīwaha, 'Maranga, e tū koutou ki runga ki ō koutou waewae'
Hakina atu ō pūeru taretare - kua haere tāua ki te hoko kākahu hou mōu.
Hana ana tērā ngā pāpāringa i te kaha whakamā.
Hana ana tērā te ahi.
Hanga ana ētahi tāngata i te whare nui ki te pereki, he whare teitei noa atu
Hanga kōwhanga ai ngā uha i ngā tumu rākau kua wharemoa
Hangaia he whare, ko te paepae kai āwhā kia rite ki tōku kakī te tiketike
Hangaia te whare ki te aho, arā ki te wāhi kua waerea.
Hangaia tō whare ki te karei kia kore ai e hinamoa.
Hangore ana ngā niho o te hākui nei
Hangā ake e ngā manu he ōhanga ki reira
Hapuru ana te rākau i te hinganga.
Hara mai kōrua, kua haere tātau.
Harakuku ana te tangere o tō kaipuke
Harawene ana a Kākā ki ngā kura wherowhero o Kākāriki
Harawene ana a Kākā ki ngā kura wherowhero o Kākāriki. Ko tōna koti he pākākā noa iho te kara
Harawene ana a Kākā ki ngā kura wherowhero o Kākāriki. Ko tōna koti he pākākā noa iho te kara. Nō reira ka hiahia ai ki te kara muramura o Kākāriki hei whakaataahua i a ia
Harawiwini ana te kiri i te mātaotao
Hare rā, e te hoa, te wehi o te whenua
Haria atu ana ngā moenga ki te papa tuatoru, he ngai te kai a ngā ringa kawekawe.
Haria atu ngā kete rīwai nā ka putu atu ki te rua.
Haria atu ngā taewa waiwai hei kai mā te poaka.
Haria atu te rēwena nei hei ō ahiahi mā koutou.
Haria he rongoā kia kore ai tātou e kainga e te ongaonga.
Haria mai ana e Pine te tekoteko nei hai whakahuene mai mā tētahi o ngā tama tāne
Haria mai he tauira o ō waiata hei whakarongo mā rātou.
Haria mai tō reti, kia pai ai tā tāua haere ki te panunu i te puke rā.
Haria mai ō hū ki roto, kei mākū i te hautōmai ā te pō nei.
Haria ngā horehore kānga ki te rua.
Haria ngā ika nunui māhau, waiho mai ngā mea riki māku.
Haria ānā, engari waiho tēnei.
Haria ēnei reta ki te poutāpeta.
Harotu noa iho ngā here o ōna ringa
Haruru ana ngā maunga i te pakō o te pū.
Haruru ana te papa tākaro i te hāumere a te hunga mātakitaki i te kēmu.
Haruru ana te rangi me te whenua i te āwhiorangi.
Haruru ana te repo i te kūkēkē a te poraka.
Haruru ana, ngātoro ana te tai ki te ākau.
Haruru te toki, ngahoa te toki, hei pao i tō uru te toki, hei pao i tō roro te toki, tēnā toki ka haruru
Hau ana te kupu a Tāwhiao ki ngā kokonga katoa o Waikato.
Hau ana tōna rongo ki te motu hei toa kōue takitahi mō te mahi hoe waka
Hau ana tōna rongo, arā, kātahi hoki te tangata tika, tangata mārō ngā whakaaro ko tēnei!
Haumia ai ngā waero motu o ngā rēme hei kai.
Haupūria ngā tio ki te pereti nui, ka hari ai ki te tēpu.
Hawahawa ana te hinu i te tinana o te kaikauhoe roa, hei ārai atu i te makariri i a ia e kauhoe ana.
He 'M' noa iho te waitohu a taua kamupene hoko ō rangaranga rongonui.
He Karaitiana ia, kotahi tonu tōna ariki, ko Ihu Karaiti.
He Katorika tōna hāhi, he Mihingare tō mātau, ahakoa, kotahi tonu te hāhi matua, ko tō Te Karaiti tonu.
He Kotimana taku hākui, nō reira mai aku toto Pākehā; he Māori taku pāpā.
He Mihinare ia i mua atu, engari kua Moromona iāianā.
He Māori anake pea te iwi e pōwhiri i te ao katoa, e pōwhiri i ngā tū tāngata katoa
He Māori katoa te nuinga e noho mai ana i tēnā, i tēnā moutere, he torutoru noa iho ngā kaiiwi e noho ana i tā te tangata whenua noho
He Māori te nuinga, he ruarua nei ngā Pākehā
He Māori tōna wahine, nō tētahi o ngā kāwai rangatira o Ngāti Tāwhaki
He Pākehā tērā nō Kaipara, i hingaia e te rākau. Ka whara tōna tuara
He Whenua Papatupu: Tōna tikanga, he whenua tūturu nō ngā tāngata Māori, i runga i ō rātou tikanga Māori
He aha anō ā tātou whakatau o rāitahirā? I roto i te rua rā, kua wareware katoa.
He aha hoki te pai kia waiho kia takoto kau ana? He moumou whenua rapea
He aha i hīrautia nei e koe tōku waewae?
He aha i mauria ai ā mātau tamariki i ngā whenua pungapunga o Taupo mahi ai, tē waiho ai i konei, i ngā whenua pātata mai?
He aha i moe ai ngā karu o ētahi Māori i a rātou ka hongi, engari ko ētahi, ka matatewha ngā karu?
He aha i nui ai te aroha o te tangata ki a Heremaia? He tangata ngāwari, he hūmārie, he mateoha, he atawhai tāngata, he tangata whakapono. Ko ana mahi ririki e ngau nei i roto o te ngākau o tōna iwi
He aha i pēnā ai tō kōrero?
He aha i tāhawahawatia ai e koe ngā kai?
He aha i tāhawahawatia e koe ngā kai?
He aha i waiho ai te manuhiri kia karanga ana?
He aha ia nei te taitara o taua mahi puoro rā?
He aha kei taku ate ka pākikini nei?
He aha kei taku ate ka pākinikini nei! Ko te tau tēnā nāna i huawaere
He aha kei taku ate ka pākinikini nei? Ko te tau tēnā nāna i huawaere, kei whati ana he awa hoenga waka
He aha kei taku poho ka pākikini nei? He mamae kōpaito ko te āhua ia
He aha kei taku uma e pākikini nei, he aroha rānei he aha rānei?
He aha koe e kaurerehu nā? Me harikoa kē koe kāore koe i tukuna ki te pakanga.
He aha koe e kore nā e kōrero mai?
He aha koe e noho nā i te kaurehu? Me whakakā pea he rama.
He aha koe e taiaroa nā i a ia? He pai katoa ana kōrero mōu!
He aha koe i hūpeke ai ki runga i a Aotea waka tū mai ai, pāhao ai i tētahi mōhiotanga mōu?
He aha koe i kaiapo ai i aku taonga? Kei te rahi anō āu!
He aha koe i kiripiro ai ki a ia? He wahine pai, he ngahau hoki.
He aha koe i nohopuku ai, tē kōrero kē ai i ō māharahara?
He aha koe i whakaparahako ai ki te kākahu mōu?
He aha koe i wāhi ai i te takawai a Tūtānekai?
He aha koe te whakawhēauau mai nā? Pēnei au ka rikarika katoa koe ki te haere.
He aha koia ngā marupō a ngā pēpi nohinohi?
He aha kōrua tē haere tahi mai ai?
He aha mō runga i tō tōhi - he tīhi, he tiamu rānei?
He aha ngā ngeni kei roto i te wai nei?
He aha ngā tino āhuatanga e kīia ai te Māori he Māori - ko ngā toto, ko te reo Māori, ko te aha atu rānei?
He aha ngā āhuatanga nāna ia i kohuki kia whai i ngā whakapapa o tōna iwi?
He aha nōu i poutuki pēnei ai te tau o te ate?
He aha rā i ahau i tatari ai kia hua mai he karepe, i puta kē mai ai he karepe māori?
He aha rā te hau e pā nei? He tuku uta, he patu moana; haumiri rawa rā i te pohe o te ākau, kia mōwai, ē
He aha rā te hau? He tuku uta, he miri moana
He aha rā te mahi a ngā taitama e tuohu rā i muri i te kāuta?
He aha rā te mate o aku kūmara e wētara nei te tupu?
He aha rā te mate o te rākau rā, engari ka popohe noa ngā hua i mua i te maoatanga.
He aha rā tāku i kai ai e hī nei au?
He aha rā tāku i kai ai e mate nei au i te tikotiko?
He aha rā tāna i kai ai kia pēnei rawa te ngau o te kona?
He aha rā ētahi whetū i hīnātore ai, ko ētahi atu he tino pīataata?
He aha rā, e hoa, ngā kai reka ē. He tuna, he tītī, he kuku, he tio. He pāua, he pipi, he kina, he pia. He poaka, he pūhā, he parāoa, he tī
He aha rā, ka maroro te tahataha, ka taka atu rāua ko tana hōiho ki te awa.
He aha te huanga o te mahi whakatū komiti?
He aha te ika e wetoki mai nei?
He aha te kai e whara i a ia?
He aha te mahi a tērā rā e whēkoi haere rā? Kua ngaro pea i a ia tētahi mea.
He aha te mate o te pātīhau, ki te kore ō hoa kōrero?
He aha te mate o ēnaka i tō taha nā?
He aha te mea kua pahure i a ia? Kāore noa iho. I pau tēnā takiwa roa i a ia ki te mahi whakawā tekateka noa iho i ngā tāngata e whakatete ana ki a ia
He aha te mea nei e mau nei ki aku makawe?
He aha te mea rā?
He aha te nama kei runga i tō tīkiti?
He aha te oranga tonutanga? Ko te whakahoki a ētahi tāngata i tēnei pātai ka pēnei: 'Ko te oranga mutunga kore, arā ko te oranga tonutanga ake ake ake'
He aha te pai o te whakapakoko i whaoa ai e tōna kaihanga
He aha te parareka o tēnei tau i hōtoa ai ki te tupu?
He aha te pata o tā tātou e mahi nei?
He aha te rawa o taua haere?
He aha te rerenga kētanga o te kawa i te tikanga?
He aha te take e nanatu mai ana tērā ki a au? Kāore hoki aku hara ki a ia.
He aha te take i kore ai he kura, koia nā taku pātai?
He aha te take kia popono tātou i ngā painga o tēnei rā mō tātou ake?
He aha te take māu e whakaero tō koutou waka
He aha te taputapu pai hei whakahei kererū?
He aha te tikanga o te koru i roto i ngā mahi toi Māori?
He aha te tikanga o te kōrero 'kua puta a pito'?
He aha te tikanga o tērā rotarota mai āna?
He aha te tohu o te taringa, he kawakawa?
He aha te wā tīmata ai te whakataetae ā te ahiahi nei?
He aha tātau i hara mai ai ki koneki?
He aha tāu e kata?
He aha tāu e kōroiroi nei, tē haere ki te mahi?
He aha tāu e whakangutungutu mai nā koe ki a au?
He aha tāu ka whakakōroiroi nei i te mahi?
He aha tēnaka i tō ringa?
He aha tēnei i taku ringa mauī?
He aha tēnei mahi pōrangi? Whakamutua! Whakamutua!
He aha tēnei mea te Tiriti? Ko te tikanga ki te reo Māori he whakaaetanga i waenganui i ētahi iwi whai mana e rua, maha atu rānei, he whakaaetanga nā aua iwi ki ētahi tikanga whānui, e pā ana ki a rātou
He aha tēnei tangata i kore ai rāua ko tōna hoa wahine e haere ngātahi, ehara hoki rā i te mea he hē tō rāua mārenatanga
He aha tēnā e tū mai nā i roto i tā kōrua māpu hipi, he punua kau, he hōiho rānei?
He aha tēnā i runga i tō hāte?
He aha tēnā?
He aha tērā e iri mai rā i te rākau?
He aha tērā e konakona mai rā? He pēkena parai?
He aha tērā e whakatongene ana i taku kakī - he pūngāwerewere, he aha rānei?
He aha tō hiahia - he inu wera, he inu mātao rānei?
He aha tōku ingoa i waiho ai hei takaruretanga i runga i te ngutu o te tangata?
He aha āu nā whakamārama mō te kupu nei?
He aho rangitahi te kaumahaki, ko ngā aho tūturu, he tataki.
He ahu oneone nui tonu e noho mai ana i te taha o te rua.
He ahurua te porohita papatahi, engari he ahutoru kē te poi.
He aitua tō tāua, i hiki taku karakia
He aituā nui te hū o Tarawera.
He aituā nui tonu te hū o Tarawera, he kore nō te iwi i whai wā ki te whakaarorangi ki tawhiti.
He aituā waka te takenga mai o tana hauātanga.
He ama anō tō tēnei waka, arā he waka iti nei hei ārai ngaru, ko Takereaotea te ingoa
He amiorangi māori te marama.
He amokapua ia nō ngā kāwai rangatira o ngā iwi o tērā takiwā.
He anga koeko tō te papatai.
He anga kore tuanui, e tūraha ana ki a Tāwhirimātea
He anga ora tēnei, e kore e roa ka tupu te kai
He anga tōrino tō te ngata me te pūtātara.
He anga whakateraki tō te whare, nā reira i mahana ai.
He anganga rā tō tēnei kāinga, ka pai te mahana i ngā ata.
He angawaho katoa te kōurapaka, te pepeke, me te pūngāwerewere.
He angotanga kei te taiapa e puta ai te ngeru, engari kāore te kurī e puta.
He anuanu kē te pakitea kei ngā pakihiwi o tana hutu.
He ao kē noa atu i te wā ki a rātou.
He ao te rangi ka ūhia, he huruhuru te manu ka rere
He ao tuarangi anō a Papatūānuku.
He ao waipiro kore te ao Māori o mua.
He aorere ka kitea, he huatau e kore e kitea
He aparua taku tarau, he mahana te apa o roto, he pare ua tō waho.
He apiapi ngā matūriki o te ōnewa - koirā i kaha ai.
He apiapi nō te huru, arā he ururua, kīhai i taea te waka te tō
He apo tonu he hākere kai i tana whānau
He ara aupiki, ka ngāngā noa iho i te pikitanga ake.
He ara hunahuna e kore nei e kitea
He ara kāwekaweka tēnei, engari he ātaahua noa ake i te haere mā te ara poto.
He ara kōpipio, ehara i te ara pokatata.
He ara kūiti taua ara, me haere takitahi.
He arawhata tōrino kei waenganui tonu o te rūma.
He arawhata, he uru, he weu tēnei rangatira nō tana iwi.
He arero kapetau noa, kāore i mōhio kua moe kē te hoa.
He arero paremo
He arero rua hoki tēnā tangata, nā reira au i whakahāwea ai i tana kōrero.
He ariki tapairu a Tāmairangi. He pakeke, he pakari, he ātaahua
He aroarowhaki te mahi a ngā ringa, he pūkana te mahi a ngā kanohi, he hāmama te mahi a ngā waha, e kōrero ana i taua mea, i te mangamangaiatua
He aroha hoki ki ngā karakia o mua a ngā mātua
He aroha i mahuki ki te tau i rāngia
He aroha ki tō rātau matua e kai ana i te kai mārō a te matā, e pūtanetane ana i te haunga o te paura, e riringi ana i ngā wai manawa whenua o te toto o te tinana
He aroha mutunga kore te aroha o te whaea ki tana tamaiti.
He aroha te mea nui i tae mai ai ahau ki waenganui i a koutou
He aroha tuku noa tō te whaea ki ana tamariki.
He aroha whakauru nōku nei ki reira, ka tokona rautia
He aroha whāereere, he tamaiti takuhe.
He aropā kōwhai
He aruhe para.
He aruhe, ko te aka o tūwhenua, ko te kai e ora ai te tangata
He atawhai tēnei tamaiti nāku, inā hoki, nāku i tiki atu i tōna whānautanga mai hei tamaiti māku.
He ate heihei me te pēkana tā māua parakuīhi.
He atua a Moekahu, he kurī tōna ariā
He atua nui pū a Hine
He atua nōhoku, he tāne ngaro roa i te awatea
He atua, te hia ora i te makariri
He atua, te hia ora i te makariri!
He au hāro
He au rei katoa te here o ngā kākahu
He aumangea tērā tangata, kāore e whakatā kia mutu rā anō tana mahi.
He aumihi atu tēnei nāku ki a koutou katoa, e ōku hoa aroha, e noho mai nā koutou kei ngā pito e whā o tō tātou ao
He aurukōwhao, e taea noatia ana te tīheru.
He autaia te kawenga a te ope nei; he pū pakupaku anake, he hoari hoki ā rātou patu
He autaia tonu te pūrangi e tatari ana kia puta mai a tuawahine i te waka rererangi.
He autaia tonu te tokomaha i puta ake - kī pai ana te wharenui.
He auē tā te pā, he hurō tā te taua
He awa e wehe ana i ngā hapū o taua tāwhati, e mau tonu nei te mauāhara tētahi ki tētahi.
He awa hīnga tuna me te hao i ētahi ika nonohi e huaina nei he mohi
He awa koehu tēnei i te horotanga atu o ngā tahataha.
He awa tāhapa, ka pai te haere, tēnā ka poupou ki waho, ka kino
He awe ngāpara, he mata whakairo.
He epa noa iho te hū ki te tamariki; he pai noa ake te haere hū kore.
He haere koropuku te haere a tērā kararehe ki te kimi kai māna, kāore e mahi tahi ki ētahi atu o te kāhui.
He haere mokemoke te haere a te tangata whakatuanui, kāore hoki te tangata e pai ki a ia.
He haere nō mātou ki reira, ki ērā whenua o mātou whakauruwhenua ai
He haere punerua tonu te pūtangitangi, ki te mate tētahi ka tere tonu tana kimi hoa hou.
He haere ōkawa tēnei, ehara i te mea kei te peka māori noa atu.
He haerenga atu nō taua minita i ngā kāinga whakapono i te taha moana, ka hawe ki te kawe i te Rongo Pai o te Atua ki ngā iwi e noho hē ana i uta
He hahaka rawa ngā tātara o tō pāmu hei pupuri i ngā tia.
He haka anō tā te ware, he pōrahu noa iho ngā ringa
He haka kia titoia?
He haka tawhito rawa tēnei nō tērā rau tau ka taha
He hake te tuarā o te tamaiti
He hakimana tētahi o ngā pū, kāhore he ngutupārera, kāhore he kopa
He hakirara tonu tērā, te whakapae kāore rātou e mārama ki tēnei momo tuhinga.
He hakorea rā au nei, kāore au e mōhio ki te raranga whāriki
He hakurara ia ki te hanga whare
He hakurara tēnā tangata - me uaua ka oti i a ia he mahi.
He hanga ahurua te tapawhā. Ki te titiro atu, he hanga ahurua anō te whārangi pepa.
He hanga ahutoru te mataono, te pouaka me te whare, engari he hanga ahurua te tapawhā.
He hanga ahutoru te whakapakoko, he ahurua noa te whakaahua.
He hanga haruharu ngā kākahu e iri mai ana i mua o te whare, engari koirā te wāhi e kaha whitikina ana e te rā.
He hanga hikuwaru - kāore i ōrite tētahi taha ki tētahi.
He hanga hua noa te roimata i aku kamo, nō te mea ia rā ka whāmamao
He hanga huapae te maha atu o ngā momo pae, pērā i te pae kākaho, i te pae hamuti, i te paepae āwhā.
He hanga ia e puta mai ana i roto i ngā ana o te ngākau o te whenua - ngā wahi e mākū ana, e haukū ana, e kore ana e pūhia e te hau, e kore ana e whitingia e te rā
He hanga kauriki te kutu - me āta titiro e kitea ai.
He hanga kino kei roto i te wai. Kaua e inumia.
He hanga kurupetipeti te takotoranga kākano o te kamokamo pakari.
He hanga kōekoeko te wāhanga o te aihikirīmi ka puritia e te ringa.
He hanga kōpae te nuinga o ngā pereti me ngā oko.
He hanga makau te arawhiti nui o Tāmakimakaurau.
He hanga matariki ngā whetū ki te titiro atu, engari inā kē te rahi.
He hanga merowhetau - mā te karu whakarahi rawa e kitea ai.
He hanga mātihetihe te pepa - māta ruiruia.
He hanga mīharo tēnei wāhi. Ka kite au i ngā neke tekau ngā momo, e noho tahi ana, e hāereere tahi ana, e moe tahi ana
He hanga mōkitokito te huakita.
He hanga mōrearea ngā puru hiko ki te kōhungahunga - me taupoki ka tika.
He hanga onge te āraitanga o te marama, o te rā.
He hanga puhau te kōrewa, koirā i whakamaua ai ki te kaharunga o te kaharoa.
He hanga pīwai te mahi toi ka tāraia ki te kōhatu, engari anō te whakairo ka tāraia ki te tio.
He hanga pōrearea, keakea ana te taringa; hoki atu, ko aua kupu anō
He hanga pūataata te karaihe o te matapihi, e mārama ai a roto o te rūma, e taea anō ai te titiro ki waho.
He hanga pūrewa te pōito.
He hanga pūtumu te honu ki uta.
He hanga rango ngā kēnā kai.
He hanga rerehua, ka roa te tirohanga atu.
He hanga rite ngā mea e rua nei - he iti noa ngā wāhi e rerekē ana.
He hanga taratara te arero o te kau.
He hanga tawhiti tōna ingoa, nō Mehiko ki taku mōhio.
He hanga tihitihi kau ō kōrero, e hoa! Kāore he kiko!
He hanga tiriwhana te 'boomerang'.
He hanga tuatinitini tonu te pūkaha waka - mā te tangata rehe anō e āta wāwāhi, ka tūhono anō.
He hanga tāwhana te kōpere.
He hanga tūturu te patupaiarehe, he mea pohewa kau rānei?
He hanga ōrite ēnei - e rua, e rua, he tapatoru, he ōrite anō te rahi.
He hangariki ngā whetū ki te titiro atu, nā te mea e noho ana ki tawhiti pāmamao.
He hangina te ū o te wahine nei
He hangore ngā peka hou o te whiro - ki te whakapikohia, kāre e whati.
He hapū hikahika karanga rua, ngātahi mai i a Ngāti Kahungunu me Rangitāne
He hara nui te pā o te ringa tūkari ki te kauraho o te kōtiro.
He harore katoa te pūhekaheka, te waewae atua me te īhi.
He harore pirinoa te āwhato, ka kai haere i ngā torongū a ētahi momo pepeke.
He harore rangitahi
He harumanu, he taketake, he rokihau
He hau angiangi i ārohirohi ai te whakaata o ngā rākau i te mata o te wai.
He hau mahana te kōraki i ēnei takiwā.
He hau mahana tonu, kore ua te whakaari i tō mātou kāinga.
He hau makariri te hau pupuhi mai i te tonga.
He hau paitini te waro hāora tahi.
He hau whakamaroke kai te hauwhenua i Ngā Pākihi-Whakatekateka-a-Waitaha.
He hauhauaitu ngā tamariki o ērā whenua, i te kore kai.
He haumaringi i a au nei, e whiti ana te rā i a koe nā.
He haumaru noa ake te kaukau i te hāpua, tēnā i te kaukau i te moana.
He haunga ake  te  parakaingaki kurī i te parakaingaki manu.
He haurangi tēnā hei whakaruruhau mō koutou.
He haurehu nohopuku te haumāmā, arā, ahakoa te aha, ka noho haumāmā tonu.
He hautapu ki te toa mau rākau, he mate hirinaki ki te toa ahumāra.
He hautau ōrite te 3/4 me te 6/8.
He heitiki te mau kakī, he kapeu kei te taringa.
He henuwiti, he huarākau taku tina i ngā rā katoa - paki mai, āwhā mai.
He here rangitahi te kaumahaki mō ngā kaho o te tuanui, he here tūturu te tataki.
He herenga kaipuke nāhau, e te Marutuna
He hewa hoki, kua horo katoa ngā makawe i te tumuaki.
He hika katoa ngā kaimahi i te wharekai - kei waho kē ngā tama, kei te taha o te hāngī.
He hinapōuri nōna i te tokomaha o āna tamariki e mate noa ana
He hira ngā pātai a te tamaiti pākiki ki tana kaiako.
He hiriwa, he pāua rānei a runga, he hiriwa a raro o te araara.
He hiwahiwa te matā tūhua.
He hoa kē ōku i taku akomanga pūtaiao, he hoa kē i te akomanga toi.
He hoa pirihongo, he hoa tūturu.
He hoa piripono nōna a Āpirana Ngata, koirā i mahi tahi ai rāua i ngā tau tekau mai i 1920
He hoatu tonu tāku i ngā mea papai māu, he whakawhere i a koe, kia tahuri mai ai koe ki a au
He hoe ka hurihuri, he hoe ka raparapa
He hoehoe waka te mahi a ngā tamariki nei
He hoiho pāwhara ērā, kāore anō kia ekengia.
He hoka te whare (arā, e kōrero ana mō te poupou o te tuanui)
He hokinga mai nō ngā waka o tōna iwi i te hao kupenga ika
He homai aroha kia weto atu au i te ahiahitanga nōu, e Reanuku
He homanga te tangata rā, he tou areare.
He horanga tautokorua ki te aroaro nō Ihurahi
He hore tēnei tangata, nā hoki tōna kata
He horetātā tētahi, he ngāwari noa iho tētahi - e kore koe e mōhio he teina tuakana rāua.
He horetītī ka tākaro ana i te whutupaoro, he rangimārie i te kāinga.
He hori tana kupu, kaua noa e whakapono atu.
He hou noa ake tōna waka i tōku.
He hourua a Te Arawa.
He huahou ā tātou mō te Kirihimete.
He huahua anake anō te kai pai mā te tangata
He huaki umaraha, kāore i konihi.
He huanui haere ki te taumatua karakia
He huarahi tāpokopoko te huarahi o te aroha pono
He huarākau katoa te āporo, te ārani, te panana me te pea.
He huawhenua hema te kāroti ka whāiti haere mai i runga ki raro.
He huawhenua katoa te rīwai, te kāpeti, te kāroti me te riki.
He hui matanui ngā hui a te poari, koirā te take i pai ai te haere o ngā mahi.
He hui tāku ki te tākuta kia tirohia taku tuakoko.
He hui tūmatanui tēnei nā te kaunihera, ka taea e te tangata te haere ake ki te whakarongo ahakoa ko wai.
He hui whakanewa tō Tārure waka, engari tō Riro, he tū tōtika.
He hui ōpaki, hei aha te mau hutu.
He huia rere uru, ā, hoka ki runga rā
He huirapa ngā waewae o te manu ka kautū i te repo.
He hukehuke te tangata ka whati i te parekura.
He hunaonga au nā Te Rangiita Waaka, te tangata kei a ia ngā hea maha atu i te ngāherehere o Mangahouhou 3A
He hunga rawa kore, e tūkinotia ana, e whakatupuria kinotia ana; kīhai nei te ao i pai mō rātou
He huriwiri hiko tāna hei whakamau i ngā kōwiri.
He hurori noa iho ngā kī taurangi a tērā rā, kāore e tutuki i a ia.
He huru kōkōwai kei te tuarā me te tou o te tieke.
He huruhuru hipi, he taewa, he poaka ngā utanga
He huruhuru manu hoki ngā parirau o te tāima, roharoha tonu ana, rere tonu, e kore e okioki
He hurukore anō, engari he hurukore pātata ki tō tāua momo
He hutu Pākehā tōna. He hāte, he neketai pango, he mea poto, me tīpona tonu ki mua o te kara
He huānga katoa ēnei nōku. Nō te marae kotahi, nō te hapū kotahi mātau katoa.
He hākarameta nui te wāwāhi i te parāoa tapu.
He hāmama tonu te waha o te pī ina tau atu te uwha manu ki te kōhanga.
He hāmoemoe noa i te rā
He hāmā nei te āhua o tōna moko, ā, he mea whiri hoki ngā makawe
He hāmā ngā huruhuru o te kiwi pukupuku.
He hāpua tawa
He hārakiraki te tāhae rā, he hoe kōnukenuke.
He hāwatewate noa te kōrero kua hū ake mō Hine rāua ko Tama.
He hāwhe hāora noa te roa o te wā tākaro.
He hāwhe hāora pea i muri i te whānautanga mai o te pēpē, ka puta mai ko te ewe.
He hāwini Pākehā tāna, he moko i runga i ngā rīnena, he pounamu ngā kakau o ngā naihi, ngā paoka me ngā pune
He hē nō te whakaterea o te waka ka kotiti kē atu ki roto i ngā whiro.
He hē te poipoia haeretia o te ingoa o te Tiriti nei e te ngutu wahine, ko ngā tikanga o roto kāore i te mārama i a rātau
He hīanga ā Mere tamariki.
He hīti katoa tētahi tāruru, he taora katoa tētahi.
He hīti noa iho te hīpoki i ngā pō takawai.
He hōanga tētehi, he tunaeke tētehi, koinei ngā kōhatu e rua
He hōhonu tonu te pūtake o te toetoe, koirā i uaua ai te huhuti ake.
He hōia ia i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao.
He hōiho ngā kaitō o taua parau. E toru awaawa e puare ana i taua parau nei i te mahinga kotahi
He hōiho noke, e whā putu noa iho pea te teitei.
He hōiho rata, he pai hei eke mā te tamariki.
He hōiho taewao nō ngā mānia ki te raki o Waiōuru.
He hōkari te mahi i mua i te whakaeketanga atu ki te papa tākaro.
He hōkioi i runga, hū, kei te āputa koe nā o te rangi e noho ana
He hōkioi i runga, ngā manu hunahuna, kāore i kitea e te tini, e te mano
He hōnore nui ki a rātou te kōrero me te haere tahi i te taha o ngā tāngata o ngā koroni, engari ko te Māori te iwi e tino whāia ana
He hōpara makaurangi te whakairo, otirā he kōrae
He hōrete ngā toka i te pūtake o te wairere.
He hū hāneanea ēnei, kāore aku waewae e mamae.
He hū kore ki tēnei mahi ki te tuku kōrero
He hūhunu a Te Arawa, ko ia te waka nui rawa o ngā waka i ū mai ki Aotearoa nei
He hūkerikeri ake te taitua i te tai rāwhiti.
He hūmārika te mātāmua, ko tō muri iho, ko te pōtiki te mea e tere pau ai tō kaha.
He ihuwaka rere tai, pihapiha nui te hōrapa.
He ika anō te kekeno me te poraka ki te Māori.
He ika haehae kupenga
He ika huirua i mate i te tukinga o ngā motokā, nā, kua whakahokia rāua ki ō rāua marae ake takoto ai.
He ika iti noa iho te aua, pēnā me te koikara tangata te rahi.
He ika ka ripiripia, he ika ka haehaea
He ika ka ripiripia, he ika ka toetoea, he ika ka haehaea
He ika kaurahi te tohorā.
He ika korotiwhatiwha te okeoke.
He ika kōhangohango te kōkiri.
He ika kōroaroa tonu te tuna.
He ika kōtingotingo te pākirikiri.
He ika paewai anake hei tomo ki roto i te hīnaki
He ika pakewa tērā, kāore e rere tahi me ētahi atu.
He ika pūkauri, he kūmara tana koha mai ki te hui.
He ika rahi te aihe, he ika iti te aua.
He ika taratara te kōpūtōtara.
He ika te tino kai a te hunga noho ki te takutai, he manu, he tuna te tino kai a te hunga noho ki uta.
He ika tipiwai.
He ika tuata tētahi; i tunua mā ngā kaumoana
He ika tāingo te kōkopu.
He ika wekeweke.
He ika, he manu anake te manawa o te iwi
He ikawhakawera ka haurangi ana.
He inanga tana mere pounamu.
He inati nui te totohunga o te Wahine i Te Upoko-o-te-Ika.
He inati taua tuna
He inati te māia
He inati ēnei moni kia utua noatia mō ngā kōrero tapepa, mō ngā kupu riroriroi o taua nūpepa
He ingoa hau tēnei ingoa, e karangatia mai nei ki te taringa
He ioio te oneone o te whenua nei
He ipu konokono ngā ipu kawe wai.
He iti ake te utu mō te tamariki, tēnā i te utu mō te pakeke.
He iti ake te utu o te haere ki te whare korikori ina whakauru koe hei mema mō te kotahi tau.
He iti hoki te mokoroa nāna i kakati te kahikatea
He iti iho te motukā i te taraka.
He iti iho te tūpono pā o te mate pukupuku ki te kiri o te tangata kenehuru, tēnā i te kiritea.
He iti kahurangi
He iti kē iho te tokonui o taku waewae mauī i tō te mea matau.
He iti marangai e tū te pāhokahoka
He iti nei ā rātau pū i pakū atu, me te oke haere o te hoariri i roto i te mate
He iti noa te wā ka pau ki te tunu i te kai Hainamana ki te whakaritea tōmuatia ngā huawhenua.
He iti tangata e tupu, he iti toki, e iti tonu iho
He iti te hanga o taua roiroi, engari he nui tōna mana i te ao pūtaiao.
He iti te mokoroa nāna i kakati te kahikatea
He iti te whāinga, he nui te paremata
He ito ki a ia, koia i tapatapaia ai hei ingoa mō tana here
He iwi aroha aua iwi ki ā rātou tamariki, ā kahore he tamaiti kotahi e romia ana e aua iwi
He iwi hauā mātou, kāhore i rapua he utu
He iwi hūmārire te Māori, he mākoha, he aroha ki te pai
He iwi kaha te Māori ki te pupuri i ō rātou whakapapa
He iwi kaitaua toa a Ngāi Te Upokoiri, ā, i tupu a Rāniera i waenganui i a rātou
He iwi mārohirohi, he iwi arotahi, e kore e hinga!
He iwi ngākaunui koutou te iwi Māori ki te mahi, ahakoa he aha te mahi, otirā ko tā koutou taonga nui ko te aroha
He iwi pīpī
He iwi rerekē noa atu te āhua, rerekē hoki ngā kahu, rerekē ngā tikanga, he iwi whakatipu pakanga
He iwi takapau pōkai - kāore e noho roa ki te wāhi kotahi.
He iwi takapau pōkai tērā ka ā haere i ā rātou kararehe ki ngā pātītī hou i ōna wā anō o te tau.
He iwi tino whakamā te heketoro, nā konei i kore ai e whakaatu i a ia ki te tangata.
He iwi totoa, he rite ki te kurī mohoao.
He iwi tērā e nonopea ana e te mana whakahaere o taua whenua, he rerekē nō tō rātou whakapono.
He kaha kino nō ngā iwi ka titoa he kaioraora mō Te Arawa me te kāwanatanga, ka riro nā te hunga whawhai ki te kāwanatanga i mau haere
He kaha rawa te hamuti heihei horomata mō te ruirui ki te māra - me ranu ki te pātītī maroke, ki te maramara rākau, ka waiho mō tētahi wā.
He kaha rawa te pupuhi o te hau - ka hē te rere o te manu tukutuku.
He kaha rātou ki te manaaki i te hunga tāpoi ka tau atu ki tō rātou tāone.
He kaha taua kura ki te kawe i te marautanga, he kaha anō tā rātou hāpai i te reo Māori i roto i ā rātou mahi katoa.
He kaha te puhitai hei patu ki te rae o Taranaki i runga
He kaha te whirinaki o ētahi whenua ki te pūngao karihi.
He kaha tonu kei a tatau, engari nā te noho māruru i hē ai
He kaha tonu te haurahi i tēnei ata, tata tonu ka haupapa.
He kaha tonu te pakē mai o te ihumoana kua pae ki uta ina takahia atu ki tō waewae.
He kaha tonu te ānau i te kōtore o te matau hī ika.
He kaha tāna whai i te taurarua me ngā karakia mākutu katoa.
He kaha tō mātou karapu hākinakina ki te tautoko i ngā tamariki me ō rātou whānau.
He kahawai tērā i mau ki te mata o te kupenga.
He kaho, he pango ngā kakano o te piupiu.
He kahu kura te kākahu
He kahu kāwitiwiti noa tēnā, kāore i eke ki ngā mahi whatu a kui mā.
He kahu tāwakawaka te iwirau, he mā, he pango ngā tae.
He kahu whai pakipaki te kaitaka me te kahu tāniko.
He kahu whai pakitaha te kaitaka me te paepaeroa.
He kahurangi ia, he matahīapo i te iwi
He kahurangi ngā petipeti mano tini ka pae mai ki te taihua i te raumati i tō mātou kāinga.
He kahurangi ngā whatu o Pare, he pērā anō ō tana tama.
He kahutoto te kūmara i heria mai e Turi
He kai anake te mahi ka pahure i tēnā tangata māngere hōnia.
He kai anō ki uta, he kai anō ki tai, ka ngaro ngā kai o tētahi o ngā whata, ka tīkina atu ngā kai o tērā o ngā whata
He kai au ka whiua, ka hora ki te whare
He kai ka whanatu ka mōmōhangatia
He kai kakara, he māngai waiwai.
He kai kini te riki mata.
He kai mātua te niu ki ngā iwi o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa.
He kai mātuatua te kūmara ki ō tātou tūpuna.
He kai mō te poho o ana pōtiki, he kanukanu rānei hei uhi mō te tuarā o tana whāereere
He kai nohunohu, mā te arero e kape.
He kai totetote tonu te hākari.
He kai tāhae te tupeka i te rawa o te tangata. Hoko kau ia i tērā kai, e kore e mākona, he paoa kau te putanga, piro noa ngā tāngata wainamu ki taua paoa
He kai tāoke te tutu.
He kai tāwhara, kua menemene ngā pāpāringa, he kai kawa, kua kōwakawaka te rae.
He kai waireka te miraka ki te tamariki.
He kai whakarae i tāpaea mai nei ki a mātou
He kaiaka, he tangata taumata rau.
He kaikairau te mahi a te wahine me te tuakana o Rangi, i roto tonu i tō rāua moenga ko Rangi!
He kaikape i ngā tuna te take i panaia mai ai
He kaikiko te ngeru.
He kaikiota te poaka.
He kaimahi ia i te wheketere motokā.
He kainga i te kai, e kore a Paeko e herea; he karanga riri, a Paeko ka herea
He kaiota te hipi.
He kaiponu te wahine rā. E kore rawa au e pēraka.
He kaitaka te kahu
He kaitara ngā rau o te akeake.
He kaitautoko a Tāmihana i ngā mahi a te Kīngi ki te aukati i ngā mahi hoko a te Māori i ō rātou whenua ki te Pākehā
He kaitoa tērā tangata - e kore e mataku i te hoariri ahakoa pēhea tōna nui.
He kaitupu te kau, he kaikiko te ngeru.
He kaitūao katoa ngā ringa āwhina - nō rātou tonu te hiahia ki te whai wāhi mai ki te kaupapa.
He kaiwawao whutupaoro anō hoki ia i Pōneke me Whanganui
He kaiwhakaako i te ture, he tangata e whakanuia ana e te iwi katoa
He kaiākiri noa iho. Kia oti te tuitui, kua hoki ki te kāinga, ki reira whakangā ai.
He kaka parauri ō ngā hōia, kia kore ai e kitea i te ngahere.
He kakati te tutu nei
He kakī pakoki, he kounu nō te iwi o te tuara, he parori nō te tikihope, he parori nō te kanohi
He kani hou tāna.
He kanikani punarua tērā, arā, mā te tokorua.
He kano hue tēnei i mauria mai e ngā tīpuna i Hawaiki hei whakatipu ki Aotearoa nei.
He kanohi tipitaha tōna, ānō nei kua parori te kauae.
He kanohi tipitaha, me huna pea ki te pāhau.
He kanohi tōkau, kāore ōna whakanikoniko.
He kapi katoa te hūkari i te hune - kia pakari ake, kua whai huruhuru tūturu.
He kapiti hono, he tātai hono
He kapu tī, he pihikete te hapa a te koroua i ngā pō katoa.
He kapua taitu
He karaihe whakatīaho kei ngā matapihi o te rūma kaukau me te wharepaku.
He karaka pī
He karaka te karu o te kamokamo pakari.
He karaka te tae o ngā hua o te karaka ka parā ana.
He karaka tūpā
He karakia anō hoki mō Tāwhirimātea, he tūā mō te rangi
He karakia purenga anō tō te tane
He karakia whakamāhutanga mō ngā hue me ka taona
He karakia whakamāhutanga mō ngā hue me ka taona, ka urua te umu
He karakia whakamārire tēnei i ngā hau nganangana o te rangi kia tuku.
He karakia, he tūāimu mō te hoariri
He karanga kai, tē karangatia a Paeko, he karanga taua, ka karangatia Paeko
He karanga rua te tamaiti rā, i heke mai ōna tātai i a Turaki-o-rauru rāua ko tana taina ko Teumurau.
He karanga tuahine nōku a Hinerangi.
He karapoi te hanga o te marama.
He kararehe māori te koara me te warapī nō Ahitereiria.
He kararehe te kurī, te kau me te hipi.
He karatī te poto tāmure.
He karera ngā waewae o te pohowera.
He karihi anō tō te paramu, te pītiti me te āperekoti.
He karu poti tētahi o ana tama, he karu uriuri tētahi.
He karu whakatata kaha tonu tāna, e pai ai tana mātai i te whānau ariki i ngā pō.
He karukaru noa iho tana hingareti, ka kitea te koko o te pokohiwi.
He kau pārekereke.
He kaumātua ake ōku mātua i ō Huia.
He kaupapa hauwarea noa iho tēnā - he moumou tāima te whai wāhi atu.
He kaupapa kurehu, e kore e tino kitea te hōhonutanga.
He kaupapa pākūwhā taku patu nō te tamāhine a Taiwhanga
He kaupapa rawe tēnei mō tēnei momo hui, e rata mai ana ngā tāngata katoa.
He kauri te rākau pai mō ngā pou, he kakano ngako, kāore he pūpeka.
He kauri te tahiwi o te waka, he kauri anō ngā rauawa.
He kauwae katoa ngā kōrero e puta ana i te waha o tērā - kaua noa koe e whakapono atu.
He kauwae pahore ngā kauwae o te tuanui o tō rāua whare.
He kauwae rite ki te ngutu manu kei te pū o ngā patapata o te wheke.
He kawa kōhatu e tohu ana i te wāhi i tanumia ai ia.
He kawakawa kē tēnei riu nō tētahi awa whānui tonu i ngā rā o mua.
He kawau te manu, rukuhia iho, puea ake, he ika e mau ana ki te waha
He kawe mai i te aroha, nāna nei i māturu iho ai te roimata
He kawenga kei runga i te take ki te ārahi tika i tōna iwi.
He kawenga nui hoki tā Te Kāhui Tika Tangata hei āwhina kia tū ai he wāhi mō te reo Māori hei taonga mō ngā tāngata katoa o Aotearoa
He kawhe māu, he tī rānei?
He keha te kānga kōpiro ki ētahi, he kakara ki ētahi.
He kehu te kiko o te tōtara.
He keka nā Koropanga mō ana tamariki
He kererū kē tērā, ehara i te tūī.
He keretewha ngā tāngata whenua o Āwherika.
He kete kōkau - kāore anō kia mahia ngā kīwai.
He kete wawata
He kiekie me te pīngao ngā kaokao o te tukutuku.
He kikorangi te kara o ngā kākahu o te pirihimana.
He kikorua au, nō Ngāti Porou i te taha o taku whaea, nō Te Arawa i te taha o taku pāpā.
He kikī rawa te kara o te kurī - me whakakaewa.
He kimi mate te haere ki te hao ika i te tūpuhi, kei tahuri te waka i te kino o ngā ngaru.
He kino aku koroiti ki te titiro atu.
He kino kē te haunga o te turuma i te raumati, ka muia e te ngaro.
He kino kē te tamaiti rā ki te oma, kāore ētahi e kātata atu ki a ia.
He kino kē tērā moheni mō te paki i ngā rongo kino mō ngā tāngata rongonui.
He kino ēnā rīwai, he kōpūwai
He kiri mangu, he hāurauri ngā whatu.
He kiri mata rānei, arā, he huakuru, āhua pūwhero
He kiri tawauri ngā tāngata whenua o Āwherika.
He kiri tāingo tētahi o ngā tohu o te mate mitera.
He kiriahi tēnā tangata, he māngere.
He kirimoko ngā mōnā e kitea ana e te karu, engari anō ērā kei ngā kokonga o te ngākau.
He kirirua te kahu pai mō te ruku i ngā wai makariri.
He kiritona taua koha pango i tana pāpāringa mauī.
He kiriuhi e uhi ana i te mata o te ara whakahā me ētahi atu wāhi o roto i te tinana.
He kitenga pohewa, kāore i tūturu.
He kiwi kei tētahi taha o te rua tekau hēneti, ko te Kuīni kei te angamate.
He kiwikiwi, he peapeau te reporepo o taua wāhi, e piri katoa ana ki ō mātou waewae.
He kiwitea te auahi e puta ake ana i te timera.
He koanga ngākau hoki tēnei ka kite nei au i te pai o te tuhituhinga o tēnei pukapuka
He koha kei taku puku, nā te kaihoro pipi.
He koha ki a Te Wherowhero i whakarērea ai te pakanga
He kohiko te uira
He kohikohi pata karāhe te oranga o ētahi Māori i taua wā.
He kohiti ā mātau mōunu. Ko taku māmā ki te whakamaumau i ngā kohiti ki runga i aku pīhuka
He kohuke te kiripaka, kitea ai i ngā toka puia.
He kohuke te pounamu, kitea ai i ngā awa o Te Waka-a-Māui.
He kohurau, he karā, he ōnewa, he pounamu; koia tēnei ngā kōwhatu e mahia ana hei toki tārai waka, me ērā atu mahi whare
He koi ake aku niho i te naihi pūhoi nei.
He koi ake aku niho i ēnā māripi hāpūpū nā - me kauoro.
He koi te kāmata o te rau rewarewa, he tongari kei te kāmata o te rohutu.
He koikara noa ka toua atu e Matawhāiti ki te wai, ko tā Matauaua, he ruku whakaango ki roto.
He koiki mataī katoa ngā kūaha o te whare.
He kokonga whare e kitea, he kokonga ngākau e kore e kitea.
He konatu nō roto i te ngākau
He kongakonga pihikete noa iho e toe ana i runga i ngā pereti a ngā tamariki.
He konganuku māngohe te hiriwa me te konukura - ina paopaohia kia papatahi, kāore tonu e pakaru.
He konganuku tino kōngohe te konukura me te hiriwa.
He konukura katoa ngā paipa wai wera o te whare nei.
He konutea anō kei roto i ētahi pani ārai rā.
He kopakopa ngā rau o te pūriri.
He kope, he puru taiawa ngā hanga o ēnei rā hei āwhina i te wahine i taua wā o te marama.
He kopī rawa ēnā, waiho kia eke ki te rahi e tika ana.
He koraha maroke hangehange, kāore e tipuria e te aha.
He koraha, he whenua rake.
He kore i hoatu wahia ka piro te ahi.
He kore nō te kanoi hei pēhi i te kino
He kore nō te kāwanatanga i whakaae kia hōmai tētahi wāhi whakataunga kōrero whai niho ki te iwi Māori
He kore pea nō te ngākau i minamina ki te kōkiri i ngā aupiki, i ngā āhuatanga papatoiake o tēnei kaupapa
He kore tangata hei whakahirihiri te riro ai te pēke parāoa
He kore tohunga māna hei wehe ki te wai, kia hemo ake ai te aroha i a au
He kore waiwhero kia utuhia, hei wai kana hoeroa mā Rautao
He koromatua kī tahi.
He koromiko te wahie i taona ai te moa
He koropuku te taha whakararo o te waka kia pai ai te rere i te wai.
He kororā ngā huruhuru o kōkako werewere tautau.
He kororā te tae o ētahi o ngā maramara pakohe i kohia e rātou.
He korotingotingo ngā hua o tēnā manu.
He korou mutunga kore tō te tamariki.
He koroua pukuriri, engari e arohaina nuitia ana e te tokomaha.
He koroua pōuareherehe, kua tō haere te rā ki runga i a ia.
He koroua tērā nōku.
He koroī te hua o te kahikatea.
He kotahi nā Tānewharerangi, e raka te mauī, e raka te katau
He koti atu anō tōku, engari kāore e mahana pēnei i tēnei nā.
He koti hengihengi noa tōna, kāore i tino mahana.
He koura te mētera ka whakawhiwhia ki te tangata ka tuatahi, he hiriwa ka hoatu ki te tangata ka tuarua.
He kowhanenga pai a Maraeroa i Pōneke mō te whakaheke ngaru, ina pupuhi te kōkōtonga.
He kuhu haere tonu i roto i ngā ngahere ururua, apiapi, monoku rawa, he whakawhitiwhiti hoki i ngā repo kua kino i te ua, kua tāpokopoko
He kuia mokemoke, engari he pai katoa ki a ia ko ia anake kei tōna whare.
He kuku kei tana hiku roa ka whakapikongia ki te timo, ki te tuku i tana paihana.
He kukume tā te marama i ngā tai o te ao.
He kupenga papangarongaro.
He kupenga tēnei ka ruha, ka paea ki te one
He kupu anō tā mātou mō tēnā mea.
He kupu i makere noa, engari he nui te utu.
He kupu kowata, e mārama katoa ana te tikanga.
He kupu māori tonu, kāore i rehurehu, kāore rānei i arero rua.
He kupu mārama rawa aua kupu a Te Tamihana, ā he tangata tika a ia ki te whakaatu kōrero
He kupu pūhui te 'niho tāpiki' me te 'kōrua hūkari kai'.
He kupu tahiti te kupu 'ture', i takea mai i te reo Hīperu.
He kupu tino teka rawa, tino hē rawa
He kupu tēnei ki a koe i roto i te ngākau mamae, pōuri, mō te ngaromanga atu o taku rangatira wahine
He kupu tēnā mō te Porowini e takoto nei i waenganui i a tātau, arā, e kīia nei ko Tararua
He kupu whakahau anō tēnei nāku ki a tātau kia kakama ki te mahi i te takiwā e whiti ana te rā, kei rokohanga tātau e te pōuri pōkerekere ka mate
He kupu whakawātea rawa i a rātou i ngā hē me ngā whakapae e makā ana ki runga ki a rātou e te Hīhana
He kupu ātaahua tēnā. Hei aha te kimi kupu kē atu.
He kura Mihinare a Te Aute, he kura Katorika a Hato Pāora.
He kura kāinga e hokia; he kura tangata e kore e hokia
He kura ngā pua o te pōhutukawa i te puāwaitanga, nāwai ā, ka kurauri.
He kura reorua.
He kura takahi puni te tohu ka riro i a rātou te tāhuna.
He kura, arā he pōhoi whero kei ngā taringa.
He kurahaupō ki te rangi, he rangi paihuarere kei te awatea.
He kurapae nā Mahina
He kuru tongarerewa
He kurukuru huka māu?
He kurumatarērehu, he tau anō ki te haka.
He kurutaitai ngā wai o te ngutuawa.
He kurī anō kei ētahi whenua, he tō haere tāna i te kōneke o tōna ariki i runga i te haupapa, me he hōiho e tō kāta nei
He kurī ingoingo tāku, ko te mā, te pango me te parauri e rere tahi ana i tana tinana.
He kurī mahake, he pai mō te tangata noho tāone.
He kurī mātau tēnei - e hia kē ngā kupu e mōhio ana ia.
He kurī nepinepi, ka uru pai noa iho ki taku pēke!
He kurī pai i te mea he pai te rangatira.
He kurī teoteo
He kurī whakarongo, ki te kīia kia noho, kua noho.
He kāhu koe nō te iwi, he ngārahu taua anō hoki.
He kāhui whetū a Matariki me Māhutonga.
He kāinga Māori te koutu i mua, ināianei kua kapi katoa i te whare Pākehā nui te utu.
He kāinga a Rotorua nō ngā mea whakamīharo: ngā wai koropupū, ngā puia, ngā puna mātaotao, me ngā wai ratarata
He kāinga haumaru, he āhuru mōwai mōku.
He kāinga hema tērā, kāore e rite ki tō tāua nei kāinga me ōna raruraru katoa.
He kāinga mārama tīahoaho, me ōna tāngata he tāngata papai anake
He kāinga pahera tōna - e wātea ana ki te iti, ki te rahi.
He kāinga tino ātaahua a Puatai engari i te mea kei roto rawa te huarahi nui kua kore he tangata
He kāinga tūraha ngā kāinga o taua moutere, kāore he pakitara.
He kākahu karukaru, he makawe pohepohe, koirā ngā tino tohu o te tangata kāore ōna kāinga tūturu.
He kākahu kura te kākahu, he pūtiki te upoko
He kākahu matatengi tēnei hei ārai atu i te hau tonga.
He kākahu pai o ētahi, he kākahu kino tō Paoa
He kākano puipuiaki
He kākano whakauru taku whaea, nō Ngāti Whare rāua ko Ngāi Te Ōtawa.
He kākā kai honihoni
He kākā matawhiwhiu a Te Rangihaeata
He kākāriki te tae o te kamokamo kāore anō kia pakari.
He kānapanapa ngā huru i te tuarā o te takahē.
He kānapanapa te wai i ngā wāhi hōhonu o te awa.
He kāpara miti hinu, kāore e roa ka wheko.
He kāraha uku i runga i te tēpu e kī ana i te huawhenua.
He kāreti kei Tāmakimakaurau mō te hunga e hiahia ana kia haere hei minita.
He kāri whero te whiu a te kaiwawao i a ia, he ngau nōna i te taringa o tētahi o te hoariri.
He kāriki hāura ētehi o ngā rau o te rākau nei.
He kāriki te tae matua o te pūhā.
He kārikiōrangi te wai o te roto.
He kāroti, he rētihi, te tame a te rāpeti.
He kārure ngā hukahuka o te horihori
He kēmu tūponotanga te whiu i te mataono, e ono ngā putanga e taea ana.
He kī kau tāku e kore hoki e piri te uku ki te rino
He kīnaki kanekane te 'wasabi' nā te iwi Hapanihi.
He kōaha te witi nei
He kōaka e rere ana i te whenua i ngā mahi a te rū.
He kōata kākāriki te nuinga o ngā pātara wāina.
He kōata whaikano kei te nuinga o ngā matapihi o taua whare karakia.
He kōawa matemate te hua o te kore ua.
He kōeaea, he matamata ētahi o ngā ingoa o te poto īnanga.
He kōekoeko te pōike o te māhuri kauri.
He kōhao kei raro ake i te niao o te peihana, e kore ai te wai e puhapuha.
He kōhatu kāhuarau te pounamu.
He kōhatu ngātātata i mahue mai i te kaha wera o te ahi.
He kōhatu pokere te tūhua.
He kōhau nōna ki ōna rā o tōna tamarikitanga
He kōhiwi tōtara nui i tāraia ai te kōtore puni.
He kōhoi tonu ngā tamariki, nā te kaha omaoma.
He kōhuru tangata te mahi a taua mauhere, koirā i whakawhiua ai mō te tekau tau.
He kōiraira kei te rēparo, he tāekaeka kei te taika.
He kōkako e ngō ana i runga te maunga
He kōkau te kanohi, kāore i tāia ki te moko.
He kōkau te āhua o te tū, he pari hoki, he roroa
He kōmāmā ake te pōro tēnehi i te pōro kirikiti.
He kōmāmā ngā pēke e kī ana i te pepa whēru, he taumaha ngā pēke e kī ana i te kēna me te pātara.
He kōngehengehe ake te tinana o te tamariki i te tinana o te pakeke.
He kōpako te waka nei
He kōparu ngā wai o taua awa, kāore i kōataata pērā i ētahi rā.
He kōpatapata ngā pāpāringa o te kōtiro, arā, he kapi katoa i te tongi parauri.
He kōpatapata tētahi o ana hāte, he tāekaeka tētahi, he tōkau tētahi.
He kōpura te ingoa o te more o te tī kōuka.
He kōputa nui tonu tērā kei roto i te toka e huna ai ngā pekapeka i ngā pō.
He kōpēpē tonu te waea konukura.
He kōpīpī te rākau nā, kei whati
He kōpū te pūweru roto o neherā, he hingareti, he himi, he tarau iti ētahi o te ao hou.
He kōpūngahuru ana kōrero. Kāore kē e pērā ana whakaaro tūturu.
He kōrahirahi ngā karaihe whaikano i ngā matapihi o te whare karakia.
He kōrangorango te kiwi pukupuku.
He kōratarata te taha whakarunga o ngā rau, he huruhuru mā kei raro, he niho roa tonu kei ngā tapa.
He kōrau rā kua reka, kua manemanea te kakī
He kōrepo i raro atu i tō rāua kāinga, he tino kāinga nō te pūkeko, nō te poraka.
He kōrero anake te mahi ka pahawa i tēnā rorirori.
He kōrero anō hei whakauru atu e kopi ai te rangahau.
He kōrero aweke kau, kaua noa e arohia ake.
He kōrero e hapa ana i ngā meneti nei - kei hea kē te mōtini a Heta?
He kōrero hāwatewate kau ēnā i titoa i runga i te ngākau kawa.
He kōrero ka whatā, e hoki anō ki te waha?
He kōrero kei runga, he rahurahu kei raro
He kōrero kēā - he mea kimikimi noa iho.
He kōrero mākiri, kaua noa e aro atu.
He kōrero māminga nāna; i whakakini mai hoki ōna kanohi, mōku kia nohopuku
He kōrero mō ngā tāngata rongonui o te wā, he pangakupu, he tohutohu tao kai ētahi o ngā mea i taua maheni.
He kōrero papahu tō kōrero
He kōrero rūkahu, kaua noa e whakapono atu.
He kōrero tapu ērā - kia kaua e whākina ki ētahi i waho atu o te kāhui kairangahau.
He kōrero tipatipa, he mea tito kau nāna.
He kōrero tipua ēnei kāore e whakaponotia ana, engari ia, he kōrero tino tika
He kōrero tūturu tēnā, e nene noa ana rānei koe?
He kōrero waingaio ki ngā kaimahi te rongo ake taihoa ka kati te wheketere.
He kōrero whānui noa i puta, kāore i āta kōrerotia ngā mahi i mahia.
He kōtaotao noa, kāore e mate taku puku, engari kia kaha ake i tērā te karekare o te wai, kua hia ruaki tonu au.
He kōtiro katoa mātau. Ko au te mātāmua, e whā aku tāina.
He kōtiro katoa ā rāua tamariki tokowhā, ko te kauaemua, ko Hine, me ana tēina e toru.
He kōtiro kōpipiri, he nguengue anō hoki.
He kōtiro pai a Mārama. Māna koe e tiaki, e āwhina.
He kōtiro pukukata.
He kōtiro tērā i noho tahi mātou ki te kura o Ahipara, he kōtiro i aroha nuitia e ōna mātua, me ōna whanaunga, arā e mātou katoa, nō reira mai anō te aroha moroki noa nei
He kōtiro tīhohe i mua, engari ināianei, me uaua ka menemene.
He kōtiro whakakōkiri, kāore e hiahia kōrero i mua i te tini tāngata.
He kōtuku kai whakaata
He kōtukutuku te ingoa o te uwha o te tōtara, he karaka te ingoa o te tāne
He kōura mara
He kōura, he tipa, he tio tā rātou kai whakapaepae hei utu i ngā manaakitanga a te iwi kāinga.
He kōwhai ngā raupua o te tohetaka.
He kōwhai te kiri o te panana ngongangonga.
He kōwhanga kei konā, he pā, ko Te Maire te ingoa
He kōwhatu tōpuku tonu, he mea tārei ki te kiripaka
He kūkāwhare tērā e mau mai ana ki te tuanui o te kāuta, i runga tonu ake o te ahi.
He kūkū tangai nui
He kūkū tāngaengae nui, he pārera apu paru
He kūpiapia tonu te ngongo o te putiputi.
He kūreureu te tū a te aroākapa.
He maha anō ngā iwi o konei i whakawhiti i Te Moana-o-Raukawa kia tae atu ki tērā hui.
He maha anō ngā kaupapa tapu i ākona i roto i ngā whare wānanga me ngā whare maire.
He maha ngā awa kei te maunga, kei te pae maunga rānei te hukitau.
He maha ngā hawai ka whāngai i te kōawa.
He maha ngā huarahi i takahia i tēnei tau i runga i te koromaki ki tō tātou reo.
He maha ngā huka e whakararu ana i taua whakahaere, hoi anō, ko te kore moni te mea nui.
He maha ngā kai tāwaha ki te tamariki ka reka ki te  pakeke.
He maha ngā karere hauwarea noa iho e taetae mai ana ki a au mā te īmēra.
He maha ngā kono i roto i ngā tauira kōwhaiwhai.
He maha ngā kupu taurite i te punakupu mō te kupu 'pakupaku'.
He maha ngā mate tawhiti i heria mai e tauiwi i te rautau tekau mā waru.
He maha ngā momo mahi toi i te whakaaturanga - he waituhi, he whakairo, he whakapakoko maitai, he tārainga kōhatu, he aha atu, he aha atu.
He maha ngā mākiri kei roto i ngā whare taonga i rāwāhi.
He maha ngā puninga o te iwi Koori o Ahitereiria, he motuhake anō ō rātou reo.
He maha ngā putiputi ka manahua i te awatea, ka kati i ngā pō.
He maha ngā pūroi kāore e whakaaetia ana e te ture kia kainga, kei wairangi noa te tangata, ka noho papa ko tētahi atu i ana mahi rorirori.
He maha ngā pūrākau mō te āhua o ngā manu māori, tae atu ki te kākāriki, ki te tīeke, me te huia.
He maha ngā rewharewha kua pā ki te tangata i roto i ngā rau tau, i ēnei rā nei ko te mate ārai kore tētahi.
He maha ngā rōpū manuhiri i whatiwhati mai ki Tūrangawaewae.
He maha ngā tau e whawhai ana rātau ki te iwi marea, ā kua waia hoki rātau ki taua mahi, he iwi hāpai patu hoki rātau
He maha ngā taua ngaki mate, kāore i mate mai tētahi tangata o te iwi o Manahua
He maha ngā tauira o tērā momo ngārara kei te whare pepeke.
He maha ngā tawheraiti kei te tētē kotahi o te huruwhenua.
He maha ngā tāone me ngā kāinga ririki kei ngā pareparenga o taua awa
He maha ngā waka kua pāea i te tāwaha kino o te whanga nei.
He maha ngā wakarā i huripoki i te aranga ake o te kawaru.
He maha ngā whakaahua e whakapaipai haere ana i ngā pakitara o tō rāua whare.
He maha ngā ū o te whāereere poaka, hei whāngote i āna hua maha.
He maha noa ake ngā āporo nahonaho ka uru ki roto i te kete, tēnā i ngā āporo rahi.
He maha noa atu ngā awaawa me ngā kokorutanga puta noa ki tētahi taha ki tētahi taha, ā, kei ngā tahataha o aua awaawa me aua kokorutanga ngā kāinga tangata e tū ana
He maha noa atu ngā pāmu miraka kau i Aotearoa nei.
He maha o rātou i pae ki uta, mate iho ana ngā tāngata tokomaha ki te wai
He maha tonu ngā kokori huri i Te Whanga-nui-a-Tara.
He maha tonu ngā kurukuru i te pārekereke nei hei wāhi mā tāua.
He maha tonu ngā kurī ka haria e ia ki te whakangau poaka puihi māna.
He maha tonu ngā kūao e whānau mai ana i te marama o Ākuhata.
He maha tonu ngā momo papa, pērā i te papa tākaro, i te papa wīra, i te papa o te whare, i te papa rānei o te roto.
He maha tonu ngā taitama o tēnei takiwā i mate atu i te pae o te riri i tāwāhi.
He maha tonu ngā uwha whakahao ka hapū i te toa kotahi.
He maha tonu ngā wāhi hei kotiri kūmara mā tāua i te nui o ngā tipu i mate.
He maha āna mahi utu kore i te hapori, pēnei i te hari kai ki ngā kaumātua me te mahi i te toa hoko kākahu 'ringarua'.
He mahana noa iho te wai, kāore i wera.
He mahi akoako tonu tā te iwi o konei i a ia ki te tū, i ā te whawhai tū ngārahu
He mahi hauwarea tērā, te huna i muri i ngā wāhine.
He mahi hohore noa iho ka pahure i tēnā heahea.
He mahi hua kore te whai kia huri mai te koroua rā - he taringa kōhatu hoki.
He mahi hōhā te tui i ngā hū; mēnā kua tāwekoweko ngā pito o ngā here, kātahi ka tino hōhā rawa atu!
He mahi kai kē te kaupapa a tērā tangata ka haere ana ia ki tātahi. Kāore ia e haere pakoke noa ki reira.
He mahi kai mō te kōpū, kia ora ai tama roto
He mahi kai te kaupapa nui i te tahamoana i ngā rā o mua, hei aha te kaukau me te pāinaina.
He mahi kaiuaua tonu te kutikuti hipi - pahore ana tērā te tuarā.
He mahi kino te kōhuru.
He mahi kino tēnā, te whakarōriki i te hunga hauā.
He mahi kino, he mahi rōrā te patu i te tamaiti kōpīpī.
He mahi kūī tērā - te nohopuku, tē whakapuaki ai i ō whakahē.
He mahi mōkinokino tērā, te tuha ki te tangata.
He mahi mōrearea te tua rākau ki te tangata e kūare ana ki tērā mahi.
He mahi mūrere tērā te huna i ngā wāhi kino o te kaupapa, me te whāki kau i ngā wāhanga papai.
He mahi nenekara te kai waipiro kia nui nei, kātahi ka taraiwa i te motukā.
He mahi nui e taea ai a tuna hāwaniwani te pupuri.
He mahi nui ki te huti ake i aua kāroti i te whenua, inā te nui.
He mahi nui ki te pahera i te waha o te ika ki te tango mai i tana matau.
He mahi nui ki te peita ā-ringa i ngā tīwatawata o te taiepa.
He mahi nui ki te tahitahi atu i te parataiao i kawea mai e te tai, e te marangai.
He mahi nui ki te tango mai i ngā kawekawe o te pikiarero e rarawhi ana i ngā waea o te taiapa.
He mahi nui te whakaora i te tohorā ka pae ki te tauru.
He mahi nui tā te waka tuarangi e puta ai ia ki waho o te whaitua o Papatūānuku.
He mahi nui tāna ki te wehewehe i ngā meka i ngā kōrero parau.
He mahi nui tāu ki te keri i te rua ki te pūhuki te mata o tō kāheru.
He mahi pai anō tēnei mā te iwi Māori he whakatupu manu, engari kaua hei whakatupungia i ngā kāinga huinga o te tokomaha
He mahi pai te tiaki tīramaroa i ngā rā o mua, mēnā e pai ana koe ki te noho hokehoke.
He mahi popohe te kore e kuhu i tō hākete whakaora ka haere ana koe ki te hī i runga waka.
He mahi pōrewarewa te whānako i tērā whakapakoko rongonui mō te kore noa iho te take.
He mahi rerekē tonu tā ngā toa i tēnei wā. Ka whakawhāiti mai ngā toa i te wā o te whakaipoipo, me te whakataetae tahi, te whakamenomeno tahi hei whakawai i ngā uha
He mahi rorohuri te haere ki te ngahere kāore he kākahu mahana.
He mahi rūwai tēnā, te hoatu i ō moni katoa ki te tauhou māna e tiaki, e whakatipu.
He mahi tūponotanga te piu i te kapa - e 50% te tūpono puta he hiku, e 50% te tūpono puta he upoko.
He mahi uaua te whakamāori tukutahi. Me mōhio te kaiwhakamāori ki ngā kupu katoa, ki ngā whakatakoto katoa tērā ka puta ake hei whakamāori māna i taua wā tonu.
He mahi utu-kore tērā, he mahi tūao.
He mahi wawau tēnā, te tuku i ō tamariki kia haere tātua kore i runga i te waka.
He mahi whaihua anō te whakarongo noa ki ngā pūkōrero me te tuhi anō i ngā kupu hou
He mahi whakarihariha te rahu.
He mahi whakauaua hoki ki te keri ki raro ki te whenua, ki te wāhi hoki i takoto ai te hiriwa
He mahi whakawhairawa mā ngā tamariki tāne māngere o ngā kāinga Māori, e hāmoemoe tonu ana i roto i te roanga o te rā
He mahinga tohetea, e waitohua ana e te ngoikore o te tipu o ngā kai.
He maihi tū ki te wā, he kai nā te ahi; he maihi tū ki roto ki Te Rongo-a-takutama, he tohu nō te rangatira
He maimai aroha nāna ki tana wahine hokoi, ki te kōkā o āna tamariki
He maitai te kaho o te arapiki.
He maitai te kotahi tāra me te rua tāra o Aotearoa, he pepa ngā mea nui ake i tērā te wāriu.
He maitai te taura ine a te kāmura, he kirihou, he papanga rānei tā te kaituitui kākahu.
He makariri ake te Kōpakatanga ki te Tonga tēnā i te Weheruatanga o te Ao.
He makariri katoa a roto nei, nā te mea i wareware a Hēmi ki te tahu i te ahi.
He makariri tonu te tonga-mā-uru i tēnei kāinga, i te mea ka rere mai mā runga o te pae maunga rā.
He makawe mingimingi ō Hine.
He mana pio ngā ika i āia mai e te āmai i te takutai o te moana i Okarito
He manako te kōura i kore ai
He manene ahau ki tōu whenua
He mangaeka ngā pua o te tohetaka.
He mangu te tae matua o ngā kākahu tākaro o te Kapa Ōpango.
He maniore tonu ōku mō te kino o te huarahi e whāia ana.
He mano te patupaiarehe, kei te tarakihi
He mano tini kua nehua noatia i te taitamatanga i te tupeka
He mano tini te tangata i roto i tēnā parekura i tēnā parekura; nui atu rā pea i ngā tāngata o Niu Tīrani katoa
He manu anō i roto i taua hua. I pakaru taua hua i te mauranga, engari ko ngā maramara i kohikohia anō
He manu aute au e taea te whakahoro ki te aho tāmiro
He manu aute au e taea te whakahoro ki te aho tāmiro?
He manu e noho mai ana ki te kāmata o te māhuri kauri rā.
He manu e noho pūtāruru ana, e taututetute ana i te pae.
He manu iti te pihipihi, he manu nui te toroa.
He manu ka pīrere, ka pūihi tonu atu ki te taiuru
He manu makuku ina tunua katoatia atu, māhunga mai, puku mai.
He manu moe awatea te ruru.
He manu māori te kōkako, te tīrairaka me te huia.
He manu mōmōhanga te kōkako i ērā maunga, me patu ngā paihamu me ngā kiore o tērā ngahere.
He manu ohooho te nuinga atu o ngā manu Māori.
He manu rata ēnei, he ngāwari noa te whakatata atu.
He manu rata, ka mau noa ki tō ringa tonu, hei aha te reti.
He manu rere tahiti te kūaka.
He manu tana maimoa, i āta whakaakona e ia ki te kōrero.
He manu tohu aituā te manu aute; mehemea ka kō, he aituā; mehemea ka āta tū, ā whiti ana te rā ki tua
He manu tāingoingo te kākāpō ki te titiro atu.
He manu āhua rahi tonu te kākāpō, he manu iti te pihipihi.
He manu ātaahua te porete, engari he haunene.
He maraki te koha a ngā iwi noho takutai ki ngā iwi o uta, he huahua te kaihaukai a uta.
He maramara kōrero noa hoki e mau ana mō tērā tipuna mō Kōurakino
He marangai, inā e takareko nei
He maro taua
He maroke ana kōrero, kāore he matū.
He maroro kokoti ihu waka
He maru nui tō Taranaki ka hora ki muri i a ia i te tōnga o te rā.
He mata rangi paruhi.
He mata tangata i tāia ki te turiwhati
He mata tawhito te karakia a Tamure, hei rongoā mōna
He mata tawhito te karakia a Tāmure, hei rongoā mōna
He mataara pā nā Ngā Puhi
He matakite, he mōhio ki ngā mea kāore anō kia puta
He matamatahuānga ērā nō tātau, engari he hapū kē tō rātau.
He mataono te hanga o ngā tioata tote.
He matau nāhaku, i ruia mai i runga o Rangiātea, i ngā pora rā, ē, i rere mai i tawhiti
He matau pāua te reke, kāore he mounu.
He matawhāiti tētahi o rāua, he pokerenoa kē tētahi.
He mataī ngā kōpapa o te whare.
He mataī, he maire me poroporo pērā anō i te paina. Heoi anō ko tāku e wāwāhi ki te toki
He mate Māori pea te maiki kua tau atu ki runga i tērā whānau.
He mate anō te mākutu, he mate anō te whaiwhaiā, he mate anō te kanakanaia
He mate anō te mākutu, he mate anō te whaiwhaiā, he mate anō te kanakanaia, me te mātākai
He mate hori i te kaokao nō te hautūtanga ki te aroaro
He mate huaketo te rewharewha.
He mate hōrapa te kohi, kaua te tangata i te mate kohi hei tuha ki te whare, ki te marae, engari te mea pai me tuha ki runga i te ahi, ko ngā kākahu horoi i te waha me tahu ki te ahi, ko ngā paepae hūare me horoi rawa ki te wai koropupū
He mate kai te tangata rā; i kitea ki ngā kanohi ka pokopokorua
He mate kai te tangata rā; i kitea ki ngā kanohi ka pōpokorua
He mate kino tērā, he mate hohoni i te tinana.
He mate ngaro te mate o Tūwhakararo; he maha ngā taua ngaki mate, kāore i mate mai tētahi tangata o te iwi o Manahua i ngā taua katoa e rapu utu ana
He mate nō roto i tētahi o ōna turi, mamae rawa ana
He mate ohorere rawa tōna mate, nō te mea he tangata ora tonu ia tae noa mai ki te rā i mate ai
He mate ohotata hoki; e toru anō ngā rā te pānga mai o tōna mate ka moe, ā ohorere katoa ana a Te Arawa i te rongonga ai ki tēnei aituā
He mate pea tō te rākau rēmana nā, inā kua taramore kau ngā hua.
He mate rere te rewharewha i urutā haere i te tau 1918.
He mate rere te rewharewha. E rere ana te rewharewha o te tāne ki tōna wahine; o te tamaiti ki tōna hoa; o tētahi o te whānau ki ētahi
He mate toro rere, tōna mutunga iho o taua mate, a waiho ana hei tino mate urutā, kua whakahemo katoa ngā tāngata o tētahi tāone Māori o reira
He mate tuaukiuki
He mate tuku iho i pērā rawa ai te poto o te pūwhenua.
He mate tōna, koirā e hikimoke rā ana kōrero.
He matemateaone ki a rātau, nā reira ia i noho ai ki taua kāinga
He mateoha tonu ki a rāua i haere tahi tonu ai rāua
He matihe ia nei, e hoki mai ki te ihu?
He matika te tū o te tangata
He matū māori te whītau, engari anō te kirihou.
He matū taumaha tonu te nuinga o ngā toka.
He maunga ike.
He maunga ninihi rawa tēnei. Mā te nanekoti anahe hei piki!
He maunga tararua, he tarahanga kei waenganui.
He maunga tiketike, ka taea e au; he tangata tiketike, e kore e taea
He maunga tūtainga āio rerenga waka ki  Raukawa
He mauri nō muri o te purenga
He mauwha te koromiko, te hangehange me te kawakawa.
He mea 'tō whare' ngā tītī noho tūrua.
He mea ahuahu tana pakoko ki te uku.
He mea akitu te hoariri kia kore ai tētahi e rere.
He mea apoapo ahau e te rimu, takai atu, takai mai
He mea auru ngā punua ki tawhiti kia kore ai e rangona e ngā whāereere.
He mea epaepa te whare ki te kōhatu, koirā e pakaru katoa nā ngā matapihi.
He mea haehae te tinana, ka pani ai ki te ngārahu, he rape, he pūhoro
He mea hahu ngā peha rīwai ki te papa o te whare heihei kia whiwhi ai te katoa.
He mea hanga ana hiripa ngerungeru ki te kiri paihamu.
He mea hanga e rātou he pahī papa rākau, ka monokia ki te uku, ā, he toetoe te rauwhare mō te tuanui
He mea hanga ngā kaka moe ki te papanga newanewa.
He mea hanga ngā karapu horoi maitai ki te rapa.
He mea hanga ngā kāri moni taurewa ki te kirihou.
He mea hanga ngā taiepa whakawaho o taua whare herehere ki te kōhatu.
He mea hanga te kauheke i whakamaua ki te mātenga o Ihu Karaiti ki tētahi tipu pūtaratara.
He mea hangā te tiki tuatahi mā Hine-te-iwaiwa.
He mea haratua te kiko ki te tūhua.
He mea hoe atu i te awa, pā noa ki te hōkikitanga
He mea hohore te kiri o te paihamu hei hoko, ka porowhiua te tinana.
He mea hoki e pāngia ai te tangata e te mate, mā te mākū, mā te makariri, mā te ngenge, mā te te ruwha, i te mea kāore te tinana i te kaha
He mea hopu te kiore ki te tāwhiti.
He mea hotahota ngā tamariki e tō rātou māmā kia kore ai rātou e tae tōmuri ki te kura.
He mea houhou ki te kuia rā te kangakanga.
He mea houwere te waewae whati o te kurī.
He mea hurihuri tonu ngā ika e tunutunua ana ki te huki.
He mea hutihuti ngā makawe, takoto ana ko te papa-ahuahu anake o te māhunga
He mea hāpara te kiko o te ika ki te matā.
He mea hāparapara te taura i honoa rā te punga kia kore ai te waka e huripoki.
He mea hāro ngā ngaku harakeke kia kore ai e makiki.
He mea hōripi te kiko ki te tūhua.
He mea hūpoki te kāwhena ki te korowai.
He mea ioio te mangō kia wawe te maroke
He mea kaiwaenga ngā akoranga e te pūoho ahi.
He mea kapo noa ēnei whakaaro ōku i te takiwā.
He mea karaepa e ia tana āporo pirau ki rāwāhi o te kōawa.
He mea karamui te tinana o te kapowai e te tini pōpokoriki.
He mea karipi te kiko ki te matā.
He mea kaui atu ngā kahawai ki te harakeke.
He mea kauoroi atu te tohu tawhito i te matapihi o te waka, kātahi ka whakapiria atu te mea hou.
He mea keri haere te huarahi i te taha hiwi
He mea korotutu te huahua i roto i te tahā.
He mea kurupana e Māui te aho kia mau rā tana ika.
He mea kāuto e ia ana mētara kia pīata ai.
He mea kōhure e ia ana kamo hei whakamataku i ngā kōtiro.
He mea kōpepe a Hinekura, inā rā tekau mā toru noa iho ōna tau, ka moea e tana tāne koroua.
He mea mahi anō nā ō mātou ringaringa, heke ana te tokakawa i a mātou i te mahinga
He mea mahi mai tana mahi toi ki te rākau, te hurumanu me te anga mātaitai.
He mea mahi te papanga ki te muka tarapī.
He mea makatiti te rākau ki te mahi papa hei hanga i te whare.
He mea mamae te taonga tārewa; kia ea anō, ka ora te tangata
He mea matatā a ia mai i te waka tūroro ki roto rawa o te hōhipera.
He mea mohani te hiako o te rākau e te nanenane, arā, ki ana pihi.
He mea māhiti mai i ngā kōrero huhua a ngā kaikōrero huhua, nō Te Pipiwharauroa, nō Te Kopara, nō Te Toa Takitini, nō Te Reo o Aotearoa, me ētahi kōrero rāwaho
He mea mūrei ngā whare hoko kai i muri i te rū nui.
He mea neke te kōhatu nui ki te kōwhiti māitai.
He mea ngaki ngā kūmara e ngā ihu oneone rā.
He mea ngare ngā kōtiro kia whakapaipai i tō rāua rūma, ka whātuturi tonu.
He mea nui rawa taua taonga, ko taua taonga he wati, i makere ki te takiwā o Te Haukē nei i te ata o te Hatarei nei
He mea nui te kōrero i te reo o tōu ake kāinga hei whakapūmau i te tuakiri ahurea, ā, koinei te kaupapa matua o te wānanga
He mea okaoka ngā ika, ka waiho kia maroke.
He mea ope ngā wai i te riu o te waka ki ana ringa tonu.
He mea oroi te uruuru o tana hoari kia koi tonu.
He mea pai rawa kia wātea i ngā mahi tūturu, kia wātea ai ki te ngaki i ngā kāri, ki te patu kai rānei mā te whānau
He mea pakuriha, kore hā anō!
He mea pani ana kūhā kia kore ai e hikahika.
He mea pani te kanohi ki te pōrakaraka.
He mea papare ēnā tūru mō ngā kaiwhakawā.
He mea parai ngā tuna maiti, ka pāwharatia ngā mea nunui.
He mea patu te whāereere, ka whakaorangia ana punua hei mōkai.
He mea pea ia kia tū ko ngā tino mohio kaiaka o te iwi hei tangata whakahaere i ngā mahi nui o te Kāwanatanga
He mea poka tana puku e te rata, kātahi nā te nawe!
He mea pono mai ki tōku aroaro
He mea porotaka nui whakahara te ao nei
He mea pourangi te tūnga mō Taumatakura
He mea puhi te māhunga ki te huru kererū, me ngā huruhuru huia anō
He mea puhi te waka ki te rau kererū.
He mea puhipuhi a runga me ngā taha, me raro, ki te puhi kererū
He mea puhipuhi tana māhunga ki te huia.
He mea pārure ngā kāinga, he mea rahu anō ngā wāhine.
He mea pārure ngā mauhere e te hoariri, kāore kē i tika te tiaki i a rātou.
He mea pātotoi ngā tamariki whatiwhati māhuri e te kuia rā.
He mea pīkau e ia ngā mōkī raupō.
He mea pīpī te tera me te paraire ki te hinu kia ngohe ai.
He mea pōnahanaha taua tamaiti, kāore i aitia ki te takapau hora nui.
He mea pōti ēnei tāngata hei tumu whakahaere mō tō mātau kura.
He mea pūrou ngā tuna a Tīrare
He mea pūtoi ngā kākaho ki te aho.
He mea rangahau e Poutapu, e Kereama Waka me Īnia Te Wīata ngā momo tauira whakairo o Waikato, hei whakairo i te haumi, i te pākurukuru, i te taurapa me ngā taha o Te Winika
He mea ranu te kai nei ki te hinu
He mea ronarona taua wahine i te taha o te awa.
He mea rongo mai nā tētahi tangata e pakū ana ngā pū, ka haere mai me tana pū
He mea roromi ngā waka ama e ngā ngaru nui, ka totohu.
He mea ruru ngā kāho kia oti mai ai he pūtere.
He mea rākai te paina ki ngā rama kimokimo hei whakanui i te Kirihimete.
He mea rīhi te katoa o ngā tēpu me ngā tūru mō te pō whakangahau.
He mea rūnā te whakakiko kia ita ai te noho mai.
He mea rūruru ngā pūhā ki ōna anō pūtoi hei hokohoko i te mākete.
He mea tahu te rakau ki te ahi, ka hinga, ka wāwāhia ki te mākahi maire nei
He mea takai ahau e koe ki roto ki tōu tikitiki
He mea takai ngā koha ki te pepa whakapaipai.
He mea takai te tinana o taua tiki ki te kaitaka, me te mere okewa ki te ringa
He mea takatakahi te tangata e te kāhui pūru - he waimarie tonu kāore i hemo.
He mea taki anō pea kia whai pakanga ai rātou
He mea tapa te awakari rā ko 'Te Awa-kari-a-Ngātoroirangi' nā te mea nāna anō i kari ake.
