He mea tapahi atu te matimati rā, i whara nei i a ia e tamariki tonu ana
He mea tarawete tana māhunga i te kēmu whutupōro, koinā ia i mauri moe ai.
He mea tauaki te kōrero i runga i te pouaka whakaata hei rongonga mā te motu whānui.
He mea teka e te ngārahu ana toa kia huaki i te hoariri, ahakoa tō rātou tokomaha.
He mea tika kia kaua ngā kararehe e patua ana hei kai, e patua ki roto ki te taiawa o te marae, engari me patu ki ngā wāhi i waho atu o ngā marae
He mea tika kia mōhio ō rātou mātua ki aua kupu āna me kore e māriri te ngākau pōuri
He mea tika kia whakatuwheratia tēnei Kamupene ki ngā tāngata e hiahia ana ki te tango hea māna
He mea tino mīharo tēnā, arā, te kite i ngā taitamariki e mahi ana i ngā mahi a ngā pakeke
He mea tino nui te mau pūkoro ure kia kore ai te tangata e pāria e ngā mate paipai kino, pērā i te Mate Ārai Kore.
He mea tino nui te rongomau
He mea tohi ia ki te wai whakaata, otiia tōna māramatanga he atoato ingoa nunui i raro i te take o Maungapōhatu
He mea toitoi te whakaminenga kia ātete i ngā kātipa a te Karauna.
He mea tono e ia kia haria mai i Tūākau te takere o te waka taua tawhito nei, o Te Winika, ki Tūrangawaewae
He mea totoe te whenua kia riro ai i tēnā, i tēnā tōna ake pito whenua.
He mea totope te kāuru o te rākau.
He mea tuakoi te rūma kia motuhake mai te wāhi mātakitaki pouaka whakaata i te wāhi kai.
He mea tuapeka a Tūrongo e tana tuakana, e Whatihua.
He mea tuha ngā pukapuka tau waea kia whiwhi ai ia kāinga ki tētahi kape.
He mea tuhi anō e ia ngā kōrero mō ngā ingoa tū takiwā Māori i pānuitia ki tētahi makahīni motokā
He mea tuhi te pukapuka i runga anō i te tirohanga a te taiohi.
He mea tuku mai rātou e te Pākehā hei whakawai i te iwi Māori, kia mahue ai ā rātou mahi Māori
He mea tukupunga ngā papipapi, he kore nō te rangatira i hiahia kia pērā rawa te maha o ana kurī.
He mea tupana e ia te kora kia hoki atu ki te takuahi.
He mea tuwhatuwha e te pēpē te pungarehu nāna tonu i puru ki tana waha.
He mea tā te parata, kei runga kei te ihi o te whare, ki te moko o tō tātau koroua.
He mea tākiri taua kākāpō, e noho ana i tōna tūrua, arā tōna moenga
He mea tāpui ngā rākau ki waenga pārae.
He mea tāpuke te hāngī kia kore ai te mamaoa e puta atu.
He mea tārai tērā o ana pakoko ki te pākeho.
He mea tātai rawa a runga o te tahā ki te papakiranga
He mea tātāki e ngā kātipa te tangata e tīhāhā rā i mua i te aroaro o te tira kahurangi.
He mea tāuteute te pūtea ki ngā kura katoa o te rohe, hei whakapau mā rātou ki tā rātou i pīrangi ai.
He mea tāwai ia kia riro katoa ana moni i te nanakia rā.
He mea tīhore te tapeha o te tuna
He mea tīmata taua kaupapa ahuwhenua nei i runga i ētehi whenua iti, whenua taratahi i Waiuku me Onewhero
He mea tīpako matapōkere ngā kāinga kia uiuitia.
He mea tīrari ngā ika i mau i a rāua ki te whānau.
He mea tōtaha tana waewae whati ki te aka.
He mea tūkino te kurī nei e tana rangatira o mua atu, nō reira ia i mataku ai i te tangata.
He mea utu ki te poro tupeka
He mea waihanga te nuinga o ngā mōhiti mārena ki te koura.
He mea waiho ngā pūhā me ngā kūtai kia moī.
He mea waruwaru ngā papa ki te hōanga matarehu kia mānihi ai.
He mea wehe anō te māra tapu, ko te matakā tērā, arā, tērā ingoa te matakā he mātāmua
He mea wehe ngā rare kia hāwhe māna, kia hāwhe māku.
He mea whakaako e rātou ngā arewhana kia hiki i ngā hanga taumaha.
He mea whakaauau noa te poaka, kāore i maoka
He mea whakahou te arawhata tereina o Ngāruawāhia.
He mea whakairi ki runga noi ai
He mea whakairi ki runga noi ai, kia ngaua ake e te auahi, e te mahana, ā ora ake au i te mahi atawhai a taua tupuna nei
He mea whakairo hoki, he mea kōwhaiwhai, he mea tukutuku, hei pupuri i te ātanga, i te wehi, i te haratau o ērā taonga a ō tātau tīpuna i roto i tēnei o ngā whare o te Atua
He mea whakairo ngā māihi o tērā whare, engari anō tēnei he tōtōkau.
He mea whakakaiwaka te paukena, kātahi ka whakakīia ki ētahi atu huawhenua, ka raua atu ki te umu.
He mea whakakarikari te rākau hei herenga atu mō te taura.
He mea whakakeukeu te tamaiti e tana tuakana - koinā e kino nā ngā piropiro.
He mea whakakākahu ki ngā kākahu mā
He mea whakakāniwha ngā pou hei paenga mō ngā kaho.
He mea whakakī te papangarua ki te hune kia mahana ai.
He mea whakakīkōrea te pona o te tui.
He mea whakakōaka te rākau kia noho ai hei ara e rere atu ai te wai.
He mea whakamarumaru hoki ia i te oneone o ngā raorao, o ngā kaokao maunga hoki
He mea whakamihi te kura mō te tokomaha o ngā ākonga o reira kua puta ngā ihu.
He mea whakamine nāna ngā tohunga pūtaiao, kia pai ai tā rātou whakawhiti kōrero mō te mahana haere o te ao.
He mea whakamoa ngā pōwhatu ki runga i ngā rua tūpāpaku.
He mea whakamokamokai te panepane.
He mea whakangawhi a Tunaroa e Māui.
He mea whakangawhi ngā whakapakoko i hangaia e te hoariri.
He mea whakanikoniko te uwhi tēpu ki te kōwhaiwhai.
He mea whakapaipai tana māhunga ki te awe kōtuku.
He mea whakapako te Dalai Lama i tōna whenua ake.
He mea whakapoto te ingoa o Tūmatauenga ki a Tūkariri, a Tūkaniwha, a Tūkaitaua, ko te tohu o te mau i ngā rākau patu tangata tōna otinga.
He mea whakapū ngā rarauhe ki te papa, kia kore ai e pirau ngā rīwai ka meatia ki runga.
He mea whakarake te kakaritanga hei mahi pāmu, waiho ana ngā maunga i ngā taha e rua kia tipuria tonutia e te rākau māori.
He mea whakarewa tana mata ki te ngārahu kia pango katoa ai.
He mea whakarite anō e te Atua ō rātou whare. Tō te ika haerenga, he wai; tō te manu, he ngāherehere; tō te kiore, he rua oneone
He mea whakarākai tana kahu ki te kihukihu me te huruhuru pūkeko.
He mea whakarākei ngā māhunga o tana wahine ki te rau o tītapu.
He mea whakarākei te kanohi ki te kōkōmuka, he tuhi kōnekeneke.
He mea whakataipū ngā oneone ki te taha tonu o te rua.
He mea whakatara au e te hui kia whakaatu i ngā mea ka taea e tā mātou rauemi hou.
He mea whakatika utukore nā tōna aroha noa
He mea whakatio ngā pātara wai, kātahi ka raua atu ki te tokanga kia noho mātao tonu ai ngā kai i te haerenga ki tātahi.
He mea whakatū a Whakaata Māori ki te whakatairanga i te reo me ngā tikanga Māori ki te pouaka whakaata.
He mea whakatū ia nāku ki waenga o ngā iwi, ā, ko ngā whenua e karapoi ana i a ia
He mea whakatū ngā pānui tōrangapū mō te pōtitanga ki ngā wāhi mārakerake, kia tere kitea ai e te mātinitini.
He mea whakatū te pāhoka kia kore ai te kurī e puta ki te karore māna.
He mea whakatū te tīramaroa ki te hū, hei ārahi i ngā kaipuke e hou mai ana ki te whanga.
He mea whakatūaho te whānau kia riro ai ā rātou moni i te rāwaho.
He mea whakauwhi a runga ki te raupō hou, kia ngaro ai te kōrua
He mea wharowharo te tamaiti mōna i patupatu i te kurī.
He mea whatu ngā taha katoa o te haki ki te kura kākā, he kura kākā te tope kura, he mea tūī
He mea whatu te māwhaiwhai pūngāwerewere e taua iwi hei kākahu, ā, he tino kākahu pai, he pai rawa atu anō hoki te āhua
He mea whawhati ngā tiakarete torutoru kia whiwhi tiakarete ai ngā tamariki katoa.
He mea whītiki te reta ki te manu ā ka tukua mai kia rere mai
He mea wiri ngā kōhao ki te pepamārō ki te waewae koi o te kutikuti.
He mea āta here ētahi pawa ki tētahi rākau roroa, kia ngāwari ai te tango i ngā manu ka mau ki roto.
He mea āta hoahoa ētahi kaka mārena kia akitō i muri i te taumau.
He mea āta kōwhiri anō hoki a ia e ana pakeke hei tangata mau ake i ngā kōrero tuku iho a te iwi
He mea āta tauhere ngā kakau o ngā putiputi ki te waea kia kore ai e tatao.
He mea āta toe te pūwharawhara kia whā kē ngā tipu hou.
He mea āta tuhi atu ngā pewa o kui mata hewa.
He mea āta tuku ki roto i te kapunga o te ringaringa katau o te kaituhi
He mea āta tungi te mauwha kia rake ai te whenua, kia kore ai te ahi e toro ki te wāhi e nohoia ana e te tangata.
He mea āta wehewehe ngā kīwaha kia noho mai ai ngā kōrero wairua pai ki tētahi wāhanga o te pukapuka, ngā kōrero wairua kawa ki tētahi
He mea āta werowero rānei te kiri i uru ai tana mate, he mea ngau rānei nā te ngārara i uru ai, ā he mea anō i uru mā te kiri o ngā kapukapu o ngā waewae
He mea āta whakakōaka tētahi taha o te rorerore kia rere atu ai te hinu.
He mea āta whakaniko te tokotoko kia ātaahua tonu, kāore i waiho kia tōkau.
He mea āta whakaputa e ia te muna a Hare, ehara i te mea i makere noa mai.
He mea āta wānanga rawa e ngā rata te tapahanga, i taea ai taua mate te tapahi ki waho
He mea ātanga te paina ki te rama kimokimo me te whetū taukapokapo.
He mea īnakinaki ngā kākaho ki te tuanui o te whare puni.
He meho!
He meka! He meka!
He mema ia nō tētahi karapu kohikohi pane-kuīni.
He mere kairangi te taonga i hoatu e te koroua rā, hei tohu kua tau te rongomau i waenganui i ngā iwi e rua.
He mihi ōpaki te 'kia ora'.
He mihiau te kōhatu i taona ai te moa
He mingimingi te kakano o te mānuka nei.
He minita rongonui nō te Hāhi Mihinare, ā, kua whetūrangitia. Haere rā, e Koro, ki te wāhi kua whakaritea mō tātou katoa
He mira tawhito anō tēnei mira, nō ērā atu tau anō, nō nāianei ka whakahoutia e mātou
He miri moana, he patu rā i te pohe o te ākau kia mōwai ai, ē
He miro te rongoā. Me tapahi te rākau, ka rere mai te hāpiapia ka pani i te motu, i te ringa i te waewae raupā rānei, ka takai ki te harakeke
He miro te rongoā. Me tapahi te rākau, ka rere mai te hāpiapia ka pani i te motu, i te ringa, i te waewae raupā, rānei, ka takai ki te harakeke
He moana haunui, ka whā rā pea e tāwhaitia ana.
He moana hīngarungaru, he puku hiaruaki.
He moana ngarungaru, he waka tūkokikoki.
He moana tāpokopoko te tai tamatāne.
He moana āio te tai tamawahine.
He moata taku ohonga ake i te ata.
He moata tonu tana oho, he karekare nōna ki te huaki i ana perehana.
He moe i te marupō, he mahi i te awatea.
He moe puku ngā mātua o te tamaiti rā, koirā ia i kīia ai he moenga rau kawa.
He moe pō nāku i konei tonu koe
He moe whakatorohū tana moe i te hokihoki tonu o ana whakaaro ki te aituā i mate nei tana hoa, kia ora ko ia.
He moe āuta te moe, nā konei i hiamoe tonu ai i te marangatanga.
He moemoeā nāku ko Rua e whakatangi ana i ana pū i tēnei pō
He moemoeā nāku, ko Rua e whakatangi ana i ana pū
He moemoā pikirua.
He moenga hau, kāore rā i aitia ki te takapau wharanui.
He moenga kurupetipeti tōku, kāore au e pai ki ngā moenga mārō.
He moepapa noa.
He mohimohi te poapoa pai mō ngā momo ika katoa.
He moke taua tangata, e noho ana ko ia anake i tōna kāinga
He mokepūihi tērā o ngā ngeru - me uaua ka puta ake ki te kai māna kia hoki katoa ngā tāngata ki te moe.
He mokepūihi ētahi kararehe, ko ētahi anō he noho ā-kāhui.
He moko te takitaki, i tāia ki te kūhā o te wahine
He momo hou taua ngārara - kāore anō kia tautuhia e ngā tohunga pūtaiao.
He momo ia nō ngā iwi e rua, he kākano whakauru.
He momo ia toto te iatuku, ko tāna, he tuku toto ki ngā wāhi katoa o te tinana.
He momo kai te komeke ka mahia ki ngā hua pehupehu o te hīnau.
He momo kōkiri anō hoki te kawau mārō, pēnei i te manawa rere, engari me tiki atu ko te āhua o te waka hei whakaahua i a ia - he ihu tōna, me kī, ā, ka riro mā te ihu e wāwāhi ngā ngaru, kaua te takere o te waka. He whēnei anō te āhua o te kawau mārō i roto i te whawhai
He momo mākutu te kōpiha ka mahia ki tētahi rua.
He momo namunamuā te pepa me te kare.
He momo ngeru ingoingo te rēpara.
He momo pakitaha te tāniko me te kauko.
He momo pāpātanga te nui o ngā kiromita ka haerehia i te hāora kotahi.
He momo tonu taua kanohi kōiraira nō taua whānau - kei te kuia, kei te whaea, kei ngā tamariki anō hoki.
He momo wai te toto, te hinu, te miraka, me te roimata.
He momo whakaheke te ihu parehe i tēnā whānau.
He momo whītiki maitai ka whakamaua ki ōna niho hei whakatika i te niho tāpiri.
He momori te pari nei
He moni te tino taonga hei pātaritari i te taiohi kia mahi i tētahi mahi i ēnei rā.
He more te kāroti.
He moremore ngā tara (o ngā tao) a ngā tuākana, he kāniwha tā Māui mōhio
He moremore ngā tara a ngā tuākana, he kāniwha tā Māuimōhio. (E kōrero ana mō ā rātou tao.)
He motuhake anō ngā papatono mō te patopato kōrero, mō ngā mahi kaute, me te tātari raraunga.
He motuhake tēnā ngota, tēnā ngota. Ka hui ētahi hei rāpoi ngota.
He moumou penehīni te haere mā te ara takawhawhe.
He moumou te hari i te kete pūputu ki te kohi pipi, me hari kē ko te kete tāwēwē.
He moumou tāima aua hui, ka wareware atu ngā take nui ki te taha, ka āta tirohia kētia ko ngā takunga.
He moumou tāima te inoi i te tangata atua rā kia homai he koha mā te hunga kāpō.
He moumou tāima te uiui i te tangata hāngū - e kore ia e tere whakaatu mai i ngā kōrero e rapa nei tāua.
He moumou tāima te whakaipo i tēnā wahine - e whai ana ia kia noho takakau ia ā mate noa.
He moutere pārūrū a Kiribati.
He muha ana kōrero. I whai tonu tāna ki te whakahē i te utu ki ngā kaitiaki pāparakāuta
He muhu te tangata rā - nāna anō tana mate i kimi.
He muimui noa iho e toe ana ki ēnei toka ināianei. Kua riro katoa ngā pāua nui.
He murihau noa i te ata, ahiahi rawa ake kua tūpararā.
He mā, he pango, he whero, he kākāriki me te kahurangi ngā tae o ngā peita i pania ki ngā kōwhaiwhai
He mā, he whero ngā tae o te tarau kotikoti o te hako.
He mā, he whero, he pango ngā kara o te haki o te Tino Rangatiratanga.
He māhanga kei te kete o tōku hoa rangatira, koirā i kaha tonu ai te konaki haere.
He māhanga rāua - kei te mōhio pū tētahi e pēhea ana ngā whakaaro o tētahi.
He māhunga hamore ngā hōia katoa.
He māhunga ngā kamokamo o tana māra i tēnei tau, kāore i waiwai.
He mākari noa iho te hanga o taua rorohiko - ka uru noa ki tō pūkoro.
He mākinakina tonu ngā rau maroke o te rimu.
He mākūkū nō ngā oneone i te uanga o te ua, koia i tupu ai ana kai
He māmā ake ki ētahi te horomi i te rongoā kūtere, tēnā i te kai pire.
He māmā ake mēnā ka tautekatia e tāua te tia nei, tēnā i te waiho mā te tangata kotahi e pīkau.
He māmā ake te amo i te pēke raima tēnā i te hari noa i ō ringa.
He māmā ake te kāpui ngārahu ki te pungarehu e ora tonu ai he ahi, tēnā i te hika i te kauweti kia puta ai he ahi.
He māmā ake te whakamahi i te tītaha hei tua rākau.
He māmā noa ake te hongi i te ihu parehe i te ihu roroa.
He māmā noa iho ki a ia ngā mahi i te kura, ka tae ki te whare wānanga, ko taua āhua anō.
He māmā noa iho ngā mahi i hoatu hei pīkau māna. Ka taea e te tino tamariki te mahi
He māmā noa iho te poke i te parāoa nā te mohe o te ranunga.
He māmā te hīkoi haere i te tuanui taramatanui.
He māmā te kite atu i ngā pararopi e mau mai ana ki te pākeho - he maramara anga, he rau, he aha atu.
He māmā te peita i te tuanui o te whare hora.
He māngohe te uku, he pai hei pokepoke.
He mānuka ngā hōngoi o te hīnaki.
He mānuka ngā kāwāwā o te taiapa, ko ngā pou matua he kānuka.
He māra kūmara nahanaha tēnei, arā, kei te tōtika ngā rārangi katoa.
He māra whakautuutu ki te rangatira, he māra tiria; he māra mate ki te ware, e kore e tiria
He mārama te kite atu kua pupau kē te wā o tōna hiranga
He māreikura, he wahine tapairu.
He mārō rawa te taura, e hoa, kautukua mai.
He mārū te heke iho i runga mai o ngā maunga
He mātanga ia, koia i riro ai i a ia te tūranga mahi.
He mātau te kurī ārahi haere i tana rangatira kēkerepō.
He mātotoru ake ngā waewae o te takahē i ō te pūkeko.
He mātotoru rawa tēnei paraikete mō te raumati.
He mātotoru tonu te tau atu o te hauhunga ki te whārua i ngā pō kapua kore, hau kore o te hōtoke.
He māturunga toto te ariā o te hau o Māui.
He māwake rangitahi i riro ai te tuanui o te whare.
He mīharo ki ngā tamariki te kōhatu tino rongonui e kīia nei ko Te Kōhatu-o-Hatupatu.
He mīhini horoi kākahu tā rātou hau ki te iwi kāinga.
He mīrei, he karā te pari kei tua mai o Hawaiki
He mīti, he kūmara, he pūhā tāna i tunu ai hei hapa mā mātou.
He mōhio ake te ngutu huia rā i taku rōia.
He mōhio hoki nō rātau mā te tokomahatanga o te hapū, o te iwi, e pai ai tā rātau noho, e rewa ai te rangatiratanga ki runga
He mōhio ia ki te whakahaere i te waka kari, i te waka hiki me ērā tūmomo waka taumaha katoa.
He mōhio te reanga taipakeke ki te penapena moni, engari anō ngā reanga tamariki iho.
He mōhio te tīrairaka me mahi kōhanga ia i ngā peka kaurera rawa o te rākau.
He mōkai pai te tori, ka noho noa iho, ka tiaki hoki i a ia anō.
He mōkitokito te ngārara puehu - e kore e kitea e te karu.
He mōmona nō te ekenga o te manu ki runga ki taua rākau kua tūrūruhi, kāore e kanae ngā kanohi, kaore e whētētē
He mōmona nōna ki te wai pēnā
He mōrea ngā kēkē o te kea, he kākāriki te tuarā.
He mōri pea a ia i te ao Pākehā, engari i te ao Māori, he tangata nui te mana.
He mōtoi taniwha nō roto i te kopa
He mōtoi taringa nō roto i te kopa
He nanakia aha tō te kiore nanakia?
He ngahangaha noa iho tērā kōrero, me whai whakaaro i mua i te hamumutanga o te waha.
He ngahau ake āu kōrero i āna.
He ngahau te tararī ki te hunga tamariki.
He ngao pae ngā poupou o tō tātou wharenui.
He ngao tū te takere o te waka kia kore ai te wai e piri ki reira, ka pōturi te haere.
He ngaore te tupu o te māra
He ngata noa te waka e whakanumi ana ki te huapae.
He ngeangea ngā momo manu taketake ake o Aotearoa.
He ngeki te whatu o tōu kākahu
He ngera te tangata e haere mai ana ki tēnei wāhi ki te karakia.
He ngetangeta kau ana pūweru i te pāmu, engari kia puta ia ki te tāone, e tama, tapatapahi ana.
He ngohi, he riki ngā kīnaki o taku henewiti.
He ngongo i ngā ringaringa, he mea mahi ki te tūpākihi, he mea ore te uho o roto kia kore
He ngore pea nō te taonga i a koe
He ngoru tana mōunu hei hī kōkopu.
He ngoungoua te tangata ka kaukau i tērā wāhi kino o te awa - e hia kē ngā tāngata kua toremi i reira.
He nguru te karakia hei whakapiri tuturu i te tāne me te wahine.
He ngututahi te kōrūrū o tō mātau whare, inā hoki te roa o tōna ngutu o runga.
He ngāherehere urutapu
He ngākau kōpīpī; e kore e manawanui
He ngākau taiatea, e kore e riro hei kai nā te pakiaka.
He ngārahu kauri hei whakamangu i tō moko.
He ngārahu kauri whakataerangitia rere te nehu
He ngārara noho oneone e kakati ana i ngā pūhanga, koirā e matemate nei ngā rākau.
He ngārara rangatira te tuatara, otirā i runga o tōna māngere, i te pūhoi, he kai nā te ngeru, nā te poaka
He ngārara whengowhengo te pōpokorua - me āta tirotiro rawa e kitea ai.
He ngāwari kē atu te ngākau o Karetai, tēnā i ō ērā o ōna karanga rua i a Tūhawaiki rāua ko Taiaroa
He ngāwari noa hoki te utu o te hopi nā reira kāore rawa he take e paru ai, e haunga ai te tangata
He ngāwari noa tana pōkai i te taura hiko, kotahi huringa o te ringa kua takoto ngā koropiko.
He ngāwari te pīhore i ēnei taewa, kāore he pūkanohi.
He niho pakeke te niho pū - kāore e kitea i te waha o te tamaiti nohinohi.
He niho ririki tāwhitiwhiti kei ngā tapa o ngā rau o te hoho.
He niho taniwha ngā pākati o tēnei pūtātara.
He niho taniwha te tauira tāruarua i te tāpare o tana whakaahua.
He niho tātere, he mea hohou ki runga ki te rākau
He niki noa ēnā kūmara, kāore i nui ake i taku kōnui!
He ninipi rawa ēnei hū - e kore e uru atu taku waewae ki roto.
He noho kino noa iho; he pakanga, he tunuhuruhuru he patu tangata, he aha, he aha
He noho noa iho, ka kōrero tonu, kāore e ngā te manawa; he wahine whawhewhawhe
He noho rōpū te rāpeti, e rima, e ono whānautanga a te whāereere kotahi i te tau.
He noho tīngei noa tā mātou noho i konei
He nohoanga kōporo - kei te kitea atu te wāhi i poroa ai, e uru pai ai ki taua kokonga rā.
He nui ake te hinu ka pau ki te haere i te ākaunga roa.
He nui ake te kākāpō i te kākāriki.
He nui ake te mana o tēnei kahou tangata i ō ētahi atu, i te mea, he ariki katoa ngā uri.
He nui ake te rua hautoru o tētahi rahinga i te 50% o taua rahinga.
He nui anō te pātītī me ētahi atu taru toro haere i te whenua, ā he puia rākau rarahi anō ōna
He nui atu taku mate kanehe ki te kākahu o te tangata rā
He nui hoki ngā manu kei taua whenua: otirā ehara i te mea waingōhia te pupuhi, i te ururua me te apiapi o te ngaherehere
He nui hoki pea ngā tāngata e tuhi reta ana mai, ā, kei te whanga mai kia utua atu e au
He nui hoki taku whakamihi mō te papai o ngā reo o te Māori i te koaea e waiata mai rā
He nui hoki te kai i mahora mā ngā hapū i tae mai nei ki te tangi i taua tūpāpaku
He nui ngā aua i mau i a mātau nō te mea he rā tika
He nui ngā hipi kua puta ki te huarahi matua i te  pakarutanga o te tīwatawata.
He nui ngā hē i roto i te tuhinga o ngā kōrero o te hui, he hapa patopato ka tahi, he hē nō te kapo atu a te kaituhi i ngā whakaaro o ngā kaikōrero ka rua.
He nui ngā kino kei roto i te awa i tēnei wāhi, he pai kē atu ngā wai i te matamata o te awa.
He nui ngā kirikiri kua mauria mai i te whakatakere o te awa o Wharekahika mō ngā mahi raima
He nui ngā mahi rēhia, harakoa mā ngā taitamariki ā te rā o te Kirihimete
He nui ngā mana me ngā iwi i tae mai; ko te mea tino nui ia o tēnei hui, ko te taenga mai o Tūhoe, arā o Te Urewera
He nui ngā momo tikanga hei whakamate. Me tārore rānei, me peke rānei i te paripari teitei, me kai paitini kē rānei
He nui ngā ngaru o te moana, he nui hoki te pūtai i runga e huhuka mai ana.
He nui ngā poti ka hangaia ki te konumohe i te mea he māmā, ka mutu kāore e kino i te waitai.
He nui ngā pēhitanga, ki konā ia okeoke ai i tana moenga ā, ao noa.
He nui ngā rerekētanga o te reo Māori i roto i ngā wehewehenga ā-iwi. Nā ēnei rerekētanga ā-reo i pārekareka ai te reo Māori
He nui ngā reta a ngā hoa kua tae mai, engari e pōuri ana mātou ki te ririki rawa o ngā pākau o te manu nei hei hari atu
He nui ngā tae o ngā peru o ngā pine i te oko.
He nui ngā take i pērā ai - e kore e taea te katoa te whakaatu atu i te wā poto.
He nui ngā taotū, tērā ka mate atu ki rō ngahere, i te hemo kai, i te aha noa atu
He nui ngā tāngata i emi mai; i reira katoa a Whanganui, mai i te hukinga ki te ngutuawa
He nui ngā whakapapa kei te pērā, he nui noa atu
He nui ngā whakatauākī whakarite tangata ki te manu. Anei ētahi. Mā koutou e kimi ngā tikanga o ēnei. 1. 'He kererū ki te kāinga, he kākā ki te haere.' 2. 'Mā te huruhuru ka rere te manu'
He nui ngā whakatūpato mō te pāina rā, kei mate pukupukutia te kiri.
He nui noa atu tōna reo ki te karanga atu, 'E tū ōu waewae ki runga.' Na mokowhiti ake ana ia, haere ana
He nui rawa ki te taha whakateao — te kakai, te inuinu, me te pōrewharewha noa iho. He iti rawa ki te taha whakatewairua
He nui rawa ngā pūkanohi i roto i te rākau, ka mate te kani.
He nui rawa te utu o te hoko whare i Tāmaki, koinei māua e rīhi nei i tō māua whare.
He nui te awe o tēnā taitama. He aha te mahi nanakia ka whakahuatia ake e ia, kua whāia e ana hoa.
He nui te kai māori, ko te mea hei whakarehu e iti ana
He nui te kāpana i whakatupuria ki tēnei kāinga
He nui te kātao e tangohia ana i ngā awa hei whakahaere i ngā mīhini mahi hiko.
He nui te pai o te tuituinga o aua kahu, pai ana i te tirohanga e māewaewa mai ana i runga i te kauwhata i roto i ngā hihi o te rā!
He nui te pūmua o ngā kai pēnei i te miraka, i te hēki, i te ika, arā atu, arā atu.
He nui te tangata he matapō, he turi, kāhore i te kite, kāhore i te rongo
He nui te toto i maringi i te kuratōpuni.
He nui te utu o te pānui ki te pouaka whakaata, engari inā kē te tokomaha ka kite.
He nui te whakamoemiti o te ngakau ki tētahi tikanga i mahia e Pēneti ki Taranaki nei, he kohi moni hei āwhina i tō kura kōtiro kua tū nei ki Ākarana
He nui te whakapātaritari mai, he nui te whakatara mai, he nui te whakatakē mai
He nui te wharawhara o te pūkaea.
He nui te whenua kei reira e takoto kau ana, tē taea te mahi, tē nohoia e te tangata, i te kore ara rerewē
He nui tonu ngā manu o tēnei kāinga, inā hoki te tini o ngā rākau.
He nui tonu ngā momo kurī, he mohoao ētahi.
He nui tonu ngā painga o Maketū, arā he tata ki te moana, ki ngā pipi, ki te tuangi, ki te pāua me te ika
He nui tonu ngā tāngata i kawea ki te hōhipera i muri i te rū nui.
He nui tonu ngā whare karakia Katorika i tēnei takiwā.
He nui tonu te repe i tana kakī.
He nui tonu te whānau o taku tāne, nō reira he nui aku kaireperepe.
He nīkau ngā tāpatu o te whare.
He oho pō, he moe ao te paihamu.
He oko tā taua koroua hei tuha atu i tana wharowharo, e kore ia e tuha noa ki te whenua.
He oma tonu tā rāua heke, pai noa iho. Engari au, āta tāwhaiwhai mārika i te tuatahi, ā, kua pai
He one maroke, mā te tau hauwai e tipu ai te kai
He oneone ngahoro te oneharuru.
He oneone ngāwari, he kai nā te kāheru.
He oneone pai te onematua, ka mōmona te tipu o te kai.
He oneone pāpaku, he rākau nepinepi.
He onepū katoa te whenua, ka pupuhi te hau ka rere te puehu, ka kī ngā mea katoa
He onge tūhau tōu!
He ope akutō, e kore e hohoro te ara
He ope taua nui tonu e whakaū ana i te kupu a te mana whakawherewhere o taua whenua.
He opeopenga toto
He oriori tēnei mō Poutūterangi, he tuakana ki a rātau. E toru ngā whiti o te waiata nei
He oro tōtara, he kāhui kākā, he huinga rangatira.
He otaota tūrukiruki
He pae huarewa hei whakahauora, hei whakangungu i te manu kua mārō kē ngā parirau, e matawara ana ki ngā rongohua tīkokekoke o te ao kōrero Māori
He pae maunga keokeo tonu, kāore i papatairite.
He paenga rangatira
He paepae pāhakehake.
He paewai ngā rākau nei - i kawea rā runga i te wai, ka pae mai ki uta.
He pahi iti te waka aronui mō ngā tāngata hauā nei.
He pahoho, he pora, he ngeri, he koka; kotahi tonu āhua o ēnā kākahu
He pahī nui tonu i haere atu ki te whakatuwheratanga o tō rātou wharekai.
He pahī te nuinga o ngā kaihuke tote i ngā rā o nehe, nā te tino uaua o te mahi.
He pai ake ngā kopa i ngā kamupūtu i te raumati, i te mea kāore e tino wera ō waewae.
He pai ake ngā kuku māī i ngā mea kātahi tonu ka puta mai i te moana.
He pai ake te hemo i te koropiko ki te hoariri.
He pai ake te huka hāura i te huka mā ki ētahi hei whakareka i te pāreti.
He pai ake te kurī i te puihi, he moe noa iho te mahi a te puihi.
He pai ake te kōingo tāwhi i te kōingo ka kataina e te tokomaha.
He pai ake te parāoa hīwera i te parāoa mā ki ētahi tāngata.
He pai ake te rere o te wai i te whare āpiti tēnā i te whare kurapāpā.
He pai ake te tango whakaahua i ngā rangi pāroro, i te mea kāore e kōrekoreko te hunga e whakaahuatia ana.
He pai ake te tirohanga atu ki te moana i te papa o runga rawa, i te mea he teitei ake.
He pai ake tēnei momo kōkiri i te waiho kia raha, kia whānui te neke whakamua, kei tere pau ō tātou hau
He pai ake āhau i āku.
He pai anō ngā turuturu hei pupuri mā te hunga tūroro, ka haere ana rātou ki te wharepaku.
He pai atu te kōrero i ō āwangawanga i te nohopuku kau.
He pai ia ki te nānā i te tūroro - he manawanui, he hūmārika hoki.
He pai ia ki te tito, ki te kōrero tene. Engari au, me āta tuhi rawa aku kōrero, ka pānui noa.
He pai kai e kore e roa te tirohanga; he pai kanohi e roa te tirohanga
He pai ki a au ngā harore tōpuku, ngā mea kāore anō kia tino pakari.
He pai ki a au ngā pani parāoa āwenewene pērā i te miere.
He pai ki a au te kakara o te pia o te purukamu.
He pai ki a au ēnā wāhine e kōrero nā koe.
He pai ki a ia ngā akoranga pāngarau me ngā akoranga toi.
He pai ki a ia te noho taratahi - kāore he pōrearea, kāore he aha.
He pai ki a rāua te inu wāina hei hoa mō te kai o te pō.
He pai ki ahau kia ngāwari te urunga kia au ai taku moe.
He pai ki aku hoa te whakamātau i te kai i te kiore Māori, engari te kiore hou nei kore tonu rātou e pai.
He pai ki ngā tamariki te kōnekeneke o ngā rau rākau i a rātou e tākaro ana.
He pai ki ngā tamariki tō rātou matua kēkē pukutākaro.
He pai ki te rongo atu i tō reo, e koro.
He pai kē ake ki a rātou te haere ki te whenua tauhou kimi oranga ai, i te hoki ki tō rātou ake whenua tāmia ihotia ai, pēhia ihotia ai e ō rātou anō
He pai kē ake mēnā ka noho mai ngā kupu Māori katoa ki te papakupu kotahi.
He pai ngā aha pēnei hei wāhi tākaro, he rite ki te marae ātea.
He pai ngā hōiho tauwhena hei eke mā te tamariki.
He pai ngā moenga whānui o ēnei rā - kāore e kōpā te takoto tahi ki tō hoa.
He pai ngā papa tawaka hei hanga i te rueke i te mea kāore e tino mania ina mākū.
He pai ngā pūweru pōruru mō te takurua, e kore te tangata e mate i te māeke.
He pai ngā tuhinga a te nuinga o ngā ākonga, engari i kīia ko tāhana he poto rawa.
He pai ngā wāhanga nui o te rangitoto hei toka rorerore, i te mea ka pai tana pupuri i te wera.
He pai noa ake te kihi i te kanohi mōhanihani i te kanohi tiotio.
He pai noa atu te huawhenua kua whakatupuria ki te wairākau māori, tēnā i te kai kua whāngaihia ki te tini matū i mahia ki te wheketere.
He pai nō ngā wai whakataerangi i tere ai te kamu
He pai nō te āhua o ngā wāhine, tanuku kau atu te korokoro
He pai rangitahi
He pai rawa ki tōku whakaaro, kia tineia atu aua ture
He pai rawa te rākau nā, kāore he pūpeka o roto, he ngako katoa
He pai rā te ara kōpiko e piki ana ki te taumata o te hiwi, kāore i pērā rawa te poupou.
He pai rā te tīare o tēnā rākau - koirā i whakamahia ai hei whakakakara i ngā rā o mua.
He pai taku kaiako, nāna kē i ngākaunui ai au ki te pāngarau me te pūtaiao.
He pai taua kumete hei takotoranga mō ngā huawhenua, i te mea he kāraraha.
He pai te inu hīmoe wera mō te mate maremare.
He pai te kaukau i ngā awa he kōhatu kei te kūkūpango.
He pai te kete ngeki mō te kohi pipi i te mea ka rere noa te wai.
He pai te kōmahimahi hei kai mā pēpi.
He pai te maheno hei whenua rāhui mō te manu māori, e kore ai ngā manu e taea e ngā hoariri o te tuawhenua.
He pai te manaaki a tō mātou hōhipera i ana mahaki.
He pai te miraka pupuru hei mahi parāoa.
He pai te māhuri makomako hei pou tokorangi i te mea ka māmā ina maroke.
He pai te māra tāhingahinga, mēnā e anganui ana ki te raki.
He pai te mīti minatote hei kōhua tahi ki te pūhā.
He pai te ngaruiti mō te tāmahana kai - ka wera i te kimonga kanohi.
He pai te oneone i tērā taha o te awa hei whakatū whare, he uka hoki.
He pai te panana pēpē ngorungoru hei kai mārō tuatahi mā te pēpē.
He pai te para hei kai, engari te pakakohi - hei aha tērā.
He pai te parakiwai mō te tou kūmara
He pai te pipi koikoi mō te waruwaru rīwai.
He pai te puhapuha, engari kia kaua e puhake rawa.
He pai te tuna pāwhara hei parai kia pakapaka tonu nei te kiri
He pai te tunga haere hei mounu mō te tuna.
He pai te tākuru ki te titiro atu engari kāore e pai ana hei kai.
He pai te wai rēmana, ā me whakaranu atu ki te wai wera
He pai te whio i a koe i te whare iti kia kore ai e kuhu noa mai te tangata.
He pai te whiro mō te hanga kōpere, he kōngohe hoki.
He pai te āhua o taua kau, engari he pukupā
He pai tonu kia whakaapi te tipu o ngā rākau i tērā taha, kia kore ai e kitea, e rangona ngā kiritata.
He pai tonu te kamokamo pakari, engari arā noa atu te reka o ngā mea kānewha.
He pai tonu tāu, engari tāku, he mea kātoatoa noa iho, he rite ki te kupenga.
He pai tonu tēnā whakaaro - me kī he pai ake i ngā whakaaro o ētahi rā.
He pai tēnei harakeke mō te mahi taura.
He pai tēnei kēmu kāri mā te tūroro, i te mea he tākaro takitahi.
He pai tēnei mahi mōku he whakapakari i taku tinana hai hāpai i ngā mea taumaha ā tōna wā
He pai tēnei papanga mō te tarau - kāore e kopa pērā i te rīnena.
He pai tēnā hāte mō te raumati, he hauhau.
He pai tēnā momo rākau, ahakoa moturere, ka wana ake anō.
He pai āhua, he tangata ringa kino, kāore i tua atu i tērā.
He pai ērā hū, he kirikau hoki.
He paihamu tā rāua māunu mō te hīnaki.
He paiore te tūāpapa o te whare, kāore e tere kurupopo.
He paketai i kawea mai e tai teka.
He pakihiwi tangata, e kore e mawhaki.
He pakiwaitara noa tērā nā te wahine tarahae - kaua noa e whakapono atu.
He pakiwaru te tangata nei, i heke mai i te ara tuawhenua.
He pakiwaru, nō te kauwhau rangatira.
He paku te ika i rāoa ai a Tamarēreti
He pakupaku oreore ngā whenua o Ihipa.
He panapananga tūpuna patua ki runga ki te tāhuna pipi
He pango katoa ngā hūtu o ngā āpiha a te Kāwanatanga i tae ake ki te hui.
He pango katoa ngā kākahu o ngā kuia, he puapua tauā tō te katoa, e apakura ana me te rere te hūpē, te roimata.
He pango kerekere te mātāmua, taka mai ki te kōkō iti, he tino urukehu.
He pango ngā tōkena o taku taina, me te mata kupenga te rite.
He pango ngā uru o te mātāmua me ō muri iho i a ia, taka iho ki te kauwaeraro, he pane pākā.
He pango, he kōkōwai, he kahotea ngā tae o ā mātou kōwhaiwhai.
He paoi patu aruhe tā tētahi, he mira tā tētahi
He papa hokohoko ka tū ki te whare tapere o te tāone ia Rāhoroi.
He papa rere tītaha ngā hōkai i ngā pakitara o te whare.
He papanui tōna tohu he āio āpōpō
He papata noa iho kei te moana, koirā te take kāore au e whakaheke ngaru ana.
He papatahi tonu te āhua o ngā pākoukou.
He papatipu te uku.
He papatupu tonu tēnā rākau, kāore anō kia kaikainga e te huhu, e te aha atu.
He papatū nāku, homai taku tū
He paraheahea te tāne, ā, e rua rawa ngā mahi a te wahine kia ea ai ā rāua nama.
He parapara te kai a te tangata takaroa ki te tēpu.
He pararaki whakamaroke kai.
He parareka kainga nā te ngārara tuiau, me ringiringi ki te wai, me kore tētahi pūkonohi e ora hei putanga ake mō tētahi matatipu
He parehe ake tōu ihu i tōna.
He parekura kei te ata
He parera kotipu te hau nei, kāore i te ahu tūturu mai i te uru.
He parewhero tērā, inā te tini o te hoariri i pūhia kia mate.
He pari horehore - kāore e tipuria ana e te paku aha.
He pari te ākau o taua motu, kotahi tonu te wāhi tāhinga mārire
He pari teko, kāore he aha e tipu ana i reira.
He paruparu nō ngā whare me ngā kāinga te pūtake mai o taua mate
He parāhi te oko whakapaipai i waenganui i te tēpu.
He parāone kē te tae o ngā ika o tērā roto.
He pata ua ki runga, he ngutu tangata ki raro
He pata whakamao noa, taihoa ka whiti anō te rā.
He patapata pango ngā whakapaipai o runga i te kākahu.
He patu tākaukau, kia hume, kia kakara ai
He patupatu wahine te tara i tāoro mō te kāpene o te tīma toa o Aotearoa.
He paukena waitau, e kore e reka.
He peha tā te tangata kāore e nui te mana, he nohopuku tā te tangata nui te mana.
He peka rākau e kokoti ana i te huarahi.
He peka tītoki e kore e whati, tōna whati he ngawhā
He pekanga nā mimi te tamaiti rā - he moe puku hoki ngā mātua.
He peke tōna takiri
He pekerangi tana mahi ki te hopu i ngā manu e tātata ana ki te wai
He pekewhā te hōiho me te hipi.
He pepa pū taua puka, ko ngā tuhituhi ka tāia ki te pepa o runga ka tāruatia ki tō raro.
He pepamārō kōwakawaka kei waenga i ngā pounamu kia kore ai e pakaru.
He pepe tuna te pūrerehua ka rere mai ki ngā matapihi mēnā e kā ana ngā rama i te pō.
He pepeke konaho te namu.
He pia i te tīmatanga, kia mātau haere kua tāura.
He pia te kai i te ahiahi, he kotiuru te kai i te ata ka whai ake.
He piau ngā kōhua nunui i te marae.
He piharoa ngā taiapa o mua i te whare, he piharoa anō te kēti.
He piki te māhunga o te wahine
He pikitanga, he heketanga, āhua paritū ana
He pine te taputapu pai hei whakapūreo tītiko.
He pinerua te tupu o ngā rau o te kōwhai i te tātā.
He pipi pūhoru
He pipi te tuatahi, he kaunuku te tuarua
He pirihimana anō e tūtū ana huri katoa i te papa tākaro poikiri, mō te tūpono taka ētahi o te hunga mātakitaki ki te hē.
He pirinoa ngā noke e mau mai ana ki ngā kōpiro o te hipi. Me rongoā - mā reira e mōmona ai te hipi.
He pito honu tō te puna kaukau, he pito pāpaku anō mō ngā tamariki nohinohi.
He poaka pakikoke tēnaka, kāore e nui te mōmona.
He poaka, he kau, he heihei ngā mīti mō te okeoke.
He pohau mangā
He poi makawe
He poi oneone
He poka noa ki te hoa wahine a te tangata kē i runga i ngā mahi a te haurangi
He pokapoka te rere o tana mate wahine.
He pokinga i ēnā tama, i ēnā tohunga, i ēnā atua, i ēnā mana, i ēnā karakia, i ēnā tauira
He pokorehu ki te pokorehu, he puehu ki te puehu.
He pono anō rā taku āniwatanga ki te kai a Tiki
He pono hoki te kōrero, arā kāore he kaumātua o tērā kātū tangata kei te ora tonu i roto o taua iwi i ēnei rangi
He pono rā ia he kai onge te wai māori ki ētahi whenua
He pono, he mea uaua te momotu mai a tētahi tangata i a ia i te whenua i whakatangatawhenuatia ai ia
He poporo tū ki te hamuti
He porohita anō e taiāwhio ana i te whetūao rā, i a Pareārau.
He porohita ngā wīra o te waka, he porohita anō te tou me te waha o te pātara.
He porokere tō rātou whare tae atu ki te pātū o mua.
He pororapa taku rākete tēnehi.
He pororua te take i wehe ai rāua ko te kai a te kurī rā.
He porotaka te hanga o te poi.
He porotātaka tonu ngā hua o te pūriri.
He porowhita te āhua o te netipōro, he pororapa te āhua o te whutupōro.
He pota rawa ngā kākahu nei mōku, homai ngā mea nui ake.
He poto ake āku kōrero i āu.
He poto noa iho te arawhata, e whā ngā kaupae kua tae ki runga.
He poto rawa au mō tēnā tākaro, mō te poitūkohu.
He poto rawa koe ki te eke hōiho ki te kore tētahi hei āwhina i a koe.
He poto te pātai, engari inā kē te roa o te paremata.
He pounamu ngā rau o te kahikatea pakari.
He pounamu whakatīaho te kahurangi.
He pounamu, he aurei, i hoatu e te tangata ki te tohunga kia tāia, arā, kia hangā hei matau
He poupou tonu te hoahoa o ētahi whare karakia.
He poupou tonu te tahataha i panunu iho ai ia i runga i tana waka harakeke.
He pouwhenua, he koikoi me ērā atu rākau
He puahi te kahu, he tewhatewha te rākau
He puaki parepare, he ika whakaotinga nā Kawatapuarangi, nā i!
He puanga kākaho ka rere i te waru
He puanga kākaho ka rere i te waru.
He puhi i taumautia mā tētahi rangatira hei taura here i ngā iwi e rua
He puhi koe nāku, he ipo ki te moenga
He puhoro te whakairo kei te ringa mauī
He pukapuka i tino kaingākautia i roto i Amerika, ā, horo ana te tono kia tāia anō
He pukapuka tawhito, kua kanukanu ētahi o ngā whārangi.
He pukapuka whaihua tonu, inā te maha o ngā kōrero o roto hei ārahi i te tangata e hiahia ana ki te whakapaipai i tōna ake whare.
He pukapuka whakahaere tika i ngā kōrero o roto i a ia; e kapea ana e ia ngā kupu e mamae ai te tangata
He puke kīhai i tairanga rawa te wāhi i tū ai taua pā
He puke rōnaki
He pukepuke moana e ekeina e te waka
He pukumahi te teina, engari he toupiore te tuakana.
He pukutākaro tonu te kurī i a ia e papipapi ana, engari he moe noa iho tana mahi ināianei.
He puna pūngao mutunga kore te hau - e kore rā e pareko.
He puna pūngao mātua te hau i Te Whanga-nui-a-Tara.
He puna te kōhuhutanga o te awa nei.
He puna wai e utuhia, he wai kei aku kamo
He puna wai tō mātau. He tino makariri te wai. Ko te āhua nei, he wai pupū ake i te whenua
He punenga a Hira - he māmā noa ki a ia te pānui i ngā pukapuka uaua tonu.
He punga ngā karu o te hoiho, he tīpare punga anō tōna.
He pungapunga, he pango te hāte o te tīma whutupōro matua o Taranaki.
He punua whare anō tōna i Kāwhia.
He puoto wai
He purapura noa iho tēnei. Mā koutou e poipoi kia tipu, kia puāwai, kia puta ai ngā kakara maha ki te ao
He purapura ora te parahūhare - ā tōna wā pea ka ara ake ki te patu i te hunga nāna i hoepapa tōna iwi.
He purapura whetū ngā papa tukutuku o te tuarongo o te whare.
He purenga tapu, he purenga whakairi, māhukihuki, whakairinga toto
He purepure te poho o te ruru ki te titiro atu.
He pureureu noa tā Rangi, engari anō a Tū, me te tākupu.
He puruhia ēnei toki, kāhore he niho
He puta kei aku ringa, i te kore ōku e whakamahi kāheru mō tētahi wā roa tonu.
He putanga wheao, he ariki taniwha tēnā
He putiputi koe, i katohia, hei piri ki te uma, e te tau! He tau aroha koe, koronga roa
He putu moni motuhake tāna i te pēke, he tamariki ā rāua, ēnei mea katoa, otirā i hōhā te wāhine nei ki tana tāne, ka pūremu
He putuputu hoki tana whakamanuhiri i ngā Pākehā i ōna kāinga i Rāpaki me Koukourarata
He pāhehaheha tonu ngā kurī omaoma.
He pāhunu te take i kore ai au e puta ki waho, he wehi nōku i ngā mea katoa.
He pākaha tonu te hunga haere i te nuku o te moana i te waka pakupaku.
He pākati tuara-kurī i waenga i ngā patapata o te whakairo.
He pākoko hoki tana wahine, kāhore anō i whānau tamariki
He pākuru te taputapu paopao i ngā rā o mua, ko te kuru maitai te taputapu paopao nēra i ēnei rā.
He pākā kōrito ngā makawe, kāore i parauri, kāore i urukehu.
He pāmārō tonu taku puku i mua, engari kua tāoru kau i te whānau tamariki.
He pānga nei ōna i ētahi poraka whenua o Te Wairarapa, ā, i Kaumoana e tātata ana ki Whakaoriori
He pānga ōna engari kīhai ōna mana ahikāroa
He pānui kei te keti e whakatūpato ana i te hunga haere poka noa ki reira.
He pānui pukapuka taku mahi i ēnei rā whakatā.
He pāpaku noa te ngau a tana whao.
He pāpaku te tipu o te kai i te tau ruru.
He pārera apu paru
He pārera ērā e keakea mai rā i te awakeri.
He pātai tika otirā he take nui, he take uaua, ā, mā wai hoki e whakahoki te pātai? Kua ngaro hoki ngā pū wānanga o raurangi
He pātanga tēnei pae maunga; ko mātau ki tēnei taha, ko rātau ki tērā taha.
He pātehetehe rawa ngā harakeke nei, tapahia kia roa ake.
He pātene kei taku tātaitai mō te tāpiri i te tāke hokohoko ki aku tātaitanga ina tuhia ana aku nama.
He pātiki apu one
He pātītī taranui anahe te kai o te whenua pūkauri nei.
He pāua, he kina, pūpū, rimurimu, tio, hāpuku, tarakihi, me ērā atu mātaitai o te moana. Titiro ake ki uta e papaki ana te manu - te kūkū, kākā, me ērā atu manu e tika nei hei kai mā te tangata
He pāwhera ika te mahi a ngā tāne, ko ngā wāhine kei te waruwaru taewa.
He pēhea te tawhiti o te haere?
He pēhea ō kōrua whakaaro ki tēnei kaupapa?
He pēhea ōu nā whakaaro ki tāku e kōkiri nei?
He pēke witi (pēke kautahanga nei) ētahi kei au e takoto ana mō te hoko
He pēnei me te hū hōiho whero te hanga o ngā autō i taku akomanga.
He pēpē roi
He pērā i te wahine hapū, ka tata ia te whānau, e whakamamae ana, e auē ana i ōna mamae
He pērā te kaukau o tērā koroua ka kautū i te wai ka pōrutu haere, kia mātao ai tōna kiri.
He pīhonga pea te kānga wai ki te ihu kāore e waia ana ki tērā kai.
He pīkari kei te pī o ngā karu.
He pīkaunga nui tēnei e pahore ai ō rātou tuarā, e hake ai hoki i te taumaha
He pīmuri hāngū te -tia, te -hia me te -ngia.
He pīmuri te 'rua' i te kupu kākano-rua, he pīmuri anō te 'kore' i te kupu rawakore.
He pīpipi, e kore e tauria e te waka; he paru, e tauria
He pītoitoi ketuketu para rau rākau
He pīwakawaka tērā e kakapa haere rā ki te kimi kai māna.
He pō atarau, ka haere te whānau ki te toitoi tuna.
He pō haitutu, he pō e hēmanawa ai te tangata.
He pō makariri, he pō whakahemo hiko.
He pō mimi tō taku koroua i a ia e māuiui ana.
He pō pai tēnei mō te mahi tuna.
He pō pai tēnei mō te rama pāpaka
He pō pariko i raru ai a Rona.
He pō tiwhatiwha, ko te wā hoki o Whiro.
He pō uriuri, he pō kerekere, he pō haere o te tuna.
He pōhā tītī tā rātou kaihaukai ki te tangata whenua.
He pōito kei te kaharunga, he karihi kei te kahararo.
He pōkeke tonu ngā māra o ngā iwi noho tāone i aua wā, engari he nui tonu te kai i whakatupuria.
He pōkēkē, he mātārere ua.
He pōrahurahu te āhua o tana patu i te pōro, engari ka rere ki tawhiti.
He pōrangi te tangata rā ka tahi; he kōripi ka rua; he kūrapa ka toru.
He pōrangorango tana hōiho, arā, he 'paepōro'.
He pōrera, he kōaka, he tūwhara, he whāriki, he kaitaka
He pōro porokawa te pōro mō taua tākaro, ehara i te pōro porotītaha.
He pōruru noa ake te kiri i te raparapa o te waewae, tēnā i te kiri i ngā kūhā.
He pōtae keokeo tō te pīhopa.
He pōtae koeko pango tō te witipū.
He pōtae, he kāmeta te haere i ngā rangi hou.
He pōturi te tamaiti rā. Mā te āta tirotiro i ō ngutu e mōhio ai ia ki ō kōrero.
He pōī tangata, he pōī whetū te rite.
He pū hurihuri ā māua, e tautau ana i ō māua tātua
He pūahi te kahu, he tewhatewha te rākau
He pūahi, he kahu waero ngā kahu kurī o tēnei kohinga.
He pūhihi noa te hanga tinana o Wiremu Kupa, ā, ko tētahi o ngā kanohi e rewha ana
He pūhihihihi nō te upoko
He pūhoro, he kape rua, he mangōpare, he aramoana ngā kōwhaiwhai o ngā heke o te whare rā.
He pūhui roa te tipu o ngā pua o te tī kōuka.
He pūhui te wai, i hua ake i te hononga o te hauwai me te hāora.
He pūkaha kai hiko tō te papu wai nei.
He pūkaha korohū tō ngā tereina o mua.
He pūkai tō Tū, he pūkai tō Rongo
He pūkainga pakake ki Te Roto-a-Tara
He pūkauwae kohuki tōna.
He pūkawa wheo kei te kaupare atu i te akiaki mai a te ngaru.
He pūkākā rawa te rā ki taua wāhi rā, he whenua whakatupu mate ki te tangata
He pūmā te pungarehu.
He pūnaha ngahuru e whāia ana e ngā whare pukapuka e mōhiotia ai kei hea ake o ngā pae ngā pukapuka mō tēnā kaupapa, mō tēnā kaupapa.
He pūnganangana ngā huru kaikamo o te pokotiwha.
He pūnguru nō ngā whakaaro a ētahi. He mārama nō ngā whakaaro a ētahi, koia i rerekē ai te titiro a te iwi i ngā tikanga o ngā ture
He pūngāwerewere te katipō.
He pūpahi tēnei nō ngā kaumātua; i a rātau e whaiwhai poaka ana, noho mai ai ki konei i ngā pō.
He pūrau te tikanga whāngai i a Pinepine, pērā i ngā tohunga tapu o mua atu
He pūrehurehu te ingoa o taua kapua māwhai e kitea ana i ngā rā paki.
He pūtiotio te tarutaru 'Onehunga'.
He pūtoetoe a Koro Kani, ko ia anahe te mea o tōna tātai pakeke e ora ana ināianei.
He pūtoi kererū (e kōrero ana mō ngā huruhuru kererū)
He pūtātara ki a ia, he rauponga ki a au, engari ko aua patapata anō rā me ōna pākati.
He pūtētete kē ō makawe, he rite ki ō te hipi!
He pūwhero ngā tapa o te uwha, he kākaka tō te toa
He rahi ake a Pareārau i a Matawhero.
He rahi ake te hauwhā o te keke i te hauono.
He rahi rawa ngā āputa o tō raumata, koirā i rere ai ngā aua.
He rahi rawa pea te huriwiri nā mō ngā kōwiri o te puritanga o te wini.
He rahi te hui i aru i a ia, i kite hoki rātou i ana merekara i mea ai ia ki ngā tūroro
He rahi tonu ngā kurupae e wheuka ana i te papa o runga.
He raima kua whakakahangia ki te maitai kei te tūāpapa o te whare.
He rama pātiki i te pō, he kohi mātaitai i te maruao.
He rama pātiki te mahi i ngā wai pākihikihi o te koraha.
He rangatira motuhenga tērā, he rangatira rānei nō te tau tītoki?
He rangatira te tangata e mōhio ana ki te whakahaere i tōna iwi i ngā wā o te pai me te kino.
He rangatira te tangata nā e whakakino ana i a ia
He rangatira waimarie a Kiwa e arohaina ana e āna kaimahi katoa.
He rangatira whai mana a Hongi. Nō Tūhoe te mana me te rangatiratanga
He rangatira ōku pūtake katoa i te taha ki taku matua, he ware i te taha ki tōku whaea.
He rangatira; e kore pea ia e kai i te paruparu
He rangi hātai āpōpō, he wā pai hei hari i ngā tamariki ki te papa kararehe.
He rangi ka maomao
He rangi kino, āwhā nei i te hotoke, ka patī ake te paruparu ki runga ki ngā kahu o te tangata haere i raro, i te kaha o te takahanga o te hōiho - tē whai whakaaro te tangata e haere ana i runga, tē aha
He rangi kōkōuri, he iti noa te karekare o te wai.
He rangi kōwhanga āpōpō engari ka pārūrū tonu.
He rangi maitai, kāore he kapua i te rangi, e hehengi kau ana te matangi.
He rangi pai te rangi nei. I te kaha te whiti o te rā, he rangi wera
He rangi paihuarere, e ari ana te kitea atu o te maunga.
He rangi paihuarere, e kākanapa ana te wai.
He rangi paihuarere, he oranga wairua.
He rangi paihuarere, taro ake, kua kōruku.
He rangi paki - e kōau ana ngā manu, e kīkī ana ngā tarakihi.
He rangi paruhi, he koanga ngākau.
He rangi pāruhiruhi, he oranga wairua.
He rangi ruki, mea ake pea ka ua.
He rangi takawai, ka kaha tonu te tipu o te weriweri 'tiwha pango' i runga i aku rōhi.
He rangi takō i te ahiahi, he hauhunga i te ata.
He rangi taritari, he mātakitaki ataata te mahi.
He rangi tāmaru
He rangi tōpuni
He rangi tūpakarearea, e tata ana te ua.
He rangi tūāhuru, hēmanawa ana.
He rango te kōpapa wai wera.
He rarahu kino nā rātou i ētahi o te iwi. Ā i ētahi rā i rumakina e rātou tētahi wahine ki te wai
He rarauhe ngā koropae o te umu.
He raro te ingoa mō te pane whakairo kei runga i te poumua o te whare, ko te upoko tonu tērā o te tipuna whare.
He raruraru taumaha kei runga o taua whenua, kaua rāua e hoko i taua whenua, kei oho anō taua raruraru nui i pēhia nei i tēnei marama ka pahure ake nei
He rata ake tāu ngeru i tāku.
He ratonga tūmatanui te haere o ngā rerewhenua i te tāone nui.
He ratonga whakamāori anō kei raro i te maru o taua tari kāwanatanga.
He rau hohoko whai kōtingotingo mā ō te ngaio.
He rau kei runga, he kawa: kāhore he rau, he matire
He raukakai ka tukua hei tohi i te whare me ka oti
He raumati tēnei, koia i tokoroa ai te ika
He raupaka ngā taopuku mō ngā ika.
He rautū te tārei o te waka
He rawa horihori te kirihou - tē kitea noatia i te taiao.
He rawa māori ngā kora o nehe pērā i te hau kapuni me te hinu.
He rawa noa ake ngā waka takahi i te huarahi matua i ngā Paraire.
He rawakore hoki ia, a e okaka ana tōna ngākau ki taua mea
He rawe a Kurawhā mehemea ka tū ki te para whakawai
He rawe hoki te whakatā i te rūma noho ina kā te ahi i ngā pō makariri.
He rawe katoa ki a au ngā kai pākehā nō ngā tōpito o te ao.
He rawe ki a Tama te mahi pāngarau - he pai ki a ia te rāwekeweke i ngā tau.
He rawe ki a au aku hungarei. Ānō nei ko ōku mātua ake.
He rawe ki a au taku punua whare, ahakoa te pakupaku.
He rawe ki a au taku tūru tawhito; ahakoa te karukaru, he tūru hāneanea.
He rawe ki a au te māngaro o te taro.
He rawe ki a au tērā koroua e noho mai rā i te pae.
He rawe ki a ia kia kapi katoa ana hēki i ngā kora pepa.
He rawe ki a ia tana pene waimangu hei pene tuhi whakaahua.
He rawe ki a mātou te haere ki te awa ki te hopuhopu kēwai.
He rawe ki ngā tamariki te whai kia riripi ngā pōwhatu i te mata o te wai.
He rawe ki taku hoa pura tana mīhini pānui pukapuka.
He rawe ki taku mokopuna te kai parāoa me te mīere.
He rawe ki te tamaiti rā te tāruperupe i te haki o tōna tīma i ngā kēmu whutupaoro nunui.
He rawe kē ki a au te kaiwhakaari mōhū - e waiho ana mā te kanohi me te tinana e kawe ōna whakaaro.
He rawe kē ngā pūtu pīataata o kuia - kei ngā pona rā anō e haere ana.
He rawe kē te mea nā.
He rawe ngā hōpa tawhito ki a ia, he rahi tonu, he ngāwari hoki.
He rawe ngā kākahu ka mahia ki te papahune, ahakoa te kopakopa.
He rawe ngā kōrero paki a taua wahine pukutākaro.
He rawe ngā muka o ngā harakeke o te kāinga hei whatu kākahu.
He rawe ngā tamariki pakeke ake, engari ko te tāmangakōtore, kātahi nā te tamaiti whakakuene!
He rawe tana kōrero. Kāore he kaikōrero i tua atu i a ia mō tērā kaupapa.
He rawe tana pukapuka wetereo Māori, i te mea e whakaahuatia ngā ture wetereo kia mārama tonu ki ngā ākonga.
He rawe te titiro ki ngā wai o te roto e māpuna kau ana i te matangi.
He rawe te whenua tāwakawaka nei hei whakatū whare - kāore e hiwihiwi rawa, kāore e papatairite rawa.
He rawe tāna tū mai i mua i te tini ki te whakahē i a rātou, he tangata māia.
He rawe tēnā. Me hoko he mea pēnaka mōku.
He rawe tō mātou kaiako.
He rawe tō rātou pāpā - he tangata ngahau.
He rawe ērā tuatua, inā kē te tuawhitu.
He rehe ki te whatu kākahu.
He reka ake te kūmara o Kaipara, tēnā i te kūmara o wāhi kē.
He reka ake tāu rēwena i tāna.
He reka te mahamaha me te pēkana, he mea parai.
He reka te pī, ahakoa kainga matatia, ahakoa tunua.
He renga te hua o te huri i te witi.
He reo hōhonu, he reo ponguru te āhua o tōna reo, ā, ahakoa te rangi o te waiata i taea noatia e ia te waiata tika
He reo rangatira kē hoki tō ngā tangihanga, tō ngā mate, tō ngā mea tapu. Kāore e kōrerotia i ngā wāhi noa iho nei
He reo tāmāori te reo o Kīngi Tāhiwi . . .  He mea tito anō hoki e ia he waiata, ā, ko ētehi o aua waiata ko 'He pūru taitama', ko 'Tō ringa, e hine', ko 'Kāore he wāhine', ko 'Tākiri atu, tākiri mai' me 'E whiti te marama'
He reo whango tō taua kōauau.
He repo, he onepū, he whenua tītōhea me ērā atu tū whenua kāhore i pai mō ngā mahi ahuwhenua
He rerekē anō te tikanga a tēnā kaunihera, a tēnā kaunihera mō te kaupapa kotahi.
He rerekē hoki tō rātou nā whenua, he whenua mātao, he whenua hahore
He rerekē ngā momo uhi hei kōkō i te kiri.
He rerekē ngā raruraru pāpori i ngā whenua rawakore i ērā ka hua ake i ngā whenua whairawa.
He rerekē te ahurea i pakeke mai ai au - e kōrero Māori katoa ana ngā whānau, he mahi kai te whāinga nui.
He rerekē te nganga o te pītiti i tō te paramu, engari e rua e rua, he mārō.
He rerenga hāngū ēnei: Ka whakaingoatia te tīma āpōpō. I tukuna atu te reta i te ata nei. Kua tunua e Hine he parāoa mā tātou. Kāore i tuhia e au tana tau waea.
He rerenga īnanga te awa nei, piki atu ki ōna kautawa katoa.
He rikarika te whakatikanga o te iwi nei
He rimu pukā kei te ākau
He rimu āhua nui tonu - e rua mārō te pae.
He rimurapa tonu te rite o tana kiri karengo i te pueatanga ake i te wai.
He rimurimu moana te kai o reira, e kōhuatia ana, he ika te kīnaki
He rinena pai, he mea whakairo nō Ihipa te mea i wherahia e koe hei kōmaru mōu, hei kara māu
He ringa hakorea au ki ngā momo hākinakina katoa - kāore ōku take.
He ringa houhere, he pātaka kī.
He ringa kino, ka reia e te tini wāhine.
He ringa mutu, koirā te utu o te whānako.
He ringa mākohakoha tēnā tangata, he tūmaeo.
He ringa mākohakoha, he parakūkā.
He ringa mākohakoha, he whakatōrekereke.
He ringa rehe a Mea, ka taea hoki e ia ngā ruharuha a ētahi atu te whakatika, te whakapaipai, kia noho taonga anō ai.
He ringa ārangirangi, kāore e tahuri ki te kimi mahi māna.
He ringatahi te nui o te weriweri mea rā e tipu ana i tana puku.
He rino ngā tauteka toko i ngā pakitara, i te tuanui hoki.
He ripa kawau kei runga kei te taumata
He ripanga parāoa ki Kauaeranga
He riri anō tā te tawa uho, he riri anō tā te tawa parā
He riri anō tō te kai, ko te kunāwhea tōna putanga.
He riri anō tō te kai, nō reira kaua e horohororē, kei ngau tō puku.
He riri anō tō te wahine mangamutu.
He riri aweko, engari e whakamau tonu ana tētahi taha ki tētahi.
He riri tautauāmoa; riri ana tērā i tāna, tērā i tāna
He rite a muri ki te hōiho, ko mua, he rite ki te raiona.
He rite ki te huhu ka wheta ina tangohia mai i tōna rua.
He rite ki te hurumaeko o te tīrairaka tana kōwhiuwhiu.
He rite ki te tāhuhu whare te takoto o te kahiwi
He rite ngā pūkorukoru kōwhai nei ki te panekoti hāngorungoru
He rite ngā tauira rauponga o te whakairo nei ki te āhua o ngā rau o te kaponga.
He rite te 'pokotiwha' ki te 'pōkokōhua' - e rua, e rua, e kohukohu ana i te tangata, i tētahi atu tūāhua rānei.
He rite te huahae ki te pito o te whiore ngeru.
He rite te pito whakarunga o tana tokotoko pūrekereke ki te upoko o te tuna.
He rite te rahi o te wai ka uru ki roto i ngā pounamu e rua nei - e 500 miririta te kītanga o ngā mea e rua.
He rite te tamaiti nā ki te kahikatea, he tino kōroaroa.
He rite te āhua o ngā tauira tukutuku ki te whakarua kōpito me te waharua.
He rite te āhua o tō whaea ki tana teina, inā te rite o ō rāua kanohi.
He rite tonu hoki te peka mai o aku mātua tāne me ngā mea wāhine, ki te tatari waka hei mau ki te tāone, ā, i ētahi wā, kia kai tahi noa ai mātau
He rite tonu tana hokihoki mai ki te rohe o Te Māhia, ki te hokohoko pū
He rite tonu tana pātai mehemea kei te rahi rawa tana kumu i roto i ērā tarau.
He rite tonu tana tipitipi i tana māra kia tino kore nei he otaota.
He rite tonu tana tope ki te tope kura i mahia ki te huru manu.
He rite tonu te kāhakihaki a te punua kurī nei i taku tōkena.
He rite tonu te taetae mai o ngā tono kia haere mātau ki te whakangahau haere i ngā rōpū o konei
He rite tonu te takataka atu o ngā toka i ngā tahataha o te kapiti.
He rite ō makawe makaka ki te rimurimu.
He rite ō makawe pōtarotaro ki ngā taratara o te kina!
He ritenga tawhito ia nā ngā Māori, mea ake ka mahue, pērā me ētahi atu ritenga tawhito kua mahue
He roa ake ngā piupiu o ngā wāhine i ō ngā tāne.
He roa hoki nō te ua i tāpokopoko ai
He roa ngā pō me ngā rā i kōrerorerotia ai ngā take nunui. Nō rātou i aua haere ka whānau mai ētahi whakaaro nunui me ētahi kōrero taumaha a tāua, a te Māori
He roa ngā pūhihi o ētahi māwhitiwhiti, he poto ō ētahi.
He roa ngā whakakai e tāewa mai ana i ngā taringa.
He roa te tau i te tohenga, ka horo te pā
He roa tonu e haere ana te tereina. Ka tae ki tēnā teihana, kua tuku ētahi
He roa tonu kātahi ka mutu te takuate a te kuia ki tana punua kurī i hemo i te tukinga e te motokā.
He roa tonu ngā whakaatu mai a Ngata i aua mahi i ngā rīpoata ā-tau a tōna tari, me āna reta ā-marama ki tōna hoa takatāpui, ki a Te Rangi Hīroa
He roa tonu tana pōtaka e taka ana me te pīoioi anō, kātahi ka hemo.
He roi motuhanga
He roi, he paku, he mahiti ngā pakapaka i haria mai e tōku hoa.
He roimata ka pāhīhī i aku kamo.
He roimata pononga tonu, ehara noa i te tangi whakakikokiko.
He roimata toroa, he mumu, he waharua ngā tukutuku i oti i a rātau te mahi.
He roimata toroa, he purapura whetū, he poutama ngā tukutuku kei roto i tō mātau tupuna whare.
He rongoā tōku mō te koiangi, ka haria e au ina haere ki tāwāhi.
He ropiropi te tinana o te wētāpunga.
He rorirori te tangata kāore e raka i tana waka ka haere ana ia ki te mātakitaki pikitia.
He roroa ngā kōmoremore ki raro
He roroa ngā ringaringa o te ture, ahakoa i hea te tangata hara ka whātorotia, rō hīnaki rawa takawhitiwhiti ai
He roroa, he pango, he kapu ngā makawe.
He roto kei te matamata o Ruapehu.
He roto nui a Taupō-nui-a-Tia.
He rua ō ngā pōkiha, he kōwhanga o ngā manu o te rangi
He ruarua ngā manu ka tangi i te ata pūao, taro ake, kua korihi ngā manu huhua noa.
He ruarua noa iho ngā whakaahua o tēnei kaumātua. Ko tēnei anake te mea i taea e au
He ruarua o aua tū kurī e kitea ana i ētahi atu whenua, engari kei Āwherika anake
He runaruna tūāpō te mātai whetū.
He ruri aroha ki tōku hoa pai rawa
He ruru kau ana kōrero - kaua e arohia ake.
He ruru koe, he moe i te awatea, he oho i ngā pō.
He rutunga nā te mate
He rā e pukepoto ai ngā wāhi hōhonu o te moana.
He rā e taka e kai ai ia i ana tūtae.
He rā e taka e kai ai te tangata pātai rā i ana tūtae.
He rā nō te whakaāhuru i te iwi, ehara hoki ēnei rā i te rā e noho wehiwehi ai te iwi
He rā paihuarere, tīhore ana te kahu o te rangi.
He rā tino nui tēnei mō Ngeungeu rātou ko tōna whānau, kua tutuki rā te hiahia taumano kē nei o tōna tupuna, o Ānaru
He rā whakatā āpōpō, aoake ka haere anō ngā whakataetae.
He rāhui whakaioio kua meatia ki taua moana e Te Papa Atawhai - e kore e hikina ahakoa he aha te kaupapa.
He rākau akoako, he māmā ki te tātā.
He rākau aweawe tonu te tōtara - tērā ka eke ki te 30 mita te roa.
He rākau e taupare ana i te huarahi.
He rākau i hinga i te pō rā, koia e kati ana i te haere o ngā waka.
He rākau ka hinga ki te mano wai
He rākau kahurapa te pukatea.
He rākau kōrori
He rākau morimori, e kore e taea te piki
He rākau māmore, kāhore he manga, kāore he peka.
He rākau māori te tōtara me te akeake, he rākau rāwaho te purukamu me te whiro.
He rākau ngāwari, na, ka hohoro te haere o te kani; he rākau pakeke, na, e āta haere ana te kani
He rākau nui te kauri, he rākau iti te koromiko.
He rākau pai te kauri mō te hanga waka, he akoako hoki.
He rākau paku e tipu ana i waho atu i te waha o te ana. Ka rūrū mai taua rākau
He rākau pārūrū te kuru.
He rākau pūaha
He rākau rapa, e kore e taea te wāhi.
He rākau tahatonga, e kore e taea te wāwāhi.
He rākau takawiri; e kore e akoako
He rākau tawhito, e mau ana te taitea i waho rā, e tū te kōhiwi
He rākau tokomanga e tauteka ana i tana rāina whakairi kākahu.
He rākau tupu hou, he rākau rea hou kei te māioio
He rākau tupua e piki ana i te awa, kāore e whai ana i te ia o te awa.
He rākau tōtara kei te tapa o te moana i te taha rāwhiti o Motutawa pā
He rākau whana, mea ake whati.
He rāngai maomao ka taka i tua o Nukutaurua, e kore a muri e hokia.
He rāngai maomao kua taka ki tua o Nukutaurua e kore a muri e hokia
He rāpoi nahonaho tērā e ngahue mai rā i te taha o te roto.
He rāpoi taimana e pīataata mai ana i te mōhiti o kuia.
He rēinga kāpura te rēinga e ako nei te Pākehā ki te Māori, ā ko te rēinga a te Māori i mōhio ai, he rēinga kē anō
He rīpene waiporoporo e whakaniko ana i tana perehana.
He rūkahu tērā tangata, kaua noa e whakapono atu.
He rūma hura kau, kāore he whāriki, he ārai, he aha atu rānei hei whakapaipai.
He rūma nui, he rūma pongipongi.
He rūnanga whakatūaho tā rātou, kia riro mai ai a Te Hura
He taetaeata, e kore e roa, ka paki
He taewa kōrahirahi. (E kōrero ana mō te taewa kāore anō i pakari.)
He taewa mokorea kau kei te pātaka - e kore e ora te whānau i tērā.
He taewa pūkeko ēnei - nō tērā tau kē i hauhakea ai.
He tahakura te mea nāna i whāki ake te aroha
He taharua au nō Ngāi Te Rangi me Ngāti Pūkenga.
He tai kōwheuwheu.
He tai kōwāwā
He tai pākato mai
He tai whakaparu te tai o te ata
He tai whakarākau, he huene nō tawhiti, nō mamao.
He taimaha te punga nei - māu au e āwhina ki te koko.
He taimaha tonu te wīra o tana motokā, e kore pea ia e kaha ki te hiki.
He taimana te āhua o te tuarā kurī.
He taimāmā te kirihou, he taumaha te nuinga o ngā momo maitai.
He taio makawe te ariā o Te Iho-o-te-rangi.
He taio makawe.
He tairite ngā tūranga mahi e rua - he ōrite te utu, ā, kāore tētahi e teitei ake i tētahi.
He tairua i te onepū te tohu he toheroa kei reira.
He taitama tāroaroa ia i taua wā, he tangata ātaahua, he tangata ngahau tonu, ā, i ētehi wā tē taea e ia te pēhi te mahi hīanga
He takahuirangi tērā tangata, he rangi kē, he kōrero kē.
He takapau kikino; ko aua takapau, he tangariki, he rangatū, he takitaki
He takapau pōkai ngā uri o Pāheke
He takawairore Māori tūturu te pōtaka me te karetao.
He takawhetanga nā te ngutu te moe tāhae a Tānerahi rāua ko te wahine a tōna tuakana.
He take iti noa iho tēnei! Kāore ōna kiko!
He take kē tāna i haere mai ai ia.
He take matatini, ka roa tonu e whiriwhiria ana, kātahi anō ka tau te māramatanga.
He take tāku ki a koe.
He take whāiti anō i karangahia ai tēnei hui tātari reo
He take ōhanga i whakahoahoa ai a Aotearoa ki taua whenua, ahakoa tana tātāmi i ētahi o ana tāngata.
He takerehāia nō te mate, he mate nui whakaharahara
He taku te haere o te tangata rā; tē hohoro tē aha
He takunga pārae (arā he maramara kai i kohia i te pārae)
He takā tō waho, he paewai tō roto
He takō noa te aka o te taiepa nei; kāore i mau
He tamaiti aewa i te whānautanga mai, engari i te pai o te tiaki a te koroua rā i tana mokopuna, kua kaha haere.
He tamaiti atamai a Rangi - e kore e ngaro he aha i a ia.
He tamaiti haere tonu ia ki te kura, tae noa mai ki ēnei marama e toru e whā kua pahemo ake nei
He tamaiti hihi, ka huna i muri i tana māmā ki te kōrero atu koe ki a ia.
He tamaiti hūngoingoi a Toarangatira i te wā e iti rawa ana ia
He tamaiti hūngoingoi, engari nōna ka pakeke, ka tino pūioio te hanga.
He tamaiti ihumanea - kotahi noa iho te whāngaitanga atu ki te mātauranga hou, kua mau.
He tamaiti kakama, ka tere mau i a ia ngā mātauranga hou.
He tamaiti kokoti tau, he whakapaunga aroha nā ōna mātua.
He tamaiti konekone a Tama - kia whakatata mai he kōtiro, kua pūwhero tonu atu ngā pāpāringa.
He tamaiti kutere i a ia e tamariki ana, ka tangata nei, kua tūpuhipuhi noa iho.
He tamaiti meamea, i aitia ki te take o te rākau.
He tamaiti mū - me uaua ka tametame ngā ngutu ki te kōrero.
He tamaiti ngohe, kāore e whakatenetene e aha.
He tamaiti ngongo - me uaua ka puta he kōrero i a ia.
He tamaiti ngāwari - kotahi te kupu a tana whaea, kua tahuri ia ki te whakatutuki.
He tamaiti niwha, he tere tū ngā pihi.
He tamaiti niwha, kāore e tuohu noa ina rokohanga he raruraru.
He tamaiti pai. Kotahi te karanga, kua kori ake ki te āwhina i ana mātua.
He tamaiti pateko tēnā, he noho noa iho, he mātaki pouaka whakaata.
He tamaiti pukunui, kāore e whakaaro ki tētahi atu i te wā kai.
He tamaiti pōriro e kimi ana i tōna matua
He tamaiti raukena a Mea - kāore i whākina e te whaea ko wai te uretū.
He tamaiti rawe, kotahi noa iho te pānuitanga, kua mau i a ia te matū o te kōrero.
He tamaiti taringa tīhoihoi, kāore e whakarongo ki te kupu a tōna matua, a tōna whaea.
He tamaiti tonu kē tāna! Mahara au karekau āna ake tamariki.
He tamaiti totoa rawa, he tamaiti hautete a Huriana, ā, pērā tonu ia i te kura
He tamaiti tērā e mōhio ana ki te āta tiaki i ana mōkai.
He tamaiti tōwenewene, e kore e mutu tana whakakuene.
He tamaiti whakatōrekereke tonu, kei wāhi kē ngā whakaaro i ngā wā katoa.
He tamaiti whīroki tonu a ia, nāwai rā, nāwai rā, kua pūioio, kua pakaua
He tamariki enanga ērā - pēnei au he māhanga.
He tamariki kaikā, he tangi tōna mutunga
He tamariki wāwāhi tahā
He tangata Ingarihi nō muri nei i huri hei Katorika
He tangata ahunui taku taokete - mō te mahi, kāore he tangata i tua atu.
He tangata ahurei i roto i te ao Māori me te ao Pākehā ngātahi
He tangata angoa, ko te anga anake e tū mai nei.
He tangata araara, kua kō ōna rongo ki te tī, ki te tā.
He tangata e mea ana ki te patu i tōna tuahine, ka mamau rāua ko taua tangata, nō reira ka werohia ia ki te naihi
He tangata e tū ana i te kokonga, ko ia e papare ana i ngā waka ki te ākau roa, kia kore ai e rokohanga atu ngā taraka i aituā.
He tangata hakirara, he kopakopa katoa ana kākahu, me te paruparu anō o te āhua.
He tangata horepatatai ka whawhai ana. Wehi katoa ana te tangata i a ia.
He tangata horetātā, he tohe ki te riri.
He tangata hārakiraki tērā - nāwai i wheke, kua kata anō, taro ake kua puku anō te rae.
He tangata hāware, he pūioio te tinana.
He tangata hōhā a Mea, he ui makihoi hoki.
He tangata hūhunu, he tangata haku.
He tangata hūmārie i uruhitia e ngā āhuatanga o te wā kia pakanga
He tangata hūmārie, ngākau aroha a Pine, manawanui hoki ki āna tauira
He tangata i kaingākautia e ngā kaitono, he tonotono tonu tā rātou mahi i a ia hei kaiārahi mā rātou
He tangata i ngākaunui a Arapeta ki ngā mahi hākinakina. Nāna i whakatū, i whakahaere ētahi o ngā karapu tākaro i te rohe o Whakatāne
He tangata i whāngaia ki ngā kōrero o te tai, me ngā tikanga a tōna iwi
He tangata ia i rere tōtōā ki ngā hiahia o te kikokiko, otirā he wā anō ka koiri ake ōna toto rangatira
He tangata ihupuku te kaihautū hou - ka tika i a ia taua whakahaere.
He tangata kaikoka, he patupatu i tana wahine me ana tamariki.
He tangata kanepoto a Tū - kāore i rite ki ana tuāhine, he tāroaroa katoa.
He tangata kauanuanu, ka nui te tautokohia e tana iwi.
He tangata kei te kūaha e uiui ana mōu.
He tangata kore hoa, he takahi tangata, he hōkeke nōna.
He tangata korokē ia, ka kīia atu kia kuhu kākahu tōtika, kua kuhu kē i ana tāngari.
He tangata kua mawhera te rongo puta noa i te ao.
He tangata kumu, he whare mokemoke.
He tangata maeko, he kāinga tupuria e te māheuheu.
He tangata mahuki, kāore e mōhio ki te whakaaro ki ētahi atu.
He tangata makihoi, he māra tarutaru.
He tangata manaaki Pākehā ia, i te pito taenga mai rā anō o te Pākehā ki uta nei tae noa ki tōna matenga
He tangata manahau ia - e menemene ana, e katakata ana i ngā wā katoa.
He tangata marae, he kāinga kikī; he tangata mahuki, he kāinga puehu.
He tangata mauri tau, kāore e mataku, ka ū tonu ngā whakaaro ki te ārahi i ana tāngata e ora ai te katoa.
He tangata momoe, he tangata māngere, e kore e whiwhi ki te taonga
He tangata mākā a Mikaere ki te whai i tāna kaupapa, ahakoa he aha.
He tangata mātau, he tangata hūmārie anō hoki.
He tangata mātātoa i mua, engari i te hokinga mai i te pakanga, kua whakatairuhi noa.
He tangata mīharo te tangata nei a Hēnare Whōto, nāna hoki i hanga te taputapu nei. E, he tino tohunga kē. Titiro ki te mahi a ōna ringaringa, te motokā nei. E, ka mau te wehi
He tangata mōrohirohi tonu, e kore rawa ia e whiore hume.
He tangata mōtiro te tangata nei
He tangata ngaio, ahakoa te uauatanga kei mua i a ia, ka kitea e ia he rongoā.
He tangata ngangahau a Rāpata ki te pāmu hipi, ki te mahi tahi hoki me te kāwanatanga ki te hoepapa i ngā mate kararehe
He tangata ngawhere, ka riro noa iho ki tāu.
He tangata ngehe, he tohunga tonu ki te karo i te mahi.
He tangata ngongo hoki, koirā au i āhua tumeke ai i te nui me te hāngai o tana kōrero.
He tangata ngāwari a Kahu, ko tā te hui e whakatau ai hei whai māna, koinā.
He tangata ngū - koinā e tautau nā te puku.
He tangata nihoniho a Te Ngahuru. Ko te riri tonu tōna hoa
He tangata ninipa ia ka oma ana. Kei rapahuki i a ia anō!
He tangata oha ki te iwi, he tangata karanga i te manuwhiri, ahakoa Māori rānei, Pākehā rānei
He tangata pai taua kīngi o Rūhia, he tangata ngohengohe, he tangata whakapono hoki
He tangata pai te tumuaki hou. Māna e tōtika ake ai taua whakahaere.
He tangata pakari te korokē nei; he toa kai pakanga hoki
He tangata parahaere tērā - kāore e noho roa ki te wāhi kotahi.
He tangata paruheti.
He tangata pehu, e pōhēhē ana kei runga noa atu ia i ētahi atu.
He tangata pokerenoa - kāore e whai whakaaro ki ngā pānga o tāna e mahi rā ki a ia tonu, ki ētahi atu rānei.
He tangata popohe engari kei reira mō te karawhiu i tana piana.
He tangata pukuriri, ka tere hū mō te kore noa iho te take.
He tangata punarua tērā, me te pai o tā rātou noho tahi ko ana wāhine e rua, kāore he hae, kāore he aha.
He tangata purotu, engari mō te māikoiko - ka aroha kē!
He tangata pākehakeha tērā ki te haka, he rite ki te heihei!
He tangata pōturi ki te mahi, engari he tika te mahi.
He tangata pūhihi noa te hanga o Pōkiha, he tangata tū takotako, tau kē nei hoki ki te mau kaka
He tangata pūkeke, he upoko mārō, kaua noa koe e whakapau i ō kaha ki te kukume i ana whakaaro.
He tangata pūkeke, me uaua ia ka neke mai i te whakaaro kua totoka ki roto i a ia.
He tangata pūkenga ēnei ki te whakatere waka haere moana
He tangata rangatira ia ki ana taonga, arā, ki ana kai e ngakia ai e tōna ringa, he ngahora noa atu mā ōna hoa
He tangata rapa au ki te hī ika, ka hemo te whānau i te matekai mēnā ko au e hī ika ana ko tōku kotahi.
He tangata rauhanga - ahakoa nāna te mahi kino, e pōhēhē whānuitia ana nā tangata kē.
He tangata raweke rawa, otirā he rangatira tū marae.
He tangata rikarika - e kore rawa ia e kotiti i roto i āna mahi.
He tangata rongonui a Te Kōti, nā te mea nāna ētahi mahi mīharo.
He tangata rorirori - kāore e mutu tana pahupahu me tana katakata ki a ia anō.
He tangata takahi manuhiri, he marae puehu
He tangata takapau pōkai tērā, he kaipaoe.
He tangata takapau pōkai, he tihoi, kāore ōna kāinga tūturu.
He tangata taruweka, he haunga, kāore e whakaaro ki tana āhua.
He tangata tauhena - e whā putu noa iho pea te teitei.
He tangata taumata rau - e tika ana anō kia tae ake te nuipuku ki tana tangihanga.
He tangata tawhiti tonu - e ono ngā hipi i tukuna e ia ki te marae mō te tangihanga o Hina, kāore he utu.
He tangata tetere tonu - he pakupaku rawa pea tēnā hūtu mōna.
He tangata tino houhare taku pāpā, e mahi ana ia i ngā hāora katoa o te awatea.
He tangata tino pukumahi, he ringa raupā, he ringa māngonge.
He tangata tino whai rawa tētahi, he ouou nei ngā rawa o tētahi
He tangata toa, he tangata kaha, otirā he tangata tino aroha, he tangata ngāwari, engari ka riri ana, murara ana te ahi
He tangata toheriri, engari he taha ngāwari anō tōna.
He tangata tourepa, he takapau pōkai.
He tangata turi - tika mai, hē mai, ka mau tonu ki tāna.
He tangata tāroaroa tonu, engari kāore i kātata ki te tāroa o tana pāpā.
He tangata tērā ka ū ki tāna i kī ai, koinei au e raumahara nei i tana kore e puta mai.
He tangata tōkeke, ka ū tonu ki tāna e mōhio rā kei te tika, kāore e tuohu.
He tangata tōtōā i ana moni ki te petipeti, ki te inuinu.
He tangata tōwenewene, he pākiki.
He tangata tūai ahakoa tana kaha ki te kai.
He tangata tūpato tērā ki ngā rāwaho katoa - he 'kakī whero'.
He tangata uraura ka tū ana ia ki te haka - whakamataku ana!
He tangata uruhau - kāore koe e rongo i a ia e amuamu ana mō ngā mea kāore e taea ana e ia.
He tangata urupū ki te mahi, e kore e mārangaranga
He tangata whai rawa ia, engari kāore e mutu tana kōhaehae i ngā taonga a tana hoa tata.
He tangata whai tara a Tūwhakairiora
He tangata whakahīhī a Tama, ki tāna ko ia te tīmatanga me te mutunga o ngā mea katoa.
He tangata whakaiti i a ia, engari i a ia te hinengaro atamai me te wairua whakakatakata
He tangata whakakakao, kāore e mōhio ki te whakaaro ki ētahi atu.
He tangata whakakatakata, tinihanga hoki te āhua o Wī Whitu
He tangata whakariro kōrero ia
He tangata whakatarapī ia, he tangata whakapehapeha
He tangata whakawiriwiri tērā, kia kai waipiro ka kitea.
He tangata whanewhane, he poto te wiki.
He tangata wāwāhi tahā, hei aha māna te ara rīroa, ngā whakaaro rīroa.
He tangi nā Hinekaukia mō tōna tamaiti i wera i te ahi ki Kererūhuahua, kei te takiwā o Waipaoa, kei roto o Tūranga
He tangi nā Tawaputa mō ana tamariki i mate i te pāhoro i Te Whetūmatarau
He tangi nā te Kahukore mō tana kete huri i pirau
He tangi tupua te mea i whakamataku i ngā tamariki i te pō.
He tangi tā te tamaiti, he whakamā tō te pāhake
He tangi tēnei nāna mō tana tama mō Te Waikari i mate tara ā-whare, ā, i whakapaea he mea whaiwhaiā
He tangihanga, he mārena, he hui rangatahi ētahi o ngā kaupapa kawea nuitia ai i tō mātou marae.
He tangitangi tonu te pēpē ka pāpāria e te kuku.
He taniwha aungarea, he kai tangata.
He taniwha horo waka, ka tirepa te waka ruanui
He taniwha kei te puna kōroto o te awa, he rua kāniwhaniwha.
He taniwha te mea e huna nei i te tangata o tēnei huarahi
He tanoi tōku mate
He tao huata e taea te karo, he tao kī, e kore e taea
He tao kī, e kore e taea te karo, he tao rākau, ka taea anō te karo
He tao rākau e taea te karo; he tao kī e kore e taea
He taonga hoatu noa, kāore i tukuna i runga i te whakaaro me utu ki te moni, ki te aha atu rānei.
He taonga kirihou kei tētahi tāruru, he taonga maitai kei tētahi.
He taonga nui te aroha nā rātou, nō nāianei kua waimeha kua matoke haere taua mea te aroha i a tātou
He taonga ohooho rawa atu te reo Māori.
He taonga taketake tēnei nā ngā tūpuna mai iho, mai iho.
He taonga te Kīngitanga hei whakakotahi i ngā iwi
He taonga te mūrere, he taonga anō te ringa raupā.
He taonga tongarerewa, me āta rauhī kia kore ai e whatungarongaro.
He taonga tuku mai i tawhiti ki te mana o te hoa, ki konā, e tāne, tāwheta mai ai
He taonga tākaro te pōtaka me te papa wīra, he taonga puoro te pūtōrino me te piana.
He taonga whakatangitangi tino pai te pūpū harakeke.
He taparau katoa te tapatoru, te taparima, te tapawaru, te tapa-ngahuru-mā-rua.
He tapatoru te hanga o ngā tauira niho taniwha o te tukutuku.
He tapatoru te kōmaru, ko te koki o raro te taketake.
He tapawhā rite ngā aikiha e haeanatia ana e ia, he tapawhā hāngai ngā perakēhi.
He tapawhā te aikiha, he tapawhā te papa tākaro whutupaoro, he tapawhā anō te taimana.
He tapawhā, he rererua te kōuma i hangā e rātou: kotahi whanganga a te ringa te roa, kotahi hoki whanganga te whānui, he mea rererua
He tapeke autaia tonu te whā rau i te kēmu kirikiti.
He tapu hoki tō te hunga kua kaipāwetia?
He tapu ngā rua kōiwi, he tapu ngā taumatua, he tapu ngā tūhinapō
He tapu te whare pupuke, nā reira e kore e taea e te tangata noa iho te kuhu ki roto.
He tapu tēnei kaha a Tuota
He taputapu māmā te hua ki te whakamahi, engari tana mahi, ko te mutunga mai o te whai take.
He taputapu ngaki māra anō āna?
He tara kei te hiku o te rau karamea.
He taraka e paeroa mai ana i te huarahi, e aukati ana i te rere o ngā waka.
He taraka tino papai ngā taraka e pākarukarungia nei
He taramārō i whatiwhati ai ngā rākau - me uaua ka pērā te ahunga mai o te hau i tēnei kāinga.
He tarariki tēnei, e kore e mao wawe.
He tarawai te kai a te matua kihikihi, ka momia e ia i ngā paiaka o te rākau.
He taringa hōhō
He taringa kōroiroi, koinā e kore nā e mau i a ia ngā kupu o te waiata.
He taringa puta kore, he taringa muhukai
He taringa whitirua tō tangata! He mea peita noa atu ngā taringa!
He tata ki te kotahi rau tāra te utu.
He tau a Te Rangikāheke ki te wetewete kupu, ki te waihanga kōrero hoki
He tau hua, e nui ana te kai.
He tau humi, he tau harikoa.
He tau humi, he tau ngahiri te kūmara.
He tau humi, kei te koha te kai.
He tau kai tēnei, e kī ana ngā rua, ngā pātaka.
He tau mutu, he iwi makuhea.
He tau mō te patu hei whakananawe ki te ringa mau ai
He tau oho
He tau tukuroa, he puku tautau.
He tau tōraro te -1 me te -4, he tau tōrunga te 1 me te 4.
He tau tōrunga te 1 me te 4, he tau tōraro te -1 me te -4.
He taua pea tērā, inā hoki ngā pū ka uira mai nei
He taua tōpuni, me he uru kahika.
He tauhou ia ki te tāone nei, koirā ia i ngaro ai.
He tauhou tērā tangata ki a au - kāore anō au kia tūtaki ki a ia.
He tauhōkai anō e rere whakapae ana i waenga i ngā pou o te pakitara.
He tauira kōiheihe tēnā, ehara i te tauira tāruarua.
He tauira noa iho tēnei, kia whakaurua katoatia ngā whakatikatika, kia whakakīia ngā whāwhārua, ka puta ki te motu whānui.
He tauira tukutuku, he tauira whakairo anō te waewae pākura.
He tauira whai te motu kiwi, e whā taimana te hanga.
He taukehe te 5, te 27 me te 449.
He taumaha rawa ki a au ngā kōhatu nunui, engari ngā mea pakupaku, pai noa iho ki a au
He taumaha rawa te hiki i ngā kohatu nui, engari ngā kōhatu pohuka.
He taupuni nui tēnei nō ngā hapū o tēnei takiwā i ngā rā o mua. I haere mai ki konei mahi ika ai i ngā raumati .
He taura akuaku, me uaua ka motu.
He taura hītawetawe te taura mō te tauronarona kia tokomaha ai ngā tāngata ki ia taha.
He taurua te 2, te 76 me te 138.
He tautahi a Roimata; koia te manawa o tana whaea.
He tautangata tēnā korokē ki ahau, inā, kāore anō ahau kia kite, kia tūtaki rānei ki a ia.
He tautīnei i ngā ture a te Kauhanganui, he whakapūmau i te rongomau me te whakatau raruraru ētahi o ngā mahi hei mahinga māna
He tawhetawhe kau ngā kaka o te kaipaoe.
He teatea, he pango te wāhi whakatangitangi o te piana.
He teitei ake a Aoraki i a Ruapehu.
He teitei ake te pāmahana toharite i Muriwhenua, tēnā i Murihiku.
He teitei rawa te rere o ngā tira o tō motukā - ka pura noa te hunga kei tērā taha o te huarahi e haere ana.
He teitei tonu te whare tūhoa o tō mātou whare karakia.
He teka, he patē kau - kaua e arohia atu.
He tekoteko whakairo kei runga i te hihi o tō mātau tupuna whare.
He tere ake te poka tata mā te awa, tēnā i te piki me te heke i te hiwi.
He tere nō te rere o te awa, me te nui o te paru i kīia ai te awa nei he awa kauehu.
He tiaki tonu hoki tāna i te kāinga i ia rā, i ia rā
He tika he waka tapu a Tākitimu, he tāne anake ngā tāngata o runga
He tika katoa ngā mahara o te wheteke mō tana ohinga, engari mō ngā mahi o nanahi noa iho nei, e tama, ka aroha kē.
He tika te kī nā te Māori ngā mahi taumaha o te Motu i mahi i aua rā. Ka reka nei hoki te moni, ka mātoke te pukumahi o te Māori
He tika, e karakia katoa ana ki te Atua. Engari tērā anō ngā rerekētanga
He tikanga anō mō ngā rā takitoru. I tētahi takitoru (rā 1, 2, 3), i hangā ngā wāhi. I tētahi takitoru (rā 4, 5, 6), i hangā ngā kainoho i aua wāhi
He tikanga nōnamata, kua kore i kawea i ngā rautau tata nei.
He tikanga pora te mau kaka pango i te tangihanga - ehara i te tikanga Māori tūturu nei.
He tikanga rerekē tērā ki a mātou - e kore rawa e kitea tērā āhua i te hau kāinga.
He tikanga tawhito te hahu tūpāpaku.
He tikanga tino kino tēnei, me takahi rawa ki raro
He tikanga tāukiuki tērā nā ngā mātua tūpuna.
He tikanga tēnei te whakarekereke i te pā, kia riro mai ngā kai me ngā mea katoa a te hoariri.
He tiketike moana e kore e taea, tēnā he tiketike maunga ka taea
He tiketike tonu ngā paerewa o taua kura, taha mātauranga nei. Ko te tino nuinga o ngā ākonga e puta pai ana i ngā whakamātautau o te motu.
He tima i paeārau ki Kereimauta. Ko Mapourika te ingoa
He tina ki runga, he tāmore ki raro
He tinana pāhura tō te pekapeka.
He tinana pāuaua, he tinana ora!
He tini ki te whakawahi i ngā waka ki te kōkōwai
He tini māioio ngā ika kei roto i te kupenga.
He tini ngerongero ngā momo tipu puta noa i te ao.
He tini noa iho ngā iwi i te ao; ko ētahi e tere haere ana, ko ētahi e tau noa iho ana - kāore kau e paneke
He tini noa iho ngā tāngata o reira. He maha ngā tāone, pūputu tonu te whare
He tini noa iho rātou i mate i ngā kauhanga riri i tāwāhi.
He tini pātere ngā whetū i te rangi.
He tini te pekerangi hei huna i te tangata ka ngaro ki te kore rā
He tini whakarere o te ngārara whakapau kai, e kainga ana e aua manu e mauria mai nei e te Pākehā ki uta nei
He tino anahera taku tuakana, ko au kē te hātana.
He tino ara te reo rotarota e whakapuaki ai te tangata wahangū i ana whakaaro.
He tino hoa rāua - e kore e hipa he rā me te kore e kōrero tahi i te waea.
He tino hōhonu te moana, he roa, he whānui hoki, e kaha ai te huna o ngā momo ika katoa
He tino kai nā te Hapanihi te ika mangungu.
He tino kai nā te Māori te kōura meramera me te kānga meramera.
He tino kai te aruhe ki te Māori o neherā.
He tino kai te aruhe para, engari anō te pehapeha.
He tino kai te ika kōmata.
He tino kai te karengo i ngā wāhi kore karengo, e penapenatia ana mā ngā manuhiri.
He tino kai te para, engari anō te kakanui.
He tino kai te roi nā te Māori o nehe; ināianei kua tahuri ki te rīwai, ki te parāoa.
He tino kai te whakamara kua mahia ki te pikopiko.
He tino kaumātua rāua tahi. Kua hina kē ō rāua māhunga pēnei i tōku
He tino kete - he kete whakairo, he kete putuputu.
He tino kupu te tope mō te tuhi matakura i te rae, i te pāpāringa
He tino kēmu te pekepeke taura me te hītokitoki i a au e tamariki ana.
He tino mate te kohi kei te Māori, kei te whakamamae kei te whakapōuri i a ia, kei te iki hoki i ōna whanaunga ki te pō
He tino mōhio a Hutu ki te tekateka niti
He tino mōmona te oneone o konei, he pai hei māra kai.
He tino ngingita te kāpia.
He tino nui ngā tohutoro whai mana i whakarārangihia mai e te kairangahau.
He tino nui taku ngariri mōu e taku tau.
He tino nui te mīharo o ā rātou kōrero engari ko ngā kōrero i tino kaha te maunga i a au ko ā Tā Āpirana Ngata
