He tino nui whakaharahara te tangihanga i tangi ai rātou ki reira: e whitu hoki ngā rā i uhungatia ai e ia tōna papa
He tino pai ki a au te kāroti, ahakoa tunua, ahakoa wheo.
He tino pai ki a au te purini kua kīnakitia ki te kirīmi.
He tino pai ki a au tō mātau rōpū
He tino pai te kōhine nāna i whakaari a tuawahine - tata heke ana ngā roimata o te hunga mātaki.
He tino pai te mahi a tama ki te ahu i tana kūao hipi.
He tino pai te rākau rā, kāre ōna pūmanga.
He tino pai te takawai mō te hanga oka, ā, i whakamahia nuitia i te wā e patupatua ana te moa.
He tino pai tā kōrua tama, he mōhio ki te whakarongo, tēnā ko tāhaku, he taringa kōhatu kē.
He tino pai tō mahi e tama.
He tino poniponi te pēpē i te whānautanga mai engari kua kunekune haere ināianei.
He tino poupou te aupikinga ki te keo.
He tino reka rawa taua merengi ki te erepata, te kurī e kīia ana ko te rangatira ia o te ngāherehere
He tino rerekē te oranga o ngā kararehe kōwao i ērā kua whakapoporetia hei mōkai.
He tino rerekē tētahi i tētahi, he ihupiro te tuakana, he mūrere, he hīanga te teina.
He tino ririki te karihi engari he whana tōrunga tōna.
He tino roa ngā ngutu o te kiwi.
He tino rongoā te koromiko mō te mate tikotiko.
He tino rongoā te pūhā, te wai pūhā rānei mō te timo a te katipō.
He tino rākau a Tānemahuta - neke atu i te rima tekau mita te tītike.
He tino tangata ia mō te oma, inā hoki te tuakaka o ōna hūhā.
He tino tangata tērā, he manu taupua, he rangatira nui nō konei.
He tino tangi ēnei, ahakoa potopoto, nō te takere o te ngākau
He tino taonga te hiko, heoi anō tā tātou he pēhi i te pātene kua kā mai ngā tūrama.
He tino taonga te māripi i te kīhini, i te ngahere, i tātahi, i hea ake rānei.
He tino taonga te tapa i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, he papanga ka mahia mai ki te hiako o te aute, he mea āta pehu kia angiangi.
He tino taonga tongarewa tā Kōtiro, nā tana koroua i hoatu ki a ia.
He tino tapu rawa te tipuaki o te tangata, otirā te upoko katoa.
He tino taputapu te kani ki te kāmura.
He tino tau kē nei te tiaki a Maria Tōpia i tōna whare, hīti whakapaipai rawa mō ngā moenga manuhiri
He tino wera ngā whenua e tata ana ki te weheruatanga o te ao.
He tino whakaahua ātaahua ki a rātou ngā maunga, ngā pukepuke, ngā ngahere, ngā kapua, ngā pārae e hīpokina nei e ngā tarutaru matomato
He tio te hanga totoka o te wai.
He tioata te taimana, te kora tote me te kora huka.
He tipirori rawa atu te hanga o tana kete tuatahi.
He tipu puiaki.
He tipuna kaha tērā ki te torotoro whenua hou.
He tipuna rongonui tērā, he tipuna mōhio ki ngā kōrero o mua, ki te takutaku whakapapa.
He tira haere toa kore, he kai nā te urumaranga.
He titi rawa te ara nei mō te paihikara - me haere mā raro.
He titiro kau atu ana ki ngā ngutu o te tangata e tametame ana, e pēhea rānei ngā kupu
He tiwa paru i tana hāte mā.
He tiwha nui kai te rae, he mā kai te matamata o te ihu, e toru waewae mā, he raho poka, he hōiho āhua nui
He tiwha whero nui tonu kei te mata o Hineitīweka.
He toa a Te Pairi ki te mau rākau, ā, ko te taiaha me te toki poutangata tāna i tino matatau ai
He toa a Tiki ki te tākaro nei, ahakoa tōna wheto.
He toa aha tōu toa?
He toa e whaiātia ko te pōtiki na Tūwhakairihau!
He toa paheke, ko te rourou iti a Haere
He toa taua, he toa pāhekeheke
He toa taua, mā te taua, he toa piki pari, mā te pari, he toa ngaki kai, mā te huhu tēnā
He toa tō te oma, ko a mua hoki toa ai
He toa whakataetae kē nei tana hanga mai i te tinana, me tana hanga mārō mai anō hoki i ngā kikopuku
He toenga kai koe nāku.
He toenga te kai a te pōturi ki te tēpu.
He tohi anō mō te tāne, he tohi anō mō te wahine
He tohu aha tēnā hahana i ō whatu?
He tohu anō i te māhunga o taua tangata, he heru iwi, he piki, he kōtuku, he tohu nō te rangatira
He tohu anō i te ringa, he whakairo, he kurawaka te ingoa o taua whakairo ringaringa
He tohu anō i te ringaringa, he whakairo, he karawaka te ingoa o taua whakairo ringaringa
He tohu anō rā te hau tamawahine
He tohu hoki te Rīpeka nō tō tātou whakapono tapu hei whakamahara mō te aroha mau tonu o Te Karaiti i hoatu nei i a ia mō tātou
He tohu ora te mākurakura o te arero.
He tohu pai te pakora ki te tūmau o te wharekai.
He tohu parekura te pokapoka, he mea kari ki te whenua
He tohu pūmau te moko e kore e taea te kōmuku atu.
He tohu tana kiri tāingoingo i mahi ia i waho, i raro i te rā, mō ngā tau maha.
He tohu tērā i tēnei momo rewharewha, kua ngau te puku, me te parerori anō.
He tohunga a Uhia, ko ia hoki te kauwaka o Te Rehu-o-Tainui
He tohunga anō taku pāpā ki te pepe manu ki te rau karamū.
He tohunga ia ki te whatu kākahu, pēnei tonu i taku whaea nei.
He tohunga ki te tuhituhi, ki te whika. I mohio ia ki te rūri whenua, ki te tatau i ngā pō
He tohunga te tangata māretireti rā ki te hikihiki maitai.
He tohunga te tangata rā ki te mau kapu.
He tohunga tonu ia ki te kuru i ngā kōhatu papatahi kia ripi i te mata o te wai.
He tohunga tātai arorangi kei runga i te waka, nāna i ū pai ai te waka ki te whenua hou.
He tohunga tērā o ngā koroua o Tamainupō ā, māna e tohutohu mai tāna mokopuna ki te tikanga e ora ai ia
He tohutohu kia ngāwari te kōrero, kia hakahaka, kia tauwhena
He toi tupu, he toi ora, he toi i ahua mai i Hawaiki
He toka e whata mai ana i te onepū.
He toka kei reira e noho teko mai ana i te onepū.
He toka koropungapunga te pungapunga, koirā i māmā ai.
He toka māmā te pungapunga.
He toka pāwhatiwhati.
He tokai i mau ki ngā kīato, ko te kauhua i mau ki te tokai; kei runga i te kauhua te raho e whata ana
He toki ōnewa, hāpūpū mārire; kā pā tāu he mata toki pounamu, e tū te tātai o te whakairo.
He toki ōnewa, hāpūpū mārire; kāpā tāu he mata toki pounamu, e tū te tātai o te whakairo
He tokoiti iho te hunga mataero ka raru i ngā mate manawa, tēnā i te hunga mōmona.
He tokoiti ngā wāhine whai tamariki nohinohi i puta ki te mahi i ngā rā o mua, engari kua rerekē katoa i ēnei rā.
He tokoiti te hunga e mārama ana ki te tikanga o ngā karakia tawhito.
He tokoiti te hunga e taea ana e rātau te piki tērā aromaunga tākau.
He tokoiti te hunga ka taea e rātou te māero te oma i te rua meneti.
He tokoiti te hunga kōrero Pākehā i taua whenua, ko te reo Wīwī kē te reo o te tokomaha.
He tokomaha i mate i runga kaipuke i te noho āpuru, i te pūmāhu, i roto i ngā nohoanga whāiti
He tokomaha mātau, he kuia, he korokoroua te nuinga
He tokomaha ngā Māori kua rongo i te mamae i runga i te nama. E kī ana te whakataukī Pākehā, 'Pai atu te haere matekai ki te moe, i te maranga taimaha i te nama'
He tokomaha ngā tamariki Māori e puta ana i ngā whare wānanga, kua whiwhi i te mātauranga, kua hoki ki te kāinga hei māhita, hei tākuta, hei Āpiha Tokoiteora rānei
He tokomaha ngā tamariki o tana kura kua tarakura katoa ngā waewae.
He tokomaha ngā tāngata e kari kāpia ana i Te Tai Tokerau i tērā wā.
He tokomaha ngā tāngata e pai ana ki te pēkana me te hēki hei parakuīhi.
He tokomaha ngā tāngata i haere mai ki te whakarongo ki tā mātau pēne
He tokomaha ngā tāngata i reira e ruku kuku ana hei mōunu hī moki
He tokomaha ngā tāngata i tū ki te kōrero i te poukai, engari he tokoiti ngā pūkōrero.
He tokomaha ngā tāngata nunui o te ao, he hunga rawakore, engari nā te kaha ki te ako, ki te kōrero pukapuka ka tupu hei tāngata nunui whakaharahara
He tokomaha ngā tāngata o konei e ngaua momotetia ana e te mate
He tokomaha ngā wāhine ka heu i ngā huruhuru i ō rātou kēkē.
He tokomaha tonu mātou ki te kōwhiti pūpū.
He tokomaha tonu ngā mātua Māori i mutu ai tā rātau kōrero Māori ki ā rātau tamariki i te kāinga, i reira ka raru nui te reo Māori
He tokomaha tonu rātou ki te ā mai i ngā hōiho kūwao o taua koraha.
He tokorua pukungangare, te hia kore kē nei e mahue.
He tokotoko pōtete tō te koroua, nā tētahi o ana mokopuna i whakairo.
He tomokanga ānau tō te kura, he mea whakairo katoa.
He tona kei ngā rongomatua he kikī rawa nō ngā hū.
He tonatona kei taku kōiti he kikī rawa nō aku hū.
He tongarerewa ana mokotaniwha.
He tongi noa te waka rererangi e whakangaro ana ki te huapae.
He tongitongi te taha whakarunga o te kahawai.
He toretore kei te pī o te karu.
He toroa awe nui e kopa ana ia ki te muri
He toroa whakakoko nō runga i ngā hiwi
He torotoro te ingoa o ērā taura o ngā punga
He torutoru ngā tamariki e whānau ana hei tiriwā mō ngā tūpāpaku tokomaha noa atu
He torutoru noa iho ngā wāhi hei kōkuhu kūmara mā tāua.
He toto Māori anō ōna? Rangi: Engari tonu - he Māori te māmā.
He toto rere, he poketoto anō ētahi o ngā para i puta mai.
He tou areare anahe ka whāō i te kai.
He tua pure, he tohi, he tua kaha mō te riri, he tāngaengae kia hopu tangata ai, me ērā atu mahi
He tuakiri nihoniho, matapiko tōna, koinā i tokoiti ai ana hoa.
He tuanui haeoratū tō tō mātou whare karakia.
He tuarā kurī te tauira o ngā kakari o te whakairo.
He tuatahi kē tēnei mōna ki te hiki i te pēpē, koirā i rorirori ai. Taihoa ka taunga.
He tuhi, he rapa, he uira
He tumakuru take kore! Kāore e kore ka hoki ora mai ia i reira.
He tumoto nā Hineiturama mō Te Urewera
He tumutumu rākau parawera
He tuna kiri kōpuni te kirirua.
He tuna pāwhara katoa ērā e tautau mai nā i te tīepa.
He tungou te mahi a tōna māhunga ki a mātou, me te mimingo kata anō
He tungāne anō ōna.
He tupere kei runga, he tupere anō kei raro.
He tuporo i te pō, he waiata haere i te pō, he aituā
He tupua, he tangata kua eke i ngā taumata rau.
He turaki rākau, he wāwāhi whare ētahi o ngā mahi kino a te rōpu.
He turaki tangata, he turaki whānau, he turaki hapū tā te rewharewha kino o te tau 1918.
He ture nō te ao; ko ngā mea kaha ka piki, ko ngā mea kahakore ka heke, ka whakawātea i te kāinga mō te hunga kakama
He turi koia aku taringa, he papi koia aku kanohi
He tāekaeka te kakano o te tōtōweka.
He tāhei pango whānui tonu kei te tuarā o te poaka.
He tāhekeheke ngā huruhuru o te taika.
He tāhuna kei te mata o taua papanga - he āhua rite ki ngā huruhuru i te kiri o te hōiho.
He tāhuna nō runga, he maroke nō runga, he pakeke, kāhore he wai
He tāhune i te kōhungahungatanga, kia pakeke, kua pūhuruhuru.
He tāhune te herepuru i te wāhi e tūtaki ai te rauawa ki te tinana o te waka.
He tāingoingo te taha whakarunga o te kahawai.
He tākaro kāri te 'Rima Rau'.
He tākaro pai te tā pōtaka.
He tākaro takirua te Hipi Toitoi.
He tākaro takirua, ka riro mā tētahi e tuhi te hanga e whakaahuatia ana e tana hoa.
He tākiritanga kāinga
He tākupu horo hau, he kawau mārō, ē, he mōwhiti moe paru, ē, he honu manawa rahi; mā wai e ranga tō mate i te ao?
He tākuru te hua o te rīwai, kāore e kainga.
He tāmore toro ki tawhiti ō te herewhenua, ka toro ka pihi ake, ka toro ka pihi ake.
He tāmure nui tonu te ika i hīia tuatahitia mai, he mahi nui  e tukua anō ki a Tangaroa.
He tāne aroha, he wahine ahuwhenua, he tamaiti whakarongo
He tāngari kē te kākahu pai mō te kutētē kau.
He tāngengangenga tana here i te taura - me here anō kia ita.
He tāniko ngā pare o taua kapa.
He tāpahu nō Irawaru
He tārai, mō te panehe te tukou, mō te toki nui he tārai
He tāraro pipi
He tārawa moana, e kore e taea e koe te riri
He tāroa ka oti te tākiri, ka whenutia, hei whenu ēnā
He tāroa tonu tō rātou tupuna, taka mai ki ngā uretoa, he pērā anō.
He tārore paihamu ki te kati te oranga i taua wā.
He tātahi rawa ngā rākau o te taiepa - ka oma tonu ngā kurī.
He tātai tonu tērā nōna, te tīkapekape i tērā taha kia amowheke rawa rātou.
He tātai whetū a Tautoru me Matakāheru.
He tātaka ināianei, he huhu i mua atu, taihoa ka tunga rere.
He tātu parāoa, he pere tērā rākau o mua
He tāua a Mahuika, he tupuna nō Māui nō te taha ki te hākui
He tāwaho te tāuru i Te Tai Hauāuru.
He tīhi mā, kaha tonu te totetote ka mahia ki te waiū o te koati.
He tīhi te mea ka hangaia i tēnā wheketere.
He tīhohe tonu ngā māhuri, engari kia pakari ake, kua whatiwhati kau.
He tīkaokao tā tātou hapa ā te pō nei.
He tīkohu te waha o te ana.
He tītaha te tuhi o ngā ingoa momo o te kararehe, o te tipu - he kupu Rātini ēnei.
He tītapu e whakarākei ana i te pōtae.
He tītī, he pūhā tā mātou hapa i te pō rā.
He tītōhea nō te whenua i pūtoki ai ngā kai o te māra.
He tīwekaweka ngā whakapaipai o runga, kāore e ū ana ki te tauira mātāmua kotahi.
He tō ā-papa anō tō te marama, engari ko tētahi hauono noa iho o te kaha o tō Papatūānuku, i te mea he iti noa ake te marama i a Papatūānuku.
He tōhi wera taku parakuīhi, he kore nōku e kaha ki te moumou kai.
He tōkini tō te wahine, he ure tō te tāne.
He tōpuku te pito whakarunga o taku tokotoko kia pai ai te pupuri.
He tōpuku tonu ngā hua o te karamū.
He tōpuni te kahu, he parāoa te rākau
He tōrino te waero o te poaka.
He tōtara ngā kurupae o raro i te papa o te whare.
He tōtara ngā pou o te taiapa tuaukiuki nei.
He tōtara nui a Te Rangihouhiri rāua ko Tamapahore nō Ngāi Te Rangi.
He tōtiti, he taewa kōrengarenga - koirā taku tino kai.
He tōwāwahi tonu ōna hū, inā hoki he hōia ia.
He tū ki roto o te moana, he tū kōpiri
He tū tahanga kāore ōna whakamā; e kore e piko ki matau, ki mauī
He tūingoa katoa te 'kōtiro', te 'kurī', te 'kapua' me te 'kare ā-roto'.
He tūmahi poro te kupu 'maremare', te 'tupu' me te 'iri'.
He tūmahi whiti te kupu 'tapahi', i te mea kāore te tangata e tapahi noa - me tapahi rawa ia 'i' tētahi mea, pērā i te parāoa, i te rākau, i te aha atu.
He tūmū e wehe ana i ngā koko e rua.
He tūnguru katoa ngā toka o tēnei takutai - pai noa iho te haere kore hū i runga.
He tūpato nō ngā tohunga kei āpititia ki te kai
He tūpā waka
He tūranga karioi tōna - kāore e rite ki ētahi rā kei te mahi ā-kirimana wā poto noa iho nei.
He tūranga kua waimeha; ko tā te tangata e hiahia ai ko tana tamaiti hei tākuta, hei rōia, hei karaka, hei mea ake, hei mea ake engari kaua hei minita
He tūru motuhake tō te kōngahungahu ka haere ana ia mā runga waka.
He tūtata māua, hai irāmutu ki a au
He tūtau te 'tahi' me te 'rua'.
He tūtei e tū ana i te kēti, e kati ana i te tomokanga ki roto.
He tūtei e tū ana i te tarawaha o te pēke.
He tūtei kei te tomotomokanga o te whare taonga, kei tūpono tahuri tētahi ki te tāhae i ngā taonga o roto.
He tūtika te hiku o te nuinga atu o ngā ika, engari he hiku pae tō te ika moana.
He tūtuki tāmaki tōna
He tūtū taua rākau; ko Te Rua-o-Tāne te ingoa; nō Te Pouwhenua taua tūtū
He tūāhu uruuru tapu ēnā, whakahoro rānei i ngā tapu o ētahi tāngata
He tūāhuru te pō nei, mō te pō uhi te ao o te rangi, koia te pō tūāhuru
He tūākura ngā rau maroke o te rarauhe.
He tūātea ki te moana, he kapua ki te rangi.
He ua tā whakarere, he horo whenua te mutunga iho.
He uaua ka tū a Te Rangi Hīroa ki te kōrero i te wā e whakawhitiwhiti whakaaro ana te Pāremata, erangi me ka kite ia e karawhiua ana te Māori, ka riro mā tana riri ia e wero kia tū
He uaua rawa te heru i ō makawe tete nei!
He uaua te hīkoi haere i te paenga tāwhaowhao i te marae o Hinekirikiri.
He uaua te karo i te pātai mākoi.
He uaua te kati i te kūaha katote.
He uaua te kite atu i ngā moutere i ētahi wā, he pua nō ngā rangi takurua.
He uaua te kite i ngā moutere o waho i ngā rangi mataauahi.
He uaua te kite nā te mātotoru o te kōkōuri e puta mai ana i te whare e pau ana i te ahi.
He uaua te kore e hoatu maramara ki te kurī e mōtiro kai ana māna.
He uaua te kuhu atu i te miro ki te kōhao o te ngira mēnā e kōwhiti ana te ringa.
He uaua te kukume i te kupenga, nā te kī i te tini o te ika.
He uaua te tuhi i runga i te pepamārō tāwakawaka.
He uaua te tū i te rahoraho ka tukoki ana te waka.
He uaua te wewete i ngā pātene iti mēnā e tino makariri ana ngā ringaringa.
He uaua te whakahoe i te hunga e mate ana i te hiakai.
He uaua te whakamāori i tēnei mea, te mana.
He uaua te whakapono i umikitia e rāua te moana i runga i tētahi waka pērā rawa te pakupaku.
He uaua te wāhi i te rākau rīrapa, engari anō te rākau aritahi.
He uaua te wāwāhi i te rākau pūioio ki te toki noa.
He uaua tonu te tā mai i te ānau o te koru kia tino tika.
He umu tangata te tuhi nei
He unahi kau te tuarā, he mārō. E kore e ngoto te hoari, te tao rānei
He upokotaua, kāore tonu te hoariri i paku mōhio taihoa rātou ka parekuratia.
He uri katoa nōku ngā mea o tērā iwi, inā kotahi tonu tō mātau tipuna kuia.
He uri koutou nā Tamatea, kua huaina ki tō koutou rohe te ingoa o tō koutou tipuna
He uri pea tana wahine uru tūrehu nō Warahoe.
He uri te tae o ngā rau pakari o te kawakawa.
He uru māwhai ō ētahi, he uru torotika ō ētahi, he uru pūtētete anō ō ētahi.
He uru rākau e tipu ana i te tihi o te toroī rā.
He urukehu ngā huruhuru, i puta mai hoki i a Kahuwaero me tana whaiāipo he tūrehu
He urukehu wherowhero nei ōna makawe, ā, he rite kē nei tōna āhua ki tōna tupuna tāne Pākehā
He urukōwhao noa te kopenutanga o te tou o tō waka - ko te mea nui kē kāore i aituā he tangata.
He utukore te uru atu ki te papa rēhia mō te tamaiti i raro iho i te tekau tau te pakeke.
He uwha taua hōiho - he whero te āhua, he mā te ngutu
He uwha te kūao, me waiho kia haere tahi rāua ko te kātua i te awatea, na, i te pō ka wehea
He uwha whero tūāpōuri nei; he mā te rae puta iho ki te ihu
He wae haere ka kaihora ki te tī, ki te tā.
He waea pūkoro anō tāhau?
He waea pūkoro anō tāu?
He waetea te tangata nei
He waewae pore tōna, koinā i totitoti ai.
He waewae turihaka.
He waewae turipū
He waha i pā mai, 'Taku wahine purotu!' 'Taku tāne purotu!'
He wahie, he waro ngā rawa matua e kā ai ngā ahi tunu kai i ngā rā o mua.
He wahine aroha ki ngā tāngata ko ngā māra tūmatanui o te tāone tō rātou kāinga, ko ngā kākahu he petapeta, kei te takahi o te rākau te moenga.
He wahine e haere atu ana ia ata ki te whakapai i te whare o te paioke.
He wahine harakoakoa te tuakiri, he pai ki te tangata, me te pai anō o te tangata ki a ia.
He wahine huamutu, koirā i whakaritea ai ki ana irāmutu kē ana taonga ina mate ia.
He wahine hākere - me uaua ka hokona e ia he rāwhara hei tautoko i ngā kaupapa e kawea ana e te hapori.
He wahine i mau tonu te whakariri o te ngākau mō te 'Pākehā tāhae'
He wahine kutekute, he whare riko.
He wahine manaaki i ngā pononga a te Atua
He wahine manawa kaha a Ngāhirapu, he wahine matatika tū teitei. I
He wahine manawanui a Kiri, e kore ia e tere hōhā i ngā mahi heahea a ngā tamariki.
He wahine mataku heahea noa iho nei, nā reira kāore e pā atu te ringa ki te pēke hāwareware kei roto ngā tuna.
He wahine matapā, e kore rawa e hapū.
He wahine matatau ki ana tamariki.
He wahine matatoua, he warea ki tāna i hiahia ai.
He wahine matemate tonu, kātahi ka hē atu i tana huangō.
He wahine ngangahau i te wā o tōna taiohinga, ā, he āhua maha tonu ana ipo rangitahi
He wahine ngarengare tērā - kāore e mutu tana tohutohu i a mātou kia pēnei, kia pērā.
He wahine ngākau mahara, he marere, he nihowera i āna mahi manaaki i ōna whanaunga, i ōna hoa Māori me te tini noa atu o te Pākehā
He wahine nipi a Hine, e rima putu noa iho te tāroa, e rima tekau kirokaramu tana taumaha.
He wahine pai taua kōtiro nei he roa ia, he wāwhatu te makawe, he kiritea; ko te tinana koia anō kei tētahi koare nei te pai, me te ngohe noa
He wahine pai, he aroha ki te tangata, mohemohe noa ngā kanohi.
He wahine pukupā, engari he tokomaha ana whāngai.
He wahine pukupā, kāore e puta i a ia he kea.
He wahine pūioio tērā - he hikihiki maitai nōna.
He wahine raureka, he wahine tāhae whenua.
He wahine rongonui e nui ana te kitea o te kanohi i ngā uhi moheni.
He wahine tahiti - kāore e mutu tana hoatu kai, kākahu, aha atu ki te rawakore.
He wahine tahiti, muia ana tōna whare e te tāngata.
He wahine tainanakia, he pai ki a ia kia tutū te puehu.
He wahine te mea i pura ai te kanohi o Tahuaroa
He wahine tino whakamanuhiri tēnei ki ngā tāngata katoa e tae ana ki tōna kāinga
He wahine toukohi, whakarērea.
He wahine tāroa tonu a Hinga - e ono putu te roa.
He wahine tēnei ka weto noa iho, koirā i kīia ai he tangi weto.
He wahine tū ia ki te kōrero Māori i ngā wā katoa, i ngā wāhi katoa.
He wahine tū rangatira te āhua. He ngākau mākoha, he mihimihi ki ia āhua o te tangata. He puiaki ki a ia te karanga i te tangata kia peka ki tōna kāinga
He wahine upoko mārō, ka ū tonu ki tāna ahakoa ngā inoi a ētahi.
He wahine whakamau tērā - ki te hēngia e koe, kua kore e kōrero ki a koe mō āke tonu atu.
He wahine whīroki a Tūī, he omaoma haere nōna ki hea, ki hea.
He wahine āhua pai tōna kanohi, ko te mea tērā i moe ai a Paoa i a ia
He wahine ātaahua a Ruapūtahanga, he urukehu, he kiritea, he puhi hoki nō ngā iwi o runga i a Aotea
He wai haranu ngā wai o konei, he wai purata ngā wai o te kāinga.
He wai iti hoki kei te takere kau o te ipu
He wai kei te kamo whakarehurehu ai ki te tāne
He wai mano whenua, ratarata ana.
He wai mongamonga tērā i roto i te wheua e ngongia nei
He wai māori ngā wai o Taupō-nui-a-Tia me Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu.
He wai para horo
He wai puehu e kore e hokia e te pātiki.
He wai purotu, ka kitea atu te takere o te awa.
He wai pūataata rawa te wai, e kitea noatia ana te ika nunui o taua awa e kai ana i te māunu
He wai tūao te wai nei; mao rawa ake te ua, kua mutu te waipuke
He waiata tangi tēnei nāna mō tōna tuakana mō Te Huhu, i mate koeo ki te Waimako
He waiata whakaoriori nā Te Heuheu mō tana kōtiro, mō Ngeru
He waiata whakatoi tēnei nā Ngā Puhi, i te mea ka warea te iwi Māori ki ngā taonga hou mai a te Pākehā, ka riro te whenua
He waiata āhuareka tonu, kāore i tiotio ki te taringa.
He waikawa anō kei te puku, koia e wāwāhi ana i ngā kai.
He waimarie kua kōipuipu - kua kore tātou e tīkākā.
He waiporoporo, he mā ngā kākahu tīepa o te minita.
He wairakau hoki te mea e warowaro ai te tupu
He wairua e rere ana, e oreore ana i ngā tamariki a Tāne korekau i ētahi atu mea
He wairua ātaahua tō te tamaiti rā.
He wairākau hoki te mea e warowaro ai te tupu
He wairākau pararopi tēnei - he otaota, he hamuti heihei anahe ngā mea o roto.
He waka eke noa
He waka hī ika nui tērā e whakamātauhia ana e te moana hīnarunaru.
He waka ka ākahukahu i te pae.
He waka kuaka
He waka noa iho. Ko te mea nui kāore i aituāhia ko koe.
He waka nui, taimaha tonu he hēra tō runga e riro ai mā te hau e pupuhi haere
He waka pāhakehake.
He waka pūhoi
He waka ruarangi tonu te Aratere - kotahi mano tāngata pea ka eke ki runga.
He waka tautaka, he waka tikoki nui.
He waka tā te Māori, he kaipuke tā te Pākehā. He paoi patu aruhe tā tētahi, he mira tā tētahi. Waihoki he ritenga anō ō te Māori i mua, he ture anō, ā, e mau nei anō; ā, he ture anō tō te Pākehā
He waka tō e ārahi ana i ngā kaipuke kia tomo pai mai i te kūwaha o te whanga.
He waka tōtō kau, he waka pītau, kāore he rauawa
He waka utanga rau te haere nei au, te tīwai haere a Pūataata hei kawe ki te tuku
He wana. Kāore e wana te titiro atu i te kakano kotahi, e rua rānei, tēnā ki te toru, ka nui te wana
He wara noa iho tēnei, e kore au e aro atu.
He wareware nōhoku, kīhai tāua i whītikia mai e ia ki te whītiki tamarua
He wawara taua pea tēnei ka tata mai
He wawata nā roto ki taku kahurangi kua ngaro nei i te tirohanga kanohi.
He wene, he wene, he wene noa atu
He wera te kīhini me te kī i te kakara o ngā kai pai
He werawera, he hinu ngā mea nui ka puta i ngā putaputa o te kiri tangata.
He weriweri te whatu nā, he ngekingeki, he karawhiti nō ngā io
He whai ara rōnaki ngā whare tūmatanui kia taea ai e te hunga turingongengonge te hou atu ki roto.
He whai kupenga te tarawhiti ka whakamahia mō te poitūkohu.
He whai mō te tangata wera i te ahi kia mahu ai
He whai peka huhua ngā rākau katoa o konei - e kore e kitea he mea hahore.
He whai tā Tuka i a Te Kahu hei wahine māna
He whai wīra anō te mīhini tāmiro wūru a taku kōkā.
He whaiāipo noa, kāore anō rāua kia mārenatia.
He whakaaetanga tēnei i waenganui i a Kuīni Wikitōria me ētahi rangatira Māori
He whakaahua motuhēhē tērā nā taua ringatoi rongonui, nā te ringa tāwhai rānei i mahi mai?
He whakaaro ohia noa ake nāku
He whakaaro tupurangi
He whakaatu tēnā kei aro noa ngā taringa rahirahi ki te whakarongo i ngā kōrero horihori a aua Māori nā rātou nei ngā kōrero tinihanga
He whakaatu tēnā kei aro noa ngā taringa rahirahi ki te whakarongo i ngā kōrero horihori a aua Māori, nā rātou nei ngā kōrero tinihanga
He whakaaturanga tēnei nāku i ngā mahi a ōku kauwheke, he mea heke iho i ō rātou nā whakatipuranga
He whakahaere tēnei e mahi ana ki te whakapakari i te hunga e mahi ana mō te hauora ā-hinengaro Māori
He whakahoro i ngā taringa, i ngā mahara o ngā ākonga kua uru nei ki te whare wānanga
He whakahorohoro taratahi
He whakairo tōrino te pītau.
He whakairo tūārangi ērā nō ngā wā o ngā Moriori.
He whakakai kei taku toke mauī e tautau ana.
He whakakai, he kuru, he ngutu huia ētahi o ngā mau taringa o mua.
He whakakake nō tōu ngākau i pohewa ai koe
He whakakitenga toi rongonui a Te Maori i whakatūria i ngā tau o ngā waru tekau.
He whakakohikohi kei te anga o te tāwera.
He whakakuene tā mātou ki a koe, arā he kākahu mō mātou
He whakamihi kōpūrau kē pea tāna, i te mea mai anō tana pūhaehae ki taua wahine.
He whakamihi nāhaku ki te ētita o Te Puke, ka nui te kaha ki te mahi i te taonga o te iwi, i te mea he taitamariki rawa koe, me ō hoa mahi i tō mātau taonga
He whakamā te take e kore ai e hamumu tana waha.
He whakamāori kōrero te kaupapa matua o tana pakihi.
He whakamārama mai tēnei i te iti noa iho o te hara o te tangata ki ā rātou tāngata anō, ina whakaritea ki ngā hara o te tangata ki te Atua
He whakamārama ērā i ngā hahau a te panehe, a te toki rānei
He whakamōhio noa ake tēnei kua hurihia ngā rā e tū ai te kura tuarua kua whakaritea mō tēnei tau
He whakanui i ngā wāhine Māori o roto i ngā tau kua whakapau i ō rātou kaha ki ngā take pāpori, ā, ki ngā take ohaoha, hei painga mō tātou, mō te iwi Māori, otirā mō ngā iwi katoa o Aotearoa
He whakanānā anō tētahi mea engari he māngere kē tēnei mahi āu!
He whakaoriori tamariki
He whakapakari nōu, ākuanei koe rengarenga ai i taku patu
He whakapopo i ngā niho, he whakahauā i te korokoro me te ate wharowharo
He whakapāha kau te mahi, i te kore i  kitea o tētahi kupu māna hei whakaatu i tōna pōuri ki ngā āhuatanga kua pā.
He whakapū kupenga tērā e tū mai rā
He whakapūwharu te koua ki ētahi tāngata.
He whakarakenga atu nā ō tīpuna i mua rā
He whakarapa tō koutou, he tikanga hauhauaitū tō koutou nei
He whakararau tēnei: 'Puritia, puritia a uta, puritia a tai'
He whakareinga rimu ki Ōpou rā ia
He whakatakohe noa te mahi a ngā taiohi  i te papa hokohoko rā i ngā pō.
He whakataukī nā te Pākehā, 'Mā te manu moata ka mau ai te toke'
He whakataukī te tore kai huruhuru; he toa, engari he pōtiki, he toa muri, ehara i te toa mātāmua; he toa pōtiki, ehara i te toa hopu mātāika
He whakatipu huruhuru upoko. Ko ngā kākano o te karo ka kurukuru kia hinuhinu, ka pōpō ai ki te upoko
He whakatohetohe te hainatanga a Ngāi Tahu i te whakaaetanga ā-pukapuka a Make
He whakatoihara iwi te take i wehe ai ngā wharepaku o ngā mangumangu i ō ngā kiritea o taua whenua.
He whakatoihara iwi tēnā, te whakahuahua i ngā ingoa kārangaranga kino mō te Īnia, te Āhia, te Hāmoa, te aha atu.
He whakaturi nō ngā kauheke o mua.
He whakatuwhera tonu rānei tāna, he wāwāhi i ngā pōkurukuru o tōna oneone?
He whakawai tānga moko
He whana ake tō ngā iraoho.
He whana taua nei
He whana tautoko i haere atu i te taha o te tīma, hei reo umere mō rātou.
He whana tōraro tō te irahiko.
He whana tōrunga tō te iraoho.
He whanaunga māua ko Piri, ina he tuakana teina ō māua pāpā.
He whanaunga tata nō ngā tāngata nunui o Waikato, tae atu hoki ki te Kīngi e hōhō mai nei
He whanaunga tata, he hoa tata anō māua.
He whanaunga te moa ki ngā manu nunui o Ahitereiria me Āwherika.
He whango te reo, he turi ngā taringa, ko te tuakana i mate, kāore rawa ngā whanaunga i pai kia whakahaere i ngā hea o te tuakana, kia taka mai ki taua whango nei, heoi nā Eruera i whakahaere ki te aroaro o te Kooti, ka tika taua whango ki ngā hea
He whare haumākū a roto, he pōuri, kāore he putanga hau kia ngaro ai te pūmāhu me te mōrūruru
He whare huatau - he rawe ngā tuanui teitei me ngā arawhata i hangaia ki te rākau māori.
He whare hūroaroa - tekau mā waru ōna papa.
He whare kauanu tēnei - me purupuru pea ngā matapihi me ngā kūaha.
He whare kuramatanui te nuinga o ngā whare o ēnei rā.
He whare kōkau tō mātou tupuna whare, kāore he whakapaipai.
He whare ngaro tērā - he tipuna huatea rā hoki, arā kāore āna tamariki ake.
He whare ngaro, engari, he tini ngā tamariki nā rāua i taurima
He whare purotu tōna - kua koroua, engari e hāneanea ana.
He whare pāparu tō rātou whare, ehara i te whare āpiti.
He whare rūnanga Māori te whare o taua kura, he whare haumākū a roto, he pōuri, kāore he putanga hau kia ngaro ai te pūmāhu me te mōrūruru
He whare tapu te whare; e kore e haerea e te tangata, e kore e kā. Kia whakaeangia, kātahi ka noa, arā kia whakangawhātia, kātahi ka noa
He whare tuku ki uta, he waka ama ki te moana
He whare tūmatanui te whare pukapuka o te tāone - e āhei ana ngā tāngata katoa te uru atu.
He whare ukiuki - kotahi rau, e toru tekau tau te pakeke.
He whare āpiti te nuinga o ngā whare karakia tawhito.
He wharekai tino rahi a Kimiora i Tūrangawaewae.
He wharepaku tāuke tō te tāne, tō te wahine.
He wharepaku tō te nuinga o ngā whare ināianei, kua kore e mate ki te puta ki waho.
He whata kaupe, arā he whata tārewa i waho i te tinana o te rākau
He whawhai taratahi - ka mura ake, ka poko, nāwai ā kua mura anō.
He whenua hou tēnei, he whenua ora, e tika ana kia nuku kē atu te tipu o tangata
He whenua houkura tēnā, kāore e tae te riri ki reira
He whenua ka mōai noa, ē, i ō tūpuna
He whenua ka rohai noa
He whenua kura, he wahine ātaahua, he patu pounamu, he taonga nui.
He whenua mahue, ka tipuria e te māheuheu.
He whenua manapori a Aotearoa. E kōwhiria ana e te iwi nui tonu ngā māngai kāwanatanga ia toru tau.
He whenua maru a Aotearoa nō Ingarangi i taua wā.
He whenua nawa - tekau mā ono hāora i te waka rererangi e tae atu ai.
He whenua pukewai tēnei, inā rā, ka piki ana te awa, ka ngaro katoa te whenua, ka pēnei te āhua.
He whenua taimaha te whenua, he tangata māmā te tangata
He whenua takataka, kāore e taumaha i te wai.
He whenua tohetea, he pātītī taranui te kai.
He whenua tītōhea ērā, he pungapunga hoki te oneone
He whenua tītōhea, he rākau kurutote.
He whenua tūparipari - e kore e ekea e te pahikara, e te nanekoti, e te aha atu rānei.
He whenua ukiuki, he whenua tōnui, he whenua pakanga, he whenua pakukore.
He whero ngā tāhei o tana hāte.
He whero ngā tīwata o te taiapa o te kāinga.
He whero pūmangu, he tiwha nui kai te rae, he mā kai te matamata o te ihu, e toru waewae mā, he raho poka, he hōiho āhua nui
He whero, he mā, he purū ngā tae o te haki Wīwī.
He whero, he pango, he mā ngā tae o te kara e tohu ana i te tino rangatiratanga o te iwi Māori.
He whetū a Rangawhenua, e ārahi ana i a Whānui
He whetū ao tēnei ka tata mai
He whetū e kōpure ana mai
He whetū katoa, puta noa puta noa, kei te takiwā o te rangi i te rā me te ao nei, engari kāore e kitea ana i te awatea i te nui o te kanapu o te rā
He whetū kotahi tonu. Ka rere ahiahi ka kīia ko Meremere, arā ko Meremere-tū-ahiahi; ka rere ata ka kīia ko Tāwera
He whetū nui a Pareārau, he wahine karihika, he wahine tīweka
He wheua toroa ngā uhi, arā, te mea māna e nakonako te kiri o te tangata
He whiro rānei koe, he ahurangi rānei?
He whitawhita nōna ka tohua ko ia hei māngai mō te rōpū.
He whā tāwhara ki uta, he kiko tāmure ki tai.
He whāiti ngā rau o te pīngao.
He whāiti te koki i waenga i te awa tāhapa me te onepū.
He whānau Māori te hunga whakatū, whakahaere, pupuri i te mauri o te kura
He whānau matamau - katoa rātou ka āta penapena i ā rātou herengi.
He whānau nui te aroha, kaha anō te whakatoi, tētahi ki tētahi.
He whānau tama ki te wahine, he awatai, he puta taua ki te tane
He whāngai poaka, he rumaki kānga te mahi, hei utu i te haere ki Nukutaurua mā runga kaipuke
He whānui rawa te hope o tō tarau.
He whānui rawa te tikanga o ēnei reta e toru, ā he pai hoki ōna kaupeka
He whārahi, he nui te pā, he torutoru ia ngā tāngata o roto
He whārarahi tonu te awa - ina makaia atu he pōwhatu, e kore e pātata ki rāwāhi.
He whāriki mō te ware, he tawatawa mō te rangatira.
He whārite anō tēnei: (a + 3)2 = 0.
He whēnei ngā whakaaro o te rōpū, hāunga a Pare me ōna whakaaro korokē.
He whīrokiroki te ngeru i te taenga atu ki a Hine, engari nāna i kumanu, ana kua mōhinuhinu, kua mōmona iāianā.
He whīrokiroki tonu au i taku itinga; nōku ka pakeke, ka mōmona, ka puku tautau.
He wiki kē, he wahine kē.
He wiki whakamutunga tēnei mō te kōrero a te Rūnanga, koia au i whaiwhai atu ai ki ēnā kupu āu, e Te Mākarini
He wiri hoki nōna i te māeke i te kauanga mai i te pō i te moana o Rotorua
He wiri matamoe
He wā anō e tika ana te kōrero 'He rongo pai te kore e rongo'
He wā anō ka taupatupatu ngā kaupapa here pāpori ki ngā kaupapa here ohaoha.
He wā anō ka tautohetohe rāua mō ō rāua take ki te whenua. Heoi i pūmau tonu tā rāua noho me ā rāua whānau
He wā anō ka āhua wene ia i whai wāhi ko tana teina ki te ako i te reo Māori.
He wā anō mō te rangaranga, he wā anō kua kūmea.
He wā e heke ai te roimata i te pōuri, he wā anō e heke ai i te makoakoa.
He wā e taka e roha ai ngā parirau, ka rere te manu ki tua o te tautika o te kāinga.
He wā mō te whawhai, me te tā pōtaka. He wā mō te tākiri manu me te tao karaka. He wā mō te whaiwhaiā me te kato pikopiko
He wā nei, hūpeke ana, tau ana, tū ana tōna waewae i te maramara kōiwi. Noho iho ana ki raro, tangohia ake ana e ia te ngota ka tīmata anō te whaikōrero
He wā pakaroa tēnei, kua whīroki ngā kau nei.
He wāhi anō kei te Kāwana Tiānara i roto i ngā mahi waihanga ture a te pāremata, arā, māna rawa e whakamana.
He wāhi hemahema kei waenganui i a Papatūānuku me ngā whetū o te rangi.
He wāhi kūiti hoki e tuhera ana i waenganui o aua kōhatu, ā, me mātua takitahi te haere atu ka puta ai te tangata i taua wāhi
He wāhi maroke, he wahi mahana. Ka pai tana takoto tapapahu i reira
He wāhi matomato tērā, he hōhonu
He wāhi mōrearea tonu te moana - inā te nui o ngā tāngata ka toremi i te tai i ia tau.
He wāhi ngahau tērā mō ngā takatāpui - me uaua ka kitea he tāne mate wahine, he wahine mate tāne rānei i reira.
He wāhi nui kei ngā moroiti me ngā noke hei whakapopo, hei wāwāhi i ngā hanga mate, kia awe ai te hoki atu o ngā painga ki te oneone.
He wāhi nui kei te kōhauhau o Papatūānuku i roto i te huringa wai, te huringa waro me te huringa hauota o te ao.
He wāhi nō tana māuiui ā-tinana te take i hua ai te whakaaro o ētehi o taua wā, koinei he tangata kahakore, he tangata whakamā, he tangata e ngāwari ana te whakakonuka
He wāhi pai te mātātā mō te poraka, mō te tuna hoki.
He wāina te kai a Te Wairau.
He wē ngā momo inu katoa.
He āhua anō tō te poaka niho puta o te puihi, ā, he āhua anō tō te poaka whāngai e hikihikitia nei e ngā rūruhi Māori, me he mea hoki he pōtiki nāna
He āhua karawhiti tēnā, kāore ōna rārangi hangarite.
He āhua kē tō ēnei pā kōhatu, he āhua kē tō ngā whare peipei oneone, whare ririki, kikino noa iho, o ngā tāngata tupu o te whenua
He āhua mataura te kiko o te rimu.
He āhua porohema ngā rau o te karaka me te karo.
He āhua porotītaha te anga o te peraro.
He āhua poupou te rōnaki o te hiwi e piki nei au, kua hēhē noa te manawa.
He āhua pūwheki te kape rino nā - he taumaha rawa, he roa rawa. He māmā ake te tīkapekape i te ahi ki te rākau tonu.
He āhua rite pea te huki o ngā tūpuna i Hawaiki ki ngā whare tūturu o ētahi o ngā iwi o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa.
He āhua rite te 2.5 henemita ki te īnihi kotahi.
He āhua rite te hanga o Rangitoto ki te koeko.
He āhua rite te ngutu o runga o te ngututa rā ki tō te kākā.
He āhua roa tonu ngā toromoka kei te kauae o te āhuruhuru.
He āhua tahangoi te putanga mai o tō kōrero
He āhuaatua tō kore e mihi ki ō pakeke.
He āhuareka ki a ia te piki maunga, kei reira te hau tino pai.
He ākau roa anō tērā, he tukutata tēnei
He āmiki kē te mahi a tēnā - kia roa koe e whakarongo ana, kātahi anō ka mau te iho o tana kōrero.
He āmionga tūturu anō tō ia aorangi e noho ana ki te rerenga o Tamanuiterā.
He āpiha kei te kura ko tāna, he whaiwhai haere i ngā tamariki e tamō ana, me te kōrero ki ō rātou mātua.
He ārai tākoru kei te whakapaipai i ngā matapihi.
He ārani te kara o te kāroti.
He āria kei te whanga, he rerenga aua, he wāhi hirou pipi.
He āta rere te wai i ngā āniwaniwa o te awa.
He ātaahua ake te ara āwhiowhio, engari he tere ake te ara tukutata.
He ātaahua ngā pae rimu o te tuanui, kaua rawa e peitahia.
He ātaahua ngā pānui whakaahua e tāia ana e rātou hei whakatairanga i te reo Māori.
He ātaahua ngā rau pōtete o te akiraho.
He ātaahua ngā waewae o te Hāmoa kua whakanakonakotia.
He ātaahua ngā werewere kahurangi o te kōkako o Te Ika-a-Māui.
He ātaahua ngā whakairo a te Moriori i tāia ki te kahiwi o ētahi rākau pērā i te karaka.
He ātaahua tana kanohi, ahakoa te wekoki o te ihu.
He ātaahua te hanga o ngā takapū i te roa e eke pahikara ana.
He ātaahua te kumikumi ki ētehi tāngata.
He ātaahua te kōtaretare ki aku tamariki.
He ātaahua te moko o Te Kōhanga Reo.
He ātaahua te papanga kua kōwhiria e ia mō ngā ārai hou.
He ātaahua te uranga mai o te rā i te huakanga.
He ātaahua te wairua o te hui.
He āwhiowhio ki te rangi e hurihuri haere ana, he āwhiowhio ki te moana e kukume iho ana.
He ōhākī i takea mai i te Tiriti o Waitangi, he kupu tapu nō ngā whakatupuranga
He ōpure te māra a Whare
He ōrangi te tuarongo o te haki Pākehā o Aotearoa.
He ōrite tahi te hokorua me te whā tekau.
He ū taetae te mate o taua wahine
Hei Kaiapoi te ōwhanga o tēnei manu
Hei a i a! Hei a i a! Titiro, tahuri, karapa ki muri, ki mua, ki te manaia, ki te whakarei o te waka nā. Hei a i a! Hei a i a!
Hei aha mā tātou ngā mahi hanihani a ērā rā - kei te harawene noa iho pea ki a tātou.
Hei aha mā tāua ngā kōrero a tēnā parakaeto.
Hei aha māku tana whākorekore - kei te mōhio tonu au nāna tērā mahi whakarihariha.
Hei aha māna te rūrū noa i te ringa o tana hoa kua eke nei ki tēnei taumata tiketike, me whakahiapo rā ka tika.
Hei aha māna, mā te tangata mōhio, e kore a ia e maumau i ana rā ki ngā mahi kūare, pōauau
Hei aha noa te whakarongo atu ki ana kutukutu ahi.
Hei aha te haere ki te toa mā runga motokā, me paihikara.
Hei aha te hari rama - mā te ata marama e whakaatu te huarahi.
Hei aha te horoi ā-ringa i ngā utauta - me rau atu ki te mīhini.
Hei aha te kawe atu i ngā otaota - me pako kē ā tātou kūmara.
Hei aha te mau huarākau mai - kei te nui te huarākau i konei.
Hei aha te naihi me te paoka, whakamahia ko ō mikao tonu.
Hei aha te pai āhua, kimihia he ringa tango parahia hei hoa mōu.
Hei aha te pai āhua, rapua he ihu oneone hei tāne māu.
Hei aha te tiki mai i a au i te taunga rererangi, ka tekehī atu au.
Hei aha te tuitui - he motu akahu noa iho.
Hei aha te waruwaru i ngā rīwai; me hūkui noa kia kore atu te paru.
Hei aha te whakarite kākahu mahana mō ngā poroteke - ki te mate ētahi i te makariri, kua mate.
Hei aha te whiri tātoru, me whiri puku, kia torokaha ai.
Hei aha ō taputapu pūhuki nā - me hari kē ko āku.
Hei hanga i tana rauwiri, ka kōtuia atu ngā peka ngohe o te whiro ki waenga i ngā pou.
Hei hanga i te momo wharau e kīia nei he pāhoka, ka hokahokaina he rākau maha ki te whenua.
Hei hanga i te taku mō tana whakaahua o te tahamoana, ka whakapiria atu he anga pakupaku ki ngā tapa e whā.
Hei heuenga mō te whare pōtae, arā, kia noa ai te tangata
Hei horoi i ngā kākahu i ngā rā o mua, ka mukumukua ki te papa kōakaaka.
Hei ikara nui haere mai ana, he tini ōna huruhuru, he roroa he kōtingotingo ngā huruhuru
Hei kai noa iho tēnā mā te karu, kaua e pā atu tō ringa.
Hei kimi mai i te pae o te tapatoru, me tāpiri noa te roa o ōna tapa e toru.
Hei koha ki ō tātou kaumātua Pākehā nā rātou nei i poipoi te iwi i roto i ngā pōuritanga, i ārahi i roto i ngā ururuatanga me ngā tuatea, me ngā tūmatakuru o roto o ērā wā
Hei kokomo i ōna pūtu roiroi kia kikī ki runga i ngā waewae, ka kore e tae he toto Māori ki ngā matimatihao o ngā waewae
Hei konei ka haere ngā tohunga i te pō ki te whakatō i ngā kai i roto i tā rātou huamata
Hei konei ka tīmata ngā mihi ā-whare, mai i te tara iti, ā, huri noa ki te tara nui
Hei konei nā he pā mō tātou
Hei konei rā, e Te Pīpīwharauroa. Ka tukuna atu koe e au ināianei he ringaringa kē, māna koe e atawhai
Hei konei, e hine, e tama rānei, e haere ana ahau ki ngā kaipakihi a te tāne. (He poroporoaki nā te tangata ki tana pēpē kāore anō kia whānau mai.)
Hei konā ka hahu ai koe i tōku papatoiake, ka maranga au, ka noa koe
Hei kōmiro i ngā ngaku pepa mō te whakapaipai i te rūma, ka huri tākarakatia tētahi pito, ko tērā atu pito ka huri kōarotia, kātahi ka whakapiria ki te tuanui.
Hei mahi mai i te tōpuni, me hanga he piri i te tuatahi.
Hei matua tāne aha, hei matua wahine aha?
Hei mea ūngutungutu haere ngā pera hei ki ngā taha o te ara whakataetae waka.
Hei muri nei au whakaoma atu ai ki te hoa rā
Hei ngari mō ana mātua tana whakarongo ki ngā puoro hoihoi i te ao, i te pō.
Hei ngerengere whakatū kau ki te patatai o te moana
Hei ngā marama whakamutunga o tēnei tau tukua ai e te Poari o ngā Whenua Karauna o tēnei takiwā ki te mākete, kia hokoa, kia rīhitia rānei i raro i ngā ture whenua o te Koroni. Tērā ēnei whenua e whāōtia e te Pākehā
Hei ngā pō ka haere a Hine ki Tokatā ki uta, ki te tiki wai mō rāua i te wai i Taranaki, he wai motu
Hei rangahau i ngā rongoā Māori, ka toro ngā ākonga i te whare pukapuka, i te Ipurangi, me te hunga kei a rātou ērā mātauranga.
Hei rautupu māna i ngā mema o te komiti, ka whakamātauria e Puna kia riro mā tana apataki rātou e turaki
Hei reira ka huaki atu ai, ka taupoki hoki, ka patu ai
Hei reira ka kauhau ai koutou i ngā kōrero mai rā anō i a pō tuatahi, ā tae noa ki te tuatangata, ā ki ngā atua, ā ki ngā mea katoa i mōhiotia e ngā kahika, e ngā tūpuna
Hei reira ka kotikoti ai i te ika nei
Hei ritenga mō te kura, i tangohia mai i te kēkē o te kākā, i rākaia ki runga i te taiaha, arā, i te māipi kura
Hei roto au hei taku whare rohi atu ai
Hei rānaki i te matenga o Te Pūoho, ka tukuna e Taiaroa a Miriama hei wahine mā Paremata, me ngā mere pounamu e rua
Hei te 25 o Tīhema whakanuitia ai te whānautanga mai o Ihu Karaiti.
Hei te 25 o ngā rā o Hakihea te Kirihimete.
Hei te 29 o ngā rā o Māehe 1901 ka kawangia te whare karakia o Te Muriwai, wāhi o Tūranganui
Hei te 6 o ngā rā o Pēpuere, 1940 tutuki ai te rau tau o te hanganga o te hainatanga ai o te Tiriti o Waitangi, ki Waitangi, wāhi o Pewhairangi
Hei te Hōngongoi puta ai te ihu o Hinetakurua, e tohu ana i te rā poto katoa o te tau.
Hei te Iwa māua haere ai ki te hararei, i te mea kua taki hokihoki ngā ākonga ki te kura i tērā wā.
Hei te Mahuru ka taki hoki mai ngā manu o tai i rere ki te raki mō te takurua.
Hei te Mātahi ka tū a Matariki.
Hei te Tahiwehewehe mātou haere ai ki Hawai'i.
Hei te Tūrei tuatahi o Noema i ia tau tū ai te Kapu o Poipiripi.
Hei te Whitianaunau mutu ai te hao matamata i ēnei takiwā.
Hei te ata pongipongi au ka takahi i te huarahi, kia tae atu ai au i te wā e hauangi tonu ana.
Hei te ata tonu nei rātou ka tae mai.
Hei te awatea ka tīmata te rewa haere o te hukapapa
Hei te hōtoke, arā, hei te makariri anake ka nohoia taua tū whare
Hei te iwa ngā toa ka huaki.
Hei te iwa wehe atu ai taku waka rererangi, ka tae atu ki Tāmaki ā te tekau.
Hei te marama o Hereturikōkā whakaaehia ai e te ture te hao karohi i Te Ika-a-Māui.
Hei te marama o Māehe hauhakea ai ngā rīwai.
Hei te maruao tākina ai te kawa o te whare hou.
Hei te maruata te whakatuwheratanga.
Hei te patunga kaua e huia katoatia te witi, engari me wehe kē ngā mea pai me ngā mea kino, me pēke kē tētahi, me pēke kē tētahi
Hei te pō tāua hoe ai, kei kitea tāua e te tangata whenua
Hei te rima o ngā hāora kati ai te nuinga o ngā toa o taua papa hokohoko.
Hei te takurua kua waiho ngā makawe kia roa, hei te raumati kua parekuhi.
Hei te tau rua mano mā iwa ka kati te kura.
Hei te tekau i te ata nei te hui, ka hiki ā te tina.
Hei te tuauki pō tau atu ai ngā moni ki roto i tō pūtea pēke.
Hei te tūruapō ka nekehia whakamuatia ngā karaka.
Hei te waru i te ata te pahi ka wehe atu i te teihana, ka tae ki Whakatāne ā te tekau karaka.
Hei te weherua ka nekehia whakamurihia ngā karaka.
Hei te wā o Whiro ngā pō kengokengo.
Hei te Āperira pea whakatōkia ai ngā putiputi ka puāwai i te takurua.
Hei tohu mai taua mapi rā i te huarahi hei whāinga māna, atu i Te Rēinga ā tae noa ki te ao wairua o te Māori i Rarohenga
Hei tuahine a Mere ki a Tama, ko ō rāua pāpā, he tuakana teina.
Hei tungāne ērā ki a au, inā ko tōku kuia me tō rātou kuia, he teina tuakana.
Hei turuturu mōhou, e Hinetīnaku
Hei tā mai i tētahi kōrero, pēhia ngātahitia te pātuhi 'Whakataki' me te 'P'.
Hei tā ngā pirihimana he tihara kē i whānakohia, ā, nā te kore haruru o te motukā, i tahua he māti hei tirotiro ā, pahū tonu atu te motukā, kāre tētahi i whara, hoi anō hei tā ngā pirihimana, kāre he whakawhiu mō ngā mahi heahea a te tangata
Hei tā te pōkokōhua rā, he iwi māngere tātou.
Hei tā ētahi he nui ake ngā ika ka mau i te rangi kōruruki, tēnā i te rangi tīhore.
Hei tā ētahi, ko te ata kura, he tohu marangai.
Hei tā ētehi, ko te mahi tino nui rawa atu o ngā mahi katoa i tutuki i a ia, ko tana mahi ki te ārahi atu i tētehi rōpū ki te kite i te Pirimia
Hei tāpiri ki tērā, ka pai anō pea ki te whakarērea ngā tamariki kaha te whakakuene, te tangiweto, te haututū rānei ki te kāinga
Hei tērā marama rāua haere ai ki reira.
Hei tētahi atu takiwā ka whakarāpopoto ai i ngā kōrero mō ngā ope manuao a Te Wīwī
Hei utu i ā mātou pukumahi o taua rā, ka haria mātou ki ngā puna aromahana o Awakeri.
Hei waenganui pō tukuna ai ngā pahū muramura hei whakanui i te tau hou.
Hei waho punga ai ō waka
Hei whakahauora i ngā tipu, haria ki waho ina ua.
Hei whakahua tika i te 'r' o te kupu 'rēwena', me pā rawa te arero ki te ngao.
Hei whakakikini noa iara, hei whakakōhukihuki noa, hei whakakōraparapa i te kanohi
Hei whakakikini noa iara; hei whakakōhukihuki noa, hei whakakōraparapa i te kanohi
Hei whakakikini noa, ī, arā hei whakararaku
Hei whakakite māna ki ia tangata, ki ia tangata kia waiho ai ia hei tauira
Hei whakamara i te ika, me waiho kia rare ki te wai.
Hei whakamatara mōhou, e Te Hoia
Hei whakamōhio noa tēnei i a koe kua whakaaetia tō tono.
Hei whakareka mō tō kiri
Hei whakatitiro i ngā kanohi kua kāpōtia, hei whakakaha i ngā uaua kua māngeretia, hei toko i ngā ringaringa me ngā koikara kia whāwhā ai
Hei whakawhiu i te mauhere, ka meatia ia kia noho paowe mō tētahi wiki.
Hei Ākuhata, i te mea kua pakari ngā pī, ka tīmata te hoki mai a te kuaka
Hei ārahi i a ia whai kē ai ia i ngā ripa o ngā puke e tāpua mai ana i te rangi
Hei ātahirā te hui, engari kei te taraiwa atu au āpōpō.
Hei āwakewake te nehu.
Hei ētahi iwi, kia mutu rā anō ngā whaikōrero a te tangata whenua, kātahi anō te manuhiri ka tū ake ki te whaikōrero.
Hei ētahi wā anō hoki kua kuhuna he kōrero hei whakakata i ngā kaiwhakarongo
Heia ki te kakī te hei taramea, te tiki pounamu, hei aha, hei whakapaipai rā
Heia rā te rimu rapa ki a koe, tāwhiua ki mauī, ki matau
Heke ana ngā roimata i aku kaikamo.
Heke ana ngā werawera i te ihi me te wehi.
Heke ana ngā werawera i te kare pūhahana.
Heke ana te waikamo i aku mata.
Heke ana te wūruhi i te timera, tangohia ana e te poaka te taupoki o te kōhua.
Heke nei, heke nei te waka rā, ā ka ngaro te ihu
Hemahema atu, hemahema mai - kīhai i taro, kua mahimahi.
Henare Tomoana: Tēnā, ki te whiua tēnei Pire e te Pāremata, ka taea rānei te tuku atu ki Ingarangi, mā tō reira Pāremata e pāhi? Te Pirīmia: Ko te Pāremata o konei te tino mana mō ngā mahi katoa e pā ana ki tēnei koroni
Heoi anō e tutuki pai ai te autaia kaupapa nei, me āta tautoko mai e te iwi Māori anō
Heoi anō ehara i te mea he pūhore tā mātou i whai atu ai i tērā tau. I whaihua tonu kē
Heoi anō he nui āna kaupapa whaiaro hei whakariterite i tō rāua wehenga.
Heoi anō he ōritenga ā-ingoa noa iho tāku e whakaatu nei, ka mutu i reira, i te mea kore rawa nei e eke tō Pōneke mahana ki te mahana o tērā āhuru mōwai
Heoi anō ka rūpeke ngā karakia, kāore hoki he karakia i mahue nei
Heoi anō ka tupu hei whawhai; whawhai nei, ā tae noa ki te tomokanga o te pā o Houmaitawhiti rātou ko ana tama e Toi rāua ko Uenuku
Heoi anō kua nā tōna ngākau, ka moe nei ia i te tōrere a tōna manawa
Heoi anō kua nā tōna ngākau, kua moe ia i te tōrere a tōna manawa
Heoi anō ngā hapū nāna i pupuri a Taupō, nā Te Heuheu
Heoi anō ngā tohunga nāna i hanga ngā waka (arā, ko ngā tohunga kātahi tonu ka whakahuatia ake.)
Heoi anō pea te wāhi o te tangata whakatoreke ka ūtongahia, ko te tou!
Heoi anō taku kupu, me haere ngā tinana wherū ki te ōhipera kia tiakina ai koutou ki ngā tikanga e tika ana mō ō koutou tinana wherū
Heoi anō tauware atu ngā ringaringa ki runga i te pane hokomirimiri ai
Heoi anō te kai e pahure i ō tātau nei huinga maha, i ō te iwi Māori, he pūhaehae, he tautohetohe mātauranga
Heoi anō te mahi a taua mano tini he auē, i te hiakai, i te ngaunga a te makariri
Heoi anō te mahi a te ngeru nei, he koniahi.
Heoi anō te mahi ka pahure i te inukorokoro nā, ko te kai.
Heoi anō te mahi, he noho, he mātakitaki ataata mō te katoa o te rā - nā konā anō i whakakurutahi ai.
Heoi anō te mea i kitea, ko tana ringa e pōhirihiri ana i te pōhutu. Waimarie kau i oraiti ia.
Heoi anō te mea i totoa mai ai māua, ko koe kia noho
Heoi anō te mea nāna i ora ai te ngākau nā ā koutou reta e tuhi mai nei, e mea nei he mate hōnore te mate ki te pakanga
Heoi anō te mea o Rānana kāore au e tino pīrangi ko te kohu me te hukarere. Ka karawhiu ana ēnei, ka tino rangona tēnei mea te makariri!
Heoi anō te takitaki o tōna whare ko te ngāherehere, hei takitaki mō te hau
Heoi anō tā rāua, he tū, ka huri, ka titiro, ka putē, ka mīharo
Heoi anō tā te whāereere he horu, kua rere atu ana kūao.
Heoi anō tā tātou he kai, kei te arakai ā muri atu.
Heoi anō tā tātou i ēnei rā he tākiri i te māti. I te wā ki ō tātou tūpuna me hika rawa te kauwati ki te kaunoti e puta ai he ahi.
Heoi anō tāku nā pātai āianei, ko te āhua o te tō rānei, kāore rānei e tō, arā, ko te whakahua tika ko Whangārei, ko Whāngārei kē rānei
Heoi anō tāna he kōwhio ki tana kurī e ā mai rā i ngā kau, me te mōhio o te kurī he kōwhio kē, he mahi kē māna.
Heoi anō tāna hei whakautu i te pātai, ko te hī o ngā pewa.
Heoi anō tāu he whakakā i te tō, he whakanoho atu i te kōhua, kāore e roa kua maoa te kai.
Heoi anō tāu, he kauparepare i ngā pātai ki te tangata ko ia e mōhio pū ana ki ngā whakautu.
Heoi anō whakapūkengatia ana ia ki ngā mahi tātaku whakapapa me ngā tikanga tawhito
Heoi anō ā rātou kākahu i tae ora mai ai rātou, he koka, he pākē
Heoi anō, i tō te Māori anō āhua, kei te taha o ngā mihi ko te aniani, ko te tīkai a ētahi
Heoi anō, kia tae rawa ki ngā whakapapa o Turi e kitea ai te taupatupatu o ēnei whakamārama a Tautahi
Heoi anō, oraora kau ana ko te hiku kau
Heoi he hanga whakamā rawa atu tēnei mō ngā tamariki rangatira o te iwi Māori, ka ingoa kinotia hoki rātou
Heoi i whakamoemiti māua ko taku whāea whāngai ki Te Atua mō tēnei āwhina nui whakaharahara
Heoi ia, mā te rangimārie koutou e arataki
Heoi ka noho mārire a Ngā Puhi, nā wai rā, ka hoki a Heke ki tana mahi, kotia pukutia ana te kara i te pō
Heoi ka puta (te tupua rā) kei waho o tōna rua
Heoi kia ora koutou i roto i ngā rā o te tau hou
Heoi kātahi ka unuunuhia ngā pou pēke . . .  ngā mea katoa a ngā kaiwea, ka pangapangaia ki roto ki te wai
Heoi kātahi rātau ka haere atu i runga i te ngākau wehi, me tō rātau mahara atu hoki kei roto tonu ngā Māori i taua pā, e tauwhanga mai ana ki a rātau
Heoi makā iho ana e rātou; ā paratī ana ētahi o ōna toto ki te pakitara, ā ki runga hoki ki ngā hōiho
Heoi ngā tāngata e uru mai ki tēnei mahi ko rātou kua tapoko ngā ingoa ki roto ki te pukapuka rārangi ingoa
Heoi rā, kua hōhā ngā iwi o te motu ki ēnei tū kōrero waowao; ko te kohuka o te tai te rite - pūhia ana e te hau kua ngaro
Heoi te hirihiri, e ngau ki Hauturu, e ngau ki te whara ki ngā puke i ahua, pohewa i takoto ki tawhiti
Heoi te koha a taua tangata i te matenga, kia pai tātou te noho
Heoi te mahi ināianei, he whakarere i ngā mahi ahuwhenua, ka haere pōhūhū ai ki ngā hui e karangatia ana i ngā wāhi katoa, hei kōrero tikanga mō te motu
Heoi te mea e toe ana, ko te whiriwhiringa i ngā tāngata mō ngā kaunihera
Heoi te mea i māmā ai tā mātou hoki mai i taua pō tuai kerekere, ko ngā noke whiti e hīnātore mai ana i ngā tahataha.
Heoi te mihi nei mō te ariā aroha nei ki a koe
Heoi tā te whakaputa mōhio nā he kōtara i te hui.
Heoi tāku e hiahia ana, kia noho pai kōrua i runga i tō tātou whenua
Heoi wehea ake ērā tokorua, marara ana ki te wai, ki uta
Heoi, hokihoki tonu ai ia ki Te Wairarapa, kia mau tonu ai tana ahikā
Heoi, i roto i ngā uiui taikaha, i mahue ki waho ngā takiaho e rua o te taha ki a Ngāi Tāwhiri, te hapū o tōna whaea
Heoi, i taua Rātapu, nāku mātau ngā hōia i karakia i te reo Māori. Ko te pukapuka karakia nō te Hāhi Mihingare anō
Heoi, i whakaae tonutia tāna me ērā atu o ngā mema Māori i marohi ai
Heoi, ka haere whakamua tonu mātau. I ētahi wā, he tere; i ētahi wā, he pōrori
Heoi, ka tangi i konei te hō a te iti, a te rahi
Heoi, ka tomokia e rātou taua motu, tūria ana te ngārahu taua i reira; ka rongo tērā i rō pā, ka pā te umere
Heoi, ko tēnei e whai ake nei i roto i ngā waiata i kohia e Tā Āpirana, ka whakaurua atu hei waiata 362
Heoi, kua kore he kai . . . Kātahi tēnei ka karakia. Ehara, kua rere mai ngā ika ki roto i te waka
Heoi, kātahi anō mātau ka whakatā nō tēnei rangi, ā, hei āpōpō anō mātau ka haere ki Kiripa-Taraera i te 3 o ngā hāora i te ata
Heoi, mā Te Atua e muru ōku hara
Heoi, noho nei, noho nei, nāwai rā ka tino mate rawa ngā tāngata i te hiakai. Kātahi ka tahuri ki te kari i te oneone, i te uku, hei kai mā rātou
Heoi, nā rāua tahi i whakaako ngā tokorima nei ki te whakairo. Kāore rawa i roa ka mau i a rātau
Heoi, nō te hūnga o Tarawera i te 10 o Hune 1886, ohotata ana te mutu o tā rātau mahi
Heoi, nō te kitenga i ngā hua o te whawhai i Waikato, ka rerekē ngā whakaaro
Heoi, okeoke kau aua te nauwhea rā, ka kōrengarenga noa te hiku, me te pane, me waenganui, i te ngaunga a te patu
Heoi, tae rawa ake ōna pire, kua mate kē
Heoi, whātorotia ana mai e te ringa kaha o te mate ka riro, ka waiho te hunga ora kia pōraruraru ana i muri
Heoti anō ka maiki ia i tērā wāhi, ka haere anō ki te kimi kāinga kē atu mōna
Heoti anō ko te rangi i pai rā, kua tāmarutia e te pōkēao
Heoti anō, ka totohe rātou i konei, tohe atu ana, tohe mai ana
Heoti anō, maranga katoa ana, tahuri tonu ki te kōhuru kino i ngā wāhine i ngā tamariki, kāhore nei i whai ringa hei karo
Heoti anō, takahia ana e Māui te iwituaroa, kumea ana te whiore; ka whakakurītia e Māui a Irawaru
Heoti ka tapia e ngā tāne, ka mate te wahine i te whakamā
Heoti te kai pai o ngā kai katoa he huahua
Heoti, e mau tonu ana te wairua tūtakarerewa i waenga i a rātou
Heoti, hora whānui ana te rohe o tana minitatanga ki ngā wāhi tūhāhā
Heoti, i whakaae a Puna ki te whakarere i āna mahi whakaora ā-wairua, ā, whakapau kē ana i ōna kaha ki te tapuhi tūroro
Heoti, kāore ngā riri haupārua a Ngāi Tahu i whati pērā ki te taitonga. Inā rā i pupau i muri tata i te tau 1828
Heoti, mēnā ki te whakaaro o te rangatahi i ētehi wā he wahine pākaha a Te Puea, i mōhio anō hoki rātou ki te hōhonu o tōna pūaroha ki a rātou katoa
Herea he miro ki tō niho mahaki, ka kukume kia makere mai ai.
Herea ki te taura kia whita tonu, kia kore ai e riro.
Herea te kurī ki te pona whakakohuhu - ki te kaha rawa tana kukume, kua nātia tana kakī.
Herea te taura ki te pou kia ngita.
Herea te taura ki te tongari, kia kore ai e pahuhu mai i te pou.
Herea te taura kia akuaku, kia kore ai e pahuhu.
Herea te taura mō tā tāua tārere ki te manga mōrohirohi.
Herea te waewae o te poaka kia kore ai ia e konewha noa.
Herepūtia ngā witi nā
Herepūtia tonutia atu e au, tē! Ka mau
Heria atu ngā wheua nei mā tō kurī.
Heria atu tā kōrua hutupōro ki waho whiuwhiu haere ai!
Herua ō makawe kia matara rawa.
Hi! He kupu tāu, e te wenewene?
Hiakai katoa atu au i te rongo i a koe e ngongo nā i te ngako o ngā wheua poaka.
Hiamo ana ā rātou pū kia kore ai e mākū i te awa.
Hihikiwi ana te iwi i te rongonga i ngā waka o te hoariri e wheoro mai ana i te pae.
Hihiko ana rāua kua kore katoa tana mate pukupuku.
Hika! Pōrutu mai ana te wai i te taunga o te kai ki roto i te wai
Hikaia ki runga, kīhai i whiwhi; hikaia ki raro, ka whiwhi, ka rawe, ka rauru
Hiki ana te hui, hokihoki ana ngā tāngata ki ō rātou kāinga
Hikitia, hikitia te tangi a te tētere!
Hikohiko ana te uira, papā ana te whatitiri.
Hikoia e te awatea, anō he pounamu kei ngā karu pango e titiwha ana
Hinapōuri katoa te pō, inā hoki ko te Whiro tēnei.
Hine: I nahea tērā? Tama: I te Paraire ka taha.
Hine: Kei hea a Tū? Pare: Aua. Kei waho pea.
Hinengaro pāroherohe, arero pāroherohe.
Hinga atu he tētēkura, ara mai he tētēkura.
Hinga katoa ana te hunga nā rātou aua taonga rā i te urutā rewharewha, e karawhiu haere rā puta noa i te motu
Hinga noa mai, mate noa mai, ki runga ki tēnei puke, ki raro ki ēnei toko, hei tārukenga, hei ngakinga mate, mō tēnei kī, mō tēnei kanga
Hinga tonu atu ngā kōtiro i ngā karu momohe o Tama.
Hingahinga kau ana ngā hōia i ngā pahū a te hoariri.
Hinuhinu ana ngā tuna mina auahi i te hākari.
Hirihiri noa au kia hoki ake koe
Hiwia mai rā te ika
Hoake ngā kai ki taku kāinga - mō muri au haere atu ai.
Hoake tāua ki te puna kaukau.
Hoake tāua ki te tāone ki te whakatau i ō tāua hoa.
Hoake tāua ki tua kei rorohūtia e te tangata
Hoake tāua kia kite i taku tūāhu, i taku ngakoa
Hoatu he hinu ki te takaore o tō tūru, kia kore ai e ngawī ina hurihuri.
Hoatu he ika ki ia tīpae.
Hoatu he kōwhai paku nei ki te kikorangi, ka hua ko te kārikiuri.
Hoatu he tio ruarua noa iho nei hei kai māna, hei whakapuku noa i a ia.
Hoatu iriiria he mea mō tō tātou waka
Hoatu kia kotahi te kutanga whakahaumako ki ia tipu.
Hoatu kia rua ngā kōpata rongoā ki ia karu.
Hoatu koe - kia oti taku mahi nei ka haere atu au.
Hoatu kōrua. Ka whai atu a Hira ā kō ake nei.
Hoatu ngā kai nā ki roto i te whata mātao.
Hoatu ngā maihi ki runga ki ngā whakawai takoto ai.
Hoatu ngā parāoa porotaka ki te umu mō tētahi wā poto, kia pūkatakata ai a waho.
Hoatu ngā wātakirihi ki roto i te kōhua, kei maoa rawa ngā wheua poaka.
Hoatu rā koe ki te mate, ki te kōmingomingo rā e kukume nei i a koe ki raro ki a Tangaroa!
Hoatu rā koe, e tama, ka whakaturuturu ai i tō manu aute hei kanohi mōku ki te rangi.
Hoatu te mea nā ki a Tame, māna e whakatika ina hoki mai ia.
Hoatu te wai kōhua ki te kōutu rino.
Hoatu tātou ki te tā karaka
Hoatu ētahi huarākau ki a ia, puritia ētahi mā tāua.
Hoatu, tuaratia tō teina
Hoatu, whitia ki te Poutama, ki te whiti a Rangahua
Hoe atu ana te iwi ki te tirotiro i te kaipuke kua ū mai ki te koro.
Hoea ki tawhiti he tīwai taua nō Te Kahukura hei uta i a au
Hoea mai ana tana waka kōkīkī ki uta, mauria ana ki te whare.
Hohoro kau ana te tangata ki te āki i te patu ki ngā kauae o te ika rā
Hohoro kē atu te pāngia o te tangata kāore nei ōna kikokiko i kaha
Hohoro te haramai, kei te riua au ki Matangihaurua
Hoihoi ana te kitā a ngā tarakihi i te mutunga o Kohitātea.
Hoihoi koe me ō kōrero hakurara!
Hoihoi tahi!
Hokahokai ana aku waewae ki te pakikau o taku whare
Hoki atu, hoki atu ko aua kōrero koretake anō rā, takeo katoa nei au.
Hoki hari atu ngā mea i waimarie, hoki pōuri atu ngā mea i kore e waimarie ki ō rātau kāinga
Hoki mai anō ko tō kōiwi
Hoki mai noa ana ki te pūkai, wheo ai
Hoki mai, e tama, ki tō ūkaipō.
Hoki matangurunguru ana ki tana kāinga i te nui o te utu ki te haere, me te maroke anō o te pō.
Hoki rawa mai i Hikihiki rā ki te tarawaha o te riri ka takoto
Hoki rawa mai ki te puta o tōna tuna, mau ana ko te hāwareware kau anake, kua riro te tuna
Hoki rawa mai ki te puta o tōna tuna, mau ana ko te hūwareware kau anake, kua riro te tuna
Hoki rawa mai, ka kūraruraru i te mea kua rerekē katoa te āhua o tana whare.
Hokona he mapi hei ārahi i a tātou i ngā rori o tēnā tāone.
Hokona he pātara miraka e rua rita te rahi.
Hokona he rama me ngā pūhiko e tika ana, ka rau atu ki te pouaka mate whawhati tata.
Hokona he rongoā hei patu i ngā eo i ngā makawe o ngā tamariki nei.
Hokona he whītiki rinena mōu, ka whītiki ai ki tōu hope
Hokona te pani e pai ana mō tōu tūmomo kiri.
Hokowhitu te karokaro a Te Heiro i whakaeke i te pā, ka murua ngā mea katoa.
Homai aku hau, ngā tītaha, ngā kōhua, ngā herehere o tōku pakanga
Homai aku kanu hei rāpaki ake mōku mō te paruparu i a au, hei parahau ake mō te oneone
Homai ana ia i tana tama kotahi. Kia pēhea atu anō i tēnei oha whakahara
Homai he hinu kia herua au, he raukura hoki hei tiatia mōku
Homai he ika, kia toru, kia hia rānei
Homai he kai hai whakaputa i te ihu o mātou ko aku tamariki
Homai he mea hei whakarekareka mō tōku māngai, paratoketoke ana
Homai he wahie kei poko te ahi
Homai he wahie, kei meto te ahi
Homai koa te naihi nā.
Homai koa tō heru kia pai ai taku whakamatara i aku uru pūhutihuti.
Homai me riringi ki te hua roimata e māpuna i aku kamo
Homai māhaku tētahi maka me tētahi mōunu
Homai rā he rare māku.
Homai taku maro kia hurua, kia rawea, kia harapaki māua ko te toa e haramai nei
Homai taku pāhi, kei roto rā aku kī mō te whare me te waka.
Homai taku tama a hara kia kainga
Homai taku taonga, taku taonga i tiria
Homai taku tātua kia whawhea
Homai te anga nā kia whakakīia ki te wai.
Homai te hama kia hamahia atu e au te nēra nei ki roto ki te pakitara.
Homai te hutihuti hei here ki te punga.
Homai te kāeaea kia toromāhangatia, ko te kāhu te whakaora, waiho kia ora ana
Homai te kīaka rā, te mea kī i te wai.
Homai te kōkō ki a au, māu e haere ki te pupuri i tā tāua kupenga.
Homai te kōrero e aha mai nei kia whakakoikoiatia, he tikanga, he pononga
Homai te māripi nā kia pai ai taku tapahi i tā tātou rēwena.
Homai tētahi rākau hei uehā mō te poti
Homai ō pukapuka ki ngā tamariki e noho nei.
Hone Heke. Ko ia tēnei ko tuahangata, ko kātuarehe
Hone aha?
Hongaia mai te waka kei eke ki te tāhuna
Hongaia ngā titi kia kore ai ngā taura o te tēneti e pahuhu.
Hopukia ana e te ringaringa; nā, itaita ana
Hora ana te mahi a te tāwhaowhao i te ākau hei kai mā te ahi hopuni.
Horahia atu ngā maramara aniana nā ki runga i te ika.
Horahia he papanga rarauhe ki raro i ngā kūmara.
Horahia mai (te kōrero) kia rongo te rau e pae nei
Horahia te tāpau, ka whakatakoto ai i te tamaiti nā ki runga.
Horahia te whāriki nui ki te papa, hei nōhanga mō ngā tāngata hiahia noho.
Horahia ō koutou moenga ki ngā rekereke o ngā poupou tūpuna. Waiho te kauhanganui kia wātea ana.
Horahora ana ngā tohetaka i te awatea, kopi ana i te pō.
Horahora ana te puta o te tahumaero - e hingahinga ana he tāngata i ngā tōpito katoa o te motu.
Hore ake i rīpenetā mō ō rātou hara
Hore atu he kōtiro tino ātaahua pērā i a Hinekohu i roto o Aotearoa
Hore he tangi, he auē; hore he wā mamae
Hore kau ia e hiahia ana kia takatū mai rātou mōna te take
Hore kau ā rāua nei kai, hore ā rāua nei aha
Horekau he tangata i reira i korikori, i turituri, i kōrero rānei
Horekau i roa te rironga atu mā Hōri e taraiwa, ka taka tō mātou taraka i te parenga
Horia te taringa o te poaka
Horoia ngā matapihi kia mā a roto, a waho anō.
Horoia ō kākahu kia mā, kei pēnei te tangata he paraheahea koe.
Horoia ō ringaringa ki te hopi.
Horoia ō waewae pātio ka pani ai ki te hinu nei.
Hotohoto ana te wai ki tōku hiako
Hou atu ngā kōrero i tētahi pokotaringa, rere ana i tētahi - e kore e whakarongo.
Houa he pō au
Hua ake ana te kurupo kua tahuri atu ki te poka kia pakaru mai ai te pirau.
Hua ake nei ka mākona te Hauhau i te kōhurutanga i a Karaitiana mā
Hua atu he rapu tāu kia kitea te mea e aroha nei tātou; ā, ka kitea, noho ana, ka ngarongaro te aroha
Hua noa i horoia ki te wai horoi hika o Māhaki, kia tiu, kia oha mō Kairākautahi
Huahuaki ana te manawa, heke ana te werawera i te kaha mataku.
Huaia te rākau nei
Huaina ana e ngā Kura Kaupapa Māori ko Te Aho Matua hei kaupapa whakamaru mō rātou.
Huakina ngā matapihi kia kōangiangi ai a roto nei.
Huakina te peita, ka tīkapekape kia hanumi katoa ai.
Huawai ana te tipu o te mauti i te māra, hūtoitoi ana te tipu o ngā kai.
Huhure ana te āhua o Taka ka kanikani ana - he waewae mātotoru.
Hui ake ngā turi ki porokakī, e tuohu kau tātou
Hui katoa e 400 tōna hokowhitu, he taipakeke, he taitama
Hui katoa ngā rangatira me ngā iwi i rūpeke ki taua huihuinga, kotahi mano e waru rau
Hui katoa, 540 takitahi
Hui katoa, e whitu ngā tae o te rore.
Huihui ngā kōrero ki roto wharekura, ki a Uenuku, tauria ki te whata roa
Huihui noa te tangata - te tāne, te wahine, te hoa mārena, te takakau, te kaumātua, te tamaiti - huihui noa, moe noa iho i te whare kotahi
Huirangi noa ana a Hine - he rangi kē, he whakaaro kē.
Hukahuka ana te kōrinorino i te tere o te haere o te waka.
Huna te kōkōuri, huna te kōkōtea, e tū mariko, tē tāpiri ana i tō taha
Hurahurahia ngā kai; ka mākū i te ua
Huri ana te pō, huri ana te ao
Huri atu ana te tuarā o taua ākonga, hiki ana te waha ki te auē me te kata anō, he hauā mārika nō te reo o te tāhae rā
Huri i te ao, kei tēnā iwi, kei tēnā iwi āna ake tikanga whakamana i te moe a te tāne me te wahine.
Huri noa te ao he porotātaka te hanga o tēnei mea te pōtae.
Huri porohita ana te koropetau i te pakihiwi o te whakairo.
Huri tonu ko te upoko ki raro, whati rawa te kakī mate tonu iho
Hurihia ana te katirere o te puoto, hihī mai ana te hau hīnohi.
Hurihuri ai ngā waetea i te ara omaoma pororapa.
Huripokina ana te oneone, kei reira te mahi a te noke e kaunoni ana.
Huripokina te poti kia pai ai te whakatika a raro.
Hutia ake te punga.
Hākerekere ana a Hine i te hinganga i ngā whakamātautau.
Hākiki ana te tama nei i tana kitenga kua tapahia kētia e ngā mihinare Karaitiana te ure o te tipuna nei
Hāmama ana ngā waha o ētahi me te auē tonu
Hāmama kau te kūaha o te ika.
Hāmeme kau ana te kapa, mō rātou i ngere i te whakawhiwhinga o ngā tohutoa.
Hāpainga kia tārewa ki runga
Hāpainga, hāpainga, kia tārewa ki runga
Hāpaipai te kiato mua, ka mania, ka paheke
Hāporoa te rākau ki konei
Hāraurau noa te taringa ki te tangi a te kōauau i tawhiti.
Hāro ana te moana i te rangi nei - me he pounamu.
Hātepea ngā pou o te whare
Hātopea te mōmona o te mīti kia kore ai ā tātou kai e hinuhinu.
Hāua atu ana te pōro, ehara, kotahi atu ki te kōhao.
Hāua atu te oneone pōkurukuru ki te mata o te kāheru, kia puaheri ai.
Hāunga ake te waihanga o te tinana, kāore he wāhi hape, engari ko ngā whakaaro
Hāunga ia ngā Māori o Hāmoa, he panana noa hoki ā rātou na kai, he rāpaki noa te kākahu, he tīhokahoka noa ngā whare
Hāunga ia ngā Māori o Hāmoa, he panana noa hoki ā rātou nā kai, he rāpaki noa te kākahu, he tīhokahoka noa ngā whare
Hāunga ia te tanuku o te hūare, ina kite atu i ētahi e inu ana
Hāunga ia tā te wahine Pākehā, kua tae nei ki ngā pona te potopoto o ngā panekoti
Hāunga te kotete noa o ngā ngutu o te pōwhaitere
Hāwiniwini ana te iwi i te rongonga i te taniwha e wheoro mai ana.
Hīkaikai ana ngā waewae, takaoreore ana ngā ringaringa
Hīkaka tonu a Tūmatangaua māna tērā wāhi, kia kitea ai hoki tana toa me tana māia
Hīkoi tonu mai a Rewi Maniapoto ki te take o te pou haki, ka kumea iho te haki ka pokapōkaia, rukea atu ki te take o te pou, ka hoki, ka noho
Hīmoemoe ana ngā āporo kānewha.
Hīraua mai he tāwhara mā tāua.
Hīrawerawe ana te whatinga o tōku ringaringa
Hīrori ana ngā waewae i te taimaha o te wahanga
Hītakotako ana te whare i tana kōrero autaki.
Hītamo noa ana te tangata, tē tata atu te tao ki te manu
Hītawetawe ana te roa o tō tangata
Hīteki atu ki korā ki tō waewae matau, ka hoki mai ki tō waewae mauī.
Hōhonu kakī, pāpaku uaua
Hōhā ana ngā motupaika māniania rā.
Hōhā ana te whakarongo ki ngā kupu whakameremere a te waha rera.
Hōhā ana te whakarongo ki te tangata heoi anō tāna mahi, he kōrero mōna anō.
Hōhā ana tērā mahi, te whakatikatika i ngā hē o ētahi atu.
Hōhā tahi!
Hōkio manu rā e huhū i te rangi
Hōmai taku tū kia hurua
Hōmai te paki whero o Uenuku nā, hei paki ake mōku
Hōngoingoi tonu mai ia ki te kāinga o tōna hungawai
Hōtikina te kūwaha o te tēneti
Hū tonu atu ngā waha i te rongonga ko ngā mea kāore e hoihoi, ka whiwhi aihikirīmi.
Hūkere ana ngā kaihoe, nihinihi atu ana tō rātou waka i ētahi atu.
Hūkiki ana te koroua i tana rongonga ake taihoa ka turakina tana punua whare.
Hūmengemenge ana ngā māhuri i te kino o te tauraki.
Hūnene ana te motu i te hinganga o Aotearoa i te Kapu o Amerika.
Hūnonoi ana ahau i te makariri
Hūtia ake ana te haika, tere ana te waka ki te tonga.
Hūtia ake tō āho, kei tata mai ki tāku, ka whīwhiwhi.
Hūtia mai ngā kākaka nā hei pere mā tāua.
I Ahitereiria, he pirimia anō mō Niu Taute Wēra, he pirimia anō mō Kuīnirangi.
I Kaiapoi, i te marae o Te Hiwi Mārama te tangihanga, ā, neke atu i te 2,000 ngā tāngata i tae ki te uhunga
I Kirikiriroa mātau ka pā mai te rongo kua mate te koroua rā.
I Raukawa rā ia e kōparea nei e ngā kaumātua
I Te Tai Tamawahine, pupuhi mai ai te tāwaho i te marangai.
I Te Waipounamu au ka pā mai te rongo kua hinga Te Arikinui.
I Uropi i ngā rautau ki muri, ka whakamahia te hunga pāngia e te tūhawaiki kia mau pere, hei tohu wawe i tō rātou mate kino.
I Waiouru ka auraki mātou ki te tirotiro i te whare taonga mō ngā hōia.
I a Hine e ngaro ana, ka tāhaetia ētahi o ngā pūrere hiko o tana whare.
I a Te Arawa e whakaata ana i ā rātou haka i Ōhinemutu, ka tū te waewae o tētahi tangata i te huata, puta rawa i tētahi taha
I a au e haere ana i te pō, ka tae mai ki a au te wehi o te taipo
I a au e hipa ana, ohia noa ake au ki te peka atu ki te kite i a ia.
I a au e moe ana i te taha o te awa ka rongo au i te wawaro o te reo punawaru.
I a au e moe ana, ka rika tērā au
I a au e ruaki ana ka rongo au i te kawa o te waiate i taku korokoro.
I a au e taitamariki tonu ana he tino māeneene tōku kiri, ināianei kua pūrehe katoa.
I a au e tane ana ka kata aku hoa.
I a au e whakamomori ana, kotahi tonu te tangata ki te taunaki i a au, ko Ihu te Kaiwhakaora.
I a au i Pōneke i tētahi rangi, ka haere au ki te Whare Pāremata ki te whakarongo ki ngā tautohetohe
I a au i te kura, he pai au ki te kōrero pukapuka, engari kāore au i tino pai ki te pāngarau.
I a au ka kī ake e haere ana au ki Te Kōpakatanga ki te Tonga mahi ai mō te toru marama, ka whakarewha kau aku hoamahi.
I a au ka pātai atu e aha ana ia i te pō rā, kāore ia i whakautu mai.
I a au ka waea atu, whakaae tonu mai, whakaritea ana he rā hei haerenga mai mōna
I a au ka whakaaro ki tēnei kurapae i tau mai ki waenganui i a tātou, ka hoki auau mai ngā huatau ki ngā kōrero mō Te Puhihuia, kei reira nei te kupu e hāngai ana ki tēnei kuia: 'Anana! Me te maure ka puta ake i te pae!'
I a ia e heke haere ana i te rākau, ka mau tana hū ki te tarahanga.
I a ia e heke mai ana i te tāheke kāroaroa nei o Ngāporo, ka tīmata te honga o te waka ki katea
I a ia e hoki ana ki tana tūru, ka mawhiti atu ki ngā kāri a tana hoa whakataetae.
I a ia e hīkoi ana, ka paheke i te hukapapa, ka hinga ki raro.
I a ia e patu ana i ngā aruhe hei ō mō te taua takitaki i te mate o tana tamaiti, ka whakahuatia e ia tana tangi, koia tēnei, 'Tukituki te whata o te aruhe, tau ake ki ahuahu'
I a ia e pīkau ana i ētahi pouaka pī, ka tārutu te kāta, ka tuhera tētahi o ngā pouaka, ka werohia ia e ngā pī
I a ia e rui ana, ka ngahoro ētahi o ngā purapura ki te taha o te ara, ā, ko te rerenga mai o ngā manu, kainga ake
I a ia e taikaumātua haere ana, ā, kua wehe kē atu tōna whānau, ka mau tonu a Hīria ki ngā tikanga a te ao tawhito
I a ia e tamariki ana i karapitia tana ringa e te wāhanga kotē wai o tana pūrere horoi kākahu.
I a ia e tamariki ana ka wera, kei tana kakī ngā wenewene.
I a ia e whai ana, tokowaru o ngā mea turikore o Ngāti Ngāwaero i mau atu i a ia ki te huarahi
I a ia e whakahemohemo ana, ka kī ake ia ki ōna irāmutu, 'I muri nei, kia pai te whakahaere i a koutou'; ko ana kupu whakamutunga ēnei ka hemo
I a ia e whakatoro atu ana ki te tiki hua mai i taua rākau, ka kōrero iho taua hua rā ki a ia ka kī, 'Kaua ahau e kainga, ko te iho au o Kataka!'
I a ia hoki ngā karakia whakanoa i ngā taonga me ngā wāhi tapu
I a ia i Itari ka matatau haere ki tō rātou nā reo.
I a ia i Pōneke ka puta tōna rongo mō te kaha ki te uruhi i ngā ture waipiro
I a ia i aua hui, ka riro mā tana kaiāwhina e whakautu tana waea.
I a ia i reira, hore rawa i pai ki a ia te ao mātauranga, anō nei ki tāna hoki he rāwaho kē ia
I a ia ka kaukau ana, ka mukumuku i ana waewae ki te koropungapunga.
I a ia ka māueue, ka mōhiotia te kino o tana riri.
I a ia kua kaumātuatia, kua tūpuhi, kua hake te tuarā, ko ana pāhau he mangu, he roroa hoki
I a ia tana puka uruwhenua e whakaatu ana i tana tuakiri.
I a koe i te toa, tīkina atu he heu kia pai ai taku heu i aku paihau.
I a koe ka whakahā, ka whakamahia tō pātūpoho.
I a koe ka whakawhiti i te arohata matua o Tāmakimakaurau, whāia ngā tohutohu ki Whangārei.
I a mātau e waiata ana e māturuturu ana ōna roimata
I a mātou e heke haere ana i te hiwi, kātahi ka karawhiu te ua, ka tino manini rawa atu te ara.
I a mātou e noho rā, e mahi rā i te tohi taua, e kōperea mai ana e te iwi o te pā rā ā rātou kōpere ki a mātou
I a mātou e tamariki ana, i mahia e mātou ā mātou pūrorohū ki te pātene.
I a māua i Ōtautahi ka haere mai taku hūngoi ki te tiaki i ana mokopuna.
I a rātou e kai ana i te umu kōtore, ka tū mai te matua o te mea wahine ki te kōrero ki te iwi.
I a rātou e rere ana, kāhore he wehiwehi, nō te mea he mōhio rātou ki te ākau, ā he hou tō rātou kaipuke
I a rātou i te whare taonga ka kite rātou i te anga o te moa.
I a rātou te pīkaunga nui engari ahakoa tērā i ū, i mau, i mānawanawa
I a rāua e ai ana i te tāhuna, ka whānakohia ō rāua kākahu.
I a rāua e haere ana, ka whai tahi te kurī mōkai a Tamatekapua rāua ko te teina i ngā tokorua nei
I a rāua e kōrero ana, ka oma te kurī.
I a rāua e piki ana i te maunga, ka taka ia ki roto i te pakohu, he mahi nui ki te tō mai anō i a ia ki runga.
I a rāua e whawhai ana ka whanaia ngā hekeri e te hoariri, ka hinga tonu atu i te mamae.
I a rāua i reira, ka tae atu te reta a tō rāua whaea e mea atu ana kei te hē rawa atu tōna tinana, ā, kāore rawa ia e parangia e te moe
I a rāua i te whare pikitia ka kohimu atu ia ki tana hoa, kia kore ai ētahi atu e rongo.
I a rāua tahi e rere mai ana i runga i tō rāua hōiho, hūpekea ana e Te Reiwhati te pātatara
I a wai taku pōtae?
I a Āpirana e kimi kaiārahi ā-takiwā nei hei pou tokomanawa mō tana kaupapa ahu i ngā whenua Māori, i heipū tonu tana kite i te pai o Whina mō te mahi nei
I ahu mai te hōrua i ngā toto i maringi i te motunga o ngā ringaringa o Rangi rāua ko Papa i tō rāua wehenga.
I ahu mai te ingoa o Ngā Rauru i tō rātou tupuna tonu, i a Rauru.
I ahu mai ēnei waiata mōteatea i tō tātau kahika i a Te Rangiwaikura.
I ahua e Tāne te wahine tuatahi ki te oneone, ko ia tērā ko Hineahuone.
I aituā i te ohinga, ka ngongengonge ngā waewae.
I ako taku koroua ki te tapahi mīti i a ia e mahi ana i te marae.
I ana tuhituhi ka rongo koe i tōna kōhengi ki ngā whanaunga kei te hau kāinga.
I apua te kai i hohoro ai te pau
I ara ake he waenga kakari i te hui mō ngā moni i wātea, arā, me whakapau rānei ki te whakahou i ngā wharepaku, ki te whakanui ake rānei i te wharekai.
I aratakina mai hoki e Te Whatanui o Ngāti Raukawa tētahi ope taua; ka hangaia he pā mōna ki Puketapu. Kua kitea tonutia, kei te tauapohia te whenua mō Ngāti Raukawa
I aua whenua ko te kōkōtonga te kai a te mātinitini, ko te tōnuitanga te kai a te tokoiti.
I aua wā kē rā o te noho noa iho, o te kai tahi, o te inu tahi, ka tino puta ngā kōrero
I eke a Īhāia ki te tihi o āna mahi mō te iwi i ngā tekau tau atu i 1900
I eke ia ki runga ki tētahi mea o te tima e mānu ana i te wai, ka whakatangi i tana whio kia haere mai ngā poti ki te kohikohi i ngā tāngata e putere ana i te moana
I eke ngā hōia i te pahī, ka riro ki te tahatū o te rangi.
I haehaea koe ki te piharoa
I haehaea te papa e te mangō, koirā i rere katoa ai ngā ika.
I haehaetia te pokohiwi o taua kurī e te poaka pūihi.
I haehaetia te puku o te ika e te keka o te matau.
I haepapatia te whānau - kāore kau he purapura ora.
I haere atu te kairui ki te rui i tana purapura, ā, i a ia e rui ana, ka ngahoro ētahi ki te taha o te ara
I haere atu te mīmiha ki uta ki te kimi kai hei oranga mōna, ka kī te puku ka moe, kātahi ka tukua iho tōna kiri hei ārai i tōna ihu, e mohio ana hoki te ika nei ko tōna wāhi tērā e tere ai tōna mate
I haere ia ki te rata kia tirohia te ira e mangeo ana i tana pāpāringa.
I haere ia ki te tangata hoko motokā i te tāone kia mōhio ai ia ki te wāriu o ōna motokā.
I haere katoa ngā tāngata ki te mimi i muri i te pikitia, koirā i pārekereke ai te wharepaku.
I haere ki te kawe i te maomaoa ki a Uenuku
I haere mai au kia tohia tā tāua kōtiro
I haere mai au, tēnei herehere, kia kite i ēnei mōrea kāwana
I haere mai ia i whea?
I haere mai ia ki te whakapapa i ngā kauwhau o mua
I haere mai koe i te aroaromahana o ngā whakatupuranga, kia mahana hoki tēnei ao i a koe
I haere mai koutou ki te pātiti ahi
I haere mai mā te mānia o Kaingaroa
I haere mai mātou te Māori ki konei ki te whakaputa i tō mātou pōuri, me tō mātou aroha, mō tō tātou hoa kua kore nei i waenganui i a tātou
I haere mai māua i te rāwhiti, i te putanga mai o te rā
I haere mai te Minita ki te whakarite i a mātou i te rā tuatahi o te hui.
I haere mārire, kāhore he tūtū waewae, kāhore he pararē o te māngai, kāhore he aha
I haere mātiti mai te iwi ki te tangihanga o te koroua rā.
I haere mātou ki tātahi kia kite i te rā e opu ana.
I haere mātou ki tētahi wharekai Itāriana, me te rawe o ngā kai.
I haere māua ko Hōri Mahue me tana mokopuna ki te hākari iriiri tamariki
I haere noa mai au ki te whakarongo.
I haere tātou i te mōaniani, ka tae ki waho ka tūtakina e hukatū, e hukarere
I hainatia te Tiriti o Waitangi i te tau 1840, i waenga i te Karauna o Ingarangi me ngā rangatira Māori.
I hakiri anō i a au taua kōrero
I hangaia e ia he ture kia kore ai te tangata e poka noa; e onioni i waenga pārae
I hangaia te tāwhiti ki te ara kiore.
I hangā e Kīngi Horomona he amo mōna, nō Repanona te rākau
I hangā e te kiore tana kōhanga kia āhuru ai ia i te takurua
I hangā e te kiore tana kōhanga kia āhuru ai ia i te takurua . . . Ināianei, auē! Mongamonga noa taua kōhanga
I hangā te arahanga rā hei ara ki tāwāhi o te awa.
I haramai au i uta, e whano ana au ki tai
I haria atu he pūtoi putiputi, me ngā pūtoi karepe.
I haria ia ki te ture, he raweke tamariki nōna.
I haria iho ia ki te pūwaha o te awa o Waiaua, ki Te Rangiomatanui, ki ngā kirikiri o te urupā o Ngāti Rua tāpukena ai. Kāre he mea whakaatu i tana rua kōiwi
I haria tana waka kia whakakorehia atu te waikura.
I haria te tūroro kia whakaorangia ake e te tohunga.
I hauā, ki tōku whakaaro, te urunga o ngā hanga a te Pākehā hei āwhina i ngā mahi a te Māori, arā ngā mea whakatangitangi a te Pākehā, te piana, te whira, te kōriana
I hea koe i te pō rā?
I hea kē kōrua ko tō kurī e ngaro ana?
I hea rātou i roto i ngā tau maha i aurere ai ngā Māori i te taimahatanga o ngā mate huhua i runga i a rātou?
I hemo ia ki tōna kāinga, ka tangihia i te marae matua o te iwi.
I herea te taura mātotoru mai i tētahi motokā ki tētahi kia pai ai te tō.
I heri tīwēwē noa iho, kāore he mea hei rau
I heua katoatia ana makawe, he io roa i te tipuaki anake i mahue.
I hiahia anō te tamaiti ki te haumiri i te ngeru engari i te matawhiwhiu tonu ki te tauhou.
I hiahia ia ki te haere ki te Kura Minita mō te kauhau i te Rongopai ki taku iwi
I hiahia te tamaiti kia haere katoa mai ana hoa ki tana rā huritau.
I hikina ake te taupoki o te kōhua kia pai ai tana pihongi i ngā kai.
I hiko mai ngā rama o te waka kātahi tonu ka hipa atu, ki te whakatūpato i a au.
I hinga i ngā mate o te ao, otirā he koroheke anō tētahi wāhi o te mate
I hipa atu ngā moni i kohia i tērā i tūmanakohia, nō reira e harikoa katoa ana ngā kaiwhakahaere.
I hoatu ana rau huia me tana mōtoi pounamu ki tētahi papa.
I hoatu anō he moni hei kawe i ngā tāngata kia whakaae ki tāna i pīrangi ai.
I hoatu he pou mātotoru hei whata i te papa o te whare hou.
I hohoni kau te matā (i te kiri), kīhai i ngoto
I hohoni kau te matā, kīhai i ngoto
I hoki ki ōna ripoinga o mua, ka tūpono atu ki tētahi o ana hoa piripono o tana ohinga.
I hoki mai au i te pākihi
I hoki mai au inakuarā. Kāore anō au kia whai wā ki te whakarongo ki ngā karere i te waea.
I hoki mai i te pakanga tuarua o te ao, kei waho he riwha, kei roto he riwha.
I hoki mai ia inatahirā.
I hokona e ia he pūtoi putiputi nui tonu hei whakawhere i tana wahine.
I hokona he hāte tāhekeheke, he kahurangi uri, he kahurangi tea ngā tae.
I hokona he rangitoto hei huna i te papanga i horaina hei tātāmi i ngā otaota i te māra.
I horahora ia i ana whakairo ki te iwi kia tirohia e rātau.
I horapa katoa te takiwā o Ngāti Porou i te autaia mate nei
