Nō te Tūrei te 28 o ngā rā o Āperira ka hinga te tōtara whakamutunga o te ihu o te waka nei o Mātaatua
Nō te Wenerei i nehua ai te tūpāpaku. Auina rawa ake, ka keria ake e ngā tuākana, ka kahakina ki te raki.
Nō te Wenerei ia i mate ai; aoake nui, kua mate ana roro i te aituā waka.
Nō te ahiahi ka kapi te wai i te tūpoupou, te aonga ake o te rā ka kitea te hanga nei e pūkai ana ki uta
Nō te aitanga a pepeke te wētā, te kēkerewai me te huhua noa atu o ngā ngārara.
Nō te ariki tērā tūranga, e kore e taea e te kāraroraro.
Nō te ata hāpara ka tukituki ngā taua, nō te ahiahi rā anō o taua rā ka mutu te putakari.
Nō te ata i haere ai te taua, ka whiriwhiria e ngā pakeke kaua a Kaiihu e haere, he tamariki rawa nōna
Nō te ata nei i haere ai a Te Hinahina, i hoe ai ki te titiwha kahawai
Nō te hapūtanga kātahi ka whakakite i a ia ki a Tāwhaki, ka noho iho i te ao nei; na kātahi ka mōhio a Tāwhaki nō te rangi tēnei wahine
Nō te hau koe e pū mai nei ki taku kiri?
Nō te hekenga iho i tērā taha, ka kite atu mātou i tētahi puke anō, hōhā noa iho mātou i te pikinga, otirā e taea hoki te aha
Nō te hikutau noa nei tāku i onokia ai
Nō te hoenga, ka makere te koromutu hinu a Kahu
Nō te hokinga mai ka toimaha haere tōna mate, tae noa ki tana matenga rawatanga i ngā rā o Mei kua mahue ake nei
Nō te horoitanga ka rongo i te tuapuku i tana ū.
Nō te hui ki Ngāruawāhia i te 2 o Mei, 1858 ka whakawahia a Pōtatau ki ngā kupu o Te Paipera e Wiremu Tāmehana Tarapīpipi
Nō te hurahanga i ngā hāngī ka kitea e mata tonu ana - he tohu aituā
Nō te hūnga, kitea ana ngā hua o te ahi tipua - he tokarewa, he pungarehu, he auahi.
Nō te itinga tēnei wahine i taumau ai
Nō te kaikaranga te reo tuatahi ka rangona ka whakaeke ana he ope i te marae.
Nō te karangatanga Mollusca tēnei mea te ngata.
Nō te katanga a tīwaiwaka i a Māui-tikitiki-a-Taranga i kūtia ai e Hinenuitepō, ā mate ana.
Nō te kaunga o te kurī ki te wai, ka romia e te ripo
Nō te kitenga i ngā kanohi o te tangata whenua o te marae, ka oho te ngākau aroha, ka whai i muri ko te matamata rongo.
Nō te kitenga i te Pākehā ka kīia e ngā mātua he tangata pora
Nō te kitenga i te auahi nui e puta ana i tō rātou maunga, ka pā te anoano ki te iwi.
Nō te kitenga mai o te hoariri . . . ka tukua mai ētahi o rātou hei hunuhunu
Nō te kitenga o ngā mahi hē a taua whakahaere, ka rihaina te kaihautū.
Nō te kiwi ngā ngutu roa katoa o ngā manu māori.
Nō te kumenga mai o Rāpata i tana aho, ka kite atu a ia kua tāweka kē tana aho ki tā Miritene
Nō te manawa kē tēnei toka, engari i roto i ngā tau tini whāioio kua panaia ki runga, e taea atu ai e te tangata.
Nō te mapi te hē. He porotaitaka hoki nō te ao, he papatairite nō te mapi
Nō te marama o Māehe 1932 i whakamātau ia ki te kauhoe kia 100 hāora te roa, engari 60 hāora noa tana kaha, ka puta ake ia i te wai
Nō te marama o Pēpuere, ka haria atu au e taku whāea whāngai ki Tūranga
Nō te matenga o Hāmiora i Hune 1918, ka whakatūria kia rua ngā kaiwhakahaere, kaitiaki hoki mō āna rawa pūhetī
Nō te matenga o Te Arikinui a Te Atairangikaahu, ka tohua ko Tuheitia hei whakakapi.
Nō te matenga o ana kuia, koroua ka noho ko ia te whītiki o te kī, ko ia te pū.
Nō te matenga o te ahi ka kitea ngā tinana o ngā Māori tokowhitu e takoto ana i roto i te ngārahu, kua mate
Nō te mea e kārangirangi noa ana ō māua whakaaro, he tau pai rānei, he tau āwhā rānei
Nō te mea kua riro katoa taua takiwā i ngā taumau a ngā tāngata tokotoru
Nō te mea kua tae ake te mate ki roto ki ō tātou matapihi, kua tomo ki ō tātou whare kīngi, hautope atu ai i ngā kōhungahunga i waho, i ngā taitamariki anō hoki i ngā huanui
Nō te mea kua tae he rongo kino ki a rātou, harotu kau rātou:
Nō te meatanga atu ki a Te Hāpuku kia panaia te Hauhau, kāore tērā i rongo, ka kī mai e kore e tukuna e ia
Nō te moemoetanga, ka ao mai a Irawaru
Nō te moko tuauri pea ngā wheua tahito i kitea i te parenga o te kōawa.
Nō te mutunga o te pōwhiri ka whakawhiti taonga ngā rangatira e rua, i runga anō i ngā tikanga o ērā whenua.
Nō te ngaromanga o aku tamariki, ka pā te āwangawanga ki a au.
Nō te ngeru te perehunga e mau nei ki ngā ringa o te nohoanga.
Nō te pakarutanga mai o tētehi ngaru nui ka whati mai, ka kōripo i ngā taha o te toka kōhatu, ka hāpainga tētehi pito o te waka, ka piua e te ngaru, ka maunu mai i te taha o te kōhatu
Nō te paunga ki roto kātahi ka kumea te tau, kātahi ka rōpine mai ā rāua kupu ki te tangere o te pūtea
Nō te puku kē tēnei mea te riri.
Nō te putanga i te whare kani rākau, paru katoa ana ōku kaka i te repo rākau.
Nō te putanga mai o Tari i te urupā, ka tāuhi i ōna ringaringa me tōna pane ki te wai kia noa ai ia.
Nō te putanga mai o te tuna nui ki waho o te rua, ka whakatare ngā tamariki kia mau i a rātou.
Nō te putanga o te uruhanga tonga ka totohu i te kī rawa i te witi
Nō te pō o te wiki, ka hui mātou ki te whare, ka moe mātou, ka tītaha te marama, ka tau te kurī
Nō te pōti o 1884, ka hinga a Tomoana i a Wī Pere, engari kīhai tana mana rangatira i taiharahara
Nō te pūkaha te kaha e huri ai ngā wīra o te waka.
Nō te pūtoi 'Gastropoda' tēnei mea te ngata.
Nō te rautau tekau mā iwa i whakamāoritia ai te Paipera Tapu.
Nō te rerenga atu o te Hāwea i Pōneke, ā, ahu ana ko Te Waipounamu, i mea ai te kāpene o taua tima kia hūtia ngā kōmaru, kia tere ai te tima i te hau tika
Nō te rima i te ata i wehe mai ai mātau i Tahiti, ā, ko te wera hoki o te rangi, ahakoa i te moata tonu
Nō te ringihanga i ngā kai ki waho o te hīnaki, ngaweki ana te tuatara, ka oma ngā tamariki i te mataku i te ngārara
Nō te rironga mai o tana Tohu Kairangi, ka kuhuna te taitara 'Tākuta' ki mua i tana ingoa.
Nō te rongonga i a koe e tokopūhā ana ka kata mātou katoa.
Nō te rongonga i te kurī, ka tāruke ngā kaitāhae kia kore ai e mau.
Nō te rongonga kua hinga tō rātou matua ka tīmata ngā kuia ki te koto.
Nō te rongonga kua mā te wāhi rā, kātahi te iwi ka hoki ki reira.
Nō te rua karaka i whānau ai a Mārama, e waru pāuna te taumaha o tana pēpē, he tāne.
Nō te rua tau rawa i muri mai ka houhia te rongo.
Nō te rā pea e kai tangata ana ka inoino rātou ki tēnei wehenga, ki tērā wāhi rānei o ngā wheua, o ngā whatīanga rānei, o ngā kāpiro rānei
Nō te taenga atu ka pātaihia, 'Ā, kai whea te nui o Tūhoe?' Ko te whakahoki a Te Purewa, 'Ira!'
Nō te taenga atu ka pātaihia: 'Ā, kai whea te nui o Tūhoe?' Ko te whakahoki a Te Purewa: 'Ira!' Ka tohu ki tōna kotahi
Nō te taenga atu o te tākuta, kua popohe kē.
Nō te taenga atu o te whai a Tūtetawhā me tana ope ki reira, kātahi ka huakina mai e te matua nui a Waikato
Nō te taenga ki ngā marama pakatiti o te tau, ka matemate ētahi o ngā tāngata o tērā takiwā.
Nō te taenga ki te hukapapa, ka mahia mai e tō mātau pāpā he papareti e pai ai tā mātou panunu haere.
Nō te taenga ki te rā o ngā poroporoaki nāku ngā mihi i uhi ki te iwi kāinga
Nō te taenga ki tātahi ka rapa ngā tamariki kātahi ka whiu haere i te pōro.
Nō te taenga mai ki Aotearoa nei, ka moemoe i ngā wāhine o ngā iwi i konei
Nō te taenga mai o ngā heremana a Kāpene Kuki, ka kitea te uhi e tupu ana i te Tai Rāwhiti.
Nō te taenga mai o te Pākehā, ka whakarērea ake ngā whao kōhatu, ka tahuri atu ki ngā whao maitai
Nō te taenga o te ika ki runga ka mīmiro te moana
Nō te taenga o te ika rā ki uta, ka tuakina te puku
Nō te takaitanga i ngā rā me te tukutanga i kīia ai ko te rā puhoro
Nō te takoto papatairite ka kīia he tuakahiwi; mehemea ka auheke, ka kīia he karahiwi
Nō te tangohanga o tana taonga tākaro, ka tāruke te tamaiti, me te auē anō o te waha.
Nō te tatanga atu ki te kāinga, ka apū te kurī
Nō te tataunga o Taranga i ana tamariki, tokorima kē rātou, kāhore i tokowhā
Nō te tau 1854 ka tū ngā riri taua whenua a Puketapu, i te taha marangai o Motunui, ki a rātou anō
Nō te tau 1881 i pāhuatia ai a Parihaka e ngā hōia o Ingarangi.
Nō te tau 1883 ka whakatūturutia taua whakaaro, ka pāhitia hei Tūranga nei taua kura
Nō te tau 1902 ka hokona mai te rōnihi korohū a Te Waiwiri. I whakamahia i te tīmatanga hei tō i ngā tohorā me ngā waka aru tohorā
Nō te tau 1925, i tautohea e ia te tūru mō te rohe Māori ki Te Tonga
Nō te tau 1930, ka hangaia te Hōro Whakamauharatanga ki a Arihia i Waiomatatini, hai hoa mō Porourangi, te whare tipuna o Ngāti Porou
Nō te tau 1932 i rongo ai te minita nei a Te Hīmoa . . . i te reo panguru tino kaha nei o Īnia e waiata mai ana i te tira rōreka o te whare karakia o Rangiātea
Nō te tau 1967 ia i whānau mai ai.
Nō te tau 1980 ka tīmata tana mahi i reira.
Nō te tau i muri mai i whakaatu anō ia i āna mahi i te whakakitenga o te motu mō ngā mahi wūru, i Ōtepoti
Nō te tau kotahi mano, waru rau, whā tekau i hainatia ai te Tiriti o Waitangi.
Nō te tauhouanga i moe tahi ai rāua, ā, nō tēnei tau i whānau mai ai tā rāua pēpi.
Nō te taunga o te hā kawa ki tōna arero, ka tuwhatuwha i ngā kai.
Nō te toru karaka i te ata ka mutu tēnā kanikani. Kua ngenge katoa ngā waewae, kua hiamoe ngā kanohi
Nō te tuakitanga o te puku o te taniwha, ka horo mai ngā pounamu a te hunga kua kainga e ia.
Nō te turakanga o te taiapa, ka konikoni ngā kararehe ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Nō te tīmatanga anō hoki o Te Māori ki Aotearoa nei, ka whakatapua te kōhatu nei, ka tapaina ko Te Māori
Nō te tōanga o Tainui i Ōtāhuhu, kotahi tauparapara, ka rua, ka toru . . . ka tekau; nō te mea he karakia tonu ēnei tauparapara
Nō te tūnga ake o Te Hata ki te kōrero, ka kī ia kore rawa ana wehewehe i te hunga kūpapa me te hunga whana
Nō te ua nui o ngā whenua i te taha ki te tonga, arā, i Nūpia, i waipuke ai te Naire
Nō te waka rererangi ērā rama e muramura mai rā.
Nō te wareatanga e te moe o te tangata ka haere te wahine nei, ka oma
Nō te wehenga atu i te kura ka mahi taku koroua i runga i te pāmu.
Nō te whaene ngā makawe, ko te ihu nō te pāpara.
Nō te whakatatanga mai o te hoariri, ka oma ngā tautauā.
Nō te whakatupuranga mai i te tamaiti a Whata, i a Whātongakūao, e rima ngā whakatupuranga ki tāna mokopuna, ki a Rākaimaro
Nō te wharanga o tōku tuke ka takaia tōku ringa katoa e te tapuhi.
Nō te whiunga atu ki roto i te moana, e horoi ana i te paruparu kia mā
Nō te whānautanga o Te Ataihaea, he kōtiro, kua hiahia tō mātau māmā kia riro mai i a ia hai whāngai māna
Nō te whānautanga o ā māua tamariki ka āhua rata mai taku poupou ki a au.
Nō te whāwhātanga atu o Te Pēhi mā, o Te Mete mā, i tika tonu atu aua kōrero rā ki tā rātou titiro; he kōrero pono katoa
Nō te whāwhātanga atu, na, ngāhorohoro noa iho
Nō te ūnga ki Whangaparāoa ka kitea te rātā e puāwai ana, ka whiua aua kura ki te wai
Nō tua iho nō aku tūpuna taku mana, ehara i konei.
Nō tua whakarere, nō te ao kōhatu rā anō.
Nō tua, nō whakapata
Nō tāikarehā te kuia i hinga ai. Hei āpōpō ka tanumia.
Nō tāinahi rā tana rā huritau, engari hei te pō nei whakanuitia ai.
Nō tāinanahi nei i kohia ai ngā pipi, kua waiho kia tuhatuha i te pō rā, hei te rangi nei kainga ai.
Nō tātou tēnei whenua.
Nō tāua tonu tērā koroua, neha?
Nō tēnei whakatipuranga, kua Pākehā nei te āhua, ngā mahi, me ngā kahu
Nō tēnei wā ka huhua, ka putuputu ō tātau aituā, ngaro ana te momo o te tangata ki te pō
Nō tērā tau ka kōrero tahi rātou ko Te Mākarini, ka whakaotia hoki i reira te nuinga o ngā raruraru
Nō tērā wiki rāua i hoki mai ai.
Nō tētahi haerenga ōna, ka hinga tana hōiho, ka marū tōna tinana
Nō tētahi rangi ka wareware te tangata nei, kātahi anō ka mokohiti mai te nanakia nei te ngeru, e, ka raru rā hoki ngā kūao kākā a te tangata rā
Nō tētahi rangi, e purei ana rātau i te papa tākaro, kātahi ka haua mai te pōro e tētahi o ngā wāhine, whewheo ana te haere
Nō tētahi wā ka uru te tamaiti rā ki roto ki ngā mahi āhuareka, e kīia nei e te waiata, 'ki te tī, te whai, te tokoraurepe', ki ngā mahi a te rēhia, a te harakoa
Nō tētehi o ōna haerenga ki Taranaki i te takiwā o 1864, i whakarērea iho e ia tētehi o āna tino ohaoha pēnei nā: 'Kei a koe Taranaki tētehi kīwei o te kete, kei a au kei a Waikato tētehi'
Nō tō mātau tirohanga atu, auē he ahi kē, e mura ana i runga i ngā kāpuhipuhi o ngā rākau
Nō tō māua taenga ki te papa kōhatu i kō rawa atu, kua ngaro ngā tapuae
Nō tō rātau mōhiotanga he hōia ērā, kātahi rātau ka puta mā muri o te pā
Nō tōku whakatikanga ake, ka taiparatia mai au
Nō tōna pāngia e te ikura roro i te tau 1958, kua kore ia e kaha ki te kōrero
Nō wai ngā ngutu kāore e pātotoi i te hau tonga nei!
Nō wai te kāmeta e mau nā koe?
Nō wai te tou e rōria mai nā? Haria ki waho!
Nō whea e hoki ake tō kōiwi ora ki te ao?
Nō ōku kauheke tōku mana, nō te hunga mata niwhaniwha i tāia ai ki te uhi a Mataora.
Nōhea e aro mai te taringa mārō ki tā tātou e inoi nei.
Nōhea e pūnaunau ai te poaka.
Nōhea hoki e paweketia ai te manu ki te māhanga ruharuha.
Nōhea hoki e raupā ai ngā ringa o te tangata waimori.
Nōhea hoki e raupā ngā ringa o tērā kaikora!
Nōhea hoki e rere te heihei parirau porepore?
Nōhea i tika ai tēnei mahi hē, e waiho nei te wahine hei tonotono mā te tangata, hei kaimahi i ngā mahi uaua mō te tangata?
Nōhea rā tērā iwi e toiere haere rarā?
Nōku ake ēnei whakaaro, ehara nō te tangata kē.
Nōku anō ōku whakaaro.
Nōku ka pakeke, ka āhua kōingo ki ngā kai o taku itinga.
Nōku te heahea ki te pōhēhē ka noho matatapu tāku i whāki atu ai ki a ia, mōhio rawa ake, kua puta kē ki te ao!
Nōku te hē - i taku kore e kī atu me tango rawa ō rātou hū.
Nōku te hē.
Nōku te motukā whero rā, he mea hoko e au i tērā tau.
Nōku te māngari i whakaaetia taku haere atu i tō rāua taha.
Nōku te rewharewha nō Te Tai Tokerau tō pāpā, ka whakatikaina mai au e te kuia rā.
Nōku tonu ēnei tōkena e mau nei au.
Nōku tēnā whakaaro, nō reira nōku anō te hē.
Nōna anō tōna mate - me mutu tana mahi i runga i te pōrārā.
Nōna anō tōna wairangi ki te tāhae moni i tana wāhi mahi.
Nōna e tūroro ana i te hōhipera, ka āwhitu tōna ngākau ki ngā kai o te kāinga.
Nōna i reira, ka whakamahia ia ki te peita pikitia, utua rawatia hoki
Nōna ka rongo i ahatia ngā mauhere i taua whenua, ka whakarihariha a roto i a ia, ka whakapairuaki.
Nōna ka taiohi, ka ānau, he piri pouaka whakaata te mahi.
Nōna ka taipakeke, ka takahuri ki te whakapono Katorika.
Nōna te hiahia i tū mai kia heuea mai te tinana, kia whakanoaia te tapu
Nōna te hōiho pango. E noho taonga tonu ana ki a ia taua hōiho.
Nōna tētahi reo ātanga - me te korimako nei te rite.
Nōnahea i mana ai te whakahau kia whakamutua te kai paipa i ngā pāparakāuta?
Nōnahea i titoa ai ēnei tuhinga āu?
Nōnakuanei tonu au i rongo ai - e kakapa tonu nei tōku manawa.
Nōnanahi nei i tae mai ai te rongo. Hei te rangi nei mātou ka tae atu.
Nōnaoakenui i mate ai, hei te ata nei tukuna ai ki te kōpū o Papatūānuku.
Nōnapō rāua i tae mai ai, nō waenganui pō tonu - koinei e moeroa nei.
Nōnatahirā i tūngāwiri ai, i tīmata ai te rere o te hūpē, e rere tonu nei.
Nōnāianei hoki i whānau ai he Kaiwhakaora mō koutou i te pā o Rāwiri, arā a te Karaiti, te Ariki
Nōu anake te takataka i kōroria ki te rau o te tewhatewha
Nōu anō te kaha, e hoa.
Nōu anō ōu whakaaro mō te whakapakeke tamariki, nōku anō ōku.
Nōu te rorirori ki te omaoma i te ara kirikiri me te kore hū.
Nōu tonu te pōro ki te whakatū i tō waka ki reira mō te ono hāora. Kaitoa kia tōia atu.
O ngā kaupeka e whā o te tau, ko te kōanga te wāhanga e tūmanako nuitia ana e ngā koroua, e ngā kuia, e 'kō' ai i tana waerenga, i tana waerenga
O ngā korowai katoa i tukua mai ki a ia, i āta meinga e ia hei taonga whakarākai i roto i tōna wharenui
O ngā ngāngara ngokingoki katoa, ko te whakapapa o te tuatara te tino tawhito rawa
O ngā ngāngara ngokingoki katoa, ko te whakapapa o te tuatara te tino tawhito rawa. He wā anō i whai parirau ai ngā ngāngara ngokingoki, arā, i rere pērā me te manu
O ngā tāngata katoa e mōhio ana au, ko ia te mea tino hūmārie.
Oho ake ki te ao, he moe tahurangi noa, e haere tonu ana koe.
Oho ake ki te ao, mapu kau au ki taku moenga
Oho ake ki te ao; kei rangitawhiti koe, nā te kamo i rehu mai
Oho ana te mauri, taukuri kau ana, haere, e whae, haere rā
Oho rawa ake i 'tahi rangi, mapu kau noa ana a Pōtiki ki tōna wahine ka riro
Oho rawa ake, ka kite iho kei te hōhipera a ia, ka āniwa ngā whakaaro.
Oho tonu ake au i te koukou a te ruru, ahakoa he tangi hārearea noa.
Okaokangia he peka mō tā tātou ahi
Okeoke kau ana te nauwhea rā
Oma atu ana te rāpeti ki roto i te puna, whai atu ana te kurī i a ia.
Oma kōtaha atu ana ngā pāpaka ki raro i ngā toka o te takutai.
Omanga a tima mai nōu, e Kāwana, kai tonu ki te rae o Te Matau rā, ia, ē
Opaina atu ki te kōwhatu
Ope tonu i te kuku ki runga i te ahi, kua maoa
Opī ana au i te pūngāwerewere, ahakoa pēhea te pakupaku.
Ora iti ana tēnā ika i te tangoro o taku aho.
Ora katoa te iwi i te korita o te tūtei.
Oraiti ngā tāngata o roto, ko ō rātou kākahu me ā rātou hanga e kōrerotia ana, i pau katoa
Oraora ana taku waha, ko ngā upokokōhua, ko nohomutu
Ore ana te kiri o te hōiho i te taunga atu o te ngaro ki tana pokohiwi.
Orooro noa Ngāti Maru, kīhai i rere tētahi, kīhai i aha
Orotā ana tērā te tangata whenua i te patunga a te taua; kāhore he mōrehu
Otiia e kore e tika kia tā nūpepa te Kāwanatanga hei tūtara i te iwi, ā ko te tino hē rawa ko te mahi kōrero tūtara a taua nūpepa i tētahi o ngā mema o te Runga Pāremata Ariki
Otiia e kore e wai māori ngā wāhi oru o reira, me ngā repo o reira
Otiia he tokomaha kei te mahi hē, arā, e noho noa iho ana, e whakanoa ana i ngā hāpati tapu a Ihowā, e haurangi ana, e kanga ana
Otiia i tētahi e tua ana i te rākau, ka marere te pane o te toki ki te wai
Otiia ko ngā ingoa o ngā kaimahi, ka tūātia ki te ingoa hou
Otiia ko tā te ngākau māori kia kaua e tirohia e te tangata kaha ngā mea o te tangata kahakore
Otiia ko tō rātou rangatiratanga kua kāhore kē tā te mea kua wakaora rātou, kua tiaki i te tangata tāhae
Otiia kāore he kupu e ahu ana ki te whakaatu ko wai a Te Motu, e kīia nei nāna tēnei oriori, ā, ko wai hoki a Rangitūmua mōna nei tēnei oriori
Otiia kīhai rātou i pai ki a ia hei kīngi, amuamu anō rātou ki a ia, tangi ana kia whakaritea mai he tangata nei anō hei kīngi mō rātou
Otiia, ko te tikanga o te karakia i haere ai ēnei atua, he whāngai
Otiia, nō te huringa i te torouka i Te Whai-a-Pawa, hei reira ka ū ki uta
Otirā e whaiāipo ana hoki taua wahine nei ki te tāne o Te Uri o te Āti Hāpai
Otirā he karakia hiki, he kōranga, he whakamaiangi ake anō tētahi
Otirā he tini he mano ngā whetū kei te takiwā o te rangi, i waenganui o te rā me te ao, engari kāore e kitea ana e tātau i te awatea, i te kaha o te kanapa o ngā hihi o te rā
Otirā he tini, he mano ngā whetū kei te takiwā o te rangi, i waenganui o te rā me te ao
Otirā i a au e haere ana, e mahara tonu ana au ki ngā kupu a ōku koroua me ā rātau ohākī
Otirā i hōhā te wāhine nei ki tana tāne, ka pūremu. I whakakorea te mārena, ka mārama tīahoaho, ehara i te mea mā te moni e mau ai te aroha
Otirā i mātua tūpato tōna ngākau ki tana wahine, kei pororuatia e Tamatekapua
Otirā i runga i te kupu a Hori Mahue kāhore i karangatia he hui heoi anō i nanao te iwi nui ki ō rātou pūkoro, ā, ea tonu atu ngā taumahatanga o te whare
Otirā ia iwi tāna tikanga anō, ia iwi tāna tikanga anō
Otirā ka puke ake anō te wai, ka pakaru te tūtaki, ka whakangaromia ngā mea katoa e ārai ana i te rerenga nui o te wai
Otirā kei te mahora tonu te whakapono, te karakia, ki runga ki te takiwā nui takoto ai
Otirā kei te mōhio anō au ki ngā tāngata nā rātou nei i whakahau kia tukitukia
Otirā kia nui te kakara o ngā puāwai, kia tatakī ki te ringa, ka mōhiotia kua pakari, kua tae ki te wā hei kōwhakitanga
Otirā ko ngā mea e tūtata atu ana ki a ia kāore i te mīharo, engari kei te mōhio ki te nui o tōna whakamanawanui ki tōna mate
Otirā ko ngā take raruraru anō o ngā rā o mua mai rā anō kei te pēhi i tō rātou pukumahi
Otirā ko te iwi Hāmi anake i kātata mai ki a tātou nei, arā, he tangata whenua kua pēhia e te rāwaho
Otirā ko te ngākau takitahi kei te whakakoromaki kia tae ia, kia tae tāna tamaiti tāna mokopuna, rāua nei, rātou nei rānei ki te huinga o ngā tamariki
Otirā ko tēnei taonga nui ko te kata he ngāwari noa, kāore he utu, heoi anō ko te pupuhi ake o ngā pāpāringa, ko te pupuri hoki i ngā kaokao
Otirā kāore a Kupe i noho, i hoki anō ia ki tāwāhi
Otirā kāore e pānuitia ana e taua nūpepa ngā kōrero katoa a te Minita Māori; engari ko ngā wāhi anake o ana kōrero e paingia ana e rātou kia whakaaria ki ngā Māori
Otirā kāore i mārama tā mātou rongo ki taua kōrero, he rongo hakiri noa
Otirā kāore i tino whakatuwheratia te tatau i taua wā, i whakamatatatia kautia mai, kāore i whakatuwheratia, nō reira whakatatare kau atu, whātatai kau atu, kāore he mea i kitea atu
Otirā kāore mātau i te mōhio ki te nui o tō mātau hē i taikaha rawa ai ana kupu
Otirā kīhai i roa ka rongo ia ki te mamae o ngā matikuku o tētahi mea e rarapi ana i ōna kaokao me ōna peke
Otirā nā te hē mārire o ā te tangata, āna tikanga, i pera ai
Otirā tā te wahine, whānau mai he tamaiti, tāmia ana, whānau mai, tāmia ana
Otirā, e hoa mā, mehemea i konei tonu koutou ka mīharo koutou pēnei hoki me mātou, mākona ana te kanohi, mākona ana te taringa, mākona ana te waha, ora ana te ngakau
Otirā, ka tupu ngātahi, ka rite ngātahi, ka rangatira ngātahi, ka whakakotahitia
Otirā, kaore i taea engari ko te whakawhetai ia o te ngākau, nui atu
Otirā, kei te āhua whakaaro anō au ki te haere kia kite i a ia, kia tūtaki māua, he kanohi ki te kanohi
Otirā, ko te nuinga o ngā ingoa kua takataka i roto i ngā tau, engari ko ētehi o aua hapū e taea anō te whakaingoa i runga i ngā kōrero kua puta ake i roto i ēnei tuhituhinga
Otirā, kāore a Kupe i noho, i hoki anō ia ki tāwāhi; ko ngā tohu i waiho i konei, ko tōna tinana i hoki anō
Otirā, kīhai au i whakapono ki āna kupu katoa i tuhi mai ai i tērā tau
Otirā, mā te kura ka mātau ngātatahi tātou ki ngā mea katoa
Otirā, noho ake ana ia, he tōti nei tāna, ā, pānui pukapuka ai i te pō
Otirā, nō te roanga, nō te huranga ake o ia whārangi o ēnei tuhituhinga ka pōhanehane au me te patapatai tonu iho
Otirā, nō te tau 1921, i tukua e Rātana tētahi reta ki ngā nūpepa hei waonga mō āna mahi
Pae ana te ika tangata
Pae ana te ika tangata ki tō matua i te muri
Pae ana tētahi kaipuke ki waho tonu o taua wahapū, ko ngā heramana i piki ki runga ki ngā rewa, kei whiua e te ngaru ki te wai
Paea mai ngā pārua o te umu kia hoki mai ai te mamaoa ki roto
Paerangitia te pū ki Wharekohu kia nui ō tohu ki runga ki tō rangi
Pahemo ana te kariri, purere tonu atu te tia.
Paheno tonu atu te poraka i taku ringa - nā te hūwareware i kore ai e mau.
Pahikara ai te tāne ki te mahi kia wātea ai te motukā ki tana wahine me ngā tamariki.
Pahore ana tērā ngā tuarā o te hunga kāinga i te pīkaunga engari ahakoa tērā i takoto a tahora nui
Pai ana te hoehoe i ngā wai uha o Te Tai Tamawahine.
Pai ana te tere haere o ngā waka rā i te kōtengitengi.
Pai ana te whakatopa a te manu taratahi rā runga i te kōkō.
Pai ana tērā te kōrero atu ki te hunga kua roa e pīkau ana i te kaupapa, e tiro ana ki ngā piki me ngā heke o te mahi nei
Pai ana tērā te rangi o tana waiata - ka mau tonu ki te hinengaro.
Pai atu te ngaronga o te Pīhopa rātou ko ōna hoa Pākehā i taua hui kia māhorahora ai te kōrero
Pai kau hoki ki a au kia mōhio ai au
Pai noa atu ki a ia ngā pakiwaituhi kua tāngia mai mō Māui, tēnā i ngā mea mō Miki Kiore mā.
Pai noa iho tana raku mai i taku ringaringa, kua noho āritarita nei au.
Pai tonu ki a au kia peka māori mai, kia peka matawhawhati mai aku hoa ki te kite i a au.
Pai tonu tana āhua i a ia e takoto ana i runga i tana kauamo
Pakakē ana te kohikohi peka mō tā rātou ahi. Kāore i roa kua kā, kei runga hoki te parai, me ngā tōtiti e hihī mai ana
Pakapaka ana te whenua i te kore āwhā.
Pakapaka taioreore te ahi ki runga ki te upoko o Te Rohika
Pakare kau ana te roto i te kōhengihengi.
Pakaru ana ngā wini i te ānewa o te rangi.
Pakaru ririki ana te kaipuke i te ākau.
Pakeke tonu, e kore e ngawhere
Pakipaki kau au ki te tuakiri o te whare
Pakiri ana ō rātou niho ki te kata i te mahinga o taua mea, he mahara hoki e tahuna ana hei kai
Pakora ana te waha ina ngote mai i ngā roro o te pane ika.
Paku noa te tāwhati haere o te iāri, kia kore ai e hārotoroto te wai.
Pakē mai ana te manga, korowhiti tonu atu te kuia.
Pakō ana te pū, kairere tonu atu te poaka ki te ururua.
Pakō ana te pū, kohema tonu atu te wahine rā.
Pakō ana te pū, rere ana te mahi a te pārera ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Pakō ana te pū, tauwhati ana te kāhui manu ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Pakō ana te pū, whati ana te kāwai pārera ki te tī, ki te tā.
Pakū ana ki te ao whānui te toa o ngā kaiwhakahaere āpiha, o ngā hōia o te Rōpū Māori Rua Tekau mā Waru
Pakū ana te pū, pūihi tonu atu ngā kararehe ki te tī, ki te tā.
Panapana noa ana taku mea
Panea!
Pangaia atu ngā kūmara ki te rua.
Pangā atu ana āna kura ki te wai
Pania ai ā mātou parāoa ki te hinu poaka, ka totea, ka kainga.
Pania atu te pata ki te tou me ngā taha o te paepae kia kore ai te rēwena e piri atu i te wā e tunu ana.
Pania tō tuarā kia kore ai e tīkākā.
Pania ō ngutu kia kākaramea.
Panipania te rongoā ki ngā wāhi katoa ōna e pukupuku ana.
Paoa ana te wōnati ki te hama, paparu kau te kai o roto.
Paoa atu ana te titi roa, hāmama kau ana te rākau.
Paoia he roi mā tātou
Paoke ana a Pare i te tomokanga atu i te ana.
Paopaoa iho, e Toko, ngā rākau kei te kanohi, ngā kiokio kei taku rae
Paopaohia atu ana te kōhatu, purere ana ngā whā ki te tī, ki te tā.
Paopaotia atu te titi kia hōhonu tonu.
Paoro ana ngā maunga i tētahi taha, i tētahi taha
Papahū ana te ngau a te toki puta noa i te whārua.
Papaki ana ngā tī kōuka i te pākihiroa.
Paparewarewa ana te oneone o te waharoa i te rite tonu o te takatakahia e te tini tāngata.
Papā te whatitiri, hikohiko te uira, ka horo ngā tihi maunga.
Parahukatia mai te peha, ka kotikoti i te kiko.
Parahutihuti ana te reti iho a tō rāua pānukunuku i te hiwi.
Parangunua he taiawa mā tātou
Paranokenoke ana te whare o Mea - te hia kore kē nei e whakamā!
Pararē ana te reo o te autaua, 'Ko te whakaariki!'
Pararē tonu te māngai o te wahine rā
Paratī ana ngā wai o te hīrere ki tawhiti.
Paratī ana ētahi o ōna toto ki te hāte o tōna hoa whawhai.
Parau tahi ō kōrero!
Parawhenua mea i haramai ai te kōkopu ki uta
Pare: He kōtiro pai a Hine. Rangi: Ehara, he kōtiro tino pai.
Pare: He pai ki a koe te kaiwaiata rā? Rangi: Ehara, kei a au ana kōpae puoro katoa.
Pare: He pai tēnā whakaaro. Rangi: Engari. He whakaaro tino pai.
Pare: I rongo au i a Pīkari e kōhimuhimu ana mōu. Rangi: Hei aha māku!
Pare: Kua oti anō i ngā kōtiro rā te whakapaipai tō rāua rūma? Rangi: Nōhea hoki! E warea kētia ana ki te whakapaipai i ō rāua matikuku
Pare: Kua panaia a Kirikau mā i tō rātou whare. Rangi: I nei? Ka aroha hoki tēnā whānau
Pare: Kāore ia i te haere mai. Rangi: Ehara! Kei te haere tonu mai.
Pare: Kāore koe i te makariri? Rangi: Ehara! Kei te makariri tonu.
Pare: Kāore ō tamariki? Rangi: Engari tonu. E whā, he tāne katoa.
Pare: Me pōhiri pea a Mea ki tā tātou hui. Rangi: Kua mate kē rā. Pare: Ata koia!
Pare: Nā wai i whāki atu? Tū: Ehara i a au.
Parohe kau ana ngā tipu nei i te kore wai.
Parohea ana te tangata i te kaha o te rā
Parua ki te kū whakakīkī āputa kia kī katoa ai ngā kōhao.
Parurutia ā koutou pēke kia pai ai taku tiaki i a koutou e kaukau ana.
Parāoa - 3½ pāuna. Tote - 1 koko iti. Rēwena - 2 koko nui. Wai - ½ panikena kia wera iti nei. Me kōrorirori ēnei katoa, me whakatakoto ki te kāpata kia kotahi hāora
Patu atu taku pehu ki mua me he matakōkiri ānewa i te rangi
Patu hipi ai rāua hai mīti mā rāua
Patua iho aua mano, waiho iho ngā kōhiwi kia paea ana e te tai ki uta
Patua iho, he kaka, ki tahaki tērā; ā ka pūehuehu, mā tana whaiaro tērā
Patua mai taku kupu
Patua rawatia kia mate.
Patua rawatia, kōhungahunga ana tērā, nakunaku noa iho
Patua te kurī nanā, kei waweruka tonu tana hoki mai
Patua te whao kia ngita
Pau ake ki roto ki ngā puku tō rātou ito
Pau ake ngā tahā, tango atu ki ngā papa pātua
Pau noa ngā tau, ka huri ngā tapuwae ki te kōhatu, ā, kei reira tonu i tēnei wā
Pau noa te rā, kua tata pau ngā matikara a Mahuika, mai i ana ringa ki ana waewae, kua tae tata atu ki te mutunga o ana matikara
Pau noa ōna rā i mina haere tonu a Te Pairi ki ngā mahi hōiho, ā, titoa rawatia ana he waiata mōna me ana hōiho
Pau tonu atu ngā kai tāwara, kapea ana ngā kai kawa.
Paupau ana ngā kai a taua iwi pōhara i te pōī rangataua.
Pehopeho ana te ruru i te atapō, kōkō ana te tūī i te atatū.
Pehu mai ana te tou o te waka, hē tonu atu te manawa.
Pehua te mīti kia angiangi ai, kia ngohe ai.
Peia atu ngā moenga kia pā rawa ki ngā pōitoito o te whare.
Peia atu ngā take hauarea ki te taha.
Pekapeka rere ahiahi, hōkioi rere pō
Pena ko au tērā, kua pau katoa ngā moni ki taku whānau.
Pena kāore koe e wātea, tēnā koa waea mai.
Penei me te ika e mau nei ki te pīhuka, he āuta noa
Penua te peha o te poaka ki te hinu kia pakapaka ai ina tunua
Peo ana ngā kōtiro kia tae tuatahi atu ko rātou.
Pere taku titiro te au kai te moana o Tūhua i waho
Piere te rangi i runga nei, ngatā te papa i raro!
Pihetia he kai mā tātou
Piki ai te ngorengore i ngā awa i te kōanga.
Piki ake Tāwhaki i te rangi tuatahi, i te rangi tuarua
Piki ake ai au ki runga o Whitireia, ki te taumata mai te marama i whēteitei ai te uiratanga mai
Piki ake ki te tihi o te taipū kia pai ai te titiro ki te moana.
Piki ake, kake ake i te toi huarewa, te ara o Tāwhaki
Piki mai ki taku tuarā, māku koe e waha ki rāwāhi.
Piki mai, kake mai, homai te waiora ki a au.
Piki mai, piki mai, te matatihi o te rangi
Piki tahi ai te nīoreore me te kōeaea i ngā awa.
Pikitia atu pātū o te rangi
Piopio ē, nau mai rā
Piri ana i tua o te angaangamate o te kapu o te ringa
Piri ana te arero o te tamaiti ngote ū ki te ngao o tōna māngai i te hiainu
Piri ana te hiore o tana kurī ki waenganui o ngā waewae ka titiro kōtaha mai, me he mea nei e whakaaro ana kei te riri rānei tana ariki kei te pēhea rānei
Piri atu ana ki a ia ētahi tāngata, pātata ki te whā rau
Piri katoa mai ngā korakora rino o roto i te kirikiri ki te aukume.
Piri tonu atu te pine pepa ki te aukume.
Piri tonu ō rātou kiri ki ō rātou wheua; kua memenge, kua rite ki te rākau
Piro kai mā te arero e kape
Piro kai, mā te arero e kape
Pitihia ngā piupiu o te kapa ki konā rārangi mai ai i te papa.
Piua atu ana te koromāhanga, ehara, mau pai ana te upoko o te kāwhe.
Pohepohe noa ngā kōtiro i ngā tama e whātero mai ana, e pūkana mai ana i te matapihi.
Pohewa noa au, he ao māngi
Pohū ana te whatitiri, raparapa ana te uira.
Pokepokea kia pupuru, ki tā te parāoa āhua anō
Pokokohua! Kai a te kurī!
Pono tonu anō ko te haramaikuku i teki i taku kiri
Pororangi ana te pae maunga i te atatū.
Pororere ana i waenganui (o te kaipuke), takoto atu ana te kei he wāhi kē, me te pongāihu he wahi kē
Pororua ana te tipu o ngā wana i te pārekereke.
Porotiti ana te poaka i te paru.
Porowhiua ngā para kararehe ki roto i te mārua, ka uhi ki te oneone.
Porowhiua te karukaru o te paukena, kāore e kainga.
Porowhiua te pokokōhua mea rā - kāore noa iho he take.
Potapota noa te waka i te tai
Poto noa ngā karakia i mahia rā ki a Hotupuku
Poto tonu ki roto o tana kupenga, kīhai i taea te korikori
Pounga waihoe ki waho ki te moana
Poupou tonu te hoa o te whare nei
Poutukingia ki te aka maire, ka hinga ki raro.
Puanga kai rau
Puea rawa ake a Hine i te taha o tētahi toka i te moana i tawhiti i te ākau o te tuawhenua
Puehu katoa i a ia e ūkui ana i ngā mahi i te papatuhi, i tuhia ki te tioka.
Pukupuku ana ngā uaua, kukume ana ngā ioio, kakapa ana ngā manawa o te hunga kake kia tae rātou ki te taumata o te paripari
Puna te roimata i paheke hū kei aku kamo
Pupuke ana tērā ngā mahara i te kitenga atu i te koroua whare i noho rā ia i tana ohinga.
Pupuri tonu ia i taua wahine ao noa te rā, kātahi ka paheno atu i ōna ringa i te hauaitu, riro atu ana
Puputa ana te toka i te mahi a te punua kuku.
Pupū ake ana ngā wai, hahana ana te ngiha o te ahi
Purere ana ngā manu i te pakūtanga o te pū.
Purere ana te kōhatu i te tere o te huri o ana wīra.
Puritia ngā hīti ngawhewhe hei horoi i ngā matapihi.
Puritia ngā kauamo i a koe e kake ana i te arawhata.
Puritia ngā mea pūharu, whakahokia ngā mea pakupaku ki a Tangaroa.
Puritia ngā taonga tuku iho kia mau.
Puritia tō kauri hei ō matenga mōu
Purotu ana te kanohi kūpara, he pūkōrero maringi noa te kupu i a ia, ā, he pai hoki ki te waiata
Purua atu te ine-mahana ki raro i tana arero, kia kitea ai tōna pāmahana.
Purua he paka ki roto i tō pēke hei kai māu ka matekai ana koe.
Purua te puta o te waka ki te kākahu
Purua ō taputapu ki roto i te kōnae.
Purupurua te waka kia kore ai te wai e papī mai ki roto.
Purutia ēnā kōrero, ka whāngai atu ki āu ake ā tōna wā.
Purutia, tāwhia kia ita
Purutiti ana ngā rori i te tini, i te mano e oma ana i a Parawhenua.
Purutiti ana te marae i te ope nui i haere mai i Rotorua.
Puta ana ngā kupu whakamiha a te hunga i māngari ki te whai wāhi atu ki tēnei pō whakahirahira
Puta atu ana au ki waho, pōuri hākerekere ana tērā. Kua poko hoki ngā raiti o waho o te rūma
Puta atu awau ki te kāinga, ka rīria awau e aku mātua
Puta kau anō te kōtiro rā, me te rama kāpara i te ringa
Puta kē ki mua, kei te kōhamo te puhi, he tokotoko te rākau, noho iho; puta kē ki tētahi wāhi kōrero ai, e rua puhi kei te rae
Puta mai ai te wētā i te pō ki te kimi kai māna.
Puta mai ana te kōnonohi me te muri aroha i te ngākau ina titiro atu ki te tini o te tamariki e whai ana, e whakatau haere ana i muri i te kāwhena o tō rātou hoa
Puta noa i te wā e ora ana a ia, i mahi tūao ai a Mihi mā te iwi o tōna rohe
Puta pūrehurehu mai te putanga mai ki ahau, ki tōu kaupapa
Puta pūrerehu mai ana, ānō nei he tūruapō.
Puta rawa ake i te ana, kua keko ngā kanohi i te mārama taiahoaho.
Puta rawa ki waho kua kapi tōna kanohi i te toto, kua pākarukaru katoa ōna kahu i ngā kiore
Puta rawa mai te tara o te rā, kei runga o Pouarua e haere ana
Puta tonu ake hoki te whakaaro i a Tūrongo, e ea ai tana mate me riro mai i a ia te puhi rongo nui o te Tai Rāwhiti, a Māhinārangi . . . He ātaahua, ā, e reia ana hoki e te tāne
Puta tonu ki waho tā tāua tamahine, ko Pōnui-a-hine; tatao ki muri, he wahine anō
Putē tonu atu ngā karu i te kitenga i te rahi o te pire hiko.
Pāea rawatia mai te kaumoana ki uta, kua tūrangaranga, engari kei te ora.
Pāhewahewa ana a Hina hei āpōpō te hui, engari nō tērā wiki kē.
Pāhi ana tērā te ngākau i te tino tokoiti o ngā tāngata i whakautu i tana tono.
Pāhia tawa, pāhia pipi, ka taona āianei, āpōpō ka hukea
Pāhitia te tamaiti nei
Pāikea ki te hama
Pākarukaru noa iho ngā tēneti o te Pākehā i roto i tētahi o ngā pā i te matā
Pākinakina ana te rā, pāroherohe ana te tangata.
Pākira kau ana a Hōri i te ngaronga o tana waka i a ia e mātaki ana i te kēmu.
Pākorakora ana ngā ngutu i te matū o te tītī.
Pākēkē ana ōku turi kaumātua.
Pāngunungunua he rīwai mā tātou
Pāngū pai ana au i te nui o te tuna kua pau i a au.
Pāohe ana te kōpū i te kore kai
Pāpakotia te whenua kia ngāwari ai te tupu o te tōrori
Pāpā, i kite au i tētahi mea tauhou! He waka, e Pā, he waka tauhou. He nui ake i tō waka, e Pā, nui ake i te waka o te rangatira, nui ake i ngā waka katoa kua kite au!
Pāpōuri ana rātou i te rongonga i te āhua pāngia koe e te mate
Pārekareka ana ki ngā tamariki te piki haere i ngā tāhuahua i te tahamoana.
Pārekareka ana te mātakitaki i te kauika aihe i hou mai ki te korutanga.
Pāruru tonu te mahinga a tuahangata
Pārūrūtia te hinu me te wairēmana, ka riringi atu ki ngā hua mata.
Pātaihia te ngutu pī rā, māna koe e whakamōhio ki ngā mea katoa!
Pātenehia tō hāte i mua i tō haerenga ki te kura.
Pātākia he kai mā tātou
Pātōtō ana tērā te tai ki ngā toka, koia i horehore ai te ākau.
Pāuraura ana ngā pāpāringa o te hunga omaoma.
Pāwera tonu tōna pāpā ki te napenga o tana karakia tohi
Pēhea koe ina tukia koe e ngā pūru i runga i te puke rā?
Pēhea nei te āhua o te tapatoru rite?
Pēhea te āhua o tēnā kai - he reka anō?
Pēketia mai te tarakihana hei tō atu i te poti ki uta
Pēnei anō te tū mahi a te wahine me ngā mahi e mahi nei te wahine Māori, e hauhake taewa ana, e whiu kāta ana, e parau ana i ngā māra
Pēnei e puoro ana te whare i te hipanga atu o te tereina.
Pēnei e pēhia i te porea nō Tamatere hei kawe atu i ahau
Pēnei he kaitiaki ngā taowaru i te tatau o te whare, e pūkana ana, e whētero mai ana!
Pēnei i te pōro tēnehi nei te rahi o te hukawaitara i ētahi wāhi - koirā i kino ai ngā tuanui me ngā waka.
Pēnei kua oti anō ngā hiahia me ngā wawata, he pō Tangaroa hoki tērā, tēnā ko te pō Korekore, e kore e whai hua te purapura
Pēnei me te tangata e ruku whakataetae nei, ā ka hēmanawa, ka puea, ka puha te hau mā te ihu, mā te waha rānei
Pēnei noa iho nei te rahi o taua ika.
Pēnei tonu mātau tērā te waipuke nei e tahi atu i tō mātau whare me mātau katoa atu, ki te moana
Pēnei tonu tā mātou haere ki te kāinga, me tō mātou matua e wepu haere ana i a matou, tae noa
Pēnā he manuhiri rangatira kua kākahu rangatira nei pēnei i te kākahu huruhuru
Pēnā kua mōhio au, kua kore au i whakaae atu.
Pēnā kua whara tō tuarā, haere ki te kairomiromi kia mirimiria.
Pēnā tonu i te tangi o te repo te whaitiri e tangi ana
Pēpēhia haerehia ngā tapa o te takakau kia mau pai ai te mīti nakunaku ki roto.
Pērā ai koe me te mōkai kākā e noho rā i tana pae, ā ka puta te pōkai kākā
Pērā anō ngā hui nunui, te whakatuwhera wharenui, wharekai rānei
Pērā anō te āhua o ngā kākahu mō te raumati . . . he kahu angiangi noa iho, kia tangi te hau ki roto
Pērā hoki rā te korepe nui, te korepe roa, te wāhi awa, te totoe awa
Pīata ana ngā wai o reira, mārama ana te kite iho i ngā ika muramura, ngā toka, ngā aha noa iho.
Pīataata ana ngā karu o Te Wera
Pīataata ana ngā taonga puoro i hangaia ki te kuratea.
Pīhukatia ana e Maria ngā poro rākau e tere ana i te awa
Pīngongo ana ngā pāpāringa i te kainga ōna e te mate pukupuku.
Pīnohinohia tā tātou poaka
Pīokaokangia he peha mō tā tātou ahi
Pīrangi ana ngā tuākana, pīrangi ana ngā tēina ki a tuawahine
Pīroria atu ana te pōro, ehara, hinga katoa ana ngā poutuki.
Pīroria te mataono tau. Ko te tau ka puta ake e tohu ana kia hia ō nekehanga i te papa tākaro.
Pītoritoriwaitia ana ōna kanohi i te titiro roa
Pō iho ai, ka whiti mai a Hinemoa ki Mokoia
Pō koheko, ata hītakotako.
Pō rawa iho, ka marere ō te māia rā ō Ngātoro, kei te whakaea, kei te kārangaranga i te hau, me te ua, me te whatitiri
Pō rawa iho, ka pō, ka tukuna mai te karere a te wahine nei ki a Ngaere. Ka hoatu te kōrero ki a Ngaere
Pōhaha ana te pūtea
Pōhēhē pai ana mātou i ngā mahi hārakiraki a tō mātou rangatira - ehara hoki ia i te tangata pērā.
Pōike ana te hua o te rākau
Pōkahu ana te tamaiti ko te rā kei te amio i a Papatūānuku.
Pōkaihia te tuaina, ka whakahoki ki te kāpata.
Pōkia ana ōna tau whakamutunga e rua e te raruraru
Pōkia tā tātou umu
Pōkokohua! Kua natu katoa te iwi ki a koe, nā ō mahi tinihanga!
Pōkē ana a Māka i te rongonga kua hinga tana kuia.
Pōkīkī ana te koroua ki te rongo ake ehara nōna ake te whenua kua roa e nohoia ana e ia.
Pōnitiniti ana te wahine ki te mīhini i kai rā i tana kāri moni.
Pōpō ana a Hine i tana kurī, whiuwhiu ana te waero.
Pōpōtia te tamaiti nā, kia mutu ai te tangi
Pōrahu kau ana aku whakaaro i te korenga ōna i mihi mai, i aha mai - ānō nei he tauhou kē māua.
Pōrahurahu kau ana taku tū i taku kore e mōhio ki te haka a taku iwi.
Pōrahurahu noa ana au i te nui o ā rātou pātai kāore i taea e au te whakautu.
Pōrauraha ana ngā whakaaro o te kuia i te mea kua hurihia katoatia te takoto o ngā taonga i roto i tana whare.
Pōtaea te kaha ki te mātenga o te kererū
Pōtatutatu kē ana au i te hoihoi o ngā kāmura. Kia hoki rāua, kua hoki anō au ki aku tuhituhi.
Pōtitia ana. Taha whakaae 20. Taha whakakāhore 34. Riro ana i te taha whakakahore
Pōuri rawa atu au kāore au i tae ki tōna tangi
Pōutoa te kāuru o te rākau
Pōwhiriwhiria tā tātou rama kia kā ai
Pōī mai ana a tīpatere ki te hui nei
Pū ana a roto, kē ana a waho
Pū, te haunga kē o ō waewae! Me āta horoi pea i waenga i ō maihao.
Pūaho ana te āhua o te kaka
Pūaroha ana tōku ngākau mō ēnei kupu tangi mai
Pūataata ana ngā whare i ngā matā o ngā pūrepo, i ngā matā hū
Pūheki ana a Rangi i te taumaha o tana pīkaunga.
Pūhetī ana te tinana, koinā e pōturi nā tana haere.
Pūhia e te hau ki runga o Pukekāhu, ka ngaro ia i te rehu tai
Pūhia mai nei, e te hau muri, pā whakarua; taku māhuri tōtara, e tū ki te rākau a Hinetāpeka
Pūhia ngā pārau ka oma, kia mōhio ai ō rātou hoa koirā te kai a te rerenga.
Pūhia te kānara kia weto.
Pūhungatia ngā rīwai kua ripia. Mō muri kohikohia ai.
Pūhutihuti tonu ngā makawe
Pūhutihuti tonu ngā makawe. Taretare noa nei ngā kākahu
Pūia ngā raupō mō te whare
Pūkairia ngā oneone ki waenganui
Pūkatokato ana a roto i te matenga o tana hoa taupiri.
Pūkawa rawa atu tēnā mea ki roto ki tōku waha
Pūmau tonu ia ki te pupuri i ngā whenua mō te iwi, kei riro i te kāwanatanga ka noho pōhara te iwi, ka waiho hei pononga mā te Pākehā
Pūngahungahu ana te hune o te pīkari.
Pūngarungaru ana te wai i te waka pūauau.
Pūpūwai ana te whāriki nei. I mīia pea e te kurī.
Pūrere ana te iwi rā, ka whāia e te hoariri.
Pūrerehua i a koe, whiti ana te rā i a au nei
Pūrikiriki noa iho te maihi o taua whare
Pūrikoriko ana te waha o te puta i te koeretanga a te ure
Pūrokutia tō panekoti kia kore ai e tau atu ki te paru.
Pūruru ana te noho i te wharepuni i te pō whakamutunga.
Pūtāruru ana te whare hokomaha i te rā i mua i te Paraire Pai.
Pūwhero ana ōna pāpāringa i te whakamā.
Q. He aha te tau toharite o tēnei huinga raraunga: {2,2,3,3,4,4,6,8}? A. Ko te 4.
Rahi rawa te hiahia o aua rangatira tokorua kia takahoa mai ki a au, a pāuaua ana rāua ki te mahi i ngā tikanga i manakohia e au
Raka rawa te kūaha o te whare ki te tīni
Rakaina te kūaha ka haere ana koe.
Rangaranga ana te muri, kapakapa ana ngā rau o ngā rākau.
Rangi: E ai ki ngā rongo i wini i a Touapo te 'Rota'. Pare: I nē? Kore rawa ia i kōrero mai ki a au inapō
Rangi: I kite koe i aua mōrehu kuia e awhi ana, e tangi ana i waho rā? Pare: Āe, ko rātou rātou i ngā tau tuatahi o Ngā Wāhine Toko i te Ora
Rangi: Ka kī mai te waha papā rā māna e hari mai ngā kai mō te hui. Pare: E weta, e weta. Mai kore ake a 'Pākene rāua ko Heiwa' e ora ai ngā tāngata
Rangi: Kei hea taku pōtae? Hine: Kei roto i te waka.
Rangi: Ki a au he mate tonu kei roto i ēnei tohe a te iwi Māori mō te ika te take. Pare: Koia rā!
Rangi: Kāore au mō te kōrero ki a koe atu i tēnei wā. Pare: Kātahi rā hoki! Kua rite koe ki te tamariki
Rangi: Pēhea ai te tunu i te huawhenua nei?
Rangitihi: Ko te tipuna rangatira o Te Arawa. Tōna whakataukī, ko 'Rangitihi whakahirahira; ko te upoko i takaia ki te akatea'
Rangona ai te pakepakē, te tīorooro me te tīkākā o tōna reo i ngā wāhi katoa e pūhia mai ana e te hau
Rangona ai ō rātou reo karanga i ngā uha, engari he rerekē te āhua o te tangi, me kī he momo nguru, ko te hāona kaipuke tōna rite
Rangā mai he taiawa
Rangā mai taku kete kia hōhonu tonu.
Rapa tonu te taura ki te rākau
Rapu kau ana, kimi kau ana ngā tākuta he aha te rongoā mō tōna mate kino, nāwai rā, ka harapuka.
Rapua a Ihowā, kei kitea ana ia: karangatia atu, kei tata ana mai ia
Rapua he purapura e tupu ai tātou. He tau ngehe te tau nei
Rapua he tikanga e taea ai koutou te whakahuihui, kia kotahi te whakaaro ki te rapu tikanga e taea ai te nanati i te puku o te ngāngara wheke nei
Rapua, ka kitea. Pātukia, ka huakina ki a koutou
Rapurapu ana ngā whakaaro o te iwi Māori i mua ki te take i haere mai ai ngā mihingare ki tēnei whenua kai tangata
Rarama tonu a roto i tēnei rūma i te koura
Rarangatia ana e ia he whāriki harakeke hei nohoanga mōna i a ia e hanga hīnaki ana
Raruraru pai au i te whanonga a tērā rā - he rangi kē, he kōrero kē.
Rarā ana te tuanui i te ua tātā.
Rarā mai ana te hoata i te tuanui.
Ratarata ana tērā te mata o te toki nei
Raua atu he huka ki te wai rēmana nā ka whakakarekare.
Raua atu he hāngī ki tēnā, ki tēnā pārō ka toha ki ngā manuhiri.
Raua atu he kini tote ki te kōhua, kia reka ai ngā huawhenua.
Raua atu kia rua ngā kamunga kārani ki te keke, ka kōrori.
Raua atu ngā kai ki te pouaka mātao, kia kore ai e muia e te moromoroiti.
Raua atu ngā kākahu e makengo tonu ana ki te pūrere whakamaroke.
Raua atu ngā kākano whakakakara kai ki te parai, kia kōrori kia kore ai e wera.
Rauawatia ngā waka whakarei, ngā waka unua, ngā waka tīwai
Raupītia rā ki te rau koromiko, ki te rau angiangi
Rawe ana tērā te porotiti a te poi
Rekareka ana a kuia ki tana waka pīataata hou.
Rekareka ana te kōtiro ki tana kaka māwhero hou.
Rekareka ana tērā te tangi a te kōauau.
Rere amio ai te hune i te kōripo.
Rere ana ngā tuanui o ngā whare i te pōkākā.
Rere ana te aho, tau atu ana te mōunu ki te moana, kātahi ka titia tana matira ki te onepū, ka noho ka tatari kia kai mai te ika.
Rere ana te mōtuhi i te mata o te tangata kutikuti hipi.
Rere ana te panapana o te tāwhiti
Rere ana te winiwini, kei hoki mai tō rāua hunaonga ki te kōhuru i tā rāua tamāhine.
Rere arorangi ana te waka rererangi atu i Tāmaki ki Poihākena.
Rere kau te ringa o te tamaiti ki te epa i te kōhatu, ka rere te karoro ki te rangi.
Rere mai ai te wairere i te pari tahataha, ka tau atu ki ētahi toka.
Rere mai rā, rere mai rā, ā, ka pāmamao pea i te whenua i haere mai rā rātou
Rere pāhukahuka ana te wai i te au o te awa.
Rere rawa mai taua roma i te ngahere, kei hea mai te makariri me te purata o te wai.
Rere te ika, whakaangi te ika
Rere tika ana te pōro i te raupapa.
Rere tika atu te kōhatu ki te matapihi, pakaru tonu atu.
Rere ā-manu ki te hui mātāngohi
Rere ā-manu tonu ki te hopu mātāngohi
Riaka ana ngā uaua ki te pupuri tonu i te taura.
Riariakina rā te tāhuhu o tō whare
Rikarika ana ngā mātua i te nui o te moni i kohia e te hapori hei āwhina i tā rātou tama.
Rikiriki ana i te ngaromanga o tana taonga, ka hia roa hoki e penapena ana i ana moni kia taea ai te hoko.
Ringihia atu te peita mā ki te peita whero, ka kōrorirori kia hanumi rawa te mā.
Ringihia atu te wai kōhua ki te tātari kia mau ai ngā huawhenua. Ko te wai noa iho ka hiahiatia mō tēnei hupa.
Ringitia te papa nei ki te wai, kei paru katoa tātau i te kōnehu e rērere haere nei.
Riporipo haere ana te auahi o tana paipa ki te tuanui.
Riporipo kau ana te tai rere
Rirerire ana te rangi, marino ana te moana i taua rā
Rirerirea tō hereheretuna ki tētahi rākau, kua oti tō matire.
Riri katoa te wahine, he patī nō te tou o te tāne i a rātou e kai ana.
Riripi ana ngā manu moana i te kare o te tai.
Riro ana mā te arotahi e tore te aho e kitea ai ngā tae o te āniwaniwa.
Riro ana mā te manuhiri tūārangi e tango te hīpoki i uhia rā ki te tohu whakamahara.
Riro ana mā te rewa e tō mai te tamaiti ki uta.
Riro ana mā te taiohi e whakahoki te mihi mai a te iwi kāinga.
Riro ana nā tana tupuna wahine ia i whakatipu
Riro ana nā te whakamutunga o te Pakanga Tuarua, i whakahohoro te whakanohonoho i ngā pāraeroa Māori ki runga i ngā whenua e hia mano eka kē nei te rahi
Riro ana taku poaka hei whakaepaepa mō te tohunga
Riro tonu ko Mīria hai kairangi mō te rōpū nei, ā, ko ia anake te mema pūmau ā mate noa ia
Rite katoa te whakaaro o te huihuinga ki tēnei take
Rite tonu tana kōrerorero mō te Tiriti i te aroaro o te tini e hākirikiri ana te mōhio, te mātau rānei ki taua Tiriti
Rite tonu te kōwhaiwhai puhoro rā ki ngā ngaru nunui o Whāingaroa moana i mua i te whatinga.
Ritua te pō, ritua te ao
Roa ana te rae i te pōuri i te korenga e whiwhi kai
Roa noa atu e whanga ana ki a koe, ā hokehokeā noa i te whanganga
Roi nei au i te roi a Tinirau
Rokohanga atu a Mereana e kai ana anō i ngā pua rātā, me te ao ki ōna ringa ka kai
Rokohanga atu ko te ruahine matamorari e noho ana
Rokohanga e tētahi wahine he taniwha i roto i tana rua. Na, ko te ingoa o taua taniwha, ko Te Whakaruaki.
Rokohanga iho e ia, ka whānau a Rongouaroa i tāna tamaiti i a Rauru. Te take i kite ai tēnei wahine i tēnei tangata nō tāna haerenga ki te wai ki te horoi i a ia, i ngā parapara o tāna tamaiti
Rokohanga ka puta te rongo mō ana mahi toa kātahi ka tino kaha kē atu tōna ihi, tōna mana
Rokohanga ka tūpono mai nei ki te tūpāpaku koia nei i peka mai ai
Rokohanga mai au e rohai ana ki te whare
Rokohanga mai ko ngā pūpū e kahora ana i runga i te paru tāhuna
Rokohina atu e noho ana te ruahine matakerepō i reira, i te take o te pikitanga
Romia atu te whakahaehae nā
Rongo anō au i rāinahi nei
Rongo hīrea ake ahau ki te tangata e karanga mai nei
Rongo kau a Puputa i te tāmure e kumekume ana, ka hūtia tana aho
Rongo kau a Puputa i te tāmure e kumekume ana, ka hūtia tana aho. Te ekenga ake, auē kei te mau rā hoki te matau ki te puku
Rongo kau atu ana ngā kaipātari i te harurutanga o te haerenga mai o te taniwha rā i roto i te rua, ānō me te wheorotanga whatitiri
Rongo kau, kite kau i te raru, kia wawe te whakanunumi
Rongo rawa ake kua kitea, tae rawa atu ki te tiki, kīhai i riro mai; koia tēnei pepeha mō te mea kite, e ka kitea te taonga makere, 'Kāore e hoatu e ahau, tā te mea ko te paekura kite a Māhina'
Rongoātia ā tātou kai mō āpōpō
Ropia ngā kai, kei muia e te ngaro.
Ropia te kūwaha
Ropia te paraikete ki te wahine kirikau.
Roromia tērā pito o te taura, ka here ki te rākau.
Rorotu ana ngā kanohi i te moe
Roru tonu ngā tāngata i te mātao
Ruhi noa, ngenge noa, i ō pū, i ō take
Ruia taitea kia tū ko taikākā anake
Ruia taitea, kia tū ko taikākā anake
Ruia te taitea, tū te ehu tapu
Ruia tā tātou rīwai ki te rongoā nei kia kore ai e kōaro.
Ruia tō tamaiti, kia heke te ngaru, kia taka ki waho
Ruiruia ki te tote me te pepa.
Rukuhia ki te moana uriuri, rukuhia ki te moana teatea
Runā te ihu o te waka ki waho
Rurea ngā pata kākano ki waho tonu o te kūaha nā, kia tau mai ai ngā kūkupa.
Rurea te whāriki ki te taiepa kia kore ai te puehu.
Ruruhia ngā rākau nā hei aupatu, kia ngāwari ai te kawe.
Rurukuhia atu ngā rauawa ki te kaunoti.
Rutu noa ana a Hare, he wheke nōna ki te tangata nāna i tuki tana waka.
Rutua ana tērā te waka rererangi nahonaho e te hau pūkerikeri.
Rā te ao uru ka tauhere te hiwi ki Hikonga
Rā te haeata hāpai ana mai
Rā te marama e hāpai ana i te pae.
Rā te marama ka mahuta i te pae rā
Rā te puke te whakanamunamu mai rā i te pae.
Rā te pūkohu tāiri ana mai te tara ki Tautari
Rā te pūnehu e tāiri mai ana ki ngā whāwhārua.
Rā te tai e papaki ki te rae o Taranaki
Rā te whetū ka mahuta i te pae
Rākau tū ki te onemata, matomato ana te tupu, rākau tū ki te onepū, pohuka noa.
Rāoa tonu mai ētahi, whakakeke kē mai ētahi, engari i reira anō ōna tāngata tautoko i te kaupapa
Rātou te hunga mate ki a rātou, tātou te hunga ora ki a tātou.
Rīhitia ana e ia he whenua anō hei whakatipu hipi māna
Rīraparapa ana te rākau nei i te aka
Rōhia ana te moana nei, mōwai ana
Rōrī pai ana au i ngā kōrero heahea a tērā o māua.
Rū ana te whenua i te hipanga atu o te tereina.
Rū ana te whenua i te pakō a te pū repo.
Rū ana te whenua, māpuna ana ngā whare teitei.
Rūrū ana te māhunga i ngā mahi rūrūwai a tana hoa.
Tae atu ana a Kino ka tapiki te ringa o kātuarehe, ka tūpikitia ka utaina e Tamahae ki runga i te waka
Tae atu ana ia ki mua ra anō o te riri arā ki roto ki ngā awa keri haere ai, ki te whakahauhau haere i a rātou
Tae atu ana ki ngā muriwai wāhi o Te Umuroa Ruatāhuna i te tau 1900, kāore he raruraru, kāore he aha
Tae atu ana ngā tāngata rā, makere ana ngā mai, tū tahanga ana ki te haka.
Tae atu ana rātou ki te toa i Parahaki ka peka rātou ki te hoko penehīni mō te motokā, ki te hoko ngau hoki hei ngaungau haere mā rātou
Tae atu ia ki te toi o tētahi maunga
Tae atu ki te parapara maunu, pokepokea iho ki ngā toto
Tae atu rā ahau ki taua rākau ka tuaina e au, anō ka hinga, ka pōutokia e au te pōike
Tae horomata ana ki ā tātou ara, tae tapu ana
Tae mai ki Motueka, huri mai nei ki tēnā whaitua o ngā maunga nei ki Tākaka
Tae noa ki te kāwai tapu o te Kīngi o Waikato i mōhiotia ai nā tōna ure tārewa i titia ai te kōtuku ki runga ki a Te Wherowhero Pōtatau
Tae noa mai ki te kāinga o ngā popoa o Uenuku
Tae rawa ake ia ki te tāone nui, kua pōngange ngā whakaaro i te mea kua rerekē katoa te ahunga o ngā huarahi.
Tae rawa ake ki te hōhipera, kua mate kē te tūroro.
Tae rawa ake ki te papa tuarima kua naenae te manawa.
Tae rawa ake te whaitaua, kua ngonga kē ngā hoa.
Tae rawa ake, kua mutumutua te tūpāpaku, kua riro kē ngā peke.
Tae rawa atu a Ngātoroirangi ki te moana, e tū mai ana te rākau mānuka a Tia i roto i te moana
Tae rawa atu ahau ki taku rākau, kua puanga noa atu te manu, kua kainga te kiko e te iro
Tae rawa atu au kua tohipa kē he ara kē
Tae rawa atu ia ki te tirotiro i te tāwhiti, kua rere kē te kiore.
Tae rawa atu kua patua tana ika e ōna tuākana ki te rākau. Koia i pokopokorua ai, i maunga ai
Tae rawa atu tana iwi ki te wāhi i patua ai ia, kua hē noa atu.
Tae rawa atu, kua patua tāna ika e ōna tuākana ki te rākau. Koia i pokopokorua ai, i maunga ai. Mehemea kāore i raweketia, takoto mania ana tēnei motu
Tae rawa ki te takurua, kua roiroi katoa ngā huarākau i mahue ki te rākau.
Tae rawa mai, ko ngā pungarehu kau e takoto ana; hoki tonu te pūrahorua rā ki te whakarongo i ngā wāhi i kapi i ngā tāngata o runga i a Te Arawa, rongo kau anō
Tae tonu mai ki a Māui, hoki rawa iho te ringa ki te pāhi, kua puta ōna toto
Taea rawa ake te tuakiri ki te wāhi āio, ka toru ngā tū o Hipi, ka koroputaputa noa ōna i te kainga a te matā
Taea rawatia ake te wahine nei, kua tino ngāhorohoro noa iho ōna kikokiko me ōna waewae me ōna ringaringa, kātahi te mate kino rawa atu ko tēnei te āhua
Tahi anō te whakarerenga iho o tana meremere, ehara kua mate
Tahi anō whakarerenga iho o tana meremere; ehara, kua mate
Tahi, rua, toru, whā kss hī auē hī!
Tahia atu ngā konga o te ahi kei pango katoa koe.
Tahia atu ngā parahanga o tō tātau kāinga
Tahoratia ngā tuna pāwhara ki runga ake i te ngārahu.
Tahuna te ahi hei tāina i te poaka.
Tahuna te umu ka kā, ka tīaroaroa ngā pōhatu
Tahuri ana te wahine ki te haehae i tana uma ki te kiripaka ratarata.
Tahuri ana te waka i te pōua, ka toremi katoa ngā tāngata o runga.
Tahuri ana tō rātou waka i te moana whenewhene o te tai tamatāne.
Tahuri atu, tahuri mai ki te motomoto i ngā ihu, i ngā kanohi
Tahuri mai tōu taringa, e Ihowā, ki taku īnoi: whakarongo ki tōku reo unene
Tahuri mai, e tama, ki ō mātua rā, e wairurutu nei ki te tangi, ī
Tahuri noa ake te wahine rā: auē! he tangata e tū mai ana i muri i a ia
Tahuri rawa ake ōna tungāne, kua kore a Hinekauirangi
Tahuri tonu atu au ki te awhiawhi i taku hoa ki te kihikihi hoki
Tahuri tō mata te uranga o te rā
Tahuri, haehaea te ika nei
Tahutahu ana ngā ngārehu.
Tahuti mai, e te tau. Kua roa rawa tēnei ngaronga ōu!
Taihoa ake nei ka pihi ake ngā tipu hou i roto i te mahinga kai.
Taihoa ake nei uru atu a ia ki te Tari mō ngā Mahi Nunui
Taihoa ake, kia wetewetehia ngā raraunga kua kohia, hei reira puta ai he kōrero mō ngā kitenga.
Taihoa anō hokia ake ai ngā kōrero mō Hoturoa mā
Taihoa e haere, kia tūtū te tai
Taihoa e haere.
Taihoa e hōreke i ā koutou tao - me tatari kia tata mai te hoariri.
Taihoa e peitangia  te whare. Kia tau mai te aupaki o te iwa.
Taihoa e tapahi i te karaihe - me tatari kia kore haere te haurangi - kei rāoa noa iho tō mīhini.
Taihoa e tāwaetia ngā kūao i ngā whāereere; me tatari kia rahi ake, kei mate.
Taihoa e ūkui i ngā kōrero i te papa tuhituhi - kia oti i ngā ākonga katoa te tuhituhi.
Taihoa ka huri te tūngoungou hei pūrēhua.
Taihoa ka kōwiria e au te kakī o te tame heihei rā ki te kore e mutu tana tekekō i te atapō.
Taihoa ka poua tō rae ki te rite tonu tō pāengaenga i a ia.
Taihoa ka whakawhānuitia aku kōrero mō tēnei, kia tae ki ngā kōrero mō te Hāhi
Taihoa koe ka raua e ngā kawekawe o te kaupapa nei, ka mau!
Taihoa nei tō miki i a au te whana!
Taihoa nei, ka ako ia i te kawa o te marae, ā, nāwai, nāwai, ka tonoa ko ia hei kaikaranga i ngā ope whakaeke
Taihoa pea ka marangai. Me whakahoki te waka ki uta.
Taihoa te whakaahua i te ao o āpōpō, kia oti pea te whakaahua i te ao o tāinakarehā
Taihoa tātou e haere ki te mahi tītiko, kia heke te tai.
Taihoa tāua e haere - kei te hiamimi au.
Taihoa tāua e puta, e ngahua kau ana ngā pī i waho rā.
Taihoa tō pani i te keke ki te kīnaki, me waiho kia kūtao.
Taihoa! Kauaka hei kaiwhiti! Ki te āta haere, ka nui te ika ki a tāua.
Taihoa, kei te whakaaro tonu au ki ngā ingoa katoa kua whakaarahia ake.
Taihoa, kia tāki nei au i ngā pouaka nā kia pai ai tō haere pēnā atu.
Taihoa, kia tīkina ake e au ngā pukapuka
Taihoa, mō te ata koe inu wai ai
Tairia te tomokanga kei puta te poaka!
Taka ana ki a Hoani Wiremu Hipango, māna te haere ki rāwāhi, hei whakatutuki i ngā tūmanakoranga o te iwi. Ka maunu atu a Hoani Wiremu Hipango . . . mā runga kaipuke
Taka ana te hōiho o te Pākehā ki roto ki te repo, waiho i konā powharu ai
Taka atu ana te kēna, taratītī ana te peita ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Taka kau i te rākau, mate rawa, e kore e ora i te pakarara
Taka ko roto nei ka māwherangi au, ē, wai ka kite ake te whiu a te atua, ē
Takahia ana e Māui te iwi tuaroa, kūmea ana te whiore, haere ana he kurī
Takahia iho tā te Atua mārena, ka rite te tangata ki te kararehe, ka moepuku noa iho
Takahia mai ngā takahanga waewae o ō mātua, o Te Korimako rāua ko Te Waka Maori me ērā kaumātua kua tauwehe atu rā ki te pō
Takahia ngā huanui kua haerea e ō mātua
Takaia ana te akatea ki tana upoko pakaru.
Takaia te ika i te pepa hiriwa. Tunua ki roto i te umu mō te rua tekau meneti
Takamingomingo ana te whītau
Takaroaroa ana te mahi tirotiro i ngā tono
Takatakai rawa te kākahu hei pōtae
Takawhīwhiwhi ana taku arero i ngā oro o tērā reo rerekē.
Takeo noa ia i ngā hēhē o ngā whakatureture a te kāwanatanga me te kāwanatanga ā-rohe
Taketake rawa, hurumanu rawa te rongo, he rongomau
Taki haere ai rātau ki roto i ngā hōtēra e nōhia ana e ngā tūruhi e tata tonu ana ki ō rātau kāinga i Ōhinemutu
Takihakohako te kete ka kōhure
Takihakohakoa ngā tarutaru kia noho whāiti ai ki te kokonga o te māra.
Takina te awa moana kia marino ai.
Takina te hoki kia ora ai tā tāua tūroro nei.
Takina te rotu kia moe ai te iwi, ka tomokia te pā
Takitakina e Hora te hū o te puoro kia whai rā koe te tira te rōreka
Takitakina rā, e Hora, te hū o te puoro, kia whai rā koe te tira te rōreka, kia mau ko te hā ki runga o Tōtara
Takoto ana he raorao, heke ana he awaawa, he pari hoki
Takoto ana te kai nei a te kūkupa
Takoto kau ana te ika i te ati hei hāpopo mā rātou.
Takoto kau atu ahau kua parangia. Oho ake au kua mārama i te ata
Takoto kau atu ki tana moenga, ka moe.
Takoto kau i te ahiahi he rau ngā mahara
Takoto mai i runga i te atamira, e rā. Ka tōkia tō kiri e te anu mātao, e rā
Takoto mai rā i te anuanu, i te mātao
Takoto mai rā, e hine, i roto i te whare papa, ko te whare rā tēnā o tō tipuna, o Tamamutu, i tuhia ai, ē, ki te tuhi māreikura
Takoto mai rā, e koro ē!
Takoto mai rā, e koro ē, koutou ko ō whakahina
Takoto mai, e hine, kia whakapaipaingia tō kanohi pāpātea.
Takoto mai, e waka, i konā, me tōhou mate. Nei te whare kia tīpae tahi tāua
Takoto mōwai ana ngā iwi nei i tō aroaro, me he waka whakarei e takoto ana i roto i te ripo
Takoto rā, e hine, kia tāia ō ngutu, tō kauae, kia pai ai koe
Takoto rā, e tama, kia tāia tō nohi pāpātea.
Takoto tonu te tūroro nei, kāhore e keukeu
Takoto, e hine, i roto i te kāinga i kōingotia e tō ngākau
Taku ahine purotu, me ko Hineata e haehae ana mai.
Taku aroha rā ki ngā tai e ngunguru ē, ē, rā; he rite mai ki ahau e ngunguru noa nei ē, ē, rā ī
Taku ate hoki rā, taku piki kōtuku
Taku ate hoki rā, taku pākai riri ki te ao o te tonga
Taku aurakitanga ki te kino, ē, rararu nei ko au anake
Taku hei kahurangi, e kore e maunu i taku kakī.
Taku hei māpuna kua riro Titapu, ē
Taku hei tāwhiri, taku kati taramea
Taku hiahia kia hohoro te whakaatu mai a ngā tāngata e whakahē nei i te ture Kaunihera
Taku kahu tīepa
Taku kahurangi kāmehameha
Taku kiri whakaniko
Taku kura tangi whakaingoingo
Taku kura, taku whakakai marihi.
Taku kuru tongarerewa, taku māpihi pounamu, taku takawairore.
Taku kōara te uira i te rangi ko te tohu o te mate nā
Taku kōmata, taku kahurangi pīataata
Taku kōmata, taku wahine purotu.
Taku mahititanga ake, he tatu anake tōku waewae
Taku manu noho mātārae i whāngaia ki te hau
Taku manu whakaruru ka hoka ki te uru
Taku manu wheko ata
Taku matainaina atu ki te mea a te tangata rā
Taku matau koti, taku pā kahawai
Taku māhuri tōtara ka hinga kai raro ē i, taku uru māwhatu ka piua e te hau ē i
Taku mōrikarika, taku mōteatea ki te hanga
Taku ngeru huru koutata.
Taku ngākau i rikiriki, taku ngākau i whatiwhati
Taku ohi, taku ohi, he ohi tipua, he ohi wahine
Taku piki kōtuku ē, taku māpihi maurea ē
Taku purapura tuawhiti, taku kōhatu turua nō te ure tārewa o Te Rangitakawhaki!
Taku pākai hau ki te ao o te tonga
Taku rātā tū tahi, taku whakamarumaru
Taku rātā tūmaru ka hinga i a Whiro
Taku rāwaru pounaho, taku whakakai marihi.
Taku tama muna
Taku tamaiti, ē, i puta mai rā koe i te toi kai Hawaiki
Taku tapuae nei ko Huakinuku, ko Huakirangi
Taku tino kupu tēnei, me mutu ā koutou pānui tautohetohe, ka moumou noa iho ngā whārangi o Te Puke Ki Hikurangi rāua ko Te Tiupiri
Taku tohetohe tatangi
Taku tongarewa, taku puiaki kua kapohia nei e te ringa kaha o Aituā.
Taku tīmatanga anō ki te pakuku iho, he turaki tonu te mahi a te tangata i a au. Ko koe anake te tuatahi i totoro mai ai te ringa hei hapai ake i a au
Taku tōtara haemata, tē rite ai, e hine, ki a koe, ī ā. Ka ngaro rā, ē, ngā tōtara whakahae o te wao!
Taku waka whakarei tēnā ka paea ki roto te Houhou
Takurua hūpē nui
Takē ana a Rangi i te wā mahi, he māngere hoki.
Takē kōanga; whakapiri ngahuru
Tama pakukore, tama mate.
Tama pāeko, tama mate; tama korikori, tama ora.
Tama tū, tama ora; tama noho, tama mate kai
Tama tū, tama ora; tama noho, tama matekai
Tama: He aha koe e hiaruaki nā - kua hapū koe? Ani: E hē!
Tamaiti i ahuahua, ka ahuahu i āna ake ā tōna wā.
Tamaiti taringa kōroiroi, kāore e whakarongo ki te kupu a tōna whaea.
Tamariki haunene, tamariki hauora.
Tangata hōngongoi ki ngā whare petipeti, whakarērea.
Tangata matakuikui ka reia e te manotini, kā pā anō te tangata matakawa.
Tangata matauaua, ka motu te manu i te ringa, engari tangata matawhāiti, ka tini ka rau.
Tangata moānanga, tangata mahue.
Tangata whaimana, ka oroia nuitia, tangata mana kore, karekau ana.
Tangi amio ana te karoro i tai rā
Tangi ana te waea i waenganui pō, kōwhiti tonu atu a Rena i tana moenga.
Tangi kau ana te mapu! Tū-ā-pōuri ana te mata o te tangata! Taumate ana te tinana! Wairuhi ana te ngākau!
Tangi mai ana te pēne, ka tū ngā pakeke ki te kanikani
Tangi mai te tupa ka ronarona i taku kakī
Tangi rikiriki ana te wahine
Tangi taukuri ai au, e te mamae
Tangi tīkapa ana te wahine i te uru
Tangi tō te tamaiti, whakamā tō te koeke
Tangihia mai rā te tangi ki te makau
Tango tonu ki te taura e mau rā i ngā uru o te upoko, ka wetekia, ka herea ki te kīato o te waka mau ai
Tangohia ai e te tāne tana pōtae ka hongi ana i te tangata.
Tangohia ai te kauwae o te parāoa hei mahi patu me ērā atu taonga tūturu a te Māori.
Tangohia ana e rāua te puru, nā, titi tonu te rā ki roto
Tangohia ana mai ko Hirautu, ko Porerinuku, ko Kahuwiwhetū, ko Poaka
Tangohia ana te taupoki o te kōhua, manana ake ana te kakara o te kai ki tōna ihu.
Tangohia kia kotahi te kāri mai i te pū kāri, ka porowhiu ai i tētahi.
Tangohia mai ana ētahi o aua kūmara rā hei tinaku māna
Tangohia ngā kongakonga, ngā pungarehu, me te pūnehu hoki kei kino ngā kai o te hāngi nei.
Tangohia ngā pikitia pūraurau nā - kei kitea e taku whaea!
Tangohia rawatia tana poraka i te kurī, kua wawata katoa i te ngaungautanga.
Tangohia te mōkā kia āhei ai te kurī rā te kai.
Tao kaitohi - he tao i taumautia, arā i āta waitohutia
Taonga ruru tonu ki roto i te pūtea
Tapahia atu ana te karaua o te heihei, e kanikani tonu ana te tinana!
Tapahia atu ngā aka o te pikiārero e romi ana i te māhuri rā.
Tapahia atu te wāhi hakuhaku o te tīhi nā, kei te pai tonu a roto.
Tapahia atu te wāhi puruhekaheka ka kai tonu.
Tapahia ko ngā matakīrea o tētahi taha anake kia kore ai ngā pārera e rere.
Tapahia mai kia rua ngā kōhao ki te pepa - koinei te wāhi mō ō karu.
Tapahia mai ngā parāoa porotaka kia pōhara, ka kuhu atu ai i te mīti me te huamata.
Tapahia ngā poro rākau kia pōtehetehe tonu, kia uru pai ai ki te ahi.
Tapahia te keke kia whā ngā wāhanga, kia whiwhi keke ai te katoa.
Tapaina ana te huinga tauira o te whare wānanga ko Ngāi Tauira.
Tapanihitia tō tātou haere, kei kitea
Taparengatia te waha o te kurī
Tapatapahia ngā huawhenua, ka rau atu ai ki te tiu.
Tapia tōu waka
Taponaia ki te toherere. Ina kūmea, ka kikī tonu.
Tarahonotia ngā manu nei ki te taha o ngā kuia, hei hutihuti mā rātou.
Taratutū ana ngā hōia o Te Hokowhitu-a-Tū i a rātau e haka ana, ānō he taniwha kua maunu i tōna rua.
Taratī ana te hamuti kau ki te tī ki te tā.
Taringa i whakarongo te tarawau a te ngutu
Taringa noa iho ki te ngare a te hunga o rahaki
Taro kau iho ka kahakina anō ko rātou e tētahi ngaru tiketike rawa
Taro kau iho kua ngaro noa iho te ngangī, ko te tai anake e āki ana
Tarā atu ngā whārangi kikorangi i ngā whārangi mā, ka karapiti ai.
Tata ana ki te 40 eka o te raupapa i te kokoru o Ōkahu i rāhuitia i taua wā anō, hei poraka papa kāinga, kāre e taea te hoko
Tata auē ahau i te tino mamae o taku korokoro, nā, ka homaingia he aihikirīmi hei kai māku
Tata kore ana ngā hiki e kitea, he tohunga nō te kairaranga ki tāna mahi.
Tata ngaro atu ana te karupango ina whakatea taua wahine.
Tata pau te ahiahi i a au e whakapīrata ana i tōku waka.
Tata pea ki te kotahi mano tau te iwi Māori i Aotearoa.
Tata tonu au ka pore whakamuri i te rongonga i toa ko au!
Tata tonu au ka pura i te hana o te rama i te whakaata.
Tata tonu au ka ruaki i te kaha meto o te paihamu i tōia mai rā e te kurī.
Tata tonu ka riro te tuanui i te pāroro.
Tata tonu ka rāoa i te ngotetanga i te roro i tana wheua poaka.
Tata tonu te wahine rā ka pōrangi, he whakatuatea kei totohu tō rātou waka e tukia mai rā e te mangō taniwha.
Tata tonu ētahi ka pōkai anō i ō rātou tueke, ka takahi i te huarahi
Tata warea ana te whare e te moe i te kauhau āmiki a Pākira.
Tatere noa tāua, tē ū te noho, tē aha
Tatutatu kau ana te hīkoi a te tangata i muri i te tukinga o tōna motokā.
Tau ana te ngahere. Kore rawa he oreore, kore rawa he ngangī, kore rawa he ngāeheehe, korekore ana he aha
Tau ana te nini ki te kanohi i te kaha whakamā.
Tau ana te punga kua rere te aho a Rakaruahine, kua tatari ki te kumekume a te hāpuku, me ērā waka atu anō ki te hī. Ehara kua tākiri tana aho, kua mārō
Tau ana te whakahamero mai a ngā manu ngangahu.
Tau ana te whakamoemiti me te whakahari a te Pākehā ki te mōhiotanga o te iwi Māori ki te mahi nei
Tau atu ana te kākā ki te huanui, ehara, ka mau.
Tau ki te papa, ki' whakaparure; taku parure, ko au nei anake te kurī pōrangi
Tau kē hoki kōrua ko tō kaka hou.
Tau kē taku māmā ki te tuitui papangarua tapitapi ki ngā kākahu tawhito.
Tau kē te waiata ā-ringa a taua kapa.
Tau mai ana ki te aroaro o te Ahorangi te pōwhiri a te rōpū nei, a NALI, kia haere atu ko ia hei kaikōrero matua ki te hunga rāmemene mai ki te hui ā-tau
Tau mai ana te hūhi i te roa e oma ana.
Tau mai ana te tini o te ngaro ki te karamuimui i a au
Tau mārire ki te taha o te awa rā, kātahi ka peke te hokowhitu rā
Tau noa atu ia i te matapihi o te whare o Tinirau
Taua tangata nei he tino toa, he tangata ātaahua, ā, kua rite kē te wā mōna e tango wahine ai
Tauapohia mai te tamaiti nā
Tauhōkai ana Kōpū i te ata
Tauia te papa kia ngātata
Taukahore te ngaoko o te tuiau!
Taukahore! Ngā mea nei, te pine!
Taukamo mai ana a ia ki a au.
Taumaru ana te kāinga i te mahi a te rākau.
Taupoki ana mai taku kumete i runga i te tumuaki a Tako
Taupokina te huka kia kore ai e muia e te pōpokoriki.
Taupokina te kumete, kia kore ai e kī i te wai.
Taupokina te kōhua, kia kore ai e kaha rawa te mimiti o te wai.
Taupokina te waka kia taea ai te tirotiro te takere.
Taupokina! Taupokina! Kia matemate katoa i a tātau!
Taura nui, taura roa, taura kaha, taura toa, taura here i a Tamanuiterā, whakamaua kia mau, kia ita
Taura nui, taura roa, taura kaha, taura toa, taura here i a Tamanuiterā, whakamaua kia mau, kia ita!
Taute ana au i ngā kōrero whakameremere a taku tungāne.
Taute te tītoki, whero te rātā i te waru
Tautekangia ngā here nā kia kore ai e tangatanga.
Tautika te haere ki tō matua, ki a Te Tara
Tautititia he kaupeka mō Haumia, ka puta te pītau ki te ao
Tawaketia tō tātou waka
Te Rahokoroheke he heru, he mea hanga ki te māpara kahika
Te Rata Porena: I haere atu koe i ahau. Te Ngākau: Inahea? Te Rata Porena: I te wā i haere atu ai koe i runga i tō whakaaro ake
Te Whānau-a-Apanui
Te akoranga rata, mahi niho, rōia, kaiwhakaako mō ngā huarahi katoa, me ētahi ake, me ētahi ake mātauranga
Te amorangi ki mua, te hāpai ō ki muri
Te anga karaka, te anga kōura, koi kitea ki te marae
Te aroaroā i a au i te kore tāngata
Te ata tuhi, te ata rapa, te ata ka māhina, ka māhina te ata i Hikurangi
Te ataahua o ngā heke o tō whare kua tāia ki te ngutukura, ki te mangōpare.
Te awe o te atua e nanape kino nei i a au
Te haerenga atu o ngā wāhine ki te muru toetoe hei kōpae kai
Te haerenga atu o te pirihimana, ka mau ki a Oraire, kātahi rāua ka mamau, ka whiua atu te meke, ū tonu ki te ihu o te pirihimana, ka mau anō rāua ki a rāua
Te haerenga hoki, te whakarerenga iho, ngaro noa
Te hau kei te tihi, kei te rea
Te haunga hoki o te pera o te kau.
Te hauroa kē o ēnā kūkamo - he putu me te hāwhe pea ia nei te roa.
Te hia pai o te konene ki te haere mai ki konei whakaputa mōhio ai, ānō nei nō konei tonu a ia.
Te hinengaro pōuri, he rite ki te wai whēranu, e kore e mārama.
Te hoihoi mārika o te kākā e ngāngā nei!
Te hokinga atu i te ata e takoto ana te rākau. Kātahi te waka ka tāraia
Te hokinga ōna i te tahatika, ka pahemo te awa o Tōrere, ka pahemo hoki a Taumata-apanui, kāore i kitea e ia
Te hopukanga atu ki te toki, tahi mai anō i te ihu, ā, te noko atu ana; tahi mai anō i te noko, ā, te ihu atu ana
Te hou hoki o te kānga piro ki taku ihu.
Te hua i te puku e kaimomotu nei, wairua i tahakura nōu nei, e Nuku
Te huki mō te ika tapu o te manea
Te hākiki kē o tēnā tangata ki te waiho mā tana wahine kē e whakatika te tuanui o tō rāua whare.
Te hīmoemoe hoki o te āporo nei - kāore e kore i whakia matatia mai.
Te ika a te Aitu
Te ingoa o te puna, ko Ōringi, e koropupū ake ana i te whenua
Te ingoa o te pā ko Te Hape, ka whakaekea e te taua
Te ingoa o tōna pā ko Whakarewa, he pā nui hoki, he maioro nunui hoki ngā maioro
Te iringa o te haki kātahi ka oho te pū kotahi, muri iho i taua pū ka oho katoa ngā pū a ngā mano rā
Te kaha rā o taua tangata ki te whakarata i te iwi pūihi kia rata
Te kaha wera o te rā, ka pā mai te mateinu ki a rāua
Te kai hāhā rawa atu ko te wātakirihi me te wheua poaka kōhua!
Te kai i pura ai te kanohi o Tahuaroa
Te kakī o Tāwhaki, te porongāue o Tāwhaki, te tumu o Tāwhaki
Te karakia kia mao te ua, te karakia kia whatitiri, kia rū te whenua, kia maroke ngā rākau, kia maroke te wai, kia ngaru te moana, kia rokia te moana
Te kauwhata o te atua; hoatu! Mairangatia ki te mairanga o te atua; kia ora ai tātou
Te kererū rā e whakawai nei
Te kihikihi tara ki te waru
Te kiriwetiweti hoki o ngā wharepaku - ānō nei kāore i horoia mō te hia marama nei te roa.
Te kitenga atu, e tama! . . . Pūhutihuti tonu ngā makawe. Taretare noa nei ngā kākahu
Te kohu ka tāiri te ripa ki Motutawa
Te komititanga o ngā wai
Te korohape, whakatikaia te hē, meinga kia tika
Te kueotanga o te whenua
Te kumukumu, te mokopārae
Te kurī nei e hongihongi nei i taku tarau! Kei te rongo pea i aku ngeru.
Te kāinga i waiho e koe
Te kākahi whakairoiro o te moana
Te kōiwi kūrapa!
Te kōkō e tauwhaiwhai ana ki ana tamariki
Te maha o te heitiki, o te kurupounamu
Te mahi a taku matua he tapahi harakeke, ko taku whaea ki te hao ika
Te mahi a te mangumangu he haere i roto i te kiri o te poaka, ka tae ki roto i te wahi ururua i te taha o te tangata e tū ana hei tūtai
Te mahi a te whaea a Tāwhaki he moe i te whakamahau o te whare
Te mahi a tēnā ika, a te marakihau, he hurihuri i ngā waka māori
Te mahi o konei he riri tākaro, he para whakawai
Te mahi tuatahi a te waipiro, he whakangoikore i ngā whakaaro
Te maioro, he mea mahi a roto ki te rarauhe me te horokio, me ngā kōtau hei whakakaha mō tā rātou ahuriri
Te mana, ē, o te whenua, ka rōrō, ē, ki te pō, ka rōrō, ē, ki te ao
Te manioro kē o te kani mīhini e haruru mai rā!
Te manu kei taua roto he manapou, e rua tikitiki o te upoko; ko ana tamariki he mea ruku ki te papa o te moana whānau ai
Te marama i runga rā ē
Te marangatanga ake o te wahine rā; rere! ko Rua e noho ana. Koia, e te whānau, rere! Ehara, he nanakia
Te mate kōpito e whakawiri nei i te puku
Te matenga o Hore ka unuhia te ope a Te Porou
Te matua i te waka me whakatangi ki te waihoe
Te matua i te whare, me rauhī mai e te ringa
Te maunga e tū mai rā
Te mea e kātoretore mai rā, he tūtaewhetū
Te mea i oi ai taku kiri ko te mahi a Kereopa
Te mea mā he tuapaka, te mea pango he kurutai, te mea whero he makahua
Te mea tuatoru, he hoari matarua
Te moenga te whita, te moenga te au
Te mokopeke au i te pākaiahi o te 'puke
Te muri aroha ki tō tau tūmau
Te mutunga atu, hei whakamārie i ō rātou whakaaro katoa, ko tana urunga atu tēnā ki te Hāhi Mihinare
Te mā hoki o te whare o taku tuahine, he whakataukī tonu te rite.
Te mū rau a te tini, te wene rau a te mano
Te ngohi mau reke
Te ngāueuetanga o te whare, ka huaki te kāpata, ka ngakuru ngā pereti.
Te ohonga ake i te ata ka mātakina te pā, kāhore he tāngata o roto, kua horo ngā tāne, kua horo ngā wāhine
Te ohonga ake o te rau mā whitu rā, anana, kīhai tētahi i rere
Te ope a Te Tauira i haere ki Tūranga ki te kaitamāhine i a Rakahanga
Te pai anō o tēnei huihuinga - ngahau ana!
Te pai hoki o tēnei tiakarete waitī - waiwai ana taku waha.
Te pai o te piko, o te rere, o te wehi hoki o te ngutu kākā i tāia e Rangi ki ngā heke o te whare.
Te pai whakarere atu o te tamāhine nei
Te pakūnga o tana pū kīhai i mate ngā kuaka
Te pane, ngā peke, te hiku, ngā unahi, te peha, ngā tuatara, i āhua ngarara katoa ēnei
Te pekeriki rā e tītope i runga
Te pua ura o te ngutu kākā.
Te pueatanga ake i te wai ka nguha mai te ihu, engari i rata noa iho, tāna mahi he hoki tonu mai ki te taha o te kaipuke titiro ai ki ngā tāngata - titiro mākutu ai
Te puhi hūmārire nei, a Hinemoa
Te puna e hū ake rā i raro i te whenua
Te puta tuatahi i hinga ai māua kei Paparetu
Te puta tuatahi i hinga ai māua, kei Paparetu
Te putanga ake o taua tawhiti nei, ānō he ahi e toro ana ki te whenua. (E kōrero ana mō te rā.)
Te putanga mai ki waho, haere atu ana, kāore he turupou
Te putanga mai ki waho, he whāitaita, he whāterotero
Te putanga o taua mate ka korotiwhatiwha te kiri, whero ana, kā ana me te ahi. Ka mahu, kātahi ka ngaro te kōtiwhatiwhatanga
Te pākē, te hautai, te hieke, te pihepihe me te pūreke; ngā mai whakaruru o ngā tīpuna.
Te pānuitanga ai i tēnei ture e te Tumuaki, whakamanā iho e te minenga
Te pīereeretanga o te rangi
Te pū he mea raranga, ka opehia a roto ki te tītoki, na ka patokia, na ka marū, na ka taona, heoi ka whakawiria, ā ka heke te hinu
Te pūtiki a Whakaotirangi
Te pūwhero mai hoki o te takupū o te rangi, ānō ko te whero o taku kahu kura.
Te rake pōhutukawa ko te rite i ahau
Te reka hoki o ngā reo o te rōpū rā me tā rātou poī.
Te reka kē o ngā kai kua puta mai i te hapī.
Te rekā kē o tā kōrua hāngi; kāore i kaha rawa te minamina auahi.
Te repetahuri, ki tētahi reo he rapatahuri, he pērā anō i te tokoraurepe
Te rerekē noa iho o te kākahu nei - ko hea te wāhi tika mō aku ringa?
Te ringaringa motomoto tuatara o te kāinga o Te Wahineiti
Te ringihanga mai o te tao, o te mānuka
Te roimata rā e puhake nei kei aku kamo
Te rā e whanake ana i te huapae o te moana
Te rākau e nohoia nei e Maru
Te rātā e hīwerawera mai nei
Te rātā e mumura atu ana i uta nei
Te taenga atu ki te ngāwhāriki, mate noa iho; hua noa he wai mātao, ana kua wera
Te taenga atu ki te wāhi repo, tapoko tonu iho, he roa hoki nō te ua i tāpokopoko ai
Te taenga ki te huanui ka pakū te pū a te mea i waiho hei tūtai
Te taenga ki te one i Tīrau, tērā ka kitea mai e ngā toro
Te taenga ki te waha o te ana, ka puta mai te manomano pekapeka.
Te taenga o Ikatāmure ki reira, haere tika tonu ki tana matua
Te taenga o ngā tokotoru nei ki a Te Wherowhero i Māngere ka hoatu te kupu, 'E Whero, kua oti te kupu o te motu ko koe hei Kīngi.' Kātahi ka pōtaea atu Te Pōtae o te Kīngitanga. Ka puta te kupu a Te Wherowhero, 'Kāore ahau e pai'
Te tahuritanga atu, ka kite ia i te raiona e rere mai ana ki runga ki a ia. Inamata kua mau ngā niho o te raiona ki tōna pakihiwi
Te takanga o te pihikete ki te papa, ngakongako katoa.
Te take i haere ai, he mea tono nā te Kāwana hei whakaatea i ngā raruraru o taua whenua
Te take i kaha ai ia ki te turaki i te waipiro, nō te mea e tino mōhio ana ia koia nei tētahi mea e patu ana i tōna iwi, i te Māori
Te take i nui ai taua whawhai nei, he whakatete ki ngā tauranga ika, me ngā tauranga mangō i waho ake o Pūponga
Te take i whawhai ai, he awa whakaheke tuna
Te tamaiti meroiti e kaha ana ki te kohikohi kōhatu
Te tamariki ai o te āhua, e kore koe e mōhio e iwa tekau ngā tau o te kuia rā.
Te tangata e haere mai nei tōna rongo, ka pakū nei i ngā whenua
Te tangata kākāriki i te waka, arā te kaihautū
Te tangata niho weha, ko Kae
Te tangata nānā, he kōhau tonu te mahi i te pō
Te tangata toiora e kore e ngahoro ki raro rā
Te tangata tuatahi he petipeti, muri atu ko ngā pōpō nunui
Te tangata tūpuhi ka mate i te hiakai.
Te tangi a taku ihu e whakamakuru nei
Te tangi mai a te ika nei a te poraka - ā kūkēkē ē! Kū kēkēkēkē a Tūhoe ki Te Whāiti - ā kūkēkē ē!
Te tangi o ngā pū a Tūtānekai
Te tapere nui o Whātonga
Te tau o taku ate e panapana tonu nei i roto.
Te tauhōkai he tītoko mō te rauwiri kei hinga i te ia
Te tauri kōmore he kāretu, he mea tākirikiri, ka whiria kia pai, ka mau ki ngā waewae, he tohu rangatira nō ngā wāhine rangatira
Te tautohe o te tangata rā ahakoa taku kī atu kia kaua.
Te tauwhāinga e kōrerotia ana ki a tāua, he mahi tahito, nō te orokohanga rā anō o te ao
Te tawhiti ai o te hari wai mai i te moana o Taupō rā anō, he tino kaha te hiainu wai o ngā paukena nei
Te tetere hoki o te tangata e tū ana i mua i ahau, he uaua te kite i kō atu i a ia.
Te tikanga ka rangatahi anō te haere a te rangatahi, engari ko rātou kē kei muri e whai mai ana.
Te tikanga kua tae noa mai. Kua ngungu atu rā ki hea?
Te tikanga tino tika, kauaka rawa tētahi tangata e haere ki roto i te rūma o te tūroro. Mehemea ki te haere, kauaka hei hongi, hei kihi rānei
Te tikanga, e iwa marama te pēpi e tipu ana i te kōpū ka whānau mai ki te ao.
Te tini tāngata e huna nei ki roto i te arearenga o ngā poho o Rangi rāua ko Papa
Te tira o Hika whakanumi atu ana
Te toki a te atua i hauporoa ai te poro tūtakitanga o aku papa
Te tomonga atu o tōna tuahine ki te whata, ka kite atu ia i te whakarae o te aruhe
Te tui whakakohuhu a Kahukura
Te tuiau ki te katikati ki te whakakeukeu moe i a au
Te tuiau ki te katikati, te whakakekeu moe i a au
Te tupunga ake o ngā māra nei puta mai te kūmara a Mārama he pōhue, puta ana te hue he māwhai, puta ana te aute he whau, puta ana te para he horokio, ka hē te tupu o ngā purapura a Mārama, te take, i hara ia ki tana taurereka
Te tāpiritanga, te tangohanga, te whakaraunga, te wehenga - koia ēnei ko ngā paheko matua e whā.
Te tītī e takarure mai i te moana
Te tīāroa o te pā
Te tōiki kāpara e tū ki te ngahere o Te Tipi
Te ua i te rangi ko te ua i aku kamo
Te umanga nui a neherā ko te whawhai
Te unuhanga a Hone i ōna hū, te kehakeha mārika hoki. Whū!
Te urunga atu o Tamainupō haere tonu, ā, ka pahemo i te takuahi i te aronga ake ki te ihonui, kātahi anō ka huri mai
Te waeroa, he tangi tāna i a ia e whakamiri haere ana i te mata, otirā i ngā wāhi katoa o te tangata; ka papaki noa te tangata, rere atu ana te waeroa
Te wahine i tino mihia ko Tauoha, ko te kaiwhakahaere o te haka poi, he ngāwari, he rawe ki te ngangahu
Te wahine nāna i hari mai te wai pounamu hei taratarai atu i te poupou
Te wai hei whakaata ake i ōna moko
Te wai nui, te wai roa, te wai māreparepa
Te waiaruhe: He kupu mō ngā aituā e ngau noa nei i roto i ngā mahara
Te waka i a Te Mana, hei hoe ki runga rā, ki te tonga
Te whai rā nge au te hukanga waihoe nāu, e Ahurei!
Te whakamāori: ko tā tēnei, he kite mēnā ka taea te whakaaro o tētahi kē atu te whakakākahu ki te kupu Māori
Te whakangungu nei ki ngā tara-a-whai o Āraiteuru
Te whakarongoa o ngā motupaika rā!
Te whakateteretia mai he toto māringiringi, te whakateteretia he toto mātahetahe
Te whakatikanga ake ki runga rā, ka tau te ruhi kei aku turi
Te whakatikanga ake o taua tawhiti raka i raro anō e haere ake ana
Te whakatikanga o Tangotango, tū ana i runga i te tekoteko o te whare
Te whakatikanga o ngā rangatira ki te pūkana, ki te whakatekoteko
